Leitunga a gamta a nungta ganhingte khempeuh - vasate, innsate, gamsate, leitunga a hon om ganhingte khempeuh le mihing khempeuh kisia khin hi.
Leikeu tunga om a nakvang pana nuntakna huih a dik peuhmah si hi.

Lei maitanga om a nungta peuhmah kiphiatkhia hi; mihingte ahi a ganhingte ahi a leitunga a bokvak ganhingte le huihlak vasate ahi zongin lei panin a kiphiatsiang hi. Noah le gunkuangpi sunga amah tawh a omte bek suak ta hi.

Ahi hangin Pasian in Noah le amah tawh gunkuangpi sunga a omkhawm innsate le gamsate khempeuh phawk gige a, leitungah huih nungsakin tui kiam hi.
Tu-in a thukna muna tuinakte le vante a tuiciin kongpite kikhak zo a, vantung panin guah a zu nawn kei hi.
Leitungah damdamin tui kiam hi. Ni za le sawmnga a bei ciangin tui kiam manga,
a kha sagihna a ni sawm le sagihna ni-in gunkuangpi Ararat-a mualte tungah a kinga hi.

va-ak khat a khah leh leitunga tui a keu mateng a tung kik zel hi.
Tua ciangin amah in lei maitang pan tui a kiam siang ta hiam cih theih nadingin vakhu khat khah hi.

Ahi hangin vakhu in leitung khempeuh ah tui om lai ahi manin a tuk nading mun a mu kei hi; tua ahi manin gunkuangpi sung Noah kiangah a ciah kik hi. A mah in a khut zankhia in vakhu la a gunkuangpi sung ama kiangah a omsak kik hi.
Ni sagih ngak lai-a gunkuangpi pan vakhu khah leuleu hi.

Ni sagih mah ngak lai-a vakhu khahkhia kik hi. Ahi hangin tua pen ama kiangah a kileh nawn kei hi.
Noah kum zaguk le khat a phak kum masa a kha masa, ani masa pen ni-in lei panin tui a keu siang hi. Tua ciangin Noah in gunkuangpi khuhna phelkhia a, lei maitang a keu lam mu hi.
A kha nihna a ni sawm nih le sagihna ni-in leitung a keu siang sinsen hi.

"Nang le na zi le na tapate le a zite uh gunkuangpi panin paikhia un.
No tawh a omkhawm a nungta ganhingte amau nam ciat - vasate, ganhingte le leitunga a bokvak ganhingte - leitungah amaute khangin cipha-a a pung nadingin paikhiasak in," a ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Noah a tapate le a zi tawh a tapate’ zite tawh a paikhia khawm uh hi.

Tua ciangin Pasian in Noah le a tapate thupha pia in amaute tungah, "Cipha-in pung unla tampi pha-in leitung dim un.
Leitung ganhing khempeuh, huihlak vasa khempeuh leitunga a bokvak ganhing peuhmah le tuipi ngasa khempeuh in note hong kihta in hong zahtak ding uh hi; note khut sungah tuate hong kipia hi.

Kong thum hi, ka sanggampa Esau khut panin hong hon in, ahang in, amah hong pai-in kei le naupangte le a nute hong sim khak ding ka lau hi.
Nang kong lamzangsak pelmawh dinga, na suan-le-khakte a kisim thei lo zah in tuipi sehnel ka bangsak ding hi,’ nong ci khin hi," ci hi.
Tua zan tua lai-ah giaka, ama kianga om a neihsate lakah a sanggampa Esau a piak ding:
keel anu zanih le apa sawmnih,
kala-oh pi a no nei sawm thum, bawngpi sawmli le bawngtal sawmkhat, le laa anu sawmnih le apa sawm telkhia hi.
A nasemte a namnamin hon kepsak a, a nasemte kiangah, "Na mapai unla, ganhonte hon khat le hon khat na kihalsak un," ci hi.
Amah in a masa pa tungah: "Ka sanggampa Esau tawh na kituah uh a, ‘Note kua aa hi a, koi-ah pai sawma, hih na mai-ua gante khempeuh kua aa hiam?’ ci-a hong dot ciangin,
‘Na nasempa Jacob aa ahi hi. Ka topa Esau adinga hong khak hi-a, amah ko nungah hong pai hi,’ ci un," ci-in hilh hi.
A nihna, a thumna le ganhon zuite khempeuh tungah: "Esau tawh na kituah uh ciangin a kibangin gen ciat un.

Tua ciangin, ‘Na nasempa Jacob nungah hong pai hi,’ ci khial kei un," ci hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in, "Ka makhak letsongte in ama lungsim daisak ding hi; tua khita amah ka muh ciangin amah in kei hong sang thei kha ding hi," ci-in ngaihsun hi.

Tua ahi manin tuni dong Israel mite in khelguh tunga belh thaguipi a ne kei uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Jacob’ khelguh kianga thaguipi lawnsak hi.

Tua ciagnin Esau khuadak a numeite le naupangte mu hi. Amah in, "Hih nong tonpihte kua hiam?" ci-in dong hi.
Jacob in, "Pasian in a hehpihna tawh na nasempa a piak tate ahi hi," ci-in dawng hi.

Tua zomin Leah le a tate pai-in a kun uh hi. A nunung penin Joseph le Rachel pai-in a kun uh hi.

Jacob in, "Hi kei, nang muhna-ah maipha ka ngah leh nong hehpihna-in nang tang in. Ahang in, tu-a na maipha ngahin nong sana, na mai ka muh pen Pasian mai mu mah ka bang hi.
Pasian in kei hong hehpih a, ka kisapna khempeuh ka nei hi. Kong puaksa letsongte hong sang hoh in," ci hi. Jacob in a cih tentan manin Esau in sang hi.

Ahi hangin Jacob in, "Naupangte a moi luat lam ka topa in na thei hi. Ka tuunote le ka bawngpi nongek nei laite kong kem ding hi. Ni khat kinawh hawl lua leh ganhing khempeuh si ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ka topa a nasempa mai-ah na pai in; Seir a ka topa kiang kong tun mateng naupangte le gan masuanin damdamin a nung uh kong zui ding hi," a ci hi.

Jacob in, "Bang hanga tua cih ding na hiam?" ci-in donga, ka topa mai-ah maipha hong ngahsak hoh in," ci hi.

Jacob tapate in thupiang a zak phetun gamlak pan innah a ciah pah uh hi. Amaute lungkhamin a heh mahmah uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Shechem in hih loh dingpi khat - Jacob tanu luppih a, Israel sungah h
Ahi hangin Hamor in amaute kiangah, "Ka tapa Shechem in na tanu tungah a lungsim kipsak khin zo hi. A zi dingin amah hong pia un.
I kiteng tuah ding hi; na tanute uh hong pia unla, ka tanute uh tenpih un.
Ko lakah nong teng thei uh hi; no ading leitang kiphal hi. Tua sungah tengin sumbawl i

Mo man ding le letsong-a kong puak ding no deih a tam thei zahzah seh un, nong nget bangbang uh kong pia ding hi. Numeino ka zi dingin hong pia hoh peuhmah un," ci hi.

Amau thusun pen Hamor le a tapa Shechem adingin hoih leh a kilawm hi.

Amaute in, "Hih mite ei tungah thunuam mahmah uh hi. I gam sungah tengsakin, summet bawlsak ni; i gamah amau ading mun-awng tampi om hi. Amau tanute i tenpih thei dinga, amau ei aate tenpih thei ding uh hi.

A innsate uh, amau neihsate le a ganhing khempeuh uh ei aa suak mawh ding ahi hiam? Tua ahi ciangin i utna amau tungah genin ei lakah amau tengsak ni," va ci uh hi.
Khuapi sung pana a paikhia mite khempeuh Hamor le a tapa Shechem cih bangin thukim uh a, khuapi sungah pasal peuhmah vun a ki-at hi.
Ni thum khit ciang mi khempeuh in na a sak hun laitakun Jacob tapate nih Simeon le Levi, Dinah sanggamte in a namsau uh la in a kigingkhol lo khuapi va sim uh a, pasal peuhmah that uh hi.

Amaute in a tuuhonte, a bawnghonte, a laate uh le khuapi sung le lo sunga om amau na khempeuh a matsak uh hi.
Amaute in a hauhnate khempeuh uh, le a numei a naupang teng uh puakhia in inn sunga om na khempeuh laksak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Jacob in Simeon le Levi kiangah, "Hih gama teng Canaan-te le Periz-te tungah nong namsiasak uh a, nong lungkhamsak uh hi. Eite i tawm mahmah hi. Amaute in kei langah pawl kai-in kei hong sim le uh kei le ka innkuanpihte kisia ding hi," ci hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in, "Ka sanggamnu uh numei kizuakte bangin a bawl ding hi zawzen hiam?" ci-in dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Pasian in Jacob kiangah, "Bethel ah paito inla tua lai-ah teng in. Tua lai-ah na sanggampa Esau pana na tai lai-a hong kilang Pasian tungah biakna-tau khat dawh in," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jacob in a innkuanpihte le amah tawh a omte khempeuh tungah, "Na kep uh gamdang pasiante paikhia unla, no le no kisiansuahin na puansilh uh khek un.
Tua khit ciangin hong pai un, ka lungkham laitaka hong dawng, ka painasa tenga hong ompih Pasian tungah biakna-tau khat ka dawhna Bethel ah pai to ni," ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a neih uh gamdang pasiante khempeuh le a bilbahte uh Jacob pia uh a, Jacob in Shechem a tehno sing nuai-ah a phum hi.
Tua ciangin amaute dingkhia uh a, kuamah in amaute a delh loh nadingin amaute kima om khuate ah Pasian in lauhuaina a tungsak hi.

Kum sawm le sagih a pha pan pasalno Joseph in a pa’ zi Zilpah’ tapa le Bilhah’ tapate, a sanggamte tawh tuuhon a cing uh hi; amah in a pa tungah amaute a sia in gen hi.

A pa un amaute khatpeuh sangin amah itzaw cih a muh uh ciangin a sanggamte in amah mudah uh a, kamkhumin a hopih kei uh hi.
Joseph in mang khat mana, a sanggamte kiangah a gen ciangin amaute in amah mudah semsem uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, "Ka mang na ngai dih un:
i vekin lo sung khatah buhtu i lomhen hi. Tua ciangin thakhatin kei aa thoto a tangtakin a kitung hi. Tua laitakin no buhlomte kei aa kimkot-ah kikhawm uh a, kei buhlom lamah a kun uh hi," ci hi.
A sanggamte in ama kiangah, "Ko tungah hong uk sawm na hi hiam? Nang, kote hong uk takpi ding na hi hiam?" ci uh hi. Amaute in a mang hang le a gensate hangin amah mudah zaw semsem uh hi.
Tua ciangin mang dang khat manin, a sanggamte kiangah gen a, "Ngai dih un, mang dang khat ka man hi, tu-a penin ni, kha le aksi sawm le khatte kei lamah kun uh hi," ci hi.
A sanggamte kianga a gen bangin a pa kiangah a gen ciangin a pa in tai a, "Hih na mangmat bang ahi hiam? Na nu le kei le na sanggamte hong pai-in na mai-ah hong kun ding ka hi uh hiam?" ci hi.
A sanggamte in amah haza uh a, ahi hangin a pa in tua thu a lungsim ah ciamteh hi.
Tu-in a pa uh tuuhonte cing dingin a sanggamte Shechem gei-ah kuan khin uh hi.

Shechem ah Joseph a tun ciangin,
amah gamlakah a pai kawikawi mi khatin mu a, "Bang zong na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.

Ahi hangin amaute in a gamlapi panin na mu uh a, amau kiang a tun ma-in a mah thah a na sawm khol uh hi.

Tu-in hong pai un thatin hih tuidumte sung khatah pai-in, ‘Gamsa gilo khat in amah nawmvalh hi,’ ci ni. Tua ciangin a mangte bang hong ci hiam en dih ni," kici uh hi.
Reuben in hih thu a zak ciangin amaute khut panin amah a suahtak zawh nading a hanciam hi. Amah in, "A nuntakna laksak liang kei ni,

a sisan them zong luangsak kei un. Hih sehnel-gam tuidum sungah lawn un. Ahi hangin ama tungah khut khat zong nga kei un," a ci hi. Reuben in amah suahtak-a a pa kianga a ciahpih theih nadingin hih banga a cih ahi hi.

kai in tuidum sungah a khia uh hi. Tuidum a hawm hi a, a sungah tui a om kei hi.
Amaute an ne dingin a tut laitakun a khuadak uh leh Gilead pana pai Ishmael khualzinte a mu uh hi. A kala-ohte un singnamtui, lingsi le paknamtui kha pua hi a, Egypt a puaksuk dinga pai uh ahi hi.

Hong pai un, Ishmael-te zuakin ama tungah i khut nga dah ni; tua banah amah i sanggampa ei si ei sa mah ahi hi," ci hi. A sanggamte a thukim uh hi.

Tuidum ah Reuben a va pai kik leh tua lai-ah Joseph a om loh lam mu-a, a puante balkek hi.
A sanggamte kiangah pai kika, "Naupangpa tua lai-ah a om nawn kei hi. Koi lam nga ding ka hi hiam?" ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph puantualpi la-in, keel khat ngawng-at uh a, a sisan lakah puantualpi diah uh hi.

"Tua gamte’ topa, tua mipa ko tungah hong khauhpau mahmah a, tua gam thu a kansimin hong ngawh hi.

Pa khat suan, sanggam pasal sawm le nih ka pha uh hi. Khat pa om nawn lo-a, a tum pen tu-in Canaan ah ka pa uh tawh om hi,’ ka ci uh hi.

"Tua ciangin gam mite topa, tua mipa in ko kiangah, ‘Mi thuman na hi uh leh na hi loh uh ka theih nading hih bang ahi hi: Na sanggamte uh khat hih lai-ah kei tawh nusia unla, a gilkial na innkuante uh ading an pua-in pai un.
Ahi hangin na nautum pen uh kei kiangah hong puak un; tua ciangin note thu kansim hi loin a thuman na hilam uh ka thei ding hi. Tua ciangin na sanggampa uh kong pia kik dinga, gam sungah sumbawlin a
A ipte uh a butkhit uh ciangin a nguntang ipte uh na om ciat mawk hi! A pa uh leh amaute in sum-ip a muh uh ciangin lauthawng uh hi.

A pa uh Jacob in amaute kiangah, "Ka tate tawh nong kikhensak khin uh hi. Joseph om nawn lo a, Simeon zong om nawn lo hi; tu-in Benjamin paikhiatpih na sawm lai uh hi. Na khempeuh kei langpang suak khin hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben in a pa kiangah, "Amah na kiang kong tut kik kei leh ka tate gel na that thei hi, ka khut sungah muangtakin amah hong ap in, kong puak kik ding hi," ci hi.

Ahi hangin Jacob in, "Ka tapa tua lai-ah nang tawh a paisuk kei ding hi. A sanggampa si zo a, amah bek om lai hi. Na khualzinna uhah amah in bang lo khat tuak kha zenzen leh ka lukang dahna tawh hanah b
Tu-in gamsungah kialpi nasia lai mahmah hi.
Egypt pana a lei uh ante a gaih khit uh ciangin a pa un amaute kiangah, "Kuan kik unla an tawm va lei beh lai un," ci hi.
Ahi hangin Judah in ama kiangah, "Tua mipa in, ‘Na sanggampa uh ka kiangah nong tut kei uh leh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ ci-in limtakin hong vauhilh hi.
Ka sanggampa uh nong tonpihsak ding leh na an ding lei dingin ka paisuk ding uh hi.
Amah nong tonpihsak kei ding leh ka paisuk kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mipa in, ‘Na sanggampa uh kei kiang nong tut kei uh leh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ hong ci hi," ci hi.
Isarael in, "Bang hanga mipa kianga, ‘Sanggam dang khat ka nei lai uh hi,’ va ci-a kei hong lungkhamsak se na hi uh hiam?" ci-in dong hi.

Amaute in, "Tua mipa in ko mahmah le i innkuan thu hong limdot mahmah hi. Amah in, ‘Na pa uh a nungta lai hiam? Sanggam dang na nei uh hiam?’ ci-in ko hong dong hi. A dotnate a dawng lel ka hi uh hi. ‘Na sanggampa uh hong paipih un,’ hong cih ding bangci in ma theih ding ka hi uh hiam?" ci-in dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin Judah in a pa Israel kiangah, "Naupang hong tonpihsak inla nang le ko le i tate puksi lo-a, a nuntak nadingin va pai pak nung.

Amah bangmah a cih loh nadingin ka nuntakna kong kham hi; a tunga tavuan khempeuh nong suan thei hi. Na kiang hong tun kik lo a, na mai-a kong omsak kik kei peuhmah leh ka nuntak sung tawntung tua mawhna ken ka khu ding hi.
Hici bangin ziakai lo hi lehang pai-in nihvei kong tung kik khin ding uh hi," ci hi.

Tua ciangin a pa uh Israel in amaute kiangah, "A tua ci lo thei lo ahileh hi ci hih un! I gama piang a limci penpente - lingsi tawm, khuaizu tawm, singnamtui le paknamtui kha pawlkhat, pistachio le almond gahte na ip sunguah guang unla, tua mipa letsongin puak un.
Na ippi gongua nong puak kik uh nguntang na loh nadingun a zah nih keng un. A kihih khial hikha ding hi.
Na sanggampa uh zong tonpih unla, mipa kiangah pai mengmeng un.
Amah in na sanggampa uh leh Benjamin hong tonpihsak nadingin Thahatpen c
Tua ciangin amaute in letsong le nguntang a zah nih kengin Benjamin zong tonpih uh hi. Egypt ah paisuk mengmeng uh a, amau mahmah Joseph khutah kipia uh hi.
Joseph in amaute tawh Benjamin a muh ciangin ama innsung ukpa kiangah, "Hih mite ka innah paipih inla, gan khat go in nitak an na huan in; an ka ne khawm ding uh hi," ci hi.
Tuapa in Joseph gen bangin tua mite Joseph’ innah paipih hi.

Tua mite a innah a kipaipih ciangin a patau uh hi. Amaute in, "Hih muna hong kipaipihna, i pai masak-a i ip sunga nguntang a kikoih pen hang hi ding hi. Amah in eite hong mawhzonin hong nuainetin a sila dingin hong manin i laate hong laksak nuam hi ding hi," ci-in ngaihsun uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute Joseph innsung ukpa kiangah pai-in inn kongkhakah a hopih uh hi.
Amaute in, "Pu aw, hong hehpih in. A masa in hih lai-ah an lei dingin kong pai uh hi.
Ahi hangin zana ka giah nading mun uh ka tun uh ciangin ka van ciat uh ka hong uh a, kong piak uh ngunte a gik zah lian ciat ka van gong uah na om kim hi. Tua ahi ciangin kong puak kik uh hi.
Ka an lei nading uh zong ngun ka puak thuah uh hi. Ka van sunguah ka ngun uh kua in koih hiam ka thei kei uh hi," ci uh hi.
Amah in, "Pha hi lau kei un. Na pa uh Pasian le note’ Pasian in na gou uh na van sunguah hong koihsak ahi hi; na nguntang uh ka ngah hi," ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute kiangah Simeon a paikhiatpih hi.
Tua innsung ukpa in tua mite Joseph inn sungah paipiha, a khe sil nading uh tui lui-in a laate uh gan-an a pia hi.
Sun-a Joseph a tun cianga, a piak ding uh letsongte a baihsa-in a koih uh hi, Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in tua lai-ah an ne ding cih a zakhol zo uh hi.
Innah Joseph a ciah ciangin inn sunga a tawi uh letsongte amah pia uh a, a mai lei lakah a kun uh hi.
Amah in amaute omzia donga, tua ciangin nong gen uh na pa tek uh bang ci? A dam lai hiam?" ci-in dong hi.
Amaute in, "Ko na nasemte’ pa nungta lai-in dam lai hi," ci-in a dawng uh hi. Zahtakna bawlin a kunsuk uh hi.
A ettel leh ama nu’ tapa Benjamin mu a, "Hih pa a thu nong gen uh na nautum pen uh hiam?" ci-in donga, "Ka tapa aw, Pasian in nang hong hehpih hen," ci hi.
A sanggampa a muh ciangin ki-ip zo lo-a, a kah nading mun khatah Joseph a paikhia pak hi. Ama inndei tuamah pai-in tua lai-ah kap hi.
A mai a phiat khit ciangin paikhia-a, ki-ip tentanin, "An lui un," ci hi.

Amaute in amah guak a tuamin lui-in unaute a tuamin a lui uh hi. Ama an nekpih Egypt mite in amau guakin a ne uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt mite in Hebrew-te tawh an a nekhawm thei kei uh hi, tua pen Egypt mite adingin a kihhuai ahi hi.
Tua ciangin ama mai-ah tua mite a kum uh tawh kizui-in a upa pen pan a nautum pen dongin a tusak uh hi; tua ciangin amaute in lamdang sa uh a khat le khat a ki-en uh hi.
Joseph sabuai panin amaute an a kilui ciangin amau tanh ciat sangin Benjamin aa a zah nga-in a tamzaw hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amah tawh dawnin nuamtakin pawi a bawlkhawm uh hi.
Tu-in Joseph in a innsung ukpa hih bangin a hihsak hi: "Hih mite amau puak zawh zahzah guan inla, a van gonguah a nguntang uh koih ciat in.
Tua ciangin ka hai, ngunhai pen, a an lei nading nguntang tawh a nau tum pen van gongah koihsak in," ci hi. Amah in Joseph gen bangin a hih hi.
Zingsang khuavak ciangin tua mite a laate uh tawh paikhia uh hi.
Khuapi pan gamla a tun ma un Joseph in a innsung ukpa kiangah, "Tua mite nungdelh pak inla, na phak ciangin amaute kiangah, ‘Bang hangin a hoih, a hoih lo-a thuk na hi uh hiam?
Hih hai, ka pu in tuidawnna le aisanna-a zong a zat hai hi lo hiam? A hoih loin na gamta zo uh hi,’ va ci in," a ci hi.
Amah in amaute a phak ciangin amaute kiangah hih teng mah a gen hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in ama kiangah, "Bang hangin ka topa un tua bangin hong ci na hiam? Na nasemte tua bangin gamta buang lawmlawm ding ka hi uh hiam?
Canaan gam panin ka vangong ua ka muh uh nguntang nangawn hong puak kik buang hi lo ka hi uh hiam? Tua ahi ciangin na pu’ inn sunga kham le ngunte bang dinga gu zawzen ding ka hi uh hiam?
Ko na nasemte lakah tua a kimuhna penin sihna thuak henla ko adang teng na sila in kong om ding uh hi," ci uh hi.
Amah in, "Hoih mahmah hi, na cih bangun hita hen, tua a kimuhna pen ka sila suak dinga, no adang teng mawh na baang kei ding uh hi," ci hi.
A van ciat uh lei-ah nga uh a manlang in a hong uh hi.
Tua ciangin nasempa in a upa pen van panin pana, a nautum pen van a nunun pen hi. Tua ciangin Benjamin van sungah hai kimukhia hi.
Tua ciangin a puan uh balkek uh hi. Tua ciangin a vekun a laate uh van suan uh a, khuapi lamah kileh kik uh hi.
Judah le a sanggamte a lut uh ciangin Joseph a innah na om lai a, amai-ah leilak a kidenna uh hi.
Joseph in amaute kiangah, "Bang hanga hici gamtat na hi uh hiam? Kei bang mi in tua bangte aisanin ka theih ding lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?" ci hi.

Judah in, "Ka topa aw, bang gen thei ding ka hi uh hiam? Mawhpeng ka hina uh bangci lah ding ka hi uh hiam? Pasian in na nasemte khialhna a lakkhia zo hi. Kote - kote mahmah le hai kimuhna pa tu-in ka topa’ sila ka hi uh hi," ci-in dawng hi.
Ahi hangin Joseph in, "Tua bang hi mawkmawk lo e! Hai kimuhna pa bek kei sila a suak ding hi. No adang teng na pa uh kiangah lungnuamtakin ciah kik un," ci hi.

Tua ciangin Judah ama kiangah paito in, "Ka topa aw, nong hehpihna-in na nasempa in ka topa tungah kam khat kong gen ding hi. Pharaoh mahmah tawh na kikim hi. Ahi zongin na nasempa tungah hong heh peuhmah kei in.
Ka topa in na nasemte nong donga, ‘Pa ahi zongin sanggam ahi zongin na nei uh hiam?’ nong ci hi.
Kote in, ‘Pa tek khat ka nei uh a, a tek nunga a neih tapa khat a om hi. A sanggampa si zo-in, a nu tapa lakah amah bek hi-a, a pa in amah a it hi,’ kong ci uh hi.
"Tua ciangin na nasemte kiangah, "Kei mahmah muh dingin hong tonpih suk dih un,’ nong ci hi.
Tua ciangin kote in, ‘Naupang in a pa nusia thei lo hi; nusia leh a pa si ding hi," kong ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang na nasemte kiangah, "Na nautum pen uh nong tonpih kei uh leh ka mai na mu kei ding uh hi,’ nong ci hi.
Ka pa kiangah na nasemte ka ciah kik uh ciangin ka topa in nong gen bangin ama kiangah ka gen uh hi.
"Tua ciangin ka pa un, ‘Pai-in an tawm va lei beh lai un,’ hong ci hi.
Ahi hangin, ‘Paisuk thei kei nung. Ka nautum pen uh ka tonpih uh leh ka pai bek ding uh hi. Ka nautum pen un ko hong zuih kei leh tua mipa’ mai ka mu kei ding uh hi,’ ka ci uh hi.
"Na nasempa’ pa in kote kiangah, ka zi in kei tawh tapa nih a nei hi.
A khat penin kei hong nusia zo-a, "Amah kibalzan khin zo hi," ka ci hi. Tua-a kipan amah ka mu nawn kei hi.
Hih pen zong kei kiang pan paikhiatpih in, ama tungah siatna khatpeuh piang kha leh ka lukang han a
"Tua ahi ciangin tu-in naupang ka tonpih kei uh leh na nasempa ka pa uh kiang ka tun ciangin ka pa uh hinna, naupang hinna tungah kinga phadiak ahi manin
naupang mu kei leh amah si ding hi. Na nasemte in ka pa uh lukang dahna tawh hanah ka paipih uh kul ding hi.
Na nasempa in naupang bittaka ka pa kianga tut ding ka kham a’ ‘Amah nang kiang kong tunpih kik kei leh ka nuntak sung tawntung na mai-ah mawhsakna ka thuak ding hi!’ ka ci hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin tu-in nong hehpihna-in ka topa sila in naupang tangin kei hong omsak inla naupang a sanggamte tawh ciahsak in.
Naupang tonpih loin ka pa kiangah bangci pai theih ding ka hiam? Hi thei lo hi! Ka pa tunga piang dahna hong musak kei in," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph amah tawh a om khawmte muhna-ah ki-ip zo nawn lo a, "Ka kiangah kuamah omsak kei un!" ci-in awng hi. Joseph a sanggamte tungah a kipulak ciangin a kiangah kuamah dang a om kei hi.
Amah nak kah lua a, tua Egypt mite in za uh a, Pharaoh inn sunga omte in a thu za uh hi.
Joseph in a sanggamte kiangah, "Kei Joseph ka hi hi! Ka pa a nungta lai hiam?" a ci hi. Ahi hangin amaute a mai-ah laulua uh ahi manin a sanggamte in a dawng thei kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph in a sanggamte kiangah, "Ka kiangah hong neh un," a ci hi. Amaute in a neh khit uh ciangin, "Na sanggampa uh Joseph, Egypt a na zuakpa uh ka hi hi!
Tu-in hih lai-a nong zuakna uh hangin lungzing loin kihehsak tuan kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh nuntakna hu dinga note mai-a Pasian hong sawl ka hi hi.
Ahang in tu-in gam sungah kum nih kialpi tung zo hi. Mailam kum nga sung lo khawhna an lakna a om kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin Pasian in note mai-ah leitunga a baanglaite ading le na nuntakna uh a lamdangtak-a hu b
"Tua ahitak ciangin hih lai-ah hong puak no hi loin Pasian ahi hi. Amah in Pharaoh’ pa hong hisak a, ama innkuante’ topa le Egypt gam khempeuh ukpa in hong koih hi.
Tu-in ka pa kiangah manlangin ciah unla ama kiangah, ‘Na tapa Joseph in: Pasian in Egypt khempeuh topa hong suaksak hi. Ka kiangah hong paisuk un; ziakai kei un.
Goshen kualah na teng ding uh a, nang, na tate le na tute, na tuuhonte, na bawnghonte - na neih khempeuh uh tawh kei nong naih ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ah nang kong vak ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh kialpi tun ding kum nga in sam lai hi. Tua hi kei leh nang le na innkuanpihte le na neihsate in gentheihna a thuak ding hi,’ ci hi.
"Note kianga thugen kei mahmah ka hina note le ka sanggampa Benjamin mahmah in zong a mu hi.
Egypt a kei thupina teng le na muhsa khempeuh uh ka pa’ kiangah na gen un. Manlangin hih lai-ah ka pa hong paipih pah un," ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Benjamin pumkawi-in kap-a, Benjamin in zong kawi-in kap hi.
Amah in a sanggamte namin a kah hi. Tua khit ciangin a sanggamte amah tawh kiho uh hi.
Joseph’ sanggamte hong tung uh cih Pharaoh’ inn sungah a kizak ciangin Pharaoh le a ulian khempeuh a lungdam uh hi.
Pharaoh in Joseph kiangah, "Na sanggamte kiangah, ‘Hih bangin hih un: Na ganhingte uh van suan unla Canaan ah ciah kikin
na pa le na innkuanpihte kei kiangah hong paipih kik un. Egypt a leitang hoihna pen mun kong pia dinga, leitang hoihna na nopsakpih ding uh hi,’ ci in.
"Amaute na hilh nading hih bang ahi hi, ‘Hih bangin hih un: Na zite, na tate tuan nading Egypt pan leng pawlkhat keng unla, na pa va la-in hong pai un.
Na neihsate uh ngaihsutin nei kei un, bang hang hiam cih leh Egypt a na hoih pente no aa hi ding hi,’ ci in," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Israel’ tapate in tua mah bangin ahih uh hi. Joseph in Pharaoh thupiaksa bangin amaute lengte pia a, lampi-a a nek ding uh an zong a guan hi.
Amaute puanthak pia ciat-a, ahi hangin Benjamin ngun shekel c
Tua ciangin a pa tungah: Egypt gama na hoih pente laa sawm puak khop, laapi sawm puak khop an le anlum le a lam-an ding a khak hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggamte paikhiasak a, a dinkhiat uh ciangin amaute kiangah, "Lampi-ah kitawng kei un!" ci hi.
Tua ciangin Egypt panin paikhia to uh a, Canaan gama a pa uh kiang tung uh hi.
Amaute in ama kiangah, "Joseph nungta lai hi! Amah Egypt ukpa na hi takpi hi," ci-in gen uh hi. Jacob lungsi dedu a, amaute thugen a um kei hi.
Ahi hangin Joseph in amau tunga a gente ama tungah a gen uh ciang le Joseph in amah puak kik nadinga a khak lengte a muh ciangin a pa uh Jacob lungsim a khanglo hi.
Tua ciangin Israel in, "Ka taksang ta hi! Ka tapa Joseph nungta lai hi. Ka sih ma-in pai-in amah ka va en ding hi," ci hi.
Tua ciangin a neihsa khempeuh tawh Israel kuankhia-a Beersheba a tun ciangin a pa Isaac’ Pasian tungah biakpiaknate pia hi.
Israel in zanin mang mu a Pasian in, "Jacob, Jacob," ci hi.
Amah in, "Hiah ka om hi," ci-in dawng hi.
Amah in, "Keimah Pasian, na pa’ Pasian ka hi hi; Egypt ah na paisuk ding lau kei in, ahang in, tua lai-ah nang minam lian khat kong suaksak ding hi.
Egypt ah nang kong tonpih suk dinga, kong ciahpih kik pelmawh ding hi. Joseph khut in na mit a khupsak ding hi," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jacob in Beersheba nusia a, Israel’ tapate in a pa uh Jacob le a zi a tate uh Pharaoh in ama tuan nadinga a khak lengte tungah a tuangsak uh hi.
Amaute in a ganhonte uh zong hawl uh a, Canaan-a, a neihsate uh le a suan-le-khakte khempeuh uh tawh Egypt ah a pai uh hi.
Amah in ama suan-le-khakte - a tapate, a tupate le a tanute le a tunute khempeuh Egypt ah tonpih hi.
Hihte, Egypt a pai Israel mite (Jacob le a suan-le-khakte) ahi hi.
Jacob ta upa pen Reuben.

Beriah Amau sanggamnu Serah ahi hi.

Egypt a Jacob tawh a paite khempeuh - a tapate’ zite kisim lo - ama suan-le-khak bekbek - mi sawm guk le guk ahi hi.

Tu-in Jacob in Goshen lam a lak dingin Joseph kiangah Judah a mapaisak hi. Amaute Goshen kual a tun uh ciangin,
Joseph in a sakolleng kithawisak-a, a pa Israel dawn dingin Goshen ah pai hi. Ama mai a muh phetin Joseph in a pa h
Israel in Joseph kiangah, "Tu-in nang a nungta lai na hilam kei mahmah in hong mu khin ka hi manin ka si zongin phamawh ka sa kei hi," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph in a sanggamte le a pa’ innkuanpihte tungah, "Pharaoh kiangah va pai-in, ‘Canaan gama teng ka sanggamte le ka pa’ innkuanpihte ka kiang hong tung zo hi.
Tua mite tuu cingte ahi uh hi; amaute in gan cing uh a, a tuuhonte, a bawnghonte, a neih khempeuh uh hong hawl uh hi,’ ka va ci ding hi.
Pharaoh in hong sap-a, ‘Bang sem na hi uh hiam?’ ci-a hong dot ciangin,

‘Na nasemte in ka pa uh sep bang tektekin ka neu tungua kipan gan ka cing uh hi,’ ci-in na dawng ding uh hi. Tua hileh note Goshen ah hong kitengsak ding hi; ahang in, Egypt-te in tuucing peuhmah a kih uh hi," ci hi.
Joseph pai-a Pharaoh kiangah, "Ka pa le ka sanggamte a tuuhon, a bawnghon uh le a neih khempeuh uh tawh Canaan panin hong pai uh a, tu-in Goshen ah om uh hi," ci-in gen hi.
Amah in a sanggamte nga tengkhia in Pharaoh mai-ah a dingsak hi.
Pharaoh in a sanggamte kiangah, "Bang sem na hi uh hiam?" ci-in dong hi.
Amaute in Pharaoh kiangah, "Ka pate uh mah bangin tuucing ka hi uh hi," ci uh hi.

Amaute in ama kiangah, "Hih lai-ah tawmvei sung a teng dinga hong pai ka hi uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Canaan ah kialpi nasia lua a, na nasemte’ tuuhonte’ nek ding lonona ka nei kei uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin tu-in nong hehpihna tawh na nasemte Goshen ah hong tengsak in," zong ci lai uh hi.
Pharaoh in Joseph kiangah, "Na pa le na sanggamte na kiangah hong tung zo uh a,

Egypt gam lah nangma thu ahi hi; leitang hoih penpenna ah na pa le na sanggamte tengsak in. Amaute Goshen ah tengsak in. Amaute lakah a tuam mahmah-a hih theihna a nei a om leh ka ganhonte uk dingin koih in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joseph in a pa Jacob lutpih-a, Pharaoh mai-ah a dingsak hi. Jacob in Pharaoh thupha a
Pharaoh in, "Kum bangzah na pha ta hiam?" ci-in dong hi.
Tua ciangin Jacob in Pharaoh kiangah, pemta a ka om hun kum za khat le sawm thum ahi hi. Ka nuntak hun tawmin haksa-a, ka pate pemta-a a om kumte a ban zo kei hi," ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jacob in Pharaoh thupha b
Tua ciangin Joseph in Pharaoh thupiak bangin a pa le a sanggamte gam hoih penpenna mun Rameses gamkhen amau adingin pia-a, tengsak hi.
Joseph in a pa le a sanggamte le a pa’ innkuanpihte khempeuh amau tate phazah tawh kizui-in an zong vak hi.
Kialpi nasia lua ahi manin tua gam kual bupah an a om peuhmah kei hi; kialpi hangin Egypt le Canaan a nih in a kial khawm hi.
Joseph in Egypt le Canaan a sum om khempeuh an manin ngah khina, Pharaoh’ innah a puak hi.

Hihte a sisa a tawmkha mi peuhmah a puansilhte sawp pelmawh dinga amah nitak mateng a siang lo hi ding hi.
"‘Ganhing a khecin ka napi ka siang taktak lo a eknel a hai lote note adingin a siang lo ahi hi; tuate khatpeuh a sisa a lawng peuhmah a siang lo ahi ding hi.
Khe li nei ganhingte lakah a khe bomin cin a nei peuhmah note adingin a siang lo ahi hi; tuate a sisa a lawngkha peuhmah nitak mateng a siang lo ahi hi.
Tuate a tawm khatpeuh in a puansilhte sawp pelmawh dinga amah nitak mateng a siang lo hi ding hi. Tuate note adingin a siang lo ahi hi.
"‘Leitunga a bokvak ganhingte lakah note adingin a siang lote in: bui, zusa, tangpi nam khempeuh,
innhik, thankik, tangteuh, saphulip le tawlbawkpi-te ahi hi.
Leitunga a awmtal ganhing khempeuh lakah note adingin a siang lo hihte ahi hi. Hihte a sisa a lawngkha peuhmah nitak mateng a siang lo ahi hi.

Hihte lakah khatpeuh sisa na khat tungah a kiat leh tua a tukna, a kizang na: sing, puan, savun ahikeh ippi ahi zongin a siang lo a suak hi. Tui-ah diah un; nitak mateng a siang lo hi dinga, tua ciangin a siang ding hi.
Tuate khat leibeel sungah a kiat leh a sunga om na khempeuh a siang lo hi dinga, a beel na sukham pelmawh ding uh hi.
Nek ding an khat tua banga a sianglo beel sungah tui in a buah khak leh a siang lo hi a, tui dawn ding tua bang beel sungah a om khak leh tua tui a siang lo a suak hi.
Tua bang ganhing sisa a tukna na khatpeuh a siang lo a suak hi; tua bang thuk ahikeh anbeel pel loin na suksiat ding ahi hi. Tuate a siang lo hi a, a siang lo-a na koih ding uh ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin tuinak ahikeh tuibem kuangzawnte a siang veve hi a, ahi hangin hih ganhing sisate a lawng peuhmah a siang lo ahi hi.
Ganhing sisa khat a kituh ding khaici tung khatah a kiat leh a sianglai veve hi.
Ahi hangin a khaici tui-ah a kidiah khitin ganhing sisa tungah a kiat leh no adingin tua khaici a siang lo ahi hi.
"‘Note nek theih ganhing khatpeuh a sih leh tua a sisa ganhing a lawngkha mi khatpeuh nitak mateng a siang lo hi ding hi.

Ganhing sisa a ne mi khat peuhmah in a puansilhte sawp tektek dinga, nitak mateng amah a siang lo hi ding hi. Tua bang ganhing sisa a tawm peuhmah in a puansilhte sawp pelmawh dinga nitak mateng amah a siang lo hi ding hi.
"‘Leitunga a bokvak ganhing peuhmah note adingin a kihhuai hi a; nek loh ding ahi hi.
Leitungah bokvaka pai ahikeh a awma tal ahikeh kheli-a pai ahikeh khe tampi-a paite ahi zongin na ne kei ding uh hi; tuate kihhuai hi.
Hih ganhingte khatpeuhin kibuahsak kei in. Tuate hangin kisiang losak ahikeh tuate hangin nang le nang a siang lo kisuaksak kei in.
Keimah
Keimah note Pasian ahi dingin Egypt pana hong pikhia
"‘Hihte in vasate, tui sunga gamta a nungta ganhing khempeuh le leitunga a bokvak a nungta ganhing khempeuh tawh kisai ngeinate ahi hi.
Note in a nungta ganhingte asiang le asiang lo, a sa nek theih ding le nek theih loh ding na khen ciltel ding uh hi,’ ci un," a ci hi.
in Moses tungah,
"Israel-te tungah: ‘Numei khat gai-a tapa a suah leh khasim a nin neih-a a sian loh bang tektekin ni sagih sung a siang loin kiseh hi.
A nigiat ni-in pasalnote a vun ki-atsak ding hi.

Tua ciangin numei in a sisan luanna pan a kisiansuah nadingin ni sawmthum le thum ngak tektek ding hi. Tuanu in a kisiansuahna ni a khen mateng a siangtho na khatpeuh lawng lo dinga, mun siangtho ah a pai kei ding hi.
Amah in tanu mei a suah leh, a nin neih lai bangin nipi kal nih sung a siang lo hi ding hi. Tua ciangin a si luanna pan siansuah nadingin ni sawmguk le guk sung ngak pelmawh ding hi.

"‘Tapa a nei a tanu a nei zongin a kisiansuahna ni a cin khit ciangin Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna-a siampipa kiangah meihal biakna dingin kum khat a pha tuuno khat le mawhna hanga biakna dingin kawlvakhu no ahikeh vakhu khat paipih ding hi.
Amah in tuanu adingin

"‘Tuanu in tuuno a neih zawh kei leh vakhu nih ahikeh kawlvakhuno nih khat haltum biak nading, adang khat mawhna hanga biakna dingin a tawi ding hi. Hici bangin siampipa in tuanu adingin thoihdamna bawlsakin, tua ciangin amah a siang hi ding hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.
in Moses le Aaron tungah,
"Mi khatpeuh in a vun tungah a kilawh thei vun natna a
Siampipa in tua vuna meima veel dinga a meima munah mulkang a po-a, meima zong vun sang a thukzaw c
A vun meima kanga a vun sanga thukzaw dingin a kilata, a meima sunga mul a kan nai kei leh siampipa in tua cinapa ni sagih sung a tangkoih ding hi.
A ni sagih ni ciangin siampipa in amah veel dinga a meima kikhel tuan loin a vun ah zong masem tuan lo hi cih a muh leh adang ni sagih sung a tuamin ki-omsak lai ding hi.

A ni sagihna ni-in siampipa in veel kik dinga, a meima masem tuan loin a vuai leh siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in gen ding hi; tua pen a dulh mawkmawk ahi hi. Mipa in a puansilhte sawp pelmawh dinga tua ciangin amah a siang ding hi.
Ahi hangin amah siampipa tungah kilak a, amah a siang hi, ci-a a kipulak khitin tua a dulh pen a vun tungah a masem leh siampipa tungah pelloin a kilak kik ding hi.
Siampipa in amah vel dinga a dulh in a vun tungah ma a sem leh amah siang lo hi, ci-in pulak ding hi; tua in a kilawh thei natna khat ahi hi.
"Mi khatpeuh in a kilawh thei vun natna a vei leh siampipa kiangah kipuak pelmawh ding hi.
Siampipa in amah veel dinga a vun sungah kangin bawka a multe a kan khita a bawk sungah mathak a om leh,
tua pen vun natna kumlui hi a, siampipa in amah siang lo hi, ci-in a pulak ding hi. Amah a siang losa ahi manin tuam omsak kul lo hi.
"Tua natna a vuntung khempeuh ah a kilawh khit leh siampipa muhna ciangah cinapa a luzang pan a khepek donga vun khempeuh a tuam khit leh,
siampipa in amah veel dinga natna in a pumtuam khin ahileh tua mipa a siang hi, ci-in pulak ding hi. Amah a pumtangin kangkhin ahi nungsang a siang ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ama tungah mathak a kilat peuhpeuh ciangin amah a siang lo ahi ding hi.
Siampipa in mathak a muh ciangin amah a siang lo ahi hi; amah a kilawh thei natna vei ahi hi.
Tua a mathak pen kikhelin a kan leh pel loin siampipa kiangah pai ding hi.
Siampipa in amah veel dinga, a meima kikhelin a kan leh siampipa in meima vei pen a siang hi, ci-in a pulak ding hi; tua ciangin amah a siang hi ding hi.
"Mi khatpeuh in vun tungah meimatum vei-in a dama,
a meima-tum veina mun bawkin kanga, ahikeh a sankang a suah leh amah siampipa tungah va kilak ding hi.

Siampipa in veelsak dinga, vun sahna sanga thukzaw-in, a kilat a, tua sunga a mul a kan khit leh siampipa in amah a siang loin pulak ding hi. Meimatum a omna munah a kitap khit leh a kilawh thei vun natna khat ahi hi.
Ahi hangin siampipa in veelsaka, a sungah mulkang po loin vunsahna sangin thukzaw lo-a, a vuai leh siampipa in amah a tuamin ni sagih sung koih ding hi.
A vun tung dang a lawh leh siampipa in, amah a siang lo ahi hi, ci-in pulak ding hi; tua pen a kilawh thei ahi hi.
Ahi hangin masem tuan lo-a, a mundang a lawh tuan kei leh tua in meimatum pawn hi lel a, siampipa in amah a siang hi, ci-in pulak ding hi.
"Mi khatpeuh mei kanga, a katna mathak vun tungah a sankang ahikeh akang liklek a om leh,

siampipa in tua mun etsak dinga, a sunga a multe kang khina, vun sahna sangin thukzaw dinga a kilat leh tua pen meikatna pana kipankhia a kilawh thei natna ahi hi. Siampipa in amah a siang lo ahi hi, ci-in pulak ding hi; tua in a kilawh thei vun natna khat ahi hi.
Ahi hangin siampipa in a veelsaka a ma-ah a mulkang om loin vun sahna sangin thukzaw lo-a a vuai lel ahileh siampipa in amah ni sagih sung tuam omsak ding hi.
A ni sagih ni ciangin siampipa in amah veel kik dinga, a vun dang a lawh leh siampipa in amah a siang lo hi, ci-in pulak ding hi; tua in a kilawh thei vunnatna khat ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin masem tuan lo-a, a vun tungtham a lawh tuan kei leh a dulh lel hi-in a katna pana bawk ahileh siampipa in amah a siangin pulak ding hi; tua pen a katna pana meima pawn lel ahi hi.
"Numei ahikeh pasal khat in a lutang ahikeh a kha ah meima a neih leh

siampipa in a meima veelsak dinga vun sahna sangin thukzaw dingin a kilat-a, a sunga a mul ngatin a naipak mel ahileh siampipa in tua mipa a siang loin pulak ding hi; tua lutang ahikeh kha-a a kilawh thei cithak natna khat ahi hi.

Ahi hangin siampipa in hih meima namte a veel ciangin vun sahna zah sangin a thukzaw lo ding tawh a kibata, a sungah mulvom a om kei leh siampipa in tua natna nei pen ni sagih sung a tuamin omsak ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in siampipa in meima veelsak dinga, a thak pen in a mundang lawh tuan loin a sungah a mul-naipak a om kei a, vun sahna sangin thukzaw dingin a kilat kei leh
tuapa in a natna mun teng lobuang a mul met dinga siampipa in adang ni sagih a tuamin kem lai ding hi.

A ni sagihna ni-in siampipa in a cithak veel dinga a vun dang lawh loin vun sahna sangin thukzaw dinga a kilat leh siampipa in amah a siangin pulak ding hi. Amah in a puansilhte sawp pelmawh dinga tua ciangin amah a siang hi ding hi.
Ahi hangin amah siang hi, ci-a a kipulak khitin a ci thakna in a vun sungah ma a seem leh
siampipa in amah veel dinga a cithakna in a vun sung a lawh khit leh siampipa in a mul naipak a zon ding kisam nawn lo hi; tua mipa a siang lo ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin kikhelna om lo-a, a sungah mulvom po zo hi, ci-a a khentel leh tua cithak a dam khin ahi hi. Amah a siang hi a, siampipa in amah a siangin pulak ding hi.
"Numei khat ahikeh pasal khatin a vun tungah cikang khat a neih ciangin
siampipa in tuate veel dinga, tua mun a kang milmial ahileh, tua pen a lauhuai lo vuntung puakkhamin adulh hi-a, tua mi a siang ahi hi.
"Pasal khat a sam pulhin a lu a tol leh amah a siang ahi hi.
Amah a luzang a sam pulh-a, a tal a kolh leh amah a siang hi.
Ahi hangin a lu kolh-a, ahikeh a taltangah sakang meima a vei leh tua pen a lutung ahikeh a taltanga pokhia a kilawh thei natna ahi hi.
Siampipa in amah veel dinga a lutang ahikeh a taltanga meima bawk pen a kilawh thei vun natna tawh kibangin a sankangin a om leh,
tua mi natna vei hi-a, a siang lo ahi hi. A lutanga meima hangin siampipa in a siang loin pulak ding hi.
"Tua bang a kilawh thei natna a nei mi-in pel loin puansia silh dinga a sam hiatmam a
Tua bang natna a vei sung teng amah a siang lo ahi hi. Pel loin amah kia om dinga giahphual pualamah a teng ding hi.
"Puansilh khatpeuh ap in a siatsak leh - samul puan ahikeh saihadial puan khatpeuh,
khau tawh ahikeh samul tawh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan khatpeuh, savun tawh ahikeh savun ahikeh savun tawh a kibawl na khatpeuh -
le puansilh ahikeh savun, ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan nate, ahikeh savun tawh kibawl na khatpeuh a mel eng pian ahikeh san pianin a ap leh pel loin siampipa kilak ding hi.
Siampipa in tua ap veel dinga tua a ap na pen ni sagih sung tang koih ding hi.
A ni sagihna ni-in tua na veel kik dinga, a ap pen in a puansilh ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan, ahikeh na-a kizang savun pen mundang a lawh leh tua pen a siahuai ap hi a, tua na a siang lo ahi hi.

Amah in tua puansilh ahikeh samul tawh ahikeh khau tawh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan na, ahikeh savun kibawl na khatpeuh gial in a sep peuhmah haltum ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua ap pen a siahuai thei hi-a, tua na haltum ding ahi hi.
"Ahi hangin siampipa in a veel ciangin tua ap pen puansilh ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan ahikeh savuna kibawl na a tung daang a lawh kei leh,
amah in tua gial in a sep na pen sawpsak ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in adang ni sagih sung tang koih lai ding hi.

Tua na a apna mun a kisawp khit ciangin, siampipa in veel dinga, tua ap in a mel a khek tuan keileh a mundang a lawh loh hangin a siang lo ahi hi. A ap in pang khat ahikeh adang khat a siatsak loh hangin mei-in hal un.
Siampipa in tua na a veel ciangin tua na a kisawp khit nungin a apte a vul leh, puansilh ahikeh savun ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan na a siatna mun teng eukhia ding hi.
Ahi hangin tua pen puansilh tung ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan na ahikeh savun kibawl na tungah a mundang ah a kilat kik leh tua banga a ap van peuhmah mei-a hal ding ahi hi.
Tua puansilh ahikeh a kigan ahikeh a kiphan na, ahikeh savun kibawl na khatpeuh a kisawpsa pen a ap nawn kei leh pel loin kisawp kik dinga tua ciangin a siang hi ding hi," a ci hi.
Hihte in samul puan ahikeh patpuan a kigan ahikeh a kiphan na, ahikeh savun kibawl na khatpeuh a apna hanga gial in a sepna tawh kisai a siang le a siang lo pulak nading ngeinate ahi hi.
in Moses tungah,
"Hihte in siampipa mai-ah cinate kipaipihin a kisiansuah hun cianga zat ding ngeinate ahi hi:
Giahphual pualam ah siampipa paikhia-in amah veel ding hi. Tua mi a kilawh thei ama vunnatna a
mi khat sian nadingin siampipa in a nungta vasa a siang nih leh tamtak sing pawlkhat, a-ausan khau le puknah a lasak ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in tua vasate khat, leibeel a tuisiang tungah gosak ding hi.
Tua ciangin amah in vasa a hing lai pen la dinga, tuisiang tunga kigosa vasa pen sisan sungah tamtak sing, a-ausan khau le puknah tawh diahkhawm ding hi.
Amah in tua a kilawh thei natna a vei pen sagih vei theh dinga tua ciangin amah siang hi, ci-in pulak ding hi. Tua ciangin amah in vasa ahing lai pen gamlakah a khah ding hi.

"A kisiangsak ding mi pen in pel loin a puan sawpin a mul khempeuh metin tui-in kisil ding hi; tua ciangin amah a siangin kiseh ding hi. Tua teng khit ciangin giahphual sungah lut thei dinga ahi hangin ama puanbuk pua-ah ni sagih sung a om pelmawh ding hi.

A ni sagihna ni-in a mul khempeuh met pelmawh ding hi; amah in a lu, a khamul, a mitkhu-mul le a mul dang khempeuh met ding hi. Pel loin a puansilhte sawpin kipumsil dinga tua ciangin asiang hi ding hi.
"A nigiat ni-in amah in a sitbaang lo kum khat a pha tuuno apa nih le anu khat, le an-a biakna dingin sathau tawh helsa annel limci ephah b
Amah in siang hi, ci-a a pulak siampipa in a kisiangsak ding mi le a biaknate Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna
"Tua khit ciangin siampipa in tuu-pano khat la dinga sathau bingta khat tawh khialhna biakna-in a piakhawm ding hi; amah in
Amah in tua tuuno, mawhna hanga biakna le meihal biakna gawhna mun siangtho ah a go ding hi. Mawhna hanga biakna mah bangin khialhna hanga biaknate siampite aa hi-a, a siangtho pen ahi hi.
Siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna sisan pawlkhat la in a kisiangsak ding mi taklam bilhual tung, a taklam khutpi tung le a taklam khepi tungah nuh ding hi.
Tua khit ciangin siampipa in bingta pana sathau la dinga ama veilam khutpek sungah sungin,
a khut sunga sathau lakah a taklam khutme-lai diahin a khutme tawh pawlkhat
Siampipa in a khutpek sunga a om lai sathau, a kisiangsak ding mi taklam bilhual, a taklam khutpi tung le a taklam khepi tung, khialhna hanga biakna sisan tungah nuh thuah ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutpek sunga om lai sathau pen a kisiangsak ding mi lutung ah koih dinga ama adingin
"Tua ciangin siampipa in, sianlohna pan a kisiangsak ding mi thoihdamna bawlin mawhna hanga biakna a pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin siampipa in meihal biakna go dinga,
an-a biakna tawh biakna-tau tungah piakhawmin ama adingin thoihdamna bawlin, tua ciangin amah a siang ding hi.

"Bangbang ahi zongin amah zawngin hihte a neih zawh keileh amah in a pel loin ama ading thoihdamna bawlna-a vei ding, khialhna hanga biakna adingin tuuno apa khat tawh, an-a biakna dingin annel limci sathau kihelsa ephah d
le ama neih zawh ding vakhu nih ahikeh kawlvakhu nih, mawhna hanga biak nading khat le a khat pen meihal biakna dingin a tawikhawm ding hi.
"A nigiat ni-in amah in a sian nadingin Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna
Siampipa in khialhna hanga biakna dingin tuuno le sathau bingta lakhawm dinga vei-a biakna-in
Amah in khialhna hanga biakna dingin tuuno go dinga a sisan pawlkhat la-in a kisiangsak ding mi taklam bilhual tung, a taklam khutpi tung le a taklam khepi tungah a nuh ding hi.
Siampipa in a veilam khutpek sungah sathau pawlkhat sung dinga,
a taklam khutme-lai tawh a khutpek sunga sathau pawlkhat
Amah in a khutpek sunga sathau pawlkhat pen khialhna hanga biakna sisan a nuhna mun teng - a kisiangsak ding mi taklam bilhual, a taklam khutpi tung le a taklam khepi tungah a nuhsak ding hi.
Siampipa in a khutpek sunga a omlai sathaute a kisiangsak ding mipa lutungah nuhsak dinga,
Tua ciangin amah in a kisiangsak ding mi neih zawh bangbang vakhu ahikeh kawl-vakhute biakna-in pia dinga
khat e
Hihte in a kilawh thei vun natna a vei peuhpeuh, ama sian nadinga biak nading zah a pia zo lo peuhmah kisiansak nading ngeinate ahi hi.
"Note neih dinga kong piak Canaan leitang ah na lut uh ciangin tua gama inn khatah ap ka na kaisak leh
pel loin a inn neipa siampipa kiangah pai-in, ‘Ka inn sungah apkai tawh kibang khat ka mu hi,’ ci-in gen ding hi.

Inn sunga na khatpeuh a siang lo-a a pulak khak loh nadingin siampipa, apkai veel dinga a pai ma-in inn sung a hawma a om nadingin thu a pia ding hi. Tua khit ciangin siampipa a sungah lutin veel ding hi.
Amah in kawm tunga apkai veel dinga, a-eng pian ahikeh asan pianin ne kuaka, a kawm maitang sahna sangin thuk bunzaw-a, a kilat leh,
inn pua-ah siampipa paikhia dinga ni sagih sung tua inn kongkhak a khakcip ding hi.
A ni sagih ni-in siampipa in tua inn veel kik ding hi. A apkai pen in kawm tung dang a lawh leh,
amah in gial in a sepsa suangtumte kalkhia-in khuanawl a siang lo mun khatah paisak ding hi.
Amah in kawm sunglam khempeuh kiatkhiasak tektek dinga, tua a kikiatkhia a zutna themte, khuapua a sianglo mun khatah buasak ding hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in hihte suang dangin laih ding uh a, buan thak la-in inn a zut ding uh hi.
"Tua inn a, a apkai suangte kilaihkhia a, kikiatkhia in a kizut thak nungin tua inn ah apkai a kilat kik leh,
siampipa pai-in veel dinga, a inn sungteng apkai in a zelh leh a siasak thei apkai hi-a, a inn a siang lo ahi hi.
Pel loin tua inn - a suangte, a singte le a zutnate phelkhia-in khuapua a sianglo mun khatah kinawnkhia ding hi.
"Tua inn a kikhakcip laitaka a sunga lut peuhmah a nitak dong a siang lo hi ding hi.
Tua inn sunga a lum ahikeh an ne peuhmah in pel loin a puansilhte uh a sawp ding uh hi.
"Ahi hangin siampipa a veel dingin pai-a, a kizut kik zawhin a apkai in mundang a lawh kei leh apkai om nawn lo ahi manin amah in tua inn a siang hi, ci-in a pulak ding hi.
Tua inn siansuah nadingin amah in vasa nih le tamtak sing pawlkhat, khau ausan le puknahte a tawi ding hi.
Amah in vasa khat leibeel sunga kikoih tuisiang tungah a go ding hi.
Tua ciangin tamtak sing, puknah, khau ausan le vasa a hing lai pen la-in tuate a sisa vasa sisan le tui siang sungah diahin tua inn sung sagih vei a theh ding hi.
Amah in vasa sisan, tuisiang, vasa a hinglai pen, tamtak sing, puknah le khau ausan-te in tua inn a siansuah ding hi.
Tua khit ciangin amah in vasa a hing lai pen khuapua gamlakah khah ding hi. Hici bangin inn adingin thoihdamna bawl dinga tua ciangin a siang ding hi," a ci hi.
Hihte in, a kilawh thei vun natna khatpeuh, cithak,
puansilh ahikeh inn tunga ap a kai ciang
le a bawk a dulh ahikeh vuntung kang liklek-te tawh kisai
a siang le a siang lo ettel cianga zat ding ngeinate ahi hi.
Hihte in a kilawh thei vunnatnate le a apkai tawh kisai ngeinate ahi hi.
in Moses le Aaron tungah,
"Israel-te hopih unla amaute tungah: ‘Pasal khatpeuh in a pumpi panin a pawtkhia a neih leh tua a pawtkhia a siang lo ahi hi.
A pumpi panin a luang den ahikeh a kang zel zongin tua in amah a siang lo a suaksak hi. Hih in amah pana pawt, a siang lo na in amah a sianlohsak zia ahi hi:
"‘A natui a pawt mipa lupna a sianglo hi dinga ama tutna na khatpeuh asianglo hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawng peuhmah in a puansilhte sawpin tui-in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
A na tui pawt mipa tutna na khatpeuh tunga a tu peuhpeuh in a puansilhte sawpin tui in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng amah asianglo hi ding hi.
"‘A pawtkhia a nei mipa a lawngkha peuhmah in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin, tui-in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng asianglo ahi hi.
"‘A natui pawt mipa in mi khatpeuh a cil a phih leh tua mipa in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin, tui-in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng a siang lo hi ding hi.
"‘Tua mipa a tuanna-a a tutna na khempeuh asianglo hi dinga
ama nuai-a a tutna a lawng peuhmah nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi; tua nate a tawm peuhmah in pel loin a puansilhte sawp dinga tui-in kipumsilin a nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
"‘A natui a pawt mipa in a khut silsiang sinsen lopi-in a lawn khak mi peuhmah in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin tui-in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
"‘Tua mipa in a lawnkhak leibeel kisukham dinga, singa kibawl na khatpeuh ahileh tui-in kisilsiang kiuhkeuh ding hi.
"‘Mi khat a natui pawtna pan a kisiansak ciangin, ama sian nadingin ni sagih simto ding hi; amah in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin tui siangin kisil dinga; tua ciangin amah a siang hi ding hi.
A nigiat ni-in amah in pel loin vakhu nih ahikeh kawl-vakhu nih tawi-in Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna
Siampipa in tuate khat mawhna hanga biakna le a khat pen meihal biakna-in pia ding hi. Hici bangin amah in mipa a natui pawtna hangin
"‘Pasal khatpeuh in a bawtui a teh ciangin tui-in a pumtung khempeuh pumsil pelmawh dinga a nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
A bawtui banna puansilh ahikeh savun pel loin tui tawh kisawp dinga, tua pen nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
Pasal khat numei khat tawh lumkhawma a bawtui a teh ciangin pel loin amaute gel tui-in kipumsil ding uh a, nitak mateng asianglo hi ding uh hi.
"‘Numei khat in a neih ngei sisan a luan ciangin a khasima a nit hun ni sagih sung hi dinga amah a lawngkha peuhmah nitak mateng a nin hi ding hi.
"‘A hunin a phak sungteng, a lupna na peuhmah le a tutna nate peuhmah asianglo hi ding hi.
Ama lupna a lawngkha peuhmah in a puansilh sawpin tui-in kipumsil dinga, a nitak mateng tuapa asianglo hi ding hi.
Ama tutna na khatpeuh a sukha peuhmah in pel loin a puansilh sawpin tui-in kipumsil dinga a nitak mateng tuapa a sianglo hi ding hi.
A lupna ahikeh a tutna khatzawsang, mi khatpeuh in a sukkhak ciangin a nitak mateng tuapa a sianglo hi ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in tuanu a luppih a tuanu khasim nin in amah a sukkhak leh tuapa ni sagih sung asianglo hi a; tuapa lupna khatpeuh zong asianglo ahi hi.

"‘Numei khat ama khasim nin neih hun sangin ni tampi sung sisan luang ahikeh a nin neih hun ngeina sanga sawtzaw a neih leh a nin neih hun nite bang tektekin a nin kizoma a pai laisiah amah asianglo hi ding hi.
A nin neih hun sunga mah bangin nin neih a kizop hun sungteng a lupna a sianglo hi dinga, a nin neih hun sung mah bangin a tutna na khatpeuh asianglo hi ding hi.
Tuate a lawng peuhmah a sianglo hi dinga; tuapa in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin tui-in kisil dinga, nitak mateng asianglo hi ding hi.
"‘Tuanu ama nin neihna pan a sian zawh ni sagih ciangin asiangin a kiseh ding hi.
A nigiat ni-in tuanu in pel loin vakhu nih ahikeh kawl-vakhu nih tawi dinga, tuate Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna-a siampipa tungah a paipih ding hi.
Siampipa in khat mawhna hanga biakna le a khat meihal biakna-in a pia ding hi. Hici bangin amah in tuanu nin neihna hanga sianlohna tang dingin

"Mun siangtho huang sunga Aaron lut nading zia hih bang ahi hi: Mawhna hanga biak nading bawngtalno khat le meihal biakna dingin tuutal khat a keng ding hi.

Saihadial puantungsilh siangtho silhin a pumpi tungah saihadial puan sungsilhte silh dinga, saihadial puan kawnggak tawh gakin saihadial puan khim ding hi. Hihte pen puansilh siangtho ahi hi; tua ahi ciangin hihte a silh ma-in a kipumsil pelmawh ding hi.
Israel mipite panin mawhna hanga biak nading keeltal nih le meihal biakna dingin tuutal khat a keng ding hi.
"Aaron in ama mawhna hanga biakna-in bawngtal pia dinga, amah le a innkuanpihte adingin thoihdamna a bawl ding hi.

"Aaron in ama mawhna hanga biakna-in bawngtal pia dinga, amahmah le a innkuanpihte ading thoihdamna bawlin ama mawhna hanga biakna dingin bawngtal a go ding hi.
Amah in
Amah in
Amah in bawngtal sisan pawlkhat la-in a khutme tawh thoihdamna sin mai theh ding hi; tua ciangin pawlkhat a khutme-in la dinga thoihdamna sin mai sagih vei a theh ding hi.

"Tua khit ciangin amah in mipite mawhna hanga biakna-in tua keel go dinga a sisan puanzak nungah paipih in bawngtal sisan tawh a hih bangin tua tawh a hih ding hi: Amah in thoihdamna mai le a sin tung theh ding hi.

Israel-te sianlohna le a lehdonate uh - a bawlsa uh mawhnate hangin hici bangin Mun Siangtho Pen adingin thoihdamna a bawl ding hi. Amah in amaute siantholohna laizanga amaute laka Kikhopna Puanbuk adingin zong hici bang mahin a hih ding hi.

Mun Siangtho Pen sungah thoihdamna bawl dinga Aaron a luta kipan, ama ading, a innkuante ading le Israel mihon buppi adingin thoihdamna bawl manta-a a pai khiat mateng tua Kikhopna Puanbuk sungah kuamah a om kei ding hi.
"Tua khit ciangin amah
Amah in Israel-te sianlohna pan tua biakna-tau siansuah a, ap nadingin a khutme tawh sisan sagih vei a theh ding hi.
"Aaron in Mun Siangtho Pen, Kikhopna Puanbuk le biakna-taute thoihdamna bawl a man ciangin tua keel a hinglai pen a paikhiatpih ding hi.

Amah in tua a hinglai keel lutungah a khut gel nga dinga, Israel-te gitlohna le a lehdonate khempeuh uh - amaute mawhna khempeuh tua keel lutungah a suan ding hi. Amah in hih nasem dinga a seh mi khat khut tungah tua keel gam sungah a khahmang ding hi.
Tua keel in amaute mawhna khempeuh pua-in gam simtham ah a paipih ding hi; tuaci-in mipa in gamlak ah a khah ding hi.
"Tua khit ciangin Kikhopna Puanbuk sungah Aaron lut dinga, Mun Siangtho Pen sunga a lut ma-in a puansilh saihadial puante suahkhia-in tua munah nusia ding hi.

Amah mun siangtho khatah tui-in kipumsil dinga ama puansilh ngeite a silh ding hi. Tua ciangin amah paikhia dinga, amah le mipite thoihdamna bawlna-in ama ading meihal biakna le mipite ading meihal biakna amah mah in a pia ding hi.
Amah in biakna-tau tungah mawhna hanga biakna thau zong a hal ding hi.
"Tua mawhpua keel-a keel khat a khahpa in pel loin a puansilhte sawpin tui-in kipumsil ding hi; tua khit ciangin a giahphual sungah tum thei pan ding hi.

Thoihdamna bawl nadinga Mun Siangtho Pen sunga a sisan kipaipih tua mawhna hanga biakna bawngtal le keel, pel loin giahphual pua-ah kipaikhiatpih ding hi; tuate vunte, a satak le a ekte kihaltum ding hi.
Tuate a halte in pel loin a puante uh sawpin tui-in a kipumsil ding uh hi; tua khit ciangin giahphual sungah tum thei pan ding uh hi.

Tua mipa ka maigumsan dinga, a mipihte panin ka khenkhia ding hi; ahang in, amah in a tate Molech pia-in, ka mun siangtho buahsak a, ka min siangtho a daisak hi.

tua mipa le a innkuanpihte ka maigumsan dinga, Molech tunga kizuak amah le amah hih bang zui-a a va kizuakte khempeuh a mipihte panin a kikhen-khia ding hi.

Ka thukipte zui-in tang un. Keimah
"‘Mi khatpeuh in a nu ahikeh a pa a hamsiat leh amah kithat pelmawh ding hi. Amah in a nu ahikeh a pa hamsiat khin ahi manin ama sisan ama lutung mah tu ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in midang khat zi - a vengpa zi tawh ang a kikawm uh leh angkawmnu le angkawmpa kithat pelmawh ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in a pa zi a luppih leh a pa selpho ahi hi. Tuapa le tuanu kithat khawm pelmawh ding hi; amaute sisan amau lutung mah tu ding hi.
"‘Pisal khat a monu tawh a lupkhawm leh a nih un thah pelmawh ding ahi hi. Amau gamtatnasa pen lehtatna hi a; amau sisan amau tung mah tu ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in numei luppih bangin pasal khat a luppih leh a nih un a kihhuai-a gamta khin uh ahi hi. Amaute kithat pelmawh ding hi; amau sisan amau lutungah tu ding hi.
"Pasal khat in numei khat le tuanu’nu a tenpih leh kheltatna ahi hi. Note lakah kheltatna a om loh nadingin amah le amaute pel loin mei tawh kihal khawm ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in ganhing khat a luppih leh amah kithat pelmawh dinga, a ganhing zong kithat pelmawh ding hi.
"‘Numei khat in a kiluppihsak dingin ganhing khat a va naih leh tua numei le a ganhing that un. Amaute kithat pelmawh ding hi; amaute sisan amau lutung mah ah tu ding hi.

"Pasal khat in a sanggamnu, a pa tanu ahikeh a nu tanu khat zawsang tenpih-a, a kiluppih uh leh tua pen a zumhuai mahmah ahi hi. A mipihte uh mitmuh in amaute kithat pelmawh ding hi; amah in a sanggamnu a selpho hi a, amah siakhu ding hi.
"‘Pasal khat in numei khat a khasim nin neih hunin a luppih leh a siluanna a hawksak suaka, a numei in zong a hawkkhia mah ahi hi. Amaute gel amau mipihte panin kikhenkhia ding hi.
"‘Na nu sanggamnu ahikeh na pa sanggamnu luppih kei un; ahang in, tua in kitanauna daisak hi; note gel na siakhu tuak ding uh hi.
"‘Pasal khat in a nuno a luppih leh a pano a selpho ahi hi. Amaute gel siakhu ding uh a, ta nei loin a si ding uh hi.

ka thukipte niala, ka thukhamte kihin, ka thupiakte na puaseh uh a, tua ciangin ka thukhunte na palsat uh leh

note tungah hihte ka tungsak ding hi: Note tungah patauhna, hong vattum ding cinatnate le na khuamuhna uh siasakin na nuntakna uh a khitkang ding cisa natna kong tungsak ding hi. Lo na pawi uh hangin a mawkna hi ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na galte un a ne ding uh hi.
Na galte un hong zawh nadingun kong maigumsan ding hi; no hong mudahte in hong uk ding uh a, kuama delh lohpi-in na taikek ding uh hi.
"‘Hihte khempeuh nungin ka thu nong man kei lailai uh leh na mawhna uh hangin sagih vei dan kong tuaksak beh lai ding hi.
Na lungkhauh kisak theihna uh ka sumang dinga, na tungua van sik tawh kibangin na nuai-ua lei sumsan ka bangsak ding hi.
Na hatna uh a mawkna-in kizang ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na leitang hoihte un gah gah loin gam sunga singte a gah kei ding hi.
"‘Kei nong langbawl lailai uh a, ka thu nong man nop kei uh leh na mawhnate uh tawh kituakin na thuaknate uh a zah sagih valin ka sahsak ding hi.
Gamsa gilote kong dosak dinga na tate uh hong tuahsakin na ganhonte uh ne ding uh a, note tawm mahmah in na lampite uh gamkhing a suak ding hi.
"’Hih bang teng hi napi kong thuhilhna na man nop kei uh a nong langbawl lailai uh leh
kei mahmah in note kong langbawl dinga, na mawhnate uh hangin a zah sagih valin kong thuaksak ding hi.
Thukhunte na palsatna uh pulakna-in note tungah namsau kong tungsak ding hi. Note khuapi sungah na nung kik uh ciangin note lakah pulpi kong tungsak dinga, na galte uh khut sungah hong kipia ding hi.
Anlum hong puakte ka khaktan ciangin numei sawm in thuk khatah anlum em thei ding uh a, teh tektekin a hawm ciipciip ding uh hi. Na ne ding uh a ahi hangin na kham zo kei ding uh hi.
"’Hih bang teng hi napi ka thu hong mang lo lai-in kei nong langneih lailai uh leh
tua ciangin ka heh dinga note hong langneihin kei mahmah in note na mawhna uh hangin a zah sagih vei val dan kong tuaksak ding hi.
Note in na tanute na tapate uh sa na ne ding uh hi.
Na munsangte uh ka susia dinga, na gimnamtui biakna-taute uh phuk-in, nuntakna a nei lo na milimte uh tungah na luangte uh ka vumsak dinga note kong kih ding hi.
Na khuapite uh ka susiamang dinga, na munsiangthote uh a mawkna suaksakin, na biaknate uah lungkimna ka nei kei ding hi.
Na leitang uh a mawkna ka suaksak dinga tua lai-a tung na galte nangawn uh a mulkim ding uh hi.
Minamte lakah note kong thehthang dinga, ka namsau dokin note kong delh ding hi. Na gam uh kimawk nusiat dinga na khuapi uh a kisia dikdek ding hi.
Tua ciangin na gam uh a kinusiat hun sungteng le na galte uh gam sunga na om hun sungteng uh sabbath kumin tang dinga, nuam a sa ding hi. Tua ciangin leitang tawlnga-in sabbath nuam a sa ding hi.
Gam in ama tunga na ten lai-ua na ngahsak loh uh tawlngakna sabbath hunte khempeuh gamkhinga a om sungin a ngah ahi hi.

"’Note lak pana kinusiakhate ahileh amaute galte leitang ah a lungsim uh ka lauthawngsak mahmah dinga, nahteh huih muta gingin a maute a taisak ding hi. Amaute kuama delh lohpi-in namsau kihta a tai bangin tai ding uh a, a puk ding uh hi.
Amaute kuamah in delh lo napi namsau kihta a tai bangin khat le khat a kiphupai ding uh hi. Tua bangin na galte uh mai-ah na nang thei kei ding uh hi.
Minamte lakah na mangthang ding uh hi; na galte uh leitang in no hong nawmvalh ding hi.
Note sung pan galte leitanga omlaite amau mawhna hangin beimang ding uh hi; amau pate mawhna hangin zong amaute beimang ding uh hi.
"‘Ahi hangin amaute in amau mawhna le a pate uh mawhnate a pulak uh leh - amaute, kei langah a zuautatnate uh, kei langa hong langneihnate uh -
amaute a galte uh leitanga ka puak theih nadinga amaute hong langneihsaknate - tua ciangin vun at loh amaute lungsim panin kiniamkhiat-a, a mawhna man uh a piak uh ciangin
Jacob tawh ka thukhun, Isaac tawh ka thukhun, Abraham tawh ka thukhun, ka phawk gige dinga a leitang zong ka phawk gige ding hi.

Ahang in, amaute in a gam uh nusia ding uh a, amaute teng loin gamkhinga a om sungin a gam in sabbath-te a tang ahi hi. Amaute in a mawhna man uh a pia ding uh hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in ka thukhamte nial uh a ka thukipte a kih zo uh hi.
Tua hi napi in amaute in a galte uh leitanga a om sung nangawnun amaute susiamang ding zahin amaute nial lo kih loin amaute tawh ka thukhun ka pelh kei hi. Keimah
Ahi hangin amaute Pasian ahi dingin, minamte muhin Egypt pan ka paikhiatpih-a, a pu a pate uh tawh ka thukhun ka phawk gige hi. Keimah

in Moses tungah,

tua mipa kum sawmnih le kum sawmguk kikal a upa ahileh mun siangtho shekel a

Tua mi kum sawmguk pan a tungsiah ahileh pasal aitang dingin shekel e
A kiciam mipa a kiseh zah pia zo lo dingin a zawn luat leh siampipa kiangah tua mipa kipaipih dinga amah in a piak zawh dinga a kiciamna zah tawh kizui-in a piak zah ding a ciangtansak ding hi.
"‘Ama kiciamna ganhing khat ahileh tua pen

Amah in a ganhing laih ahikeh a hoih lo tangin a hoih, ahikeh a hoih tangin a hoih loin a khek peuhmah kei ding hi; amah in ganhing khat tangin adang khat piak teitei a kul leh a tanga a piak pen tawh a nihin a siangtho a suak ding hi.
Piak dinga a ciam pen a sianglo ganhing -
amah in a hoihna le a hoih lohna tawh kizui-in a seh ding hi. Siampipa in aman a seh zah peuhpeuh aman hipah ding hi.
A neipa in a gan a tat nop leh aman zah tungah aman zah sehnga suah sehkhat behlap ding hi.

Mi khat in a apsa a inn a tat kik nop leh amah in a inn man zah sehnga suah sehkhat piakbeh dinga, tua inn ama aa suak kik ding hi.
"Mi khat in a innkuan leitang uh
Amah in Jubilee Kum hun laitakin a lo a ap leh a ma-a kisehsa mah kimangpah ding hi.
Ahi hangin Jubilee khitin a lo a ap leh, siampipa in Jubilee kum kik tawh kikal a kum phazah tuatin aman seh dinga, aman-a a seh zah kikhiam ding hi.
Lo ap mipa in a tat kik nop leh aman zah sehnga suah sehkhat behlap pelmawh dinga, a lo ama aa suak kik ding hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin a lo a tan kik lo ahikeh mi khatpeuh tungah a zuak khit leh a kitan kik thei nawn kei ding hi.

siampipa in Jubilee Kum dong aman tuat dinga tua mipa in tua ni mah in a kiseh a man zah

A sianglo ganhing khat ahileh aman kiseh zah ah aman zah sehnga suah sehkhat behlapin lei kik thei ding hi. A tat kik kei leh aman kiseh zahin kizuak ding hi.

Mi khat in ama neihsa sawma khat a tat leh aman zah sehnga suah sehkhat piak beh ding hi.
Bawng hon le tuuhon pana sawma khat buppi - gancingpa ciangkhut nuai-ah paisakin, a sawm cinna pen peuhmah -
Amah in a hoih lo lak pana a hoih tengkhia ahikeh a khek kei ding hi. A khek zenzen leh a ganhing le a khekna a nihin a siangtho suak dinga, a kitan thei kei ding hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.

A beh, simin pasal khat ciat, a innkuan lutang pen ciat in nang hong huh ding uh hi.

Reuben panin, Shedeur tapa Elizur;

a kha nihna a ni masa ni-in mihonpi bup a kikhawmsak uh hi. Tua mite in amau pupa bawng’ le innkuan zui-in ciamteh uh a kum sawmnih leh a tungsiah a min a banbanin a khum uh hi;

Hih mite pen Moses Aaron le amau innkuan ciat tanga a sem Israel makai sawm le nihte misimna ahi hi.

Tuate lakah Levi beh innkuan teng adangte tawh a kisim khawm kei hi.
"Na misimna ah Israel dangte tawh Levi beh na simkhawm peuhmah kei ding hi.

Tua tangin, Levi-te Tecipanna biakbuk - a nazat khempeuh le tua tawh kisai na khempeuh uk dingin seh in. Amaute in biakbuk le a vanzat khempeuh a pua ding uh hi; amaute in cing ding uh a, a kimkot ah giahphual sat ding uh hi.
Biakbuk a kiphualsuan peuhpeuh ciangin Levi-te in phel ding uh a, biakbuk a kilam peuhpeuh ciangin Levi-te in a sem ding uh hi. Midang khatpeuh a kiangah a pai leh kithat ding hi.
Israel-te in a pawlpawlin a puanbukte uh lam ding uh a, amau satsa giahphual-a dialkhai nuai-ah a om tek ding uh hi.
Levi-te in ahileh Israel mipite tungah thangpaihna a tun loh nadingin biakbuk kimkot ah a puanbukte uh a lam ding uh hi. Levi-te in Tecipanna biakbuk kep ding tavuan a la ding uh hi," a ci hi.
in Moses le Aaron tungah:
"Israel-te Kikhopna Puanbuk kimkot ah a kihal simsimin ama pawl dialkhai nuai-ah a mikim in a innkuan dialkhai khai-in giahphual a sat ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Nisuahna-lam pangah nisuahna lam nga-in Judah pawlte in amau pawl dialkhai nuai-ah giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Judah mite makaipa Amminadab tapa Nahshon ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 74,600 a pha hi.
Amaute zomah Issachar behte in giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Issachar mite makaipa Zuar tapa Nethanel ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 54,400 a pha hi.
Tua zomah Zebulun behte hi ding hi. Zebulun mite makaipa Helon tapa Eliab ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 57,400 a pha hi.
Judah giahphuala phual sat ding khempeuh amau kipawl khenna zui-in mi 186,400 a pha hi. Amaute dingkhia masa ding uh hi.
Leitaw-lam pangah Reuben-te in amau pawl dialkhai nuai-ah giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Reuben mite makaipa, Shedeur tapa Elizur ahi hi.
Ama pawlah mi 46,500 a pha hi.
Amau zomah Simeon behte in giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Simeon mite makaipa, Zurishaddai tapa Shelumiel ahi hi.
Ama pawlah mi 59,300 a pha hi.
A zomah Gad behte hi ding hi. Gad mite makaipa Deuel a tapa Eliasaph ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 45,650 a pha hi.
Reuben giahphuala phual sat ding khempeuh amau kikhenna zui-in mi 151,450 a pha hi. Amaute a nihna-a dingkhia ding ahi uh hi.

Tua ciangin a giahphual zui-a paite laizangah Kikhopna Puanbuk le Levi giahphual sat dingte a dingkhia ding uh hi. A giahphual sat ngeina bangun amaute dingkhia ding uh a, amau pawl dialkhai nuai amau mun ciatah pai ciat ding uh hi.
A nitumna-lam pangah Ephraim mi pawlte in amau pawlte dialkhai nuai-ah giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Ephraim mite makaipa Ammihud tapa Elishama ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 40,500 a pha hi.
Amaute zomah Manasseh behte ahi ding hi. Manasseh mite makaipa Pedazur tapa Gamaliel ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 32,200 a pha hi.
Tua zomah Benjamin behte ahi ding hi. Benjamin mite makaipa, Gideoni tapa Abidan ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 35,400 a pha hi.
Ephraim giahphuala phual sat ding khempeuh amaute kikhenna-te zui-in mi 108,100 ahi hi. Amaute a thumna ah dingkhia ding uh hi.
Leilu lam pangah Dan pawlte in amau dialkhai nuai-ah giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Dan mite makaipa, Ammishaddai tapa Ahiezer ahi hi.
Ama pawlah mi 62,700 a pha hi.
Amaute zomah Asher behte in giahphual a sat ding uh hi. Asher mite makaipa Ocran tapa Pagiel ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 41,500 a pha hi.
A zomah Naphtali behte hi ding hi. Naphtali mite makaipa Enan tapa Ahira ahi hi.
Ama pawl ah mi 53,600 a pha hi.
Dan giahphual ah phual sat ding khempeuh mi 157,600 a pha hi. Amaute amau dialkhai nuai-ah a nunung penin dingkhia ding uh hi.
Hihte pen Israel-te amau innkuan zui-a kisim ahi hi. Amaute pawl kikhenna zui-in giahphuala om peuhmah mi 603,550 a pha hi.

Aaron tapate minte: a tacil Nadab tuateh Abihu, Eleazar le Ithamar ahi hi.

Nadab le Abihu ahileh Sinai Sehnel gamah mei siangtho lo zangin
"Levi behte paipih inla, amah huh dingin amaute siampi Aaron tungah pia in.
Amaute in Kikhopna Puanbuk-a biakbuk na a sepna uah ama ading le mipi bup adingin na a sem ding uh hi.
Amaute in Kikhopna Puanbuk sunga nazat khempeuh kem ding uh a, biakbuk nasepna ah Israel dangte hih ding ngeina teng a tangtungsak ding uh hi.
Aaron le a tapate tungah Levi-te pia in; ama a tungah a kibup piak Israel-te amaute ahi hi.
Aaron le a tapate siampi sem dingin seh in; munsiangtho ah a pai midang khatpeuh kithat ding hi," a ci hi.
"Israel-te lak panin Israel numeite’ tapa upa pen mun-a dingin Levi-te ka la khin zo hi. Levi mite kei aa ahi hi;

ahang in, ta cilte kei aa ahi hi. Egypt ah tacil khempeuh ka sattuk lai-in mihing ahi a, ganhing ahi zongin Israel-te pana suak tacil peuhmah kei adingin ka tuam koih hi. Amaute kei aa ahi ding uh hi. Keimah
Sinai Sehnel gama Moses tungah
"Levi-te amau bawng’te le a innkuante zui-in sim in. Pasal kha khat pan a tungsiah peuhmah sim in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin
Hihte Levi tapate minte ahi hi:
Gershon, Kohath le Merari.
Hihte, Gershon bawng’te minte ahi hi:
Libni le Shimei.
Kohath bawng’te:
Amram, Izhar, Hebron le Uzziel.
Merari bawng’te:
Mahli le Mushi.
Hihte in amau innkuan zui-in Levi behte ahi hi.
Libni mite le Shimei mite pen Gershon bawng’te ahi uh hi; hihte pen Gershon mite bawng’te ahi hi.
Kha khat pan a tungsiah a pha pasal a kisim khempeuh 7,500 a pha hi.
Gershon mite bawng’te in biakbuk nung nitumna lamah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Gershon mite innkuan makaipa, Lael tapa Eliasaph ahi hi.
Kikhopna Puanbuk ah Gershon mite tavuan in: biakbuk le puanbuk a khuhnate tawh, Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna a puankhai,
buktual a puankhaite, biakbuk le biakna-tau kimkot-a, a huang umna puante le a khaute - le tuate tawh a kizom na khempeuh ahi hi.
Amram mite, Izhar mite, Hebron mite le Uzziel mite pen Kohath bawng’te ahi uh hi; hihte in Kohath mite bawng’te ahi uh hi.
Kha khat pan a tungsiah pasal peuhmah 8,600 b a pha uh hi. Munsiangtho cin ding Kohath-te tavuan ahi hi.
Kohath-te bawng’te in biakbuk leitaw-lam pangah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Kohath innkuante bawng’te makaipa, Uzziel tapa Elizaphan ahi hi.
Amaute tavuan in singkuangpi, sabuai, meivak tunna, biakna-tau, biakna nasepna-a kizang mun siangtho sunga nate, puanzak, le tuate tawh kizom na khempeuh cin ding ahi hi.
Levi-te makai lian pen siampi Aaron tapa Eleazar ahi hi. Amah munsiangtho cing dinga tavuan neite khempeuh tunga a uk dinga kikoih ahi hi.
Mahli mite le Mushi mite pen Merari bawng’te ahi uh hi; hihte, Marari bawng’te ahi uh hi.
Kha khat pan a tungsiah pasal a kisim peuhmah 6,200 a pha hi.
Merari innkuan bawng’te makaipa Abihail tapa Zuriel ahi hi; amaute in biakbuk leilu-lam pangah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Merari mite pen biakbuk singpekte, a zawnna zawlte, a khuamte, a bullente, a kizang nengneng khempeuh, le tuate tawh a kizom a kizang na khempeuh,
tuate banah a huang umna khuamte a bullente tawh, puanbuk khetphim le a khaute tawh a cing dinga kiseh ahi hi.

Moses le Aaron le a tapate in biakbuk nisuahna-lam pangah nisuahna-lam nga-in Kikhopna Puanbuk mai-ah giahphual a sat uh hi. Amaute in Israel-te tangin mun siangtho cin tavuan la ding uh hi. Midang khatpeuh mun siangtho nai-in a pai leh kithat ding hi.
Israel-te tacilte tangin kei adingin Levi-te nong laksak dinga, Israel-te ganhing tacilte khempeuh tangin Levi-te ganhingte nong laksak ding hi. Keimah
Tua ciangin
A min a ciamteh kha khat pan a tungsiah tacil pasal khempeuh 22,273 a pha hi.
"Israel tacil khempeuh tangin Levi-te la inla, amaute ganhing tacil tang dingin Levi-te ganhingte la in. Levi-te kei aa hi ding hi. Keimah
Levi-te sangin tatkhiat ding Israel-te tacilte 273 in tamzaw hi;
tuate tat nadingin mun siangtho shekel gerah sawmnih a gik tawh kizui-in mi khat ciangin shekel a nga ta khawm in.
Tua sum pen Israel-te a tamzawknate tatna-in Aaron le a tapate tungah pia in," zong a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Moses in Levi-te banah a val lai mite tung panin kitatna sum a kaikhawm hi.
Amah in Israel tacilte panin munsiangtho shekel b tawh kizui-in sumngo shekel 1,365 a kaikhawm hi.
Moses in
in Moses le Aaron tungah:
"Levi khil mah ahi Kohath mite a bawng’te le a innkuanin sim in.
Kikhopna Puanbuk ah nasema kuan thei ding kum sawmthum pan kum sawmnga ciang pasal khempeuh sim in.
"Kikhopna Puanbuk sungah Kohath mite nasep ding hih ahi hi: A siangthopente cing ding uh hi.
Giahphual a kisuan ding ciangin Aaron le a tapate sungtum ding uh a, a liahna puanzak phelkhia-in tua tawh Tecipanna singkuang a tuam ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in tuipi bawngpi c vunin tuam ding uh a, tua tungah puan adum kiuhkeuh tawh khuhin a zawlte a thuah ding uh hi.
"Amaute in Ompihna sabuai tungah adum puan phah ding uh a, tua tungah kuangte, keute, le kuangkumte, le dawntheih-a biak nading thambelte koih in; tua tunga om den ding anlum a koih ding uh hi.
Amaute in hihte tungah a-ausan puan phah ding uh a, tuipi bawngpi vun tawh tuamin a zawlte a munah a bulh ding uh hi.
"Amaute in puan adum khat la in, khuavak ding meivakte a tunna tawh a mei-ek siakna le kuangdaite, le thun tawm ding meitui koihna thambeelte khempeuh a khuh ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in a na zat khempeuh tawh henkhawmin tuipi bawngpi vunin khuh ding uh a, a puakna tal tungah tuate a koih ding uh hi.
"Amaute in kham biakna-tau tungah puan adum khat phah ding uh a, tua pen tuipi bawngpi vun tawh khuhin a zawlte a thuah ding uh hi.
"Amaute in mun siangtho sunga biak piakna-a kizang khempeuh puan adumin tun ding uh a, tuipi bawngpi vun tawh tuamin, tuate a puakna tal tungah a koih ding uh hi.
"Amaute in sumngo biakna-tau tunga vutte luakkhia ding uh a, a tungah puan dupsan a phah ding uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute in a tungah, biakna-tau a biakpiakna-a kizang um le beelte khempeuh, meibung, sa thukna sikka, vutluahna le thehna kuangkumte a tungah a koih ding uh hi. Tua tungah tuipi bawngpi vunte phahin khuh ding uh a, a zawlte a munah a thuah ding uh hi.

"Aaron le a tapate in biakna-a vanzat siangthote le biakna na siangthote khempeuh a tun khit uh giahphual suan ding a kiman ciangin Kohath mite a pua dingin a kuan ding uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute in tua a siangtho nate a lawng peuhmah kei ding uh hi; a lawn uh leh a si ding uh hi. Kohath mite in Kikhopna Puanbuk sunga nate a pua ding uh hi.

"Siampi Aaron tapa Eleazar in mei-a vak ding sathau, a namtui gimnamtui, a hunhunin an-a biakna le nilh sathaute a uk ding hi. Amah in biakbuk buppi le a sunga nate khempeuh vanzat siangthote le biakna siangthote a uk khawm ding hi," a ci hi.
"Levi mite panin Kohath bawng’te a kikhenkhiat loh nadingin thei in.
A siangtho pen nate kiangah a pai uh ciangin si lo-a, a nuntak theih nadingun amaute hicisak in: Mun siangtho sungah Aaron le a tapate pai-in amau sep ding le a puak ding ciat uh seh ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin Kohath mite tomkha no sung bek nangawn a en dingin a sungah a tum peuhmah kei ding uh hi; a tum uh leh a si ding uh hi," a ci hi.
"Gershon mite zong a bawng’te le a innkuanin sim in.
Kikhopna Puanbuk-a na sem ding kum sawmthum pan sawmnga ciang pasal khempeuh sim in.
"Hih in Gershon bawng’te nasep le a vanpuak ding uh ahi hi:
Amaute in mun siangtho puanzakte, Kikhopna Puanbuk, a khuhna le a puanung a khuhna tuipi bawngpi vunte, Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna-a puankhaite,
mun siangtho le biakna-tau, buktual umna puanzakte, a lutna-a puanzak khaute, nasep cianga kithawinate khempeuh a pua ding uh hi. Gershon-te in tuate tawh kisai nasep kisam khempeuh a sem ding uh hi.
Amaute nasep, puak ding ahi a nasep dangte ahi zongin Aaron le a tapate makaihna bangin a sem ding uh hi. A puak ding khempeuh uh amaute tungah tavuan na pia ding hi.
Hih in Gershon bawng’te in Kikhopna Puanbuka a nasep uh ahi hi. Amaute nasep in siampi Aaron tapa Ithamar makaihna bangbang hi ding hi.
Merari mite amau bawng’te le a innkuanin na sim ding hi.
Kikhopna Puanbuk sungah nasem ding kum sawmthum pan sawmnga ciang pasal khempeuh sim in.
Kikhopna Puanbuk ah na a sep uh ciangin hih in a tavuan ding uh ahi hi: Biakbuk singpek khempeuh, a zawlte, a khuam le a bullente,
tuate tawh a tual umna khuamte, a bullente tawh, puanbuk khetphimte, khaute, amau vanzatte khempeuh le amau vanzat tawh kizom na khempeuh a pua ding uh hi. Mikim tungah ama puak ding tang sehsak in.
Hih in Merari bawng’te in siampi Aaron tapa Ithamar makaihna zui-a Kikhopna Puanbuk ah a sep ding uh ahi hi," a ci hi.
Moses, Aaron le mipite makaite in Kohath-te a bawng’te le a innkuanin a sim uh hi.
Kikhopna Puanbuk-a nasem dingin a pai kum sawmthum pan sawmnga a pha pasal khempeuh
a bawng’ zui-a simin 2,750 a pha hi.
Kikhopna Puanbuk a Kohath-te bawng’te khempeuh a vekpi in hih teng ahi hi.
Gershon-te amau bawng’te le a innkuante zui-in kisim hi.

a bawng’te le a innkuante zui-a simin mi 2,630 a pha hi.
Kikhopna Puanbuk a, mi peuhmah a vekpi-in hih teng ahi hi.

Kikhopna Puanbuk a, nasem dinga a kuan kum sawmthum pan sawmnga a pha pasal khempeuh,
amau bawng’te zui-a simin 3,200 a pha hi.
Merari bawng’te pana peuhmah a vekpi in hih teng ahi hi.
Tuaci-in Moses Aaron le Israel makaite in Levi mite khempeuh amau bawng’te le a innkuante zui-in a sim uh hi.
Na sem ding le Kikhopna Puanbuk pua dinga a kuan kum sawmthum pan sawmnga ciang a pha pasal khempeuh,
8,580 a pha hi.
in Moses a thupiak bangin tua bangin amaute a kisim ahi hi.
in Moses tungah,
