Numei le pasal a kibangin hawlkhia in. Amaute laka ka tenna amau giahphual a buahsak loh nadingun amaute giahphual pua-ah hawlkhiasak in," a ci hi.
Israel mite in a hih uh hi; amaute in giahphual pua-ah a hawlkhia uh hi.
"Israel-te tungah, ‘Numei khat ahikeh pasal khat in khialh theina namkhat b peuh khiala, tua hangin
ama mawhna pel loin a pulak ding hi. Amah in a khialhna a kimin loh dinga, a zah sehnga suah sehkhatin a mawhna mi tungah a kimin pia ding hi.
Ahi hangin tua mi in a khialhnate hanga lohkikna a sang ding tanau kinaipih a neih kei leh tua lohkikna
Israel-te in siampipa tunga a puak uh a siangtho na khempeuh ama aa hi ding hi.
Mi kimin a puak letsong siangthote ama neihsa hi a, ahi hangin amah in siampipa a piakte siampipa aa ahi hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.
Tua khit ciangin
"Israel-te hopih inla amaute kiangah: ‘Pisal khat a zi vakzau-a ama tungah muanhuai lo-in
midang pasal khat tawh lumkhawma tua thu a pasal in thei loin, tuanu sianlohna kikan lo-a (ama langah teci ding om loin a mawh laitakin lah a kimat loh nungsang)
a pasal in hazatna lungsim nei-a, a zi siangtho loin a upmawh leh tuanu a siang lopi mah amah in hazatna lungsim a neih leh -

tua ciangin siampipa kiangah a zi paipih ding hi. Amah in tuanu aitang-a biakna dingin mangbuh-ham vui ephah c khat sehsawm suah sehkhat a tawi pelmawh ding hi. Amah in a tungah sathau sung loin, gimnamtui zong a koih kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua in hazatna hanga an-a biakna hi-a, khialh kik khak loh nadingin phawksakna-a biakna ahi hi.
"‘Siampipa in tuanu paipih dinga,
Tua ciangin leibeel-in tuisiangtho pawlkhat la dinga biakbuk sual-a leivui tawm khat tui sungah a khia ding hi.
Siampipa in tua numei

Tua ciangin siampipa in amah kiciamsakin tuanu kiangah, "Na pasal zi-a na om sungin nang tawh kuamah lumkhawm loin, koimah vakzau loin a sianglo na suah leh hih hamsiatna hong tun hih tuikha in nang tungah bangmah siatna hong tun kei hen.
Ahi hangin na pasal zi-a na om sungin a vakvai na hileh na pasal lo midang tawh na lupkhawmna hangin nang le nang na kibuahsak leh," -
siampipa in tua numei hih tomlawhna-in kiciamsak dinga - "
Hih hamsiatna tuikha in na gilsung zui henla, na sungkua bawksakin na pheipi theepsak b hen," a ci ding hi.
‘Tua khit ciangin tua numei in, Amen, tua bangin hi ta hen," a ci ding hi.
"‘Siampipa in hih ciamsiatnate laizial tung khatah gelh dinga, tua ciangin tuikha sungah sawpkhia ding hi.
Amah in tua numei hamsiatna tuikha dawnsak dinga, tua tui ama sungah tumsukin na sak velval ding hi.
Tua ciangin siampipa in hazatna hanga an-a biakna tuanu khut panin lakhia dinga,
Tua ciangin siampipa in phawkna hanga biakna dingin an-a biakna khut khat dim pham dinga biakna-tau tungah hal ding hi; tua khit ciangin amah in tua numei a tui a dawnsak ding hi.

Amah le amah a kibuahsaka, a pasal tungah a muanhuai lo ahileh tua hamsia-tun tui a kidawnsak ciangin a sungah lut dinga nakpi-in nasak ding hi; a gilpi bawkin a pheipi theep c dinga, a mite lakah tuanu hamsiat thuak ahi ding hi.
Ahi zongin a numei amah le amah kibuahsak lo a, a siang ahi nak leh amah a khial lo hi a, ta a nei thei ding hi.
Hih in, numei khat in a pasal zi-a a om sungin vakzau in amah mah a kibuahsak ciang,
ahikeh mi khat in a zi a ummawhna hanga hazatna lungsim a neih ciangin hazatna hanga zat ding thukham ahi hi. Siampipa in tuanu
A pasal khialhna bawlna panin mawhpeng dinga, ahi hangin numei in ama mawhna a thuak ding hi,’ ci in," a ci hi.
in Moses tungah,
"Israel-te hopih inla amaute kiangah: ‘Numei khat ahikeh pasal khat in a tuam vilvelin kiciamna, Nazir mi kiciamna bang

amah zu le a kibilh dawntheih dangte kidek pelmawh dinga zu-a kibawl zu nam le a kibilh dangte a dawn peuhmah kei ding hi. Amah in lenggah tui dawn loin, lenggah min ahikeh lenggah keu a ne kei ding hi.
Amah Nazir zek a tan sungteng lenggui pana piang a tang ahikeh a hawng nangawn a ne peuhmah kei ding hi.
"‘Amah tuam om dinga a kiciam hun sung khempeuh a lutungah mulkiatna a kitah kei ding hi.
A nu, a pa, a sanggamnu, a sanggampa nangawn a sih leh amaute hangin amah le amah anin a kisuaksak kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian tungah a kituamkoihna lim a lutungah a om hi.
Amah a tuam om hun sung tawntung
"‘Thakhatin a gei-ah mi khat a sih vata, a ki-apsa a sam a buahsak leh a kisiansuah ni-in a lu a mettol pelmawh ding hi - tua ni pen a ni sagih ni ahi hi.
Tua ciangin a nigiat ni-in Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna-a siampipa tungah vakhu nih ahikeh kawl-vakhu no nih a paipih ding hi.

Siampipa in khat mawhna hanga biakna le adang khat meihal biakna-in pia dinga, thoihdamna a bawlsak ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah misi luang kianga a omna hangin a mawh hi. Tua ni mahin a lu a siangtho-in a ap ding hi.
Amah a tuam om hun sungteng
"‘Hih in ama tuam om hun a bei cianga Nazir mi adingin thukham ahi hi. Amah Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna ah kipaipih ding hi.
Tua lai-ah amah in letsongin
tuate tawh an-a biakna le dawntheih-a biaknate, le silngo sawh loh anlum lawh khat - sathau kihel annel limci kibawl mohpheng, le sathau ki-tat mohnipte a pia ding hi.
"‘Siampipa in tuate
Amah in silngo sawh loh anlum tawh pia in,
"‘Tua ciangin Kikhopna Puanbuk lutna ah Nazir mi in a apsa a sam metkhia pelmawh ding hi. Amah in a sam tawi-in kilawmtakna biakna piakna nuai-a mei-ah a khul ding hi.

A ni sawm-le-khat ni-in Asher mite makaipa Ocran tapa Pagiel in ama biakna a puak hi.

Ama biakna a nihin munsiangtho shekel tawh kizui-a kiteh, shekel zakhat le sawmthum khai ngun kuangdai khat, le shekel sawmsagih a khai thehna ngun kuangkum khat, an-a biakna annel limci sathau helsa adim tuak tawh;

A ni sawm-le-nih ni-in Naphtali mite makaipa Enan’ tapa Ahira in ama biakna a puak hi.

Ama biakna munsiangtho shekel tawh kizui-a kiteh, shekel zakhat sawmthum khai ngun kuangdai khat, le shekel sawmsagih khai thehna ngun kuangkum khat, an-a biakna annel limci sathau helsa adim tuak tawh;

Hihte pen Israel makaite in biakna-tau sathau a kinilh cianga a ap nading uh biaknate ahi hi: ngun kuangdai sawm le nih, thehna ngun kuangkum sawm le nih le kham sikkeu-kum sawm le nih ahi hi.

Ngun kuangdai khat in shekel zakhat le sawmthum ciat khai-a, thehna kuangdai in shekel sawm sagih ciat a khai hi. Ngun kuang khempeuh in munsiangtho shekel tawh kizui-in shekel a tulnih le zali a khai hi.
Gimnamtui adim kham sikkeu-kum sawm le nih in munsiangtho shekel tawh kizui-in shekel sawm ciat a khai hi. Kham sikkeu-kum khempeuh a vekpi in shekel b zakhat le sawmnih a khai hi.

Meihal biakna dinga kihawl ganhing khempeuh, bawngtalno sawm-le-nih, tuutal sawm-le-nih le kum khat a pha tuuno apa sawm-le-nih le an-a biakna tawh ahi hi. Mawhna hanga biakna dingin keel apa sawm le nih kizang hi.

Kilawmtakna biakna dingin ganhing vekpi gawm, bawngtal sawmnih le li, tuutal sawmguk, keel apa sawmguk le kum khat a pha tuuno apa sawmguk a pha hi. Hihte in biakna-tau sathau a kinilh khita apna-a biakna ahi hi.

"Isreal-te hopih inla amaute kiangah, ‘Jordan kantanin Canaan ah na lut uh ciangin

Mi khatpeuh in sawmkhol lopi-in a sih nadingin suang ahikeh bang khatpeuh in a den a,
ahikeh galbawlin a sih nadingin khuttumin a tup leh tua mipa kithat ding hi; amah mi that ahi hi. Sisan phulapa in mi thatpa a tuah khak ciangin a that ding hi.
"‘Ahi hangin galbawl lopi-a mi khatpeuh in midang khat sun vat ahikeh bukbawl loin na khatpeuhin deng
ahikeh amah mu lopi-in a sih theih nading suangtum khat khiatkha a, amah a sih leh tua ciangin amah a galpa hi loin amah liamsak a sawm ahi loh nungsangin
mipite in hih ding ngeina tawh kizui-in amah le sisan phulapa kikalah thu a khen ding uh hi.

Joseph tacil Manasseh ahi manin hih sehtanh a ngah hi-a, tua pen, Manasseh tacil Makir ading ahi hi. Makir pen Gilead-te pianna hi a, Makir-te galkap thupite ahi manun Gilead le Bashan amau ngahsa ahi hi.

A leitaw lamah Ephraim-te gam hi-a, leilu lamah Manasseh-te gam ahi hi. Manasseh-te gam in tuipi bana, a leilu lamah Asher tawh kigamgi in, nisuahna lamah Issachar tawh kigamgi hi.

"Moses tungtawna nang kong lamlah bangin Israel-te in bukna khuapi a koih dingun gen in,

"Amah tua khuapite khatah a tai ciangin khuapi kongpi lutna ah dingin, tua khuapi upate tungah a thu a telgen ding hi. Tua ciangin amaute in amau khuapi ah amah omsakin amau tawh a omkhawm nading mun a pia ding uh hi.

A sisan phula nuampa in amah a delh leh tuapa tungah thu neipa a pia peuhmah kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah in a innvengpa sawmkhol lopi-a a thah khak hi-a, kigalneihin a tum khol hi lo hi.

A thu kikhen dingin mipa mai-ah a din mateng le tua huna nasem tulpipa a sih matengin amah tua khuapi ah a teng ding hi. Tua khit ciangin amah a taikhiatna khuapi-a a inn ah a ciah kik thei ding hi," a ci hi.

Kohath a bawng’bawng’te adingin ai masa pen a pha hi. Siampi Aaron suan Levi-te in Judah, Simeon, le Benjamin behte aa panin sehtanh khuapi sawm le thum a ngah uh hi.
A om lai Kohath’ suante in Ephraim, Dan le Manasseh behte alang a bawng’bawng’te tung panin sehtanh khuapi sawm a ngah uh hi.
Gershon suante in Issachar, Asher, Naphtali le Bashan a om Manasseh beh alang a bawng’ bawng’-te tung panin sehtanh khuapi sawm le thum a ngah uh hi.

Judah le Simeon behte tung panin a nuai-a khuapite a minminin
(Levi-te Kohath bawng’ panin Aaron suante tungah hih khuapite kipia hi, bang hang hiam cih leh ai a masa pen amau tungah tu hi) kipia hi:
Amaute in Judah mualtung gama om Kiriath Arba (tua pen Hebron) a kimkot a lonona mun tawh amaute a pia uh hi. (Arba in Anak pu ahi hi.)

Tua ciangin Joshua in amaute thupha pia-in paikhiasaka, a inn uah a ciah uh hi.

(Manasseh beh alangte tungah Moses in Bashan ah leitang pia-a, alang dang khatte, Joshua in Jordan nitumna-lam galah a sanggamte tawh leitang a pia hi.) Joshua in amaute inn ah a ciahsak ciangin thupha pia a,
"Na hauhna uh tampitak, - ganhing hon tampitak ngun, kham, sumngo le sik tampitak le puansilh tampitak tawh ciah unla - na galte uh van na lakte uh na sanggamte uh tawh hawm un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Reuben-te, Gad-te le Manasseh beh alangte in Canaan a Shiloh ah Israel-te nusia uh a,
Reuben-te, Gad-te le Manasseh beh alangte Canaan gam sung Jordan kiang Geliloth ah a tun uh ciangin amaute in Jordan gei-ah biakna-tau khat a dawh uh hi.
Amaute in Israel-te lam gal Jordan kiang Canaan tawh gamgi Gililoth ah biakna-tau a dawh uh Israel-te in a zak uh ciangin
amaute sim dingin Israel mipi bup Shiloh ah a kikhawm uh hi.

Hadadezer khut nuai-a om kumpite khempeuh in, Israel in amaute a zawh lam a theih uh ciangin Israel-te tawh kilemna bawl uh a, amau nasem a suak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Ammon-te a huh lai ding uh Aram-te lau ta uh hi.

Kumpite galsim dingin a kuan hun phalbi sungin David in kumpipa mite tawh Joab le Israel galkap buppi a kuankhiasak hi. Amaute in Ammon-te susia uh a Rabbah a umcih uh hi. David ahileh Jerusalem ah a om hi.
Nitak khat David a lupna panin tho a, kumpi inn tungah a vak kawikawi hi. Inn tung panin numei kipumsil khat a mu hi. Tua numei melhoih mahmah a,
David in tuanu kan dingin mi khat a sawl hi. Mipa in, "Eliam’ tanu Bathsheba hi-in, Hit mi Uriah zi hi lo hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in kamtaite sawlin tuanu a samsak hi. Tuanu a kiangah pai-a amah in a luppih hi. (Tuanu a nitna a kihahsiang khin phet ahi hi) Tua ciangin c
Numei gai-a David kiangah, "Nau ka paii hi," ci-in a gensak hi.
Tua ciangin David in Joab kiangah, "Hit mi Uriah hong ciahsak in," ci-in a vaikhak hi. Tuateh Joab in amah David kiangah a puak hi.
Uriah a kiangah a tun ciangin David in Joab bangci a, galkapte bangci a, galvai bangci hiam, ci-in a dong hi.
Tua khit ciangin David in Uriah kiangah, "Na innah ciahsuk inla na khete sil in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin kumpi inn panin Uriah paikhia-a, kumpipa letsong a nungah kipuak hi.
Ahi hangin Uriah inn ah ciah loin a pu’ nasemte khempeuh tawh kumpi inn kongah a lum hi.
David kiangah, "Uriah innah a ciah kei hi," ci-a a kigen ciangin amah in, "Khual gamla pana hong tungphet hi lo na hiam? Bang dingin innah ciah lo na hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.

Uriah in David kiangah, "Singkuangpi le Israel le Judah-te puanbuk sungah om uh a, ka pu Joab le ka topa nasemte lopaang ah ka giak uh hi. Bangci in a ne a dawn ding le ka zi tawh a lum dingin ka innah ciah thei ding ka hiam? Nang nuntakna ka lo hi, tua bangin ka hih kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in, "Ni khat om lai in, zing ciangin kong puak kik ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ahi ciangin Jerusalem ah Uriah tua ni le a zing ciang a tam lai hi.
David in amah sama amah tawh nekhawm dawn khawmin zu a khamsak hi. Ahi hangin a nitak ciangin a pu’ nasemte lakah phek tungah lum dingin paikhia a, inn ah a ciah tuan kei hi.
A zingsang ciangin David in Joab lai khak a Uriah a puasak hi.
A sungah, "Kidona a nasia pen mun gal mai-ah Uriah na masisak in. Tua ciangin amah kisattuka a sih nadingin amah guak nungkinsan un," ci-in a gelh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in khuapi a umcih laitakun a khauh pen kinanna mun hi-a a theihna munah Uriah a koih hi.
Khuapi mite kuankhia in Joab a do uh ciangin David galkapte pawlkhat a tuk uh hi; tua tham loin Hit mipa Uriah zong a si hi.
Joab in David kiangah gal kidona thu a cingin a puak hi.
Amah in kamtaipa kiangah: "Kumpipa kiangah hih gal kidona thu na gen khit ciangin,
kumpipa a heh suak kha dinga nang kiangah, ‘Bang dinga galsim dingin khuapi va neh lua na hi uh hiam? Kulh panin thaltang hong lot ding uh thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Jerub-Besheth’ a
Kamtaipa kuankhia-a David kiang a tun ciangin Joab in a gen dinga a vaikhak khempeuh a gen hi.
Kamtaipa in David kiangah, "Mite in ko hong zothawh uh a, ko sim dingin gam sungah hong kuankhia uh hi; ahi hangin khuapi lutna kongpi ah ko ka nawh kik zo uh hi.
Tua ciangin thalkapte in kulh panin thaltang hong kap uh a, kumpipa mi pawlkhat a si hi. Tua tham loin na nasempa Hit mi Uriah zong a si hi," a ci hi.

David in kamtaipa kiangah, "Joab tungah, ‘Hih thu ah kilung-khamsak kei in; namsau-in khat le a dang khat mah a si ngei ahi hi. Khuapi nak sim mahmah unla susia un,’ ci-in Joab hanthawnna-in hih thu na gen in," ci-in a gen hi.
Uriah zi in a pasal sih a zak ciangin ama hangin a thum hi.
Thumna hun a bei khit ciangin David in a innah tuanu lasak-a, ama zi suakin tapa khat a nei hi. Ahi hangin David gamtatna hangin
in David kiangah Nathan a sawl hi. Ama kiang a tun ciangin, "Khua khatah mi nih a om hi. Khat hau-a a khat a zawng hi.
A haupa in tuuhon le bawnghon tampitak nei-a

a zawngpa in ahileh a leisa tuunu no khat longal bangmah a nei kei hi. Amah in tuuno khoi khanga, a tate tawh a khangkhawm hi. A an hawmin a hai-in tui tulh-a a ang nangawnah a lumsak hi. Ama tanu tawh a kibang hi.

"Khatvei a haupa kiangah khualzinpa khat tunga ahi hangin a haupa in ama inna tungpa nek dingin a tuuhon ahikeh a bawnghon panin khatpeuh a gawh nuam kei hi. Ama aa tangin mizawngpa tuuno laksak-a a inn a tungpa adingin a gawhsak hi," a ci hi.
Tua mipa tungah David heh mahmah a Nathan kiangah, "
Amah in hehpihna nei loin tua banga gamta ahi manin tuuno a zah li-in a loh pelmawh kul hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in David kiangah, "Nang tua mipa na hi hi.
Na pu’ inn nang kong pia-a, na pu’ zite na angah om uh hi. Nang tungah Israel innkuan le Judah kong pia hi. Hih khempeuh tawm lua lai ahileh a tamzaw nangawn kong pia lai ding hi.
Ama muhna ah a sia-a gamtatna tawh bang hangin
Tua ahi ciangin tu-in na inn le namsau a kikhenkhia ngei kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cihleh kei nong simmawh a Hit mipa Uriah’ zi nang adingin na sut hi,’ ci hi.
Nang na dap sep ahi hi, ahi hangin keimah in Israel khempeuh mai-ah suntangpi in ka sem ding hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.

Nathan in, "
Ahi hangin hih banga na gamtatna tawh
Inn ah Nathan a ciah khit ciangin
David in Pasian tungah naupang ading a thumsak hi. Amah a inn sungah pai-in an tanga leitual ah lumin zan hunte a zang hi.
Leitual pan amah a phong dingin a innkuan upate a kiangah ding uh a, ahi hangin amah’n nial-a, amaute tawh an khatpeuh a ne nuam kei hi.

A ni sagih ni-in naupang a si hi. Naupang a sih lam David kiangah a koh ding uh a nasemte a lau uh hi. Amaute in, "Naupang a nuntak lai nangawnin David ka hopih uh hangin ka thu uh hong ngai lo hi. Naupang a sihlam bangci gen peuhmah ding i hi hiam? A sia khatpeuh a bawl kha ding hi," ci-in a ngaihsun uh hi.
David in a nasemte amau le amau a kihuau uh thei a, naupang a sihlam a thei hi. Amah in, "Naupang si ta hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, "Hi hi, amah sita hi," ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Tua ciangin David leitual panin a thoto hi. A kisil khit ciangin sathaute kizut-a a puan khekin
A nasemte in, "Bang hangin hih bangin gamta na hi hiam? Naupang a nuntak lai-in an tangin na kap a, tu-in naupang si ta-a, nang thoin an na ne zawsop hi!" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Amah in, "Naupang a nuntak lai-in an tangin ka kap hi. Kei ngaihsutna ah, ‘Kua’n thei ahi hiam?
Ahi hangin tu-in amah si ta hi, bang hangin an tang nawn ding ka hi hiam? Ke’n amah la kik thei ka hi hiam? Ama kiangah ka pai dinga amah ahileh kei kiangah hong ciah kik nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in a zi Bathsheba hehnem a, ama kiangah pai-in amah a luppih hi. Tuanu in tapa khat nei-a a min Solomon a phuak uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Joab in Ammon mi Rabbah simin a kumpi kulh muanhuai a la zo hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in David kiangah kamtai sawla, "Rabbah ka sima a tuinek uh ka la zo hi.
Tu-in galkap a om lai teng khawm inla khuapi umcihin la ta in. Tua hi kei leh ken khuapi la leng keima min a puakha ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David in galkap om khempeuh khawma Rabbah ah kuanin sima, a la hi.
Amaute kumpipa b
tua lai-a om mite paikhiatpihin sing-at ding, tuzum le hei zanga nasem dingin koiha, leisek seekna d
Hih hun khit ciangin David’ tapa Amnon in a melhoih Absalom sanggamnu Tamar a ngai hi.
Tamar nungak bit hi-a, ama tungah bang khatpeuh hih ding piang thei lo ahi manin a sanggamnu tungah a lawhsapna hangin Amnon in a cinat lawh hi.
Amnon in David sanggampa Shemeah’ tapa Jonadab min nei lawm khat a nei hi. Jonadab mi lungsim khel mahmah khat ahi hi.
Amah in Amnon kiangah, "Bang hangin nang kumpipa’ tapa, zingsang khat khit zingsang khat gawng tektek na hi hiam? Hong gen lo ding na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amnon in, "Ka sanggampa Absalom sanggamnu ngai ka hi hi," a ci hi.

Jonadab in, "Lupna ah pai inla a cina kineihin na pa in hong veh ciangin, ‘Ka sanggamnu Tamar hong pai-in nek ding khatpeuh hong pia hen. A sep mahmah mu in a khuttung ka nek theih nadingin an hong huansak hen,’ ci in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Amnon luma cina a kineih hi. Kumpipa in amah a veh ciangin Amnon in, "Ka sanggamnu khuttunga ka nek theih nadingin ka sanggamnu hong pai-in ka muhin anlum a tuam mahmah in hong bawlsak hen," a ci hi.
David in kumpi inn sunga Tamar kiangah thu zasak a, "Na sanggampa Amnon innah pai inla an pawlkhat huansak in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a sanggampa Amnon inn ah Tamar pai-a, amah a na lum hi. Tuanu in annel lom la-in, meka ama muhin anlum bawlin a em hi.
Tua ciangin a sikbelpei la-in anlum a lui hangin a ne nuam kei hi.
Amnon in, Hih lai-a om khempeuh pusuaksak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh a pusuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin Amnon in Tamar kiangah, "Na khut tungpan ka nek theih nadingin ka lupna inndei sungah an hong puak in," a ci hi. Tuateh Tamar in a bawlsa anlum, a sanggampa Amnon lupna inndei sungah a puak hi.
Ahi hangin a nek dingin inndei sungah a paipih ciangin mancip-a, "Ka sanggamnu aw, hong pai-in hong luppih in," a ci hi.
Tuanu in, "Hong tuacih ke’n, hong thatang kaih kei in. Israel sungah tua bangin kigamta lo ding hi! Hih bangin gitloh gamtat kei in.

Kei bang suak ding ka hi hiam? Ka maizumna koi-ah sel ding ka hi hiam? Nang a bangci thu na hiam? Israel migilo a haikhat na bang ding hi. Nong hehpihna-in kumpipa kiangah gen in, nong tenpih ding hong kham lo ding hi," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin a thu ngai lo a tuanu sangin amah hatzaw ahi manin a buangawp hi.
Tua khit ciangin Amnon in thakhatin amah a mudah mahmah hi. A taktakin a itnasa sangin a mudah zaw hi. Amnon in tuanu kiangah, "Tho inla paikhia in!" a ci hi.
Tuanu in, "Hi kei! Kei nong sawlkhiatna, tu-a kei tungah na bawlsa khialhna sangin a lianzaw hi," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin amah in tuanu thu a ngai nuam kei hi.
Ama nasem neih tuampa sam-a, "Hih numei hih mun pan nawhkhia unla a nungah kong kalh un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nasempa in koihkhia-a a nungah kong a kalh hi. Tuanu in puantualpi a manpha mahmah a kizem e
Tamar in a lutungah vut khu a, a silh lai a kizem puantualpi f

A sanggampa Absalom in tuanu kiangah, "Tua na sanggampa Amnon nang tawh om ahi hiam? Ka sanggamnu aw, dai in; amah na sanggampa ahi hi. Lungsim in zong nei se dah lel in," a ci hi. Tuateh amah a sanggampa Absalom innah ciah a numei khatguak lungsipi in a om hi.
Hih thu teng kumpipa David in a zak ciangin a heh mahmah hi.
A sanggamnu Tamar Amnon in maimawlsak ahi manin Absalom in amah mudaha, asia apha kam khat beek a genpih kei hi.
Kum nih khit ciangin Ephraim gamgi kianga Baal Hazor ah Absalom’ tuumul mette om uh a amah in kumpipa’ tapa khempeuh tua lai-ah a pai dingun a sam hi.
Kumpipa kiangah Absalom pai-a, "Na nasempa in gan-mulmette ka khawm khin hi. Nong hehpihna-in kumpipa le a uliante nong kihel zo ding uh hiam?" a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hi lo hi, ka tapa aw, ka vekun kong pai kei ding uh hi; nang adingin vangik lel hi," ci-in a dawng hi. Absalom in a kut hangin nial teitei a, ahi hangin thupha a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom in, "Nong pai kei ding leh nong hehpihna in ka sanggampa Amnon ko tawh hong paisak in," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, "Bang hangin no tawh hong pai ding hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin Absalom in kun tentan a, tua ciangin a om lai kumpipa’ tapate le Amnon a paisak hi.

Absalom in a mite kiangah, "Ngai un! Amnon in zu a kham mahmah ciangin, ‘Amnon satlum un,’ kong cih ciangin that un. Lau kei un. Thu hong pia khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Kihatsakin kihangsak un," ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom mite in Absalom thupiak bangin Amnon tungah a hih uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa’ tapate khempeuh diangkhia uh a, laasakol ah tuangin a tai uh hi.
Amaute lamkalah a om laitakun David tungah thu kizasak a; "Absalom in kumpipa’ tapate khat zong sit loin satlum khin hi," a kici hi.
Kumpipa dingto-in a puansilhte balkeka, leitual ah a lum hi; a nasemte khempeuh puan balkeksa in a kiangah a ding uh hi.

Ahi hangin David sanggampa Shimeah’ tapa Jonadab in, "Ka topa in kumpipa tapa khempeuh kithat khin dingin ngaihsun kei in; Amnon bek si hi. Hih in Amnon in a sanggamnu Tamar a buansaka kipan Absalom in a sawm den ahi hi.
Kumpipa’ tapa khempeuh si khin a hong kiko pen thusim kei in. Amnon bek si hi," a ci hi.
Tua hun laitakin Absalom a taimang hi.
Tua laitakin galvilpa a khuadak toh leh ama omna pan nitumna-lam mualpang panin mitampi paisuk a mu hi. Tua galvilpa pai-in kumpipa kiangah, "Haronaim lam mualpang ah mi ka mu hi," a
Jonadab in kumpipa kiangah, "En in, kumpipa’ tapate hiah om hi; na nasempa gen bang tektek ahi hi," a ci hi.
A gen khit phetin nakpitaka kap kawmin kumpipa’ tapate a lut uh hi. Kumpipa zong kap-a a nasemte khempeuh kah cihtakin a kap uh hi.
Absalom tai a, Geshur kumpipa Ammihud’ tapa Talmai kiang a tung hi. Ahi hangin Kumpipa David a tapa hangin nisimin a thum hi.
Absalom a tai khit ciangin Geshur ah pai-a, tua lai-ah kum thum a om hi.
Amnon sihna hangin kumpipa b
Kumpipa in Absalom a ngaih lam Zeruiah’ tapa Joab in a thei hi.

Tua ciangin Joab in Tekoa ah mi khat sawlin tua lai panin numei pil khat a kipuaksak hi. Amah in tuanu kiangah, ‘A thumthum va kineih in. Thumna puansilhte silh inla kipuahna sathau khatpeuh zang kei in. Ni tampi sung misi khat hanga a dah numei bangin va gamta in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah pai-in hih kammalte zangin vahopih in," a ci hi. Tuateh Joab in tuanu tungah a thugen ding teng a muam hi.
Kumpipa kiangah Tekoa pana numei pai c
Kumpipa in, "Bang in hong lungkhamsak hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Tuanu in, "Ka pasal si khin a; meigong ka hi ta hi.
Keimah na nasemnu in tapa nih ka nei hi. Amaute lopaang ah kilai uh a, a phelh ding kuamah a om kei hi. Khat in a khat satin a si hi.

Tua hi-a ka bawng’ buppi uh na nasemnu langah a ding uh hi; amaute in, "Ama thah a sanggampa tangin amah ka thah theih nadingun, a sanggampa a sattuk pen hong ap in; tua ciangin a gamh luah ding ka beisak vet ding uh hi,’ ci uh hi. Ka mei-am om lai sunsun mitsak ding uh a, ka pasal min le ama suante leimaitang panin phiatmang ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in numei kiangah, "Nang thu tawh kisai thu ka pia ding hi, innah ciah in," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin Tekoa pana numei in, "Ka topa kumpipa aw, kei tung le ka pa innkuanpih tungah mawhsak-na tu henla kumpipa le a tokhom kimawhsak kei hen," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, "Mi khatpeuh in nang tungah bang khatpeuh a gen leh kei kiangah hong paipih in, amah in nang hong buaisak kik nawn kei ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuanu in, "Ka tapa a siatsak nawn loh nading le sisan phulapa kisiatsak behna panin a dalsak dingin kumpipa in ama Pasian
Amah in, "
Tua ciangin numei in, "Ka topa kumpipa tungah na nasemnu kam khat hong gensak lai in," a ci hi.
Gen in, ci-in a dawng hi.

Numei in, "Tua ahileh bang hangin Pasian mite tungah tua tawh a kibang na hih sawm na hi hiam? Kumpipa in hih banga a cih ciangin amah le amah kimawhpaih ahi hi, ahang in, kumpipa in a hawlkhiatsa tapa sam kik ta ahi hiam?

Eite i si pelmawh dinga tui buasa a kiluah theih nawn loh tawh a kibang ding hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in nuntakna a lakhiamang kei ding hi; tua sangsikin a kihawlkhia mipa amah panin a midang suak loh nadingin lampi a gelsak hi.
"Tua hi-a tu-in hih thu gen dingin ka to kumpipa kiangah kong paina mite ka kihtak hang ahi hi. Na nasemnu in, ‘Kumpipa ka hopih dinga, a nasemnu ngetna a pia kha ding hi.
Pasian in kote hong piaksa gouluahna panin kei le ka tapa, khenkhiat hong sawm mite panin kumpipa in a nasemnu hong hut ding a thukim kha thei ding hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua hi-a tu-in na nasemnu in, ‘Ka topa kumpipa pen asia le apha a khentel thei Pasian van sawltak tawh kibang ahi manin ka topa kumpipa kammal in kei hong tawldamsak ding hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in numei kiangah, "Tu-a nang kong dot ding a dawnna hong im kei in," a ci hi.
Numei in, "Ka topa kumpipa in hong gen in," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hihte khempeuh Joab khut suak ahi na?" ci-in a dong hi.

Numei in, "Ka topa kumpipa, nang nuntakna ka lo hi, ka topa kumpipa aw, ka topa kumpipa gente panin kuamah in veilam ahi-a taklam ahi zongin a pialsak thei kei hi. Himah hi, hih banga hih dingin lam hong lak na nasempa Joab hi a, na nasemnu gen khempeuh amah in na nasemnu hong muap ahi hi.
Tu laitaka omzia khel nadingin na nasempa Joab in a hih ahi hi. Ka topa in leitunga a piang khempeuh a thei - Pasian van sawltak khat bangin pilna na nei hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Kumpipa in Joab kiangah, "Hoih mahmah hi, ka sem ding hi. Pai inla tangvalpa Absalom va sam kik in," a ci hi.

Amah a zahtakna lakin Joab khup bawh suka, kumpipa thupha a pia hi. Joab in, "Kumpipa in ama nasempa ngetna pia na hi manin na nasempa in na mai-ah maipha ngah ahi lamtak tuni-in a thei hi, ka topa kumpipa aw," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Geshur ah Joab pai a, Jerusalem ah Absalom a ciahpih kik hi.
Ahi hangin kumpipa in, "Ama inn ah a pai kul ding hi; ka maitang a mu peuhmah kei ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Absalom ama innah pai-a kumpipa maitang a mu kei hi.
Israel khempeuh sungah Absalom zah a pasal mel hoih a kiphat mi khat beek a om kei hi. A luzanga kipan a khenuai dongin genbanna a om kei hi.
Amah in a lu-a sam gik lua a sak hunhun in met a - a sam a met simin tehin - kumpi tehna in shekel a
Absalom in tapa thum le tanu khat a nei hi. A tanu min Tamar hi a, numei melhoih khat ahi hi.
Kumpipa maitang mu loin Jerusalem ah Absalom kum nih a teng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah paisak nuamin Absalom in Joab a vaikhak hangin Joab ama kiangah a pai nuam kei hi. Tua ciangin a nihveina vaikhak a, amah a pai nuam tuan kei hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a nasemte kiangah, "En un, kei lo le Joab lo a kigizawng hi a, tua lai-ah mangbuh-ham a nei hi. Pai unla mei-in halsak un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Absalom nasemte in a lo a halsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom inn ah Joab pai a, ama kiangah, "Bang hangin na nasemte in ka lo hong halsak uh ahi hiam?" a ci hi.

Absalom in Joab kiangah, "En in, nang kong thukhak a, ‘Kumpipa kiangah hong sawlin, "Bang hangin Geshur panin hong ciah ka hi hiam? Tua lai-ah om lai leng kei adingin a hoihzaw ding hi!" ci-a nong dotsak ding ka deih hi. Tua hi-a tu-in kumpipa maitang ka mu nuam hi, na khatpeuh a khial ka hileh amah hong thatsak in,’ ci-in kong dongsak nuam hi," a ci hi.
Kumpipa kiangah Joab pai-a a va gen hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa in Absalom samsak a, amah a sungah tumin kumpipa mai-ah leilam nga-in a kunsuk hi. Tuateh kumpipa in Absalom a nam hi.
Hih hun khit ciangin Absalom in a mai-a tai ding sakolleng khat le sakolte le mi sawmnga a kithawisak hi.

Amah thobaih a khuapi kongpi zuatna lampi gei-ah a ding hi. Kumpipa mai-ah thukhensak ding lungkimlohna a nei mi pai khatpeuh a om ciangin Absalom in sama, "Nang koi khua pan na hiam?" ci a, amah in, "Na nasempa Israel beh khat pan ka hi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
En in, na thuneih dikin kician sinsen hi, ahi hangin na thu hong sit dingin kumpipa in mi a koih kei hi," a ci hi.
Tuateh Absalom in, "Gam sungah kei thukhenin hong kiseh le maw! Lungkimlohna a nei ahikeh thu nei peuhmah hong pai dinga thutangin a thu ka khensak ding hi," a cih beh hi.
Mi khatpeuh in ama lam manawh in a mai-ah a kunsuk leh Absalom in a khutin zama, amah lenin a nam hi.
Absalom in kumpipa tunga thutang dong dinga pai Israel-te khempeuh tungah hici bangin bawla, hih bangin Israel mite lungsim a gukhia hi.
Kum li b
Aram a Geshur ah na nasempa ka ten lai-in: "
Kumpipa in, "Lungnuamin pai in," ci hi. Tua ciangin Hebron ah a pai hi.
Tua ciangin Absalom in Israel behte sung khempeuh ah kamtai sawlsim a, "Pengkul ging na zak phetun, ‘Hebron ah Absalom kumpi ahi hi,’ ci un," a cisak hi.
Jerusalem panin Absalom in mi zanih a tonpih hi. Amaute mawhpeng hi-in lengla bang lel-a kisam hi a, bangmah thu a thei kei uh hi.
Absalom in biakna a piak laitakin David thu kuppihpa Gilon-te Ahithophel zong ama gam khuapi Giloh pan a pai nadingin a vaikhak hi. Tua bangin sawmsimna thahatin Absalom nungzui a khang semsem hi.
David kiangah kamtai khat pai a, "Israel mite lungsim Absalom in zo khin hi," ci-in a gen hi.

Tua ciangin David in Jerusalem a, a ompih a ulian khempeuh tungah, "Hong pai un! I tai kei leh Absalom in eite khat beek hong suaktasak lo ding hi. Thakhatin i nusiat pak kei leh manlangin hong kuan dinga eite hong zoin hong siasak ding uh a, namsau-in khuapi a vat ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Kumpipa’ uliante in, "Ka topa uh kumpipa in a tel peuhpeuh a sem dingin na nasemte kithawisa-in ka om uh hi," ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Kumpipa paikhia-a, a innkuanpih khempeuh in amah a zui uh hi; ahi hangin amah in a kumpi inn kem dingin a zinote sawm a nusia hi.
Tuaci-in kumpipa paikhia-in, a mite khempeuh in zui uh a, a gamla simsim mun khatah a khawl uh hi.
A mite khempeuh in amah makhelh uh a, Kereth-te khempeuh, Peleth-te khempeuh le Gath pana a tonpih mi zagukte a vekun kumpipa mai-ah a pai uh hi.
Kumpipa in Gath mi Ittai kiangah, "Bang dia ko hong zui na hi hiam? Ciah kik inla Kumpi Absalom tawh om in. Nang gamdang mi na hi a, na gam pana hong kihawlkhia ahi hi.

Zana hong tung pan bek na hi hi. Tua hi a, ka pai nading mun ka theih lohna ah tuni in nang hong kawivakpih ding ka hi hiam? Ciah kik inla na khuapih mite tonpih in. Migitna le muanhuaina no tawh om ta hen," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin Ittai in kumpipa kiangah, "
David in Ittai kiangah, "Pai ou leh," a ci hi. Tua ciangin Gath mi Ittai a mite khempeuh le ama tonpih a innkuanpihte in a zuisuak uh hi.
Tua mite khempeuh nawkna khuaneu-a mite khempeuh a kapkhia uh hi. Kumpipa in zong Kidron Kuam kantana mite khempeuh in sehnel-gam lam a manawh uh hi.

Zadok zong tua lai-ah kihel a, ama ompih Levi-te khempeuh in Pasian thukhun singkuangpi a pua uh hi. Amaute in Pasian singkuangpi nga uh a, mite khempeuh khuapi pan a pusuah khit matengun Abiathar in biakna a
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Zadok kiangah, "Pasian singkuangpi khuapi sungah puak kik un.
Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Nang tungah ka lungkim kei hi,’ a cih leh kei a kigingsa ka hi hi; kei tungah hoih a sak bangbang hong hih ta hen," a ci hi.

Kumpipa in siampi Zadok kiangah zong, "Thumukhol khat hi lo na hi hiam? Na tapa Ahimaaz le Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan tawh lungnuamtakin khuapi ah ciah kik un. Nang le Abiathar in na tapate gel uh tonpih un.
Sehnel-gam sunga ngahmun ah no hong zaksakna ka zak mateng ka na ngak ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Zadok le Abiathar in Jerusalem ah Pasian singkuangpi pua kik uh a tua lai-ah a om uh hi.
David ahileh Olive Vum ah paito lai-a, a pai kawmin a kap hi; a lu khuha a khe guakin a pai hi. Ama tonpihte khempeuh in zong a lu uh khuh uh a, a paitoh kawmun a kap uh hi.
Tua hunin David kiangah, "A lehdo mite lakah Absalom tawh Ahithophel kipawl hi," ci-in a kigen hi. Tua ciangin David in thu ngen a, "
Mite in Pasian biakna muna a zat uh mualdawn ah David a tun ciangin amah tawh kimu dingin Ark mi Hushai na om-a a puantual kibalkekin a lutungah leivui a khu hi.
David in ama kiangah, "Kei nong zuih leh nong gimsak ding hi.

Ahi hangin khuapi ah kileh kik inla Absalom kiangah, ‘Kumpipa aw, na nasem kong suak ding hi; a beisa hunin na pa’ nasem ka hi hi; tu-in nang nasem kong suak ding hi,’ va ci lecin Ahithophel ngaih-sutpihna lawhsamsakin kei nong huh thei ding hi.
Siampite Zadok le Abiathar tua lai-ah nang tawh om ding hi lo ahi hiam? Kumpi inn sunga na zak khempeuh amau ko in.
Amau tapa nihte, Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz le Abiathar’ tapa Jonathan-te amau tawh tua lai-ah a omkhawm uh hi. Zak khatpeuh na neih uh ciangin kei kiangah hong sawl un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin khuapi ah Absalom a lut laitakin Jerusalem ah David lawmpa Hushai a tung hi.

Mualdawn galdiak ah David a tun ciangin Mephibosheth neihsa kempa Ziba in amah a na dawn hi. Amah in anlum zanih, lenggah mohkeu zakhat, thei moh za khat le zu savun-um khat a pua tutphah vawhsa laa nih tawh a na dawn hi.
Kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, "Bang hanga hihte hong puak na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Ziba in, "Laate kumpi innkuante tuan nading hi a, anlum le singgahte mite nek ding hi-in, a zu pen sehnel gama a tha beite tha thawh kik nading ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Na pu’ tupa koi-ah om ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Ziba in, ama kiangah, "Amah Jerusalem ah omlai hi, bang hang hiam cih leh,‘Tuni-in Israel innkuante in ka pu kumpi-gam hong pia kik ding hi,’ ci-in ngaihsun hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Ziba kiangah, "Mephibosheth neihsa peuh mah tu-in nang aa ahi hi,"a ci hi.
Ziba in, "Kiniamkhiatin kong kun hi; ka topa kumpipa aw, na mai-ah maipha hong ngahsak in," a ci hi.
Kumpipa David in Bahurim a manawh laitakin Saul innkuan tawh a bawng’ kibang mi khat tua lai panin a paikhia hi. Amah Gera’ tapa hi in a min Shimei hi a, a hamsiat kawmkawmin a paikhia hi.
Amah in David veilam le taklam ah galkap honte le amah a cingte om napi David le a uliante khempeuh suangtangin a deng hi.
A hamsiat kawmkawmin Shimei in, "Paikhia, paikhia, no mihing sisan suahte, no misiate!
Ama muna na uknapa, Saul innkuan sunga na luansak sisan
Tua ciangin Zeruiah’ tapa Abishai in kumpipa kiangah, "Bang hangin hih ui sisa in ka topa kumpipa hamsiat ahi hiam? A kiangah pai-in a lu hong tankhiasak in," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin kumpipa in, "No Zeruiah’ tapate aw, no le ko bang kisai i hi hiam? Amah

Tua ciangin David in Abishai le uliante khempeuh kiangah, "Ka tapa, keima ci-le-sa mahmah in kei thah hong sawm hi. Tua ci lehang hih Benjamin mipa in kei hong hicih ding mah hi! Amah koihkhong lel un; hamsiatsak lel un,
Tua ciangin David le a mite lampi tawnin a pai laitakun amau gal ah mualpang tawnin Shimei pai a, a pai kawmkawmin samsia a, amah suangtangin deng a leivui a theh hi.
Kumpipa le a tonpihte khempeuh gimpi in a tupna mun uh a tung uh hi. Tua lai-ah amahmah a tawlnga hi.
Tua hun laitakin Absalom le Israel mite Jerusalem ah tung uh a, Ahithophel amah tawh a omkhawm hi.
Tua ciangin David lawmpa Arki mi Hushai, Absalom kiangah pai a, "Kumpipa khansawt hen! Kumpipa khansawt hen!" a ci hi.
Absalom in Hushai kiangah, "Hih pen na lawmpa na itna na lahna hi ve maw? Bang dinga na lawmpa zui lo na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Hushai in Absalom kiangah, "Hi lo hi,
Tua banah ke’n kua na sem ding ka hi hiam? A tapa na sem lo ding ka hi hiam? Na pa na ka sep bang tektekin nangma na ka sem ding hi," a ci hi.
Absalom in Ahithophel kiangah, "Na ngaihsutna hong gen in. Bang hih ding i hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Ahithophel in, "Na pa in a inn cing dinga a nusiat a zinote luppih in. Tua ciangin Israel khempeuh in na pa langpanna za ding uh a, nang tawh a om khawm peuhmah a thakhauhsak ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in inn tungah Absalom puanbuk lamsak uh a, Israel khempeuh muhin a pa’ zinote a luppih hi.
Tua hi a, tua hun lai-in Ahithophel ngaihsutna, Pasian dot tawh a kibang ahi hi. Tua bangin David le Absalom in Ahithophel ngaihsutna a thupi sim uh hi.
Ahithophel in Absalom kiangah, "Mi tul sawm le tulnih ka a
Amah gima a thanem laitakin simin linthawnin ka sat dinga b
mite khempeuh nang kong puak kik ding hi. A si dinga mi khat na zon, a vekpi-a hong ciahkikna suak dinga; mite khempeuh ka nasak kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Absalom le Israel upate khempeuh in tua geelna hoih sa uh hi.
Ahi hangin Absalom in, "Ark-te Hushai zong sam dih un, amah’n bang gen hiam za phot dih ni," a ci hi.
Hushai ama kiang a tun ciangin Absalom in, "Ahithophel in hih ngaihsutna hong pia hi. A gen bangin i hih ding hiam? I hih kei ding leh na ngaihsutna hong gen in," a ci hi.
Hushai in Absalom kiangah, "Ahithophel ngaihsutna tutungin hoih lo hi.
Na pa le a mite na theihsa ahi hi; amaute galdo siam uh a, gamlakah vompi no laksak bangin a hangsan uh hi. Tua thamlo in, na pa galdo siamsa khat hi a, zanin galkap honpi tawh a omkhawm kei ding hi.
Tu nangawnin suanghawm ah a buk kei leh mundang khatah om ding hi. Amah in nang galkapte hong sim masa e
Tua ciangin Israel khempeuh in na pa galsiam hi-a, ama ompihte galhang ahilam a theihsa uh ahi manin, humpinelkai lungsim nei a hang pente nangawn lau-in lungsi ding uh hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin kei ngaihsutna ah: Israel mi peuhmah Dan panin Beersheba ciang - tuipi gei-a sehnel zaha tamte - kikaikhawmin, nang mahmah in galsung ah amaute na makaih ding hi.
Tua hileh amah a kimuhna peuhpeuh ah simin leituala daitui kia bangin ama tungah i kia ding hi.
Amah khuapi sungah a nung kik leh, Israel khempeuh in khauhual kengin, tua khuapi a them zong a kimuh loh dongin kuam sungah i kaimang ding hi," a ci hi.
Absalom le Israel mite khempeuh in, "Ahithophel ngaihsutna sangin Ark-te Hushai ngaihsutna hoihzaw hi," a ci uh hi. Ahang in, Absalom tungah siatna a tun theih nadingin
Hushai in siampi Zadok le Abiathar-te kiangah, "Ahithophel in Absalom le Israel upate kiangah hih bang hih banga sep dingin gen a, ahi hangin ke’n tuaci bang tuaci banga sep dingin ka gen hi.
Tu mahmah in thu paisak inla David kiangah, "Sehnel gam ngahmun ah tuzan na giak kei in; na galkah pelmawh kei uh leh kumpipa le ama ompih mi khempeuh hong kivalhtum ding hi,’ ci-in gen in," a ci hi.
En Rogel ah Jonathan le Ahimaaz a om uh hi. Nasem numei khat in amaute thu va puakin amaute in kumpipa kiangah pai-in a va gen ding uh ahi hi; ahang in, tuate khuapi sungah a lut ding uh lauhuai hi.

Ahi hangin tangval khatin amaute mu a Absalom kiangah a ko hi. Tua ciangin tua mite gel paikhia uh a, Bahurim a mi khat inn a zuan uh hi. Tuapa in a huang sungah tuidum khat a nei hi; amaute tua sungah a kumsuk uh hi.
A zi in tuidum sin la-in a tungah sin-a, tua tungah an a zaal hi. Tua thu kuamah in a thei kei hi.
Absalom mite tua inn a numei kiang a tun uh ciangin, "Ahimaaz le Jonathan koi-ah om uh hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Numei in amaute kiangah, "Amaute lui galkah khin uh hi," a

Tua mite a paikhiat khit uh ciangin amaute tuidum panin kahto uh a Kumpi David thu puak dingin a pai uh hi. Amaute in, "Manlangin paikhia unla gungal kah un; Ahithophel in no tunga hih nadingin hibang, hibangin ngaihsutna pia hi," a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin David le a ompihte khempeuh paikhia in Jordan galah a galkah uh hi. Khuavak ciangin Jordan galah a galkah nai lo khat beek a om kei uh hi.

Ahithophel in ama ngaihsutna a kizuih loh lam a muh ciangin a laa tutphah vawhin ama gam khuapi-a a innah a ciah hi. A innsung vai hawmsaka tua khit ciangin a gui-awk hi. Tuaci-in amah si-a a pa hanah kivui hi.
Mahanaim ah David pai a, Absalom le a mi Israel-te khempeuh Jordan a galkah uh hi.
Absalom in Joab munah galkapte a uk dingin Amasa a koih hi. Amasa pen Israel-te b
Israel-te le Absalom in Gilead ah giahphual a sat uh hi.
Mahanaim ah David a tun ciangin Rabbah pana Ammon-te Nahash’ tapa Shobi le Lo Debar pana Ammiel’ tapa Makir le Rogelim pana Gilead-te Barzillai in
puanlom le kuang le inn vanzatte a puak uh hi. Amaute in mangbuh le mangbuh-ham, annel le antang kansa, be le zawngbe e
khuaizu le nawithau-khal, tuu le bawngnawi-khalte David le a mite nek dingin a puak uh hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in, "Mite gilkialin gim uh a, sehnel gamah a dangtak uh hi," a ci uh hi.
David in ama ompih a mite kikhawmsak-a a tultul-a uk le a zaza-a ukte a seh hi.

David in galkapte kuankhiasak-a - sehthum-ah khat Joab uksakin sehthum-ah khat Zeruiah’ tapa Joab sanggampa Abishai uksak-a, a thumna Gath-te Ittai a uksak hi. Kumpipa in galkapte kiangah, "Kei mahmah no tawh kong kuankhawm kul ding hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Ahi hangin mite in, "Na kuan peuhmah kei ding hi; kote hong kidelh kek leh kote hong ki-awlmawh lo ding hi. Kote a lang nangawn ka si uh zongin hong awlmawh lo ding uh hi; ahi hangin kote f
Kumpipa in, "Note hoihsak penpenin ka gamta ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mite khempeuh a tultul le a zaza ukin a kuankhiat laitakun kongpi gei-ah kumpipa a ding hi.

Kumpipa in Joab, Abishai le Ittai-te kiangah, "Kei nong khualna un tangvalpa Absalom hong dopsak un," ci-in thu a pia hi. Kumpipa in Absalom tawh kisai galkap ukte tung ciat-a a thupiak, galkapte khempeuh in a za uh hi.
Israel sim dingin galkapte lopaang ah kuankhia uh a, Ephraim tulak ah gal a kido hi.
Tua lai-ah David mite in Israel galkapte zo uh a, tua ni-in a si tam lua mahmah in - mi tul sawmnih a si hi.
Mualtung khuaneu buppi ah kidona kizel a, tua ni-a namsau a si sangin tulak in nuntakna tam a susiazaw hi.

Tu-in Absalom le David mite a kituak kha uh hi. Amah a laa tungah tuanga, tawsaw hiangzau mahmah nuai-ah a laa a pai laitakin sing kawmah Absalom lu a awk hi. A tuanna laa paisuak a, amah huih lakah kikhai-in a nusia hi.
A hici a om tua mite khatin a muh ciangin Joab kiangah, "Tawsaw kung khatah Absalom kikhai ka mu hi," a ci hi.
Tua a gen mipa tungah Joab in, "Bang e! Amah mu ing e? Bang dia tua mun mahah lei lakah satkhia pah lo na hia? Tua cih lecin ngun shekel g
Ahi hangin mipa in, "Shekel h
Kei nuntakna a lauhuai-in om kha leh - kumpipa in lah zak loh nei lo a - nang lah kei kiang pan na kikangkoih tuak hi," a
Joab in, "Hih bangin nang hong ngak man nawn kei ning," a ci hi. Tua ciangin teikhawh thum la a, tawi-in tawsaw kawmah a hing lai-a om Absalom lungtang ah tuate in a sun hi.
Tuateh Joab’ galhiam tawi mi sawm in Absalom umcih uh a satin a that uh hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in pengkul muta, Joab in khawlsak ahi manin galkapte in Israel a delh nawn kei uh hi.
Amaute in Absalom lakhia uh a tulaka dumpi khatah lawnin a tungah suangtum tampitak a ciannelh uh hi. Tua khit phetin Israel-te khempeuh amau inn ciatah a tai uh hi.

Absalom in, "Kei min ban zom ding tapa ka nei kei hi," ci-in ngaihsun ahi manin a nuntak lai-in khuampi khat la-a, a mual dingin Kumpipa Kuam sungah a phut hi. Amah in tua khuampi ama min puasak a, tuni dongin Absalom Mual kici hi.
Tua ciangin Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz in, "Kei va tai-in
Joab in, "Tuni-a thuthak ko ding nang hi kei teh; kumpipa’ tapa si ahi manin a hun dang teh ko in," ci-in a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in Cush-mipa kiangah, "Pai inla na muhsa teng kumpipa va ko in," a ci hi. Joab mai-ah Cush mipa kuna a taikhia pah hi.
Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz in Joab kiangah, "Bangbang hi ta leh Cush mipa nungah kei zong hong taisak in," a ci kik hi.
Ahi hangin Joab in, "Ka tapa aw, bang pai nopna na hi hiam, thuthak hilh man pahtakman na ngah kei ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tuapa in, "Bangbang hita leh tai nuam ing," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Joab in, "Tai ou leh!" a ci hi. Tuateh zanglei b
Kongpi sungnung le a puanung kikalah David a tut laitakin kulh kongpi khum zangah galvilpa a kahto hi. Amah khuadak a mi khat hong tai a mu hi.
Galvilpa in kumpipa samin a gen hi.
Kumpipa in, "Amah kia ahileh thu hoih hi ding hi," a ci hi. Mipa a nai tektek hi.
Tua ciangin galvilpa in mi tai dang khat mu-a a nuai-a kongpi cingpa samsukin, "En dih in, midang khat kia hong tai leuleu!" ci-in a ko hi.
Kumpipa in, "Amah’n zong thu hoih mah hong puak pelmawh ding hi," a ci hi.
Galvilpa in, "A masa pen Zadok’ tapa Ahimaaz tai tawh kisun sa ing," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in amah mi hoih hi; amah’n thu hoih hong tun ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Ahimaaz in a mai leilam ngatin kumpipa mai-ah kunsuk-a, "Hoih khin hi,
Kumpipa in tangvalpa Absalom a suakta hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Ahimaaz in, "Joab in kumpipa nasempa kei hong sawl laitakin buaina lianpi khat ka mu a, na nasempa in bang hiam cih ka thei kei hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Kumpipa in, "Pam ah ding inla na ngak in," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah pai-in a pamah a ding hi.
Tua khit ciangin Cush mipa tunga, "Ka topa kumpipa aw, thu hoih na za in! Na langa ding khempeuh panin tuni-in
Kumpipa in Cush mipa kiangah, "Tangvalpa Absalom a suakta hia?" ci-in a dong hi.
Cush mipa in, "Ka topa kumpipa galte le nang hong nasak nuam-a dingte khempeuh tua tangvalpa tawh kibang ta uh hen," ci-in a dawng hi.

Kumpipa a kigaih hi. Amah kongpi tunga inndei-ah paito in a kap hi. A paitoh kawmin: O ka tapa Absalom! Ka tapa, ka tapa Absalom! Nang sih tangin kei si hoh leng maw! - O Absalom, ka tapa, ka tapa!" a ci hi.
Joab kiangah, "Kumpipa in Absalom kahkahin a thum-thum hi," ci-in a kiko hi.
Tua hi-a, tua ni-in, "A tapa hangin kumpipa dah hi," cih galkap honpi in za uh ahi manin galkap buppi adingin tua ni-a gualzawhna, thumna a suak hi.
Galsimna pana tai-te maizumin a dap lut bangin tua ni-in mipite khuapi sungah a daplut uh hi.
Kumpipa in a mai khuh in, "O ka tapa Absalom! O Absalom ka tapa, ka tapa!" ci-in nakpi in a kap hi.
Tua ciangin inn sungah Joab lut a kumpipa kiangah, "Nangma nuntakna, na tanu na tapate nuntakna le na zipite le na zinote nuntakna a hukhia na mite khempeuh tuni-in na maizumsak hi.

Nang hong mudahte na it a, nang hong itte na mudah hi. Tuni-in galkap mangte le a mite bangmah man lo na suahsak lam kitel hi. Tuni in Absalom-te nungta henla, kote khempeuh si khin le ung na nuam ding lamtak ka thei hi.
Tu-in paikhia inla na mite hanthawn in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa ding to a, kongpi-a a tutna ah a tu hi. Mite kiangah, "Kongpi ah kumpipa tu hi," ci-a a kigen ciangin amaute khempeuh a mai-ah a pai uh hi.
Tua hun laitakin Israel-te a inn uah a tai uh hi.
Israel beh sung tengah, "Kumpipa in i galte khut panin hong hukhia hi; Philistia-te khut pana hong hukhia zong amah ahi hi. Ahi hangin Absalom hangin a gam taisan hi;
tuateh eite hong uk dingin sathau i nilhpa Absalom lah gal sungah si ta hi. Tua ahi ciangin bang hanga kumpipa lak kik ding a gen om lo na hi uh hiam?" ci-in mi khempeuh khat le khat a kingawh uh hi.

Tua ciangin David in siampi Zadok le Abiathar-te kiangah, "Judah upate kiangah, ‘Israel sungteng khempeuh ah kumpipa ama muna omsak kik ding a kigen nungsang bang hangin kumpipa a kumpi inn ah tunpih kik ding, note a nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?
Note ka sanggamte, keima si-le-sa na hi uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin bang hangin kumpipa a tun kik nunung pen hi ding na hi uh hiam?" ci-in a dongsak hi.

Tua ciangin Amasa kiangah, ‘Nang ka si-le-sa hi lo na hi hiam? Tu-a kipan mailam ah ka galkap mangpa dingin Joab munah kong koih kei tak leh Pasian in a ut bangin hong bawlin a nasiazaw-in zong hong bawl ta hen, ci hi’ ci un," ci-in thu a zasak hi.
David in Judah mi khempeuh lungsim mi khata bangin a zo pah hi. Amaute in kumpipa kiangah, "Nang le na mite khempeuh hong ciah un," ci-in thu a zasak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jordan dong kumpipa a ciah kik hi.

Amaute Jordan galkah in guampi sunga om khuapi leitaw lama Aroer kiangah giak uh a, tua ciangin Gad kantanin Jazer dong a paisuak uh hi.

Tua ciangin amaute Tyre kulhpi lam le Hiv-te le Canaan-te khuapite khempeuh ah a pai uh hi. A nunung penin, Judah a Negev sunga Beersheba ah a paisuak uh hi.
Gambuppi ah a pai kim khit uh - kha kua le ni sawmnih a bei ciangin Jerusalem ah a tung kik uh hi.

Tua ciangin Gad tungtawna
Araunah in a et leh kumpipa le a mite ama lam manawh-a pai a mu hi; amah pusuak-a a maitang leilam ngatin kumpipa mai-ah a kunsuk hi.
Araunah in, "Bang hangin na nasempa kiangah ka topa kumpipa hong pai na hi hiam?" a ci hi.

Araunah in David kiangah, "Ka topa kumpipa in na lungkim bangin la inla pia in. Hih lai ah meihal biakna dingin bawngtalte oma, hih lai-ah a sing dingin ancilna vante le bawngtal hakkolte a om hi.

Tua ciangin David in ancilna phual le bawngtalte lei-a, tuate man dingin ngun shekel a
David in tua lai ah
Kumpi David tekta-a a kum kicing ta in puan a silhsak ciang nangawnun a khua lum thei lo hi.
Tua ciangin a nasemte in a kiangah, "Nungakno bit khat kumpipa kem dingin ka zong ding uh hi. Tuanu a pangah lum leh ka kumpipa uh a khua lum ding hi," a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in Israel gam sung teng nungakno melhoih khat zong uh a Shunam-te Abishag mu in kumpipa kiangah a puak uh hi.
Nungakno melhoih mahmah a, amah in kumpipa kemin cinga kumpipa in a luppih zo nawn kei hi.
Tu-in a nu Haggith tapa Adonijah amah le amah kikausiphumin, "Kumpi ka suak ding hi," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amai-a tai ding mi sawmnga, sakol-lengte le sakolte a
(A pa in, "Bang hangin na ut banga ta na hi hiam?" ci-in a tai ngei kei hi. Amah zong a mel hoih mahmah a Absalom zoma suak ahi hi.)
Adonijah in Zeruiah tapa Joab le siampipa Abiathar hih thu donga amaute in a thukimpih uh hi.
Ahi hangin siampi Zadok, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, kamsangpa Nathan, Shimei le Rei b
Tua ciangin Adonijah in En Rogel kiang Zoheleth Suangpi ah tuu, bawng le bawngno vakthaute biakna-in a pia hi. Amah in a sanggamte khempeuh, kumpi tapate le kumpi ulian ahi Judah mi khempeuh sam napi
ahi hangin kamsang Nathan ahi-a, Benaiah ahi-a, a cing tuamte ahi a, a sanggampa Solomon ahi zongin a sam kei hi.
Tua ciangin Nathan in Solomon nu Bathsheba kiangah, "I topa David theih loh kalin Haggith tapa Adonijah kumpi a suah lam za lo na hi uh hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin tu in nangma nuntakna le na tapa Solomon nuntakna na hotkhiat theih nadingin ngaihsutna khat kong pia ding hi.

Kumpi David kiangah lut inla, ‘Ka to kumpipa aw, na nasemnu tungah: "Kei khita kumpi sem ding na tapa Solomon hi a, ka kumpi tokhom ah a tu taktak ding hi," ci-in hong kiciam hi lo na hi hiam? Bang hangin tu-in Adonijah kumpi suak ta ahi hiam?’ ci-in gen in.
Kumpipa tawh na kihoho laitakin kei hong tumin na gensate kong kipsak ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a tekta kumpipa va mu dingin inndei sungah Bathsheba lut-a, Shunam-te Abishag in a na kem hi.
Kumpipa mai-ah Bathsheba kunsukin a khukdin hi.
Kumpipa in, "Bang deih na hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Tuanu in ama kiangah, "Ka topa aw,
Ahi hangin tu-in Adonijah kumpi suak khin a, tua thu nangmah ka to kumpipa in na thei kei hi.
Amah in ganhon tampitak, bawngno vakthau le tuute go a, kumpipa tapa khempeuh, siampi Abiathar le galkap mangpa Joab sam napi na nasempa Solomon a sam kei hi.
Ka to kumpipa khitteh kumpi tokhom tungah kua tu ding cih a theih nadingun Israel khempeuhte’ mit nang tung hong tu hi, ka to kumpipa aw.
Tua hi kei leh ka to kumpipa a pate tawh tawlnga dinga a kisialkhawm phetin kei le ka tapa Solomon mawhna neite bangin hong kibawl pah ding hi," a ci hi.
Tuanu kumpipa tawh a kihoho laitakin kamsangpa Nathan a tung hi.
Tuateh amaute in kumpipa kiangah, "Kamsangpa Nathan hih lai-ah om hi," ci-in a gen uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa mai-ah amah pai-a leilam nga-in a kunsuk hi.
Nathan in, "Ka to kumpipa aw, nang khitah Adonijah kumpi suakin na kumpi tokhoma tu dingin na pulak mah ahi hiam?

Tuni-in amah paisuk khinin biakna-in ganhon tampi, bawngno vakthau le tuute a pia hi. Kumpipa tapa khempeuh, galkap mangte le siampi Abiathar a sam khin hi. Tu mahmah in amaute in amah tawh nekhawm dawn khawm uh a, ‘Kumpi Adonijah khansawt hen!’ ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin na nasempa kei, le siampi Zadok, le Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, le na nasempa Solomon hong sam lo hi.
Ka to kumpipa in ama nasemte hong theisak loin ka to kumpipa khitah a tokhoma tu ding na hihsa ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpi David in, "Bathsheba hong tumsak un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah kumpipa omna-ah lutin a mai-ah a ding hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiciam a: "Ka lungkhamna khempeuh pana hong hukhiapa
Tua ciangin Bathsheba niamtakin lei lamah kunsuk a, kumpipa mai-ah khukdin sa in, "Ka topa Kumpipa David nungta tawntung hen!" a ci hi.
Kumpi David in, "Siampi Zadok, kamsang Nathan le Jehoiada tapa Benaiah hong lutsak un," a ci hi. Amaute kumpipa mai a tun uh ciangin
amah in amaute kiangah: "Na topa nasemte tonpih unla ka laa tungah ka tapa Solomon tuangsakin Gihon ah paipih suk un.
Tua lai-ah siampi Zadok le kamsangpa Nathan in Israel kumpi dingin sathau a nilh ding uh hi. Pengkul mut unla, "Kumpi Solomon khansawt hen!" ci-in awng un.
Tua ciangin amah tawh tonto unla amah ka kumpi tokhom ah tu-in kei munah a mang ding hi. Israel le Judah a ukpa dingin amah ka seh khin hi," a ci hi.
Jehoiadah tapa Benaiah in, "Amen!
Tua hi-a siampi Zadok, kamsang-pa Nathan, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, Kereth-te le Peleth-te paisuk uh a, Kumpi David laa tungah Solomon tuangsakin Gihon ah a paipih suk uh hi.
Siampi Zadok in puanbuk siangtho panin sathau koihna saki la a Solomon a nilh hi. Tua ciangin amaute in pengkul mutin mi khempeuh in, "Kumpipa Solomon khansawt hen," ci-in a awng uh hi.
Tuateh mi khempeuh in a nung zui to uh a, tamngai mut kawmin nuam a sa mahmah uh hi; amaute awging in lei a lingsak hi.
Adonijah le a ompih a lenglate khempeuh a pawi bawl uh a man kuanun hih thu a za uh hi. Pengkul ging a zak ciangin Joab in, "Khuapi sunga gamlumnate khempeuh bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amah a paupau laitakin siampi Abiathar tapa Jonathan a tung hi. Adonijah in, "Hong tum in. Nang bang mi gina khat in thu hoih hong puak pelmawh niteh maw," a ci hi.
Jonathan in, "Hi peuhmah kei! I Kumpipa David in Solomon kumpi suaksak khin ta hi.
Kumpipa in amah tawh siampi Zadok, kamsangpa Nathan, Jehoiada tapa Benaiah, Kereth-te le Peleth-te sawlin amaute in kumpipa laa tungah tuangsak uh a,
siampi Zadok le kamsangpa Nathan in Gihon ah amah sathau nilh zo uh hi. Tua lai panin amaute gualnuamin paito uh a khuapi sung teng a thawn hi. Na zak gamlumna tua ahi hi.
Tua banah Solomon in a kumpi tokhom luah khin hi.

Kumpi ulian te zong i to David Kumpipa a lungdampih dingin pai khin uh a, ‘Na Pasian in nang min sangin Solomon min thangsak zaw henla nang tokhom sangin amah aa liansakzaw ta hen!’ ci uh hi. Tuateh kumpipa a lupna tungah kunin bia-a,
‘Tuni-in kei za laih ding ka tokhom tunga tu ka mita hong musak
Tua tak ciangin Adonijah lenglate khempeuh lauthawngin dingto uh a, a kikhen-thang uh hi.
Ahi hangin Adonijah in Solomon kihta a, biakna-tau kite a pom hi.

Tua ciangin Solomon kiangah, "Adonijah in Kumpipa Solomon kihta a biakna-tau kite a pom hi. Amah in: ‘Kumpipa Solomon in a nasempa namsau-a hong thah loh nadingin tuni-in hong kiciam hen,’ ci hi," ci-in kigen hi.
Solomon in, "Amah mi gina ahina a lah theih nak leh a samzang khat zong lei lakah kia lo dinga; ahi zongin ama sungah siatna a kimuh leh a si ding hi," ci-in a thuk kik hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa Solomon in mi sawla biakna-tau pan a lasuk uh hi. Tuateh Adonijah pai-in Kumpipa Solomon mai-ah kun-a, Solomon in, "Na inn ah ciah in," a ci hi.
David in a sih kuan ciangin a tapa Solomon thu a vaikhak hi.
Amah in, "Leitung mi khempeuh lampi zui-in a paikuan ta ka hi hi. Tua ahi ciangin kihatsak inla, kipasalsak in.

"Tu-in nang mahmah in Zeruiah tapa Joab in kei tungah hong bawlna - Israel galkap mang nihte Ner tapa Abner le Jether tapa Amasa-te tunga a gamtatna na thei hi. Amah in amaute that-a, gal kido hun bangin gal kilem hunin a sisan uh luangsaka kawnga a kawnggak le khe-a a khedap ah amaute sisan a bangsak hi.

"Ahi zongin Gilead a Barzillai tapate tungah migi inla na sabuai-a an nete lakah an nesak in. Na sanggampa Absalom kiang pana ka tai lai-in ka kiangah hong dinpih uh hi.

"Tuateh Mahanaim ah ka paini-a a khaa mahmah a kei hong hamsiatpa Bahurim pana Benjamin-te Gera tapa Shimei nang tawh a om lam zong phawk in. Jordan ah kei hong dawn dingin hong paisuk lai-in ama tungah
Ahi hangin tu-in amah a mawhpeng in ngaihsun kei in. Nang pilna nei mi khat na hi hi; amah na bawl nading na thei ding hi. A lu-a a samkang sisan tawh hankhuk ah puak in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin David a pate tawh khawlkhawm ta a, David Khuapi ah a kivui hi.
Amah in Israel tungah kum sawmli sung uk a - Hebron ah kum sagih om leh Jerusalem ah kum sawmthum le thum sung a om hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon a pa David tokhom tungah tu-a, ama ukna kiptakin a kiphut kip hi.
Tu-in Solomon nu Bathsheba kiangah Haggith tapa Adonijah a pai hi. Bathsheba in ama kiangah, "Lemthu-a hong pai na hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amah in, "Lemthu-a hong pai hi mah ing," ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Na khat kong gen nuam hi," a cih beh lai hi.
Tuanu in, "Hong gen in," ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in, "Na theihsa bangin kumpi-gam kei aa ahi hi. Israel khempeuh in kei kumpi in hong mu uh hi. Ahi hangin nate kikhek ta-a, ka sanggampa tungah kumpi gam tung khin ta hi; ahang in,
Tu-in nang tungah ngetnop khat kong nei hi. Hong nial kei in," a ci hi.
Tuanu in, "Nong ngen thei hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin, "Nong hehpihna-in Kumpipa Solomon tungah ka zi dingin Shunam-te Abishag na ngetsak lecin - amah’n nang hong nial lo ding hi," ci-in a zom lai hi.
Bathsheba in, "Hoih mahmah hi, kumpipa tungah nang adingin kong gensak ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Bathsheba in Adonijah tangin Kumpipa Solomon hopih dingin a pai ciangin tuanu muakin kumpipa dingto a, ama lamah kunin a kumpi tokhom ah a tu hi. Amah in kumpipa nu adingin tokhom khat kipuaksak-a a taklam ah a tu hi.
Amah in, "Nang tungah na neuno khat kong ngen nuam hi, hong nial kei in," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in, "Nu aw, hong ngen in kong nial kei ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, "Shunam-te Abishag le na sanggampa Adonijah kitengsak in," a ci hi.

Kumpipa Solomon in a nu kiangah, "Bang hangin Adonijah adingin Shunam-te Abishag hong ngen na hi hiam? Ama kumpi-gam ding zong hong ngen khawm pah vet ve - tuateng banah amah ka u ahi hi - hi hi, ama ading le siampi Abiathar le Zeruiah tapa Joab ading tawh ngen vet lecin!" ci-in a dawng hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Benaiah thu pia a, "Ama cih bangin hih in. Sattuk suk inla vui in, tua bangin Joab in kei le ka pa innkuan tungah mawhpengte sisan tunga a khialhnate siangsak in.

Kumpipa in Jehoiada tapa Benaiah galkap mangpi in Joab mun ah koih a, Abiathar hemkhia in siampi Zadok tawh laih hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Shimei samsak a ama kiangah, "Mundang ah pai kei inla Jerusalem ah inn khat lamin tua lai-ah teng in.
Paikhia lecin Kidron Kuam na kantan ni-in na si taktak ding hi; nangma sisan nang lu tungah a tu ding hi," a ci hi.
Shimei in kumpipa kiangah, "Na gen bangin a hoih hi. Na nasempa in ka to kumpipa cih bangin ka hih ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi. Tua ciangin Jerusalem ah Shimei sawtveipi a teng hi.
Ahi hangin kum thum khit ciangin Shimei silate nih - Gath kumpipa Maacah tapa Achish kiangah tai uh a, Shimei kiangah, na silate Gath ah om hi," ci-in a kigen hi.
Tuateh a laa tutphah vawhin a silate zong dingin Gath a Achish kiangah a pai hi. Tuaci-in Shimei kuankhia-a Gath panin a silate a la kik hi.

Tua ciangin kumpipa in Jehoiada tapa Benaiah thu pia a, amah paikhia-in Shimei sattukin a that hi.

Solomon in munsangte ah biakna pia in gimnamtui a hal lohbuang a pa David ngeina kipte banga kalsuanna tawh
Munsang thupi pen Gibeon ahi manin biakna pia dingin kumpipa tua lai-ah pai a, Solomon in tua biakna-tau ah meihal biakna tul khat a pia hi.

Solomon in, "Na nasempa ka pa David tungah na migitna na lak zo hi, bang hang hiam cih leh amah nang tungah muanhuai-in thumaana a lungsim a thutang hi. Hih na migitna lianpi ama tungah na zomsuak a tuni mahmah in ama tokhom a tu ding tapa khat na pia khin hi.
Tu-in
Na teelsa mi sim zawh loh a tampite lak hih lai-ah na nasempa ka om hi.
Tua ahi ciangin na mite uk nading le akhial le amaan khentel theih nadingin khentheina lungsim kei hong guan in. Ahang in, hih nangma mi tampitakte kua in uk zo ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Solomon in hih a ngetna hangin Topa a lungkim hi.

Tua ahi ciangin Pasian in ama kiangah, "Nang in hih nong ngen hi, khansawt nading ahi a, neih le lam ahi-a, na galte sih nading ahi zongin hong ngen loin thu khentheihna tawh thutanga uk theih nading hong ngen na hi manin
nong nget mah kong pia ding hi. Nang tawh a kibang a om ngei nai lo leh a om ngei nawn lo dingin pilna le thutheihtelna lungsim nang kong pia ding hi.
Tua banah na nuntak hun sung teng kumpite lakah na kibatpih a om loh nadingin nong nget khak loh - hauhna le pahtawina kong pia ding hi.
Tuateh ka lampite tawna, na pa David hih bangin ka ngeina kipte le ka thupiakte na man leh khansawtna zong kong pia ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Solomon khanglo a - a mang ahilam a thei hi.
Amah Jerusalem ah ciah kik a, Topa thukhun singkuangpi mai-ah dingin meihal biaknate le kilawmtakna biaknate b
Kumpipa kiangah numei kizuak nih pai-in a mai-ah a ding uh hi.
Amaute khat in, "Ka topa aw, hih numei tawh inn khatah ka tengkhawm uh hi. Amah tawh ka omkhawm sungun ta khat ka nei hi.
Ka ta suah zawh a nithum ni-in hih nu in zong ta khat mah a nei hi. Ko guak bek ka om uh a; inn sungah kuamah dang om loin kote gel bek ka hi uh hi.
"Zanin tuanu in a tapa nenkha in a si hi.
Tua ahi ciangin zankim laitakin amah tho-a, na nasemnu ka ihmut kalin ka panga ka tapa a la hi. Amah in a angah koih-a a tapa sisa kei angah a koih hi.
A zingsang ciangin ka tapa nawi pia dingin ka tho a - amah na si mawk hi! Ahi hangin zingsang khuavak ah limtaka ka et ciangin tua pen kei sunga suak tapa hi lo hi," a ci hi.
Numei khat pen in, "Hi kei! A hing pen kei tapa hi-a, a si pen nang aa ahi hi," a ci hi.
Ahi hangin a masa pen in, "Hi kei! A si pen nang aa ahi hi; a hing pen kei aa hi,’ ci teitei hi. Tua bangin kumpipa mai-ah a kisel uh hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hih pen in, ‘A hing pen kei tapa hi, nang tapa a si hi,’ ci a, hua pen in, ‘Hi kei! Nang tapa a si hi, kei aa a hing pen hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Namsau khat hong la un," a ci hi. Tua ciangin amaute in namsau khat kumpipa a pia uh hi.
Tua ciangin mah in: "Naupang a nungta pen tumnih suah unla, alang khat pia in, alang adang khat pen pia un," ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tapa a hing pen’ nu in a tapa khuatuah a, kumpipa kiangah, "Ka topa aw, nong hehpihna-in naupang a hing pen amah pia in! Amah that kei in!" a ci hi.
Ahi hangin a khat pen in, "Nang na hi-a, kei ka hi zongin a nei i om tuam kei ding hi. Tum nih suah in!" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a thukhenna pia a, "Naupang a nungta pen a masa numei pia un. Amah that kei un; tuanu ama nu ahi hi," a ci hi.
Israel khempeuh in kumpipa thukhenna a zak uh ciangin kumpipa lamdang a sa uh hi, bang hang hiam cihleh amah in Pasian tung panin thutanga gam-uk nading pilna a neih lam amaute in a mu uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Solomon in Israel khempeuh a uk hi.
Tua hi-a hihte in ama ulianpite ahi hi:
Zadok tapa Azariah-siampi;
Shisha tapate Elihoreph le Ahijah - thuvanpite;
Ahihud tapa Jehoshaphat - thu ciamteh;
Jehoiada tapa Benaiah - galkap mangpipa,
Zadok le Abiathar - siampite;
Nathan tapa Azariah - gamkhen uliante ukpipa;
Nathan tapa Zabud - siampipa le kumpipa thukuppihpa;
Ahishar - kumpi inn ukpa;
Abda tapa Adoniram - aana-a nasemte ukpa ahi hi.
Solomon in Israel gamsung bupah kumpipa le kumpi innkuante kivakna lamsang a sik ding gamkhen uk sawm le nih zong a nei hi. Khat in kum khatin kha khat ta a sik ciat ding uh hi.
Amaute min hihte ahi hi:
Ephraim mualtung gamah- Ben-Hur;
Makaz, Shaalbim, Beth, Shemesh le Elon Bethhannan ah - Ben-Deker;
Arruboth (Socoh le Hepher leitang khempeuh ama aa) ah - Ben-Hesed;

A masapen cherub kha langkhat tong nga sau-a, a langkhat pen zong tong nga mah a sau hi - a kha dawn le a kha dawn kikal tong sawm ahi hi.

Hitaleh na nasempa in nong lainat ding kong thungetna le kong thumna hong thusimsak in
Nangmah in, ‘Tua lai-ah ka Min a om ding hi,’ na cihna mun hih lam nga-in na nasempa in thu hong ngetna na zak thei nadingin hih biakinnpi lam nga-in sun le zanin hong mitsuan ta in.
Na nasempa le na mi Israel mite in hih mun lam nga-in hong thumna uh za in. Nangma tenna vantung panin za inla na zak ciangin a mawhna uh maisak in.
"Mi khat a vengpa tungah khialin kiciam a kul a, hih biakinnpi sung na biakna-tau mai-ah hong pai-a a kiciam ciangin
van panin na za inla na sem in. Na nasemte kikal ah thu khen inla a khialpa mawhpaihin a gamtatna ama lutungah tusak in. Mawhpengpa mawh lo hi cikhia inla ama mawhpenna kipsak in.
Na mi Israel mite nang tunga hong mawhna uh hangin gal khat in a zawh a, nang kiangah hong kileh kikin hih biakinnpi sungah na min hong pulakin, thungenin hong thum uh leh

tua ciangin van panin na za inla na nasemte, na mi Israel mawhna maisak in. Amaute nuntakna lampi maan hilh inla na mite luah dinga na piak leitangah guah zusak in.
Hih gamah kialpi ahi a pulpi ahi zongin a tun a, ahikeh an cinghteekna, an maibuakna, kaukhup, kauphe tunna ahikeh amau khuapite khatpeuh galte in umcih a, haksatna natna khatpeuh a tuah uh a,

na tenna mun vantung panin na za inla Israel-te theih bangin hih ka lamsa na inn in na Min a puak lam leitung mi khempeuh in thei a, nang hong kihtak nadingun gamdang mipa a ngetna na pia in.

Jehoiakim kumpi a suahin a kum sawmnih le nga pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm le khat sung a uk hi. A nu min Zebidah hi a, Pedaiah tanu hi-in amah Rumah pan ahi hi.
A pate hihsa bangin
Jehoiakim uk laitakin Babylon kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar in a gam sima, kum thum sung ama innteng a suak hi. Ahi hangin tua hun ciangin a lungsim khenga amah in Nebuchadnezzar a lehdo hi.
Manasseh mawhnate le ama bawlsa mawhnate, mawhpengte sisan a luansaknate khempeuh hangin ama ompihna pan a khenkhiat theih nadingin
Amah in mawhpeng sisan tawh Jerusalem kidimsak ahi manin
Jehoiakim uk sunga thupiang dangte le ama sepsate khempeuh Judah kumpite khangthu ciamtehna laibu sungah kigelh khin hi lo ahi hiam?
Jehoiakim a pate tawh tawlnga khawm hi. Tuateh a tapa Jehoiachin in a kumpi za a luah hi.
Babylon kumpipa in ama gam khempeuh, Egypt Wady panin Euphrates Gunpi dong laksak khin ahi manin Egypt kumpipa ama neihsa gam panin a kuankhia kik nawn kei hi.
Jehoiachin kumpi a suahin a khan kum sawm le giat pha a, Jerusalem ah kha thum sung a uk hi. A nu min Nehushta hi-a Elnathan tanu ahi hi; Jerusalem pan ahi hi.
Amah in a pa hih bang tektekin
Tua hun laitakin Babylon kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar uliante Jerusalem ah kuanto uh a, a umcih uh hi;
ama uliante in a umcih laitakun khuapi ah Nebuchadnezzar mahmah a paito hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoiachin, a nu, amah cingte le a uliante khempeuh ama tungah a va lut uh hi.
Babylon kumpipa in a uk a kum giatna kumin Jehoiachin thong sungah khum hi.
Amah in Jerusalem-te khempeuh: a uliante khempeuh, galkapte, le khutsiamte le nasep siamte khempeuh - a vekpi in tulsawm, salin a kai hi. Gammi a zawng pente bek a nusia lai hi.
Nebuchadnezzar in Babylon ah Jehoiachin salin a kai hi. Amah in kumpipa nu, a zite, a uliante le gam sunga makaite zong Jerusalem panin Babylon ah a paipih hi.
Babylon kumpipa in gal sim thei mi thahat khempeuh galkap tul sagih le khutsiamte le nasep siamte mi tul khat zong Babylon ah nawhkhia hi.
Amah in Jehoiachin pano Mattaniah ama mun ah kumpi suaksak a min laihsakin Zedekiah a phuak hi.
Zedekiah kumpi a suahin kum sawmnih le khat pha a, Jerusalem ah kum sawm le khat sung a uk hi. A nu min Hamutal hi-a Jeremiah tanu hi; Libnah pan ahi hi.
Jehoikim hihsa bang tektekin
Tu-in Zedekiah in Babylon kumpipa a lehdo hi.

Tua ciangin Zedekiah in a uk a kum kuana, a kha sawmna a ni sawmna ni-in Babylon kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar, Jerusalem sim dingin a galkap buppi tawh a kuan hi. Amah in khuapi pua-ah giahphual sat-a a kimkot tengah umcihna a bawl hi.
Zedekiah uk a kum sawm le khatna dong khuapi ki-um cip hi.
A kha lina e
Tua ciangin khuapi kulh kitovang a, Babylon-te f
Babylon-te h
amah kiman hi. Amah Libnah a Babylon kumpipa kiangah kipuak a, tua lai-ah ama tungah thu a kikhen hi.
Amaute in Zedekiah tapate ama muhin a that uh hi. Tua ciangin a mitte khelkhia uh a, sumngo kol bulhin Babylon ah a paipih uh hi.
Babylon kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar a kum sawm le kuana, a kha ngana, a ni sagihna ni-in Babylon kumpipa ulian khat ahi amah cingte ukpa Nebuzaradan Jerusalem ah a pai hi.
Amah in
Kumpi cingte ukpa khutnuai-a Babylon galkap buppi in Jerusalem kimkot ah kulhte a phelkhia uh hi.
A cingte ukpa Nebuzaradan in khuapi sunga a om lai mite, mi omlai peuhmah le Babylon kumpipa tungah tokaisate khempeuh tawh salin a kai khawm hi.
Ahi hangin a ukpa in lote le lenggui-lote a kho dingin gammi a zawng pente pawlkhat a nusia hi.
Babylon-te in sumngo khuampite,
Amaute in beelte, vutluahnate, taitehte, kuangte le biakinnpi sunga nasepna-a kizang sumngo vanzat khempeuh a lamang uh hi.
Kumpi cingte ukpa in biakna veinate le tui thehna kuang-ukte - kham ahikeh ngun-a kibawl khempeuh a lamang hi.
Khuampite khat teh pi sawmnih le sagih a
A cingte ukpa in siampi makaipa Seraiah le ama zoma siampipa Zephaniah le kongpi cing mi thumte salin a kai hi.

Tua khuapi sunga a omlaite panin galdo mite a uk ulianpa le kumpipa thudot mi ngate a man hi. Amah in gam mite laka aana-a paltan dongte a uk thuvanpipa le khuapi sunga kimu ama mi sawmgukte zong a man hi.
A cingte ukpa Nebuzaradan in amaute khempeuh paipih a Riblah a Babylon kumpipa kiangah a puak hi.
Tua lai Hamath gam sung Riblah ah kumpipa in amaute a thatsak hi.
Tua bangin ama gam pan Judah salin kikai hi.
Nebuchadnezzar in Judah-a a nusiat mite a uk dingin Shaphan tapa, Ahikam tapa Gedaliah a koih hi.

Galkap mangte le amau mite khempeuh in, Babylon kumpipa in Gedaliah ukpi-a a koih lam a zak uh ciangin Mizpah a Gedaliah kiangah Nethaniah tapa Ishmael, Kareah tapa Johanan, Netophat-te Tanhumeth tapa Seraiah, Maacath-te tapa Jaazaniah le amau mite a pai uh hi.
Amaute le amau mite a khamuan nadingin Gedaliah a kiciam hi. Amah in, "Babylon uliante kihta kei un. Gam sungah hong lal unla Babylon kumpipa na sem un; no adingin hoih ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua hi napi a kha sagihna sungin kumpi sisan mah ahi, Elishama tapa Nethaniah, tapa Ishmael a mite sawm tawh kuanin Mizpah a om Gedaliah le amah tawh a om khawm Judah mite le Babylon mite zong a suamlum hi.
Tuateh amaute in Babylon-te kihta uh ahi manin aneu pen pan alian pen dongin galkap uliante tawh Egypt ah a tai uh hi.
Judah kumpipa Jehoiachin sal-a a kikaih zawh a kum sawmthum le sagihna kumin Babylon ah Evil - Merodach c
Amah kamnemin hopih a, Babylon ah amah tawh a omkhawm kumpi khempeuh sangin pahtawina tutphah sangzaw ah a tusak hi.
Tua ciangin Jehoiachin in a thong puante suahkhia-a, tua huna kipan a nuntak laiteng kumpi sabuai-ah an a ne hi.
Jehoiachin a nuntak laisiah kumpipa in nisimin a zattawm ding manmanin a pia hi.

Hih sumte tawh Jerusalem a note Pasian biakinnpi-a biakna-tau ah piak dingin bawngtalte, tuutalte le tuuno apate, an-a biaknate le dawntheih-a biakna bekin na zang ding uh hi.

Tuateh na Pasian biakinnpi dinga kisam dang khatpeuh piak nop na neih leh kumpi sumkholna panin na zang thei ding hi.

"Sinai Vum tungah nong kumsuk a, van panin amaute na hopih hi. Amaute a thumaan a thutang ngeinate le thukhamte le a hoih thukipte le thupiakte na pia hi.
Amaute tungah na Sabbath siangtho na theisak-a amaute thupiakna, thukhensatna le thukhamte Moses tungtawnin na pia hi.
A gil uh a kial leh van panin anlum na pia-a a dang uh a tak leh suangpi panin tui na puak hi; khut vikto in amaute piak dinga na ciamsa leitang ah pai-in a neih nadingun na gen hi.
"Ahi hangin ka pute uh kiphasak lua-in genhak uh a, na thupiakte a mang kei uh hi.

Na thu mang nuam lo uh a, amaute laka na bawl nalamdangte a phawk nuam kei uh hi. Amaute genhak uh a, a salsuahna-uah a paikik nadingun a lehdo ding makai a seh uh hi. Ahi hangin nang, mawhna a maisak a hehpihthei, le mi a khuatuah, a heh hak, itna dim a nei Pasian na hi hi. Tua ahi manin
amaute mahmah in bawngno lim sungin, ‘Hih in Egypt pana hong pikhia note Pasian ahi hi,’ a cih ciang nangawn uh ahikeh a kihtakhuai gendaina a bawl uh hangin na nusia tuan kei hi.
"Na khuatuahna lianpi hangin amaute sehnel gamah na nusia kei hi. Meii khuampi in sunin amaute lamlak den-a, zan in zong mei-khuampi amau lampi ah a tang hi.
Amaute ahoih nangma Kha lam na laksak hi. Amaute kamah manna na kitalawisak kei-a a dangtak uh ciangin tui na pia hi.
Kum sawmli sung sehnel gamah na vaak hi; amaute bangmah kisam loin a puan uh zong paat lo-a, a khe nangawn uh zong a bawk kei hi.
"Amaute kumpi-gam le minamte na pia a, gammong gamla pen nangawn na piakhia hi. Amaute in Heshbon kumpipa gam, Sihon d
Nangmah in a tate uh vana aksi zaha tam dingin na bawl-a, pai-a a luah dingun a pate uh tunga na gensa gamah na puak hi.

A tapate uh lutin tua gam a nei uh hi. Tua gama teng Canaan mite amaute mai-ah na guallelsaka; amau khutah Canaan mite pia in, a ut bangbangun a bawl dingun a kumpipa, a mite le a gam uh na piakhawm hi.

Amaute in kulha ki-umsa khuapite le lei hoihna munte la uh a; na hoih khempeuh a kicing inn, tuikhuk tawhsa, lenggui lo, olive lo le singgah kung tampitak a nei uh hi. Amaute in tuate a duh bangbangun ne-in kivak uh a, a lian mahmah nangma hoihna nuam a sa uh hi.
"Ahi hangin amaute thumang loin nang hong lehdo uh a; na thukham a nungngatsan uh hi. Amaute nang lama a kihei nadingun a zol, na kamsangte that uh a; a lauhuai mindaisakna a bawl uh hi.

Tua ciangin a nenniam amau galte khutah na pia hi. Ahi hangin amaute a kinetniam ciangin nang tungah hong kiko uh hi. Amaute hong kohna van panin na za-a, na khuatuahna lianpi hangin a galte uh khut panin a hukhia ding na pia hi.

"Ahi hangin a tawl uh a dam ciangin nang muhna ah a hoih lo a sem kik zel uh hi. Tua ciangin a galte uh khut sungah amaute na pia-a a galte un amaute a uk hi. Nang tungah hong kiko leuleu uh ciangin van panin na za-a na khuatuahna-in amaute tam veipi na hukhia hi.

"Na thukham lama a kihei nadingun na vauhilh hangin kiphasak lua uh a, na thupiak a mang kei uh hi. Mi khat in a zuih leh a nungtasak thei na ngeinakipte tungah a mawh uh hi. Phengphi in nang hong nungngatsan uh a, ngawngkhauhin na thu a ngai kei uh hi.
Kum tampi tak amaute na thuak keiikai hi. Kamsangte tungtawnin na Kha-in na vauhilh hi. Amaute in thusim lo teitei uh a, tua ciangin amau gamveng mite khutah na pia hi.
Ahi hangin a hehpih thei, mi a lainat Pasian na hi manin na lainat luat manin amaute beisak tuan loin na nusia kei hi.

"Tua ahi ciangin kote Pasian, a lian mahmah a thahat a kihtakhuai, itna thukhun a palsat lo Pasian aw, Assyria kumpipa huna kipan tuni dong kote tung, ka kumpite uh le ka makaite uh tung, ka siampite uh le kamsangte tung, ka pate uh le na mite khempeuh tunga hong tung hih haksatnate hong neu muhsak kei in.
Ko tunga hong tungsa khempeuh ah nang na thutang khin a, mawhna ka bawl lai-un muanhuaitakin na sem hi.
Ka kumpite uh, ka makaite uh, ka siampite uh le ka pate un na thukham zui lo uh a; na thupiakte le amau na vauhilhnate a thusim kei uh hi.
Amaute na piaksa lei hoihna gam zapi ah tengin a lian mahmah nangma hoihna nuamsa in amau kumpi gamah a om lai nangawnun, nangma na sem loin a gamtatsiate uh a tawpsan tuan kei uh hi.
"Ahi hangin en in, tu-in kote sila ka hi uh a, ka pate uh a gah le a sunga piang a hoih khempeuh a nek theih nadingun na piaksa gamah sila ka hi uh hi.
Kote mawhna hangin a piangkhia peuhmah ko hong uk dinga na koih kumpite in tang ta uh hi. Amaute in a ut bangun ka pumpi tung uh le ka ganhonte uh tungah hong uk uh hi. Ka lungdong mahmah uh hi.
"Hihte khempeuh ngaihsunsa-in kiciamna kho khat ka bawl uh a, lai tawh gelhkhia-in ka makaite uh, ka Levi-te uh le ka siampite un a tungah seal a tum uh hi," a ci uh hi.

"A omlai mite - siampite, Levi-te, kongpi cingte, lasate, biakinnpi nasemte le Pasian Thukham hanga a gamveng mite lakah amau le amau a kithehthang, thu theihkhin a zite uh le a tanu a tapate uh tawh -
hihte khempeuh in tu-in Pasian nasem Moses tungtawna kipia Pasian Thukham zuih ding le thupiakte, ngeinakipte le
"Eite kimkot a mite tungah i tanute mokhak loin i tapate adingin amau tanute i pi kei ding hi, ci-in ka kiciam uh hi.

"Ka gamveng mite un Sabbath ni-a zuak ding sumbuk van ahikeh antang hong puak uh ciangin Sabbath ni ahikeh ni siangtho khatpeuh ni-in ka lei kei ding uh hi. Kum sagih simin lo ka kuan kei ding uh a, ka leiba khempeuh uh ka maisak ding uh hi.
"Thupiak zuihna in, eite Pasian inn a nasep nadingin shekel khat sehthum suah sehkhat a

tua in sabuai tunga kikoih anlum ading, manmana kipia an-a biaknate le meihal biaknate ading; Sabbath ni-a biaknate, Kha Thak pawi le a kisehsa pawite ading; a siangtho biaknate ading; Israel-te thoihdamna ding, mawhna hanga biaknate le eite Pasian inn sunga nasep nading ahi hi.
"Thukham-a kigelhsa bangin ko - siampite, Levi-te le mipite in - kumsima a kisehsa hun zui-in
"Ka anpalte uh le singkung a gah masa peuhmah kum simin
"Thukham a kigelhsa bangin siampite in Pasian inn sunga a zat dingun ka tapa upapen uh, ka bawnghonte uh tacil, ka ganhonte uh tacil le ka tuuhonte uh tacil kong puak ding uh hi.

"Tua tham loin Pasian inn a vankholna-a siampite tungah lei-a piang anpalte, an-a biaknate, singkung khempeuh pana gah masate, lenggahzu thak le sathaute ka puak ding uh hi. Tuateh ka nasepna uh khuapi khempeuh ah sawma khat a kaikhawm Levi-te ahi manin ka khawhsa uh an panin sawma khat, Levi-te ka puak ding uh hi.
Levi-te in sawma khat a san uh ciangin Aaron suan siampi khat tawh kithuah ding uh a, Levi-te in sawma khat pana a sawma khat, eite Pasian inn sunga vanmanpha kholna inndei ah a puak ding uh hi.
Levi-te a kihel Israel mite in amau piak an, lenggahzu thak le sathaute mun siangtho-a zat ding vante koihna, vankholna inndei le nasem siampite, kongpi cingte le lasate omna munah a puak ding uh hi.
Eite Pasian inn eite in i thusim lo kei ding hi, a ci uh hi.
Tu-in mipi makaite Jerusalem ah tengin adang mi sawma khatte khuapi siangtho Jerusalem ah teng dingin ai lawn uh a, a om lai kuate amau khua ciatah a teng uh hi.
Amau utthu-a Jerusalem a teng nuamte khempeuh a kipakta hi.

Hihte, Jerusalem a teng khawk ukte ahi hi. (Tu-in Israel-te pawlkhat siampite, Levi-te, biakinnpi nasemte le Solomon nasemte suante Judah khuapi ah tengin, amau khuapi-a amau neihsa ciat ah a teng uh hi;
tua hun mahin Judah le Benjamin panate Jerusalem ah a teng uh hi):

Parez’ suan Mahalalel tapa, Shephatiah tapa, Amariah tapa, Zechariah tapa, Uzziah tapa, Athaiah;

Jeshaiah’ tapa, Ithiel tapa, Maaseiah tapa, Kolaiah tapa, Pedaiah tapa, Joed tapa, Meshullum tapa, Sallu
le a nungzuite Gabbai le Sallai - mi 928 pha hi.

Pasian inn ukpa Ahitub’ tapa, Meraioth tapa, Zadok tapa, Meshullam tapa, Hilkiah tapa, Seraiah
