le amah a huh innkuan lutangte tawh - 242 pha a; Immer’ tapa, Meshillemoth tapa, Ahzai tapa, Azarel tapa, Amashsai
le amah b
Levi-te panin:
Bunni’ tapa, Hashabiah tapa, Azrikam tapa, Hasshub tapa, Shemaiah;
le Pasian inn pualam nasem uk Levi lutangte nih - Shabbethai le Jozabad;
lungdamkoh thungetna-a makai thuvanpipa Asaph’ tapa, Zabdi tapa, Mica tapa, Mattaniah hi a; amah a huhte a nihna pa Bakbukiah; le Jeduthun’ tapa, Galal tapa, Shammua tapa, Abda ahi hi.
Khuapi siangtho a om Levi-te a vekpi in 284 pha hi.
Kongpi cingte:
Kongpi cinga a vil Akkub, Talmon le amau naseppihte tawh - mi 172 pha hi.
A om lai Israel-te - siampite le Levi-te ahileh Judah khuapi dang khempeuh a amau luah leitang ciatah a teng uh hi.
Biakinnpi nasemte Ophel mualno tungah teng uh a Ziha le Gishpa-te in amaute a uk uh hi.
Jerusalem sunga Levi-te ukpipa Mica’ tapa, Mattaniah tapa, Hashabiah tapa, Bani tapa, Uzzi ahi hi. Uzzi pen Asaph’ suante hi-a, Pasian inn ah kikhop cianga lasak tavuan nei khat ahi hi.
Lasate, kumpipa khutnuai hi uh a, nisimin manmanin na a sem uh hi.
Judah tapa Zerah’ suante khat, Meshezabel’ tapa Pethahiah in mipite le kumpipa kikalah na khempeuh-a kizang pazang ahi hi.
Khua neute le a lote tawh kisai-in, Judah mite pawlkhat Kiriath Arba le a kima khuaneute ah, Dibon le a khuaneute ah, Jekahzeel le a khuaneute ah,

Tuateh Levi-te makaite, Hashabiah, Sherebiah, Kadmiel’ tapa Jeshua le amaute huhte hi uh a, Pasian mipa David gualhsa bangin phatna le lungdamkohna a bawl uh ciangin amaute tawh kigalsai-in ding uh a, a dang khenkhat in a na dawng uh hi.
Mattaniah, Bakbukiah, Obadiah, Meshullam, Talmon le Akkub-te kongpi cingte hi uh a, kongpi-a vankholna inndei a cing uh hi.
Amaute in Jozadak’ tapa, Jeshua tapa, Joiakim hun sung le ukpipa Nehemiah le laithei siampi Ezra hun sungin na a sem uh hi.
Jerusalem kulh apna ah lungdamkohna late le tumtheih daltuah, harp-te le lyre-te tawh gualnuamtaka a ap dingin Levi-te amau tenna munmun ah kizongkhia-in Jerusalem ah kipuak hi.
Lasate in Jerusalem kim tengah khua nono sat uh ahi manin, Jerusalem kual kim teng - Netophath-te khuaneu pan,
Beth Gilgal pan, le Geba Azmaveth kimnai panin lasate a kipuak hi.
Thukham ngeina bangin siampite le Levi-te a kisiansuah khit uh ciangin mipite, kongpite le kulh a siansuah uh hi.

pengkul tawi siampi pawlkhat tawh kithuahin, Asaph’ tapa Zaccur tapa, Micaiah tapa, Mattaniah tapa, Shemaiah tapa, Jonathan tapa, Zechariah zong,
le amah a huhte - Shemaiah, Azarel, Malalai, Gilalai, Maai, Nethanel, Judah le Hanani-te in - Pasian mipa David sehsa bangin tumtheih nate tawh a zui uh hi. Laitheipa Ezra in mihonpi a makaih hi.
Tuikhuk Kongpi panin kulh-a kahtohna David khuapi kahlei zui to uh a, David inn khengin nisuahna lama Tui Kongpi lam manawhin a pai uh hi.

Tua ciangin lungdamko lapawl nihte Pasian inn sung amau mun dingah om uh a; tua mah bangin uliante a lang tawh
siampite - Eliakim, Maaseiah, Miniamin, Micaiah, Elioenai, Zechariah le Hananiah-te pengkul tawi kawmin -
Maaseiah, Shemaiah, Eleazar, Uzzi, Jehohanan, Malkijah, Elam le Ezer tawh zong ka tonkhawm uh hi. Lapawlte in Jezrahiah makaihna zui-in la a sa uh hi.
Tua ni-in Pasian in amaute lungnopsak mahmah ahi manin a lian mahmah biakna pia-in nuam a sa mahmah uh hi. Numei naupangte zong a gualnuam uh hi. Jerusalem khua sunga gualnopna gamlapi panin kiza hi.

Tua huna khiat dinga kiseh gahmasa le sawma khat kholna inndeite a cing ding mi a kiseh hi. Siampite le Levi-te in na a sep uh ciangin Judah-te lungkim uh ahi manin siampite le Levi-te adingin Thukham in a kalh zah, khuapite kima lote panin vankholna inndei ah amaute in a puak uh hi.
David le a tapa Solomon thupiakna tawh kizui-in lasate le kongpi cingte in zong a hih ding bangun amaute Pasian nasepna le kisiansuahna nasepte a sem uh hi.
Ahang in, tanglai pek, David le Asaph hunin lasate ading, Pasian phatna le lungdamkohna lasate adingin a ukpa a na om khin hi.

Zerubbabel le Nehemiah hun lai-in Israel-te khempeuh in lasate le kongpi cingte adingin a nisim tanh uh a pia uh hi. Amaute in zong Levi-te adingin koihtuam uh a, Levi-te in Aaron suante adingin a koihtuam uh hi.
Tua ni-in mipite zakin Moses Laibute ngaihtakin kisim-a, Pasian mite kikhopna ah Ammon-te ahikeh Moab-te a kihel ngei loh lam kimu hi;
bang hang hiam cih leh amaute in Israel-te an le tui in vai-dawn uh a, amaute a hamsiat dingin Balaam a cialzaw uh hi. (Bangbang ahi zongin, eite Pasian in hamsiatna thupha-in hong heisak hi.)
Mipite in thukham a zak uh ciangin gamdang mite suan khempeuh Israel-te panin a khenkhia uh hi.
Hih ma-in, eite Pasian inn a van kholna inndei ukin siampi Eliashib kikoih hi. Amah Tobiah tawh a semkhawm helhel hi uh a,
tununga an-a biakna antangte le biakinnpi vanzatte, le sawma khata kipia an; Levi-te, lasate le kongpi cingte, siampite adingin a kipiakhawm nate a kholna uh inndei lianpi khat ama sik ahi hi.

Ahi hangin Babylon kumpipa Artaxerxes hun a kum sawmthum le nihna kumin kumpipa kiangah hong ciah pan ka hi manin hih thu khempeuh a pian laitakin Jerusalem ah ka om kei hi. Tua nung deuhin ama phalna ngenin
Jerusalem ah ka ciah kik pan hi. Hih munah Eliashib in Pasian inn huang sunga inndei khat Tobiah a sikna hanga na hoih lo a piang khat ka phawk hi.
Ka lungkim lo lua mahmah a, Tobiah-te inn sung vanzat khempeuh inndei pualam ah ka lawnkhia hi.
Inndei sung siansuah dingin thu ka pia a, tua khit ciangin Pasian inn sung vanzat teng, an-a biaknate le gimnamtui tawh tuate ka koih khawm hi.
Levi-te tanh dinga kisehte amau kipia lo-a, nasepna-a nasem Levi-te le lasate khempeuh amau lo ciatah a ciah kik uh zong ka phawkkhia hi.
Tua ciangin uliante tai-in amaute kiangah, "Bang hangin Pasian inn kithusim lo ahi hiam?" ci-in ka dong hi. Tua ciangin amaute khempeuh ka kaikhawm a, amau mun ciatah ka pangsak hi.
Judah-te khempeuh in an pan sawma khat, lenggahzu thak le sathau, vankholna inndei ah a puak uh hi.

Siampi Shelemiah, laithei Zadok le Levi-te khat a min Pedaiah, vankholna inndei ka uksak a, Mattaniah’ tapa, Zaccur tapa Hanan amaute ka huhsak hi, bang hang hiam cih leh hih mite a muantakin kingaihsun hi. A sanggamte uh tunga amau tanh ciat a piakkhiat ding uh amau nasep ahi hi.
Ka Pasian aw, hih thu-ah kei hong phawk gige inla, ka Pasian inn le a sunga nasepnate ah muanhuaitaka ka sepsate maimangsak kei in.

Tua hun laite in Judah gam ah, Sabbath ni-in lenggah cilna ah lenggah a cil, lenggahzu, lenggah, theigah le van nam khempeuh laate suana van nawn mi ka mu hi. Amaute in Sabbath ni-in hihte khempeuh Jerusalem ah a puak uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin tua ni-a an a zuak uh ka vauhilh hi.
Jerusalem a teng Tyre mite in ngasa le sumbuk-van namkim Jerusalem ah puak uh a Sabbath ni-in Judah-te tungah a zuak uh hi.
Judah uliante kiangah, "Hih nasep uh gitlohna bang ahi hiam - Sabbath ni-in zehphi hi lo na hi uh hiam?

Eite Pasian in hih tuahsiatna khempeuh ei tung le Jerusalem tungah a tunsak nadingin na pute un zong tua bangin sem uh hi lo ahi hiam? Tuni-in note in Sabbath ni-a zehphitna tawh Israel tungah a nasiazaw thangpaihna na tungsak uh hi," ci-in ka tai hi.

Nitaklam, Sabbath kipat ma, Jerusalem kongpite a liap ciangin kongpite khaksakin Sabbath a bei ma-in a hon dingun thu ka pia hi. Sabbath ni-in van a kitumpih theih loh nadingin kongpite ah keima mite ka pangsak hi.
Khatvei nihvei bang sumbukte le van namkim zuakte Jerusalem pualam ah a giak uh hi.

Ahi hangin amaute ka vauhilh a, "Bang hangin zan ciangin kulh bulah giak na hi uh hiam? Na hicih lai uh leh no tungah khut kong nga ding hi," ka ci hi. Tua ni-a kipan amaute Sabbath ni-in hong pai nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Levi-te amau le amau kisiansuah uh a, Sabbath a kisianthosak theih nadingin pai-a kongpite a cin nadingun thu ka pia hi.
Ka Pasian aw, hih thu ah zong hong phawk inla, a lian mahmah na itna tawh kizui-in kei tungah na lainatna hong lak in.
Tua tham loin tua hun lai-in Ashdod, Ammon le Moab pana numeite a tenpih Judah mite ka mu hi.
A tate uh alang Ashdod pau le adangte pau-in pau uh a, Judah pau-a a pau zia ding a thei kei uh hi.

Amaute tai-in ka hamsiat hi. Pasalte pawlkhat te sat-in a humsam uah manin ka bawhsak hi. Pasian minin ka kiciamsaka, "Note in na tanute uh amaute na tenpihsak kei ding uh a, a tanute uh zong no le na tapate uh zi dingin na pi tuan kei ding uh hi.

Israel kumpipa Solomon mawhna zong hih bangte a tenpih hangmah hi lo ahi hiam? Minamte tampi lakah amah bang kumpi a om kei hi. A Pasian in amah it a, Pasian in Israel-te khempeuh kumpi a suaksak hi; ahi hangin gamdang numeite in amah nangawn a khialsak uh hi.
Gamdang numei tenpihna tawh note in zong a lauhuai gitlohna bawlin eite Pasian tungah na muanhuai lohna uh tu-in i vekin za pelmawh ding hi lo i hi hiam?" ka cisak hi.
Siampi Eliashib’ tapa Joiada’ tapate khat Haron-te Sanballat makpa ahi hi. Tuateh amah ka hawlkhiamang hi.
Ka Pasian aw, amaute in siampite zum, siampi’ thukhun le Levi-te ninsak uh ahi manin amaute ciamteh gige un.
Tua ciangin gamdang nate tawh a kizom siampite le Levi-te ka siansuahsak a, amaute nasepna ciatah na sem dingin ka seh hi.
A kiseh huna cih ding sing le biakna le gahmasa-a biakna ding zong ka vaihawmsak hi.
Ka Pasian aw, hong angvan inla hong phawk in.
Hih in India pan Cush a
Tua hunin Kumpi Xerxes a kumpi tokhom tungah tu-in a kumpi khua Susa panin uk a
ama uk zawh a kum thumna kumin a uliante le a zum nasem liante adingin pawi a bawl hi. Tua lai-ah Persia le Media galkap makaite, uliante le gamneu uk uliante a om uh hi.
Amah in a kumpivang’ minthanna a nopci ziahzuahna le ama liatna ni 180 sungtak a lak hi.
Tua banga a lah hun a bei ciangin kumpi innpi kianga huan gei-ah Susa khuapi sunga om a neupen pan a lianpen dong mi khempeuh tawh pawi a bawl hi.

Tua huan ah suangkang khuampite tungah ngunkual kivawha a kang le a dupsan nate a kikhai puandum le puankangte a kikhung hi. Tua lai-ah suangmanpha, porphyry, suangpek, kep manpha-nu le suang manpha dang tawh hoihtaka kizem suangphah tungah ngun le khama kibawl lupnate a om hi.
Kham hai tuamtuamte in lenggahzu kihawma, tuate khat le khat a kibang kei hi. Kumpi lenggahzu kicing mahmah a, deih zahzahin kizang hi.
Kumpipa in a zuhawmte tungah amau duh zahzah piak dingin hilhkhol ahi manin kumpipa thupiak bangin lenglate in amau duhzah ciat a dawn uh hi.
Kumpinu Vashti in zong Kumpipa Xerxes inn sungah numeite pawi a bawlpih hi,
A ni sagihna ni, Kumpi Xerxes in lenggahzu dawna nuam a sak mahmah ciangin ama nasem cilgehte sagih thu pia a - Mehuman, Biztha, Harbona, Bigtha, Abagtha Zethar le Carcas-te samin,
Kumpinu Vashti a mel hoih takpi ahi manin mite le a uliante et dingin kumpi lukhu khusakin a lah nadingun thu a pia hi.
Amah a cingte in kumpipa thupiak a gen uh hangin Kumpinu Vashti a pai nuam kei hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa a lung so-in a heh mahmah hi.
Thukham le a maana thu khenna tawh kisai a siamte kumpipa in a dot ngeina ahi manin, hun theisiam mipilte hopih a,

amah le amah tawh a kithuah - Carshena, Shethar, Admatha, Tarshish, Meres, Marsena le Memucan ama gam sunga, a sangpen le kumpipa tawh a kithuah tuamdiak Media le Persia ulian sagihte zong a hopih hi.
Amah in, "Upadi tawh kizui-in Kumpinu Vashti bangcih kul ding ahi hiam? Kumpipa Xerxes in cilgehte a thupiak a piaksak thupiakna mang nuam lo hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa le uliante om mahin Memucan in, "Kumpinu Vashti a khial ahi hi. Kumpipa tung bek hi loin Kumpi Xerxes ukna sunga gamneute a uliante khempeuh tungah zong a khial hi.

Ahang in, kumpinu gamtatna numei khempeuh in thei ding uh a, tua ciangin a pasalte uh thusim loin, ‘Kumpi Xerxes in ama mai-ah Kumpinu Vashti a kipuak ding thu pia napi, a pai nuam kei hi," ci ding uh hi.
Tuni mahmah in kumpinu thu a za Persia le Media numei uliante in kumpipa uliante tungah tua tawh kibangin gamta ding uh hi. Kizahtaklohna le kisimmawhna a bei ngei kei ding hi.

"Tua ahi ciangin kumpipa na lungkim leh kumpi thupiakna khat suaksak inla a kingen kik thei lo Persia le Media-te upadi sungah gelh in, Kumpi Xerxes omna ah Vashti tum ngei nawn lo ding hi, kici hen. Tuanu omna kumpi inn sunga om ding tuanu sanga hoihzaw khat zong koih in.
Tuateh kumpipa thupiakna ama gam sung khempeuh ah a zaksak ciangin numei khempeuh a neupen pan a lianpen dong in a pasalte uh zahtak ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Kumpipa le a uliante in hih ngaihsutna lungkim uh a, Memucan gen bangin kumpipa in a hih hi.
Amah in a gam sung mun khempeuh ah lai paisaka pasal peuhmah ama innkuan sungah a ukpa hi ding hi, ci-in amau gama om amau lai ciat, a minam kam ciat un zasak uh a, amau pau ciatin a tangko uh hi.
Tua khit Kumpipa Xerxes a hehna a daih ciangin Vashti gamtatnasa le ama tunga a thupiaksate a phawk kik hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa cingte in, "Kumpipa ading nungak bit melhoih zongsak in.

Kumpipa in amaute gam ciatah a teel ding mi sehsakin tua a teel uh nungak melhoihte khempeuh kumpipa tenna Susa ah kipuaksak in. Tuate, kumpipa cilgehpa, numeite ukpa kemsak in; amaute a mel hoih nadingun kizemsak in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa lungkimna penpen Vashti tangin kumpinu suaksak in," ci-in ngaihsutna a gen uh hi. Hih ngaihsutna kumpipa tungah gen uh a amah in a zui hi.
Tua hun laitakin kumpipa khua Susa ah Benjamin beh Kish tapa, Shimei tapa, Jair tapa Mordecai kici Jew mi khat a om hi,
amah pen Babylon kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar in Jerusalem pan sal-a a kaih, Judah kumpi Jehoiachin a

Mordecai in Hadassah kici sanggam khat a nei hi. Tuanu in nu le pa nei lo a amah’n kemin a khansuahsa ahi hi. Hih nu Esther zong kici a, a duang hoih in a ngaihbaang hi; a nu le a pa a sih ciangin Mordecai in a tanu banga a kep ahi hi.
Kumpipa thupiakna le thukhauh a kitangko khit ciangin kumpi khua Susa ah numei tampi kipuak-a Hegai kikemsak hi. Esther zong kumpi inn ah kipuak-a, numeite omna inn ukpa Hegai a kikemsak hi.

Numeino in amah lungkimsak a amah’n a angvan hi. A mel hoih nadingin mel hoihna za pia-in an lim nono in a vakpah hi. Kumpi inn sungah a kiteeltuam numei sagih sehkhia a, amah le a nasemte omna mun hoih penah a omsak hi.
Esther in ama minam le a pianna beh le phung thu a laakhia kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Mordecai in tuate a pulak ding a kham hi.
Amah numeite omna innhuang nai-ah Esther bangci a, ama tungah bang piang cih a thei dingin nisimin a kileh kawikawi hi.
Kumpipa Xerxes kiangah a kilah dong ama hun a tun ma-in a kipuah ding hun kha sawm le nih hi-a, myrrh thau-in kha guk sung kizutin paknamtui le gimnamtui-in kha guk sung kipuah ding uh hi.
Tua hi a hih bangin kumpipa kiangah a va kilak hi. Numei kepna inn panin kumpipa inn ah a kem dingin ama deih peuhpeuh a kipia hi.

Nitak ciangin tua lai-ah kipaisaka a zingsang ciangin numei kepna-a kumpipa zinote a uk cilgehpa Shaashgaz cinna numei kepna inn ah a kiciahsak hi. Kumpipa a lungkima a minin a sap kei ngal leh a kiangah a kipaisak nawn kei hi.

Kumpipa kiangah Esther (Mordecai in a pano Abihail’ tanu a kep) a pai ding hun a tun ciangin numei kepna a cing kumpipa cilgehpa Hegai hihsak zah val bangmah a ngen thuah kei hi. Tua hi a Esther a mu peuhpeuh in a angvan uh hi.
Kumpi Xerxes in a uk a kum sagihna a kha sawmna Tebeth kha in amah kumpi inn ah kipaipih hi.
Tu-in kumpipa in numei dangte sangin Esther iplahzaw a, ama angvanna ngahin nungak dangte sangin a lungtungzaw tham hi. Tua ciangin kumpi lukhu khusak a, Vashti tangin kumpinu a suaksak hi.
Tuateh kumpipa in pawi lianpi khat Esther pawi, a uliante le a zum nasem uliante tawh a bawl hi. Kumpi gamneu khempeuh ah zum khak nading thu thangsak a, kumpipa tawh kituak letsong a hawmkhia hi.
Nungakbitte a nihveina a kikaikhop hunin kumpipa kongpi ah Mordecai a tu hi.
Ahi hangin Esther in Mordecai hilhkholhsa bangin a nualamte thu le a minam a im khinkhian hi; ahang in amah a kikhansuah lai-a Mordecai lahsa bangin a zui suaksuak lai hi.
Kumpipa kongpi gei-ah Mordecai a tuttut lai-in kongkhak cing kumpi nasem zalian nih Bigthana b
Ahi hangin Mordecai in tua sawmsimna thei a, Esther tungah ko-in amah in Mordecai genin gena kumpipa a ko sawn hi.
Tua thu kikana, a taktak ahilam a kitheih ciangin zum nasem uliante gel khuampi c
Hih thute khit ciangin Kumpi Xerxes in Agag-te Hammedatha tapa Haman pahtawi a, lamto in ulian dang khempeuh sangin pahtawina tokhom a pia hi.
Kumpipa thupiaksa ahi manin kumpi kongpi sunga nasem kongpi tawna a pai peuhmah in zahtakin a khukdin uh hi. Ahi hangin Mordecai khukdin loin a zahtakbawl kei hi.
Tua ciangin kumpi kongpi-a nasemte in Mordecai kiangah, "Bang hangin kumpipa thupiak mang lo na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.

Ni khat khit ni khat amah a paupih uh hangin a thukim ding a nial hi. Tua ahi ciangin amah Jew mi ahilam amaute tungah genkhin ahi manin Mordecai gamtatna ahi ding mah hiam, cih Haman tungah a gen uh hi.
Mordecai khukdin loin amah zahtak lo cih a muh ciangin Haman a heh mahmah hi.

Tua banah Mordecai mipihte thu a theih khit ciangin Mordecai guak thahtaak a sa kei hi. Tua sangsikin Haman in Xerxes kumpi-gam sung khempeuh a om Mordecai mipihte - Jew-te khempeuh suksiat nading lampi a zong hi.

Kumpi Xerxes in a uk a kum sawm le nihna a kha masapen ahi Nisan kha a kipan pur (tua pen aisanna) zangin a ni a kha ding teelna-in Haman omin ai a lawn uh hi. Tua ciangin a kha sawm le nihna, Adar kha ah ai a tu a

Tua ciangin Haman in Kumpipa Xerxes kiangah, "Na kumpi-gam sung gamneu tuamtuamte ah kithehthangin a tuam om mi pawlkhat a om hi. Amaute ngeinate adangte aa tawh kibang lo a, kumpipa thukhamte a mang nuam kei uh hi; amaute khahkhong ding kumpipa deihpen ahi kei hi.
Kumpipa na lungkim leh amaute suksiat nading thukip bawl inla, tua tawh kisai nasem dingte adingin na sumkholhna ah talent b
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a seal tupna zungbuh suahkhia a, Jew-te galpa, Hagag-te beh Hammedatha tapa Haman a pia hi.
Kumpipa in Haman kiangah, "Na sum nang kem inla na mi gente na lungkim bangin hih in," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin a kha masapen a ni sawm le thumna ni-in kumpi zum lai-atte a kikaikhawm uh hi. Amaute in Haman thupiakna khempeuh a gamgama, amau kam ciatin gelhkhia uh a, kumpipa ukna sunga gamkhen tuamtuama gam-ukte tung, le mi tuamtuama uliante tungah a pia uh hi. Hihte Kumpi Xerxes in ama min mahmah a kigelh lai hi-a a zungbuh seal a tup ahi hi.

Kumpipa gam sung khempeuhah kha sawm le nihna Adar kha a ni sawm le thumna ni, ni khat bek sungin Jew-te a khangmoi, a khangham, numei le naupangnote thatin kisumaimang dinga a neihsate uh kilaksak ding hi, cih thu laitaite a kipuaksak hi.
Tua ni-in a baihsa-a a om theih nadingin hih thupiakna lai gam khempeuh ah upadi bangin dal khat ciat kipuak hi - tua pen a gam sung mite theihkimsak nading ahi hi.

Kumpipa thupiakna tawh kintakin laitaite a kuankhia uh hi; hih thupiakna kumpipa khua Susa pana kihawmkhia ahi hi. Kumpipa le Haman zu dawn dingin tukhawm uh a, ahi hangin Susa khua sung a buai mahmah hi.
A kihihsa thu Mordecai in a theih ciangin a puan balkek-a vut khusa in khuapi sungah taikhia-in, nasiatakin nakpipi-in a kap hi.
Ahi hangin kumpipa kongpi ciangdong bek a pai hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh puan hampi silhsa in kuamah a sungah kilutsak lo hi.
Kumpipa thupiakna lai a tunna gam peuhpeuh ah Jew-te lakah nakpi-a thumna le an tanga kahna le tauna a om hi. Mi tampi in puanhampi silhin vut a khu uh hi.
Esther nasem numeite le cilgehte in Mordecai thu a gen uh ciangin amah zong a lungzing mahmah hi. Puan hampi tangin a silh ding puan a khak hangin a sang nuam kei hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in amah a cing dingin a kiseh cilgehpa Hathach sama, Mordekai lungdonna le ahang a thei dingin a sawl hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kongpi mai tual-awnga om Mordecai kiangah, Hathach a pai hi.
Mordecai in ama tunga thupiang khempeuh, Jew-te suksiat nadinga Haman in kumpipa sumkholna sunga a piak dinga a ciam sum phazah nangawn a gen hi.

Amaute kibeimangsak nadingin Susa pana kihawmkhia laidal khat Esther a lah dingin amah pia-a, a thu teng teltaka a gen ding le kumpipa kiangah amah na pai-a, amah le a mipihte adingin lainatna a nget ding a sawlna a gensak hi.
Hathach kilehkik a, Mordecai gensa teng Esther tungah a zasak hi.
Tua ciangin amah in Mordecai tungah a gen ding amah hilh a,

"Kumpipa nasemte khempeuh le kumpi-gam sunga mite kuama sap lohin kumpi huang sungah a va pai leh: kumpipa in upadi khat nei a, tua banga a va paite thah ding ahi hi. A tangkai diaka kumpipa in a kham ciangkhut ama lamah a na khak leh amah a kithat kei ding hi, cih thu a theihsa uh ahi hi. Ahi hangin kei hong kisap loh ni sawmthum pha ta hi," a ci hi.
Esther kammalte Mordecai tungah a kizaksak ciangin,
"Kumpi inn sungah na om hangin Jew-te lakah nang guak a suakta tuan dingin kingaihsun kei in.

Ahang in, hih huna bangmah hih lo-a na daihcip leh Jew-te suahtak nading munkhat panin hong om veve dinga ahi hangin nang le na pate innkuan na kisia ding uh hi. Hih kumpi inn sung na tunna zong hih bang huna kimang dingin a tung na hihmeel kua-in thei ahi hiam," ci-in a dawn kikna a khak hi.
Tua ciangin Esther in:

"Pai inla, Susa sunga om Jew-te khempeuh kaikhawmin kei adingin an na tang un. Sun taleh zan taleh ni thum sung an ne tui dawn na om kei un. No mah bangin kei le ka nasem numeite in zong ka na tang ding uh hi. Hih banga i hih khit ciangin upadi tawh a kituak kei kha zongin ka sih le ka sih kumpipa kiangah ka va pai ding hi," ci-in a thuk kikna Mordecai a khak hi.
Tua ciangin Mordecai in Esther lahsa teng khempeuh kengin a kuankhia hi.
A nithumna ni-in Esther in a kumpi puantual silhin kumpi inntual sunglam kumpipa innpi mai-ah a ding hi. Innpi sungah innsung lutna lam nga-in kumpipa a tokhom tungah a tut laitak ahi hi.
Amah in huang sungah Esther ding a muh ciangin a lungkima a khut sunga a tawi kham ciangkhut ama lam ngatin a tawi hi. Tua ciangin Esther in zuana a ciangkhut dawn a lawng hi.
Tua ciangin Kumpipa in, "Kumpinu Esther aw, bang a hiam? Bang hong ngen na hiam? Nong nget peuhpeuh kumpi-gam phellang dong kong pia ding hi," ci-in a dong hi.
"Kumpipa na lungkim leh ama adingin ka kiginsa pawi tuni-in Haman tawh hong simkhawm un," ci-in a dawng hi.
Kumpipa in, "Esther hong nget ka hihsak theih nadingin Haman hong paipih pak un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Esther bawlsa pawi sim dingin kumpipa le Haman a pai uh hi.

Lenggahzu a dawn laitakun kumpipa in Esther kiangah, "Nong nget bang ahi hiam? Nang kong pia ding hi. Tu-in nong nget bang hiam? Kumpi-gam phelkhat dong nangawn hong kipia ding hi," ci-in a dong kik hi.
Esther in, "Kong nget nop, kong thum nop in:

Kumpipa in nong angvan zawh a, kong ngetna lungkimin kong thumna nong tangtunsak leh zing ciangin kumpipa le Haman in ka pawi hong sim lai un. Tua ciangin kumpipa dotna kong dawng ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ni-in Haman lungdam-a, ki-angtangsakin a paikhia hi. Ahi hangin kumpipa kongpi-ah amah a pai ciangin Mordecai ding beek lo-a, kihtakna lim a lah loh ciangin a heh lua mahmah hi.
Tua hi napi Haman ki-ip tentansa in inn ah a ciah hi.
A lawmte le a zi Zeresh samkhawm a,
a hauhna, a tapate, a munmuna kumpipa pahtawina, kumpi nasemte khempeuh tunga a kitawisangnate hangin a kisial hi.
"Tua teng bek hi lo hi," Haman in, "Kumpinu Esther in kumpipa tawh pawisim dinga a sapkhawm kei bek ka hi hi. Amah in kei le kumpipa zing ciangin hong samkhawm lai hi.
Ahi hangin kumpipa kongpi ah Jew pa Mordecai ka muh laiteng ka lung a kim thei kei hi," a cih beh lai hi.
A zi Zeresh le a lawmte khempeuh in, "Pi a
Tua zanin kumpipa a ihmu thei kei hi; tua ciangin ama kumpi suahna khangthu bu la-a a sim dingun thu a pia hi.
Tua lai-ah kumpipa nasem lian kongvang cingte gel - Bigthana le Teresh in Kumpipa Xerxes suamsim ding a sawm uh Mordecai in a genkhiat, a kiciamtehna a mu hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hih thu ah Mordecai, bang pahtawina, bang lungdamlahna kipia ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amah cingte in, "Amah bangmah kipia lo hi," a ci uh hi.

Kumpipa in, "Hih huang sungah kua om ahi hiam?" a ci hi. Tua hun laitak, huang pualam pan Mordecai khailup nadinga a phuhsa gui-awk khuampi ah Mordecai khailup nading thu a gen dingin Haman a va tum laitak lian ahi hi.
Amah a cingte in, "Huang sungah Haman ding hi," a ci uh hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hong tumsak un," ci-in thu a pia hi.
Haman a tum ciangin Kumpipa in, "Kumpipa pahtawi nop mipa bangci pahtawi leng hoih ding hiam?" ci-in Haman a dong hi.
Tua laitakin Haman in, "Kumpipa in kei sanga a pahtawi nop zawk kua om peuhmah ding hiam?" ci-in amah dingin a kivawhpah hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa kiangah, "Kumpipa pahtawi noppa,
kumpipa silh puantualpi silhsakin, kumpipa tuanna sakol ah tuangin kumpipa lukhu khusak in.

Tua ciangin kumpipa ulianpen khat puantualpi le sakol apsak in. Amaute in kumpipa pahtawi noppa puan silhsakin khuapi sung lampite ah sakol tungah tuangsak inla ama mai-ah tangko paisak in. Hih in kumpipa pahtawi noppa kibawl nading ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Kumpipa in Haman kiangah, "Tu mahmah in pai inla, puantualpi le sakol va la-in, kumpipa kongpi-a tu Mordecai tungah tu-a na ngaihsutna nong gen bangin hih in, "Hoih na saksate khatbeek sit kei in," ci-in thu a pia hi.

Tua ciangin Haman in puantualpi le sakol a la hi. Puantualpi Mordecai silhsak a, sakol tungah tuangsakin khuapi sung kongzingte ah paipihin a mai-ah tangkosaka, "Kumpipa pahtawi noppa hih bangin kibawl hi," a ci hi.
Tua zawh ciangin kumpipa kongpi ah Mordecai a ciah kik hi. Haman ahileh lungsi pipi-in lutunsa in a inn ah ciah vingveng a,
a zi Zeresh le a lawmte tungah ama tunga thupiang khempeuh a ko hi.
A thudotte le a zi Zeresh in, "A mai-a na guallelh kipatna pa Mordecai Jew mi taktak ahi nungsang ama langah na pang zo kei ding hi - a sia taktak ding hi ta teh!" a cihuan uh hi.
Amaute in amah a hopihpih laitakun kumpipa’ cilgehpa tunga Esther bawlsa pawi sim dingin Haman a paikhia pah hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa le Haman in Esther tawh an umkhawm uh a,

a ni nihna lenggahzu a dawnkhawm laitakun kumpipa in, "Kumpinu Esther aw, nong gennop bang ahi hiam? Hong kipia ding hi. Nong thum nop bang ahi hiam? Kumpi-gam phelkhat dong hong kipia ding hi," ci-in a dong leuleu hi.

Tua ciangin Kumpinu Esther in, "Kumpipa aw, nong angvan zawha tua in na thupina a lungkimsak leh ka nuntakna hong hawisak in - kong ngetnop hih ahi hi. Ka mipihte hong thahsak kei in - kong thum nop hih ahi hi.

Ahang in, kei le ka mipihte susia in ngawngtan ding le suk maimang dingin hong kizuak khinzo hi. Numei pasal mi sila dinga hong kizuak hileh bangmah ka gen kei ding hi, bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang lelin kumpipa lungzinsak tak ka sa kei hi," a
Kumpipa Xerxes in Kumpinu Esther kiangah, "Amah kua hiam? tua banga hih ngam mipa koi-ah om hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Esther in, "Ka langpa le ka galpa, hih mi zumhuaipa Haman ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa le kumpinu mai-ah Haman a linglawng gawp hi.

Kumpipa hehsa in dingkhia-a a lenggahzu dawnlai nusia-in kumpi-inn huan sungah a paikhia hi. Ahi hangin kumpipa in a hih dingin a khensatsa Haman in sehkhol thei a, tua mun mah ah om lai-in Kumpinu Esther kiangah amah a suahtaksak nadingin a ngen hi.
Kumpi-inn huan panin pawi bawlna innpi ah kumpipa a kileh phetin Esther kingapna lupna tungah Haman a tuk a mu hi.
Kumpipa in, "Hih inn sungah ka omlai nangawnin hih mipa in amah luppih sawm hiam?" a ci gaih hi.
Kumpipa a pau khit phetin amaute in Haman mai a tunsak uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa a cing cilgehpa Harbona in, "Haman inn gei-ah pi b
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Tua tungah amah khai un!" a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Mordecai khai nadinga kibawl gui-awk khuampi tungah amaute in Haman a khai uh hi. Tua ciangin kumpipa hehna a daituam hi.
Kumpipa Xerxes in tua ni mah in Jew-te galpa Haman neihsa teng Kumpinu Esther a pia hi. Esther in amah tawh a kitanauna uh gen ahi manin kumpipa omna ah Mordecai a teng hi.
Kumpipa in Haman tung pana a lakkhiatsa seal zungbuh lakhia in Mordecai a pia hi. Tua hi-a Esther in Haman neihsa khempeuh Mordecai a uksak hi.
Kumpipa khephungah kapsa in Esther puk a thu khat a ngen kik hi. Agag-te Haman in Jew-te a langbawlna-a a sawmsimnate a beisak nadingin a thum hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Esther lamah a kham ciangkhut vana tuanu dingto in a mai-ah a ding hi.

Tuanu in, "Kumpipa na lung kim a, kei hih dinga kilawm na sak leh, hih dingin man na saka kei tungah na lung a kim leh na gam sunga om Jew-te khempeuh Agag beh Hamedatha tapa Haman laigelhsate lehkik nadingin lai khat gelhsak in.
Ahang in, ka mipihte tungah hih siatna a tun ka muh ding thuak zo peuhmah ding ka hi hiam? Ka innkuanpihte siatna ka muh ding bangci thuakzawh ding ka hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Kumpipa Xerxes in Kumpinu Esther le Jew mi Mordecai kiangah, "Haman in Jew-te a do manin a neihsate Esther tungah ka pia khina, amah gui-awk khuampite ah kikhailum khin hi.

Tu-in Jew-te adingin hoih pen dinga na ngaihsut thukip dang khat kumpipa minin gelhin kumpipa seal zungbuh in tum in - ahang in, kumpipa mina thupiakna kigelh seal zungbuh kitumsa khat kimawk dawhkik thei lo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
A kha thumna Sivan kha a ni sawmnih le thumna ni-in kumpi thuvante a kisam pah hi. Amaute in Mordecai thupiakna khempeuh Jew-te tungah gelhkhia uh a, gam tampi ukte, ukpite le India pan Cush c
Mordecai in Kumpi Xerxes minin gelh a kumpipa seal zungbuh kitumin kumpi adingin a kituam koih sakol taihatte tunga tuangte lai a kitaisak hi.

Kumpipa thupiakna in khuapi khempeuh a Jew-te kipawlkhawmin amau le amau a kihut theih nading; minam khatpeuh pana galkapte ahikeh amaute sima a numei a naupangte uh thatin su maimangin a siatsak dingte uh leh a galte un a neihsate uh a laksak ding dalsakna ahi hi.
Kumpi Xerxes ukna gam khempeuh a Jew-te in hih banga a hih nadingun a kiciangtan kha sawm le kha nihna Adar kha ni sawm le thum ni ahi hi.
Tua ni-in Jew-te a kiginkholh theih nading le a galte uh a thuk kik theih nadingun tua thupiakna lai kumpi-gam tengah upadi bangin a kihawmkhia hi.
Laitaite kumpi sakol ah tuang uh a, kumpipa thupuak kintaka puak dingin a taikhia uh hi. Tua hi-a thupiakna kumpi khua Susa ah zong a kihawmkhia hi.

Mordecai in adum le akang kumpi puan silh a, kham kumpi lukhu a lian deda khat khu in saihadial puan hoih le puansan silhsa in kumpipa omna panin a paikhia hi. Tua hi-a Susa khuapi ah lungnuamtakin pawi a kibawl hi.
Jew-te adingin tua hun lungdam ni, gualnop ni, kipahni le kipahtawi ni ahi hi.
Kumpipa thupiakna a tunna gam teng le khuapi tengah Jew-te lungnuam in kipakin pawi bawlin a ai uh hi. Tua hi-a minam dang tampite in Jew-te a kihtak manun Jew-te a suak uh hi.

A kha sawm le nihna Adar kha, ni sawm le thum ni-in kumpipa thupiak banga hih ding hun ahi hi. Tua ni-in Jew-te galte in amaute a zawhgawp ding uh a lamen uh hi. Ahi hangin a hun kilehbulh in amaute a mudahte tungah Jew-te a tungtuang zawsop uh hi.

Amaute a siasak nuamte a do dingin Kumpi Xerxes gam sunga khuapite khempeuh a Jew-te a kigawm khawm ciat uh hi. Minam dangte khempeuh in amaute kihta uh ahi manin amaute langa ding zo khat beek a om kei hi.
Gam tuamtuam a uliante, gam tampi ukte, ukpite le kumpipa naseppihte in Mordecai mat ding a lau manun Jew-te a huh uh hi.
Kumpi inn sungah Mordecai thuneipi suaka, ama thuneihna gam khempeuh ah kizelin amah a vanglian semsem hi.
Jew-te in a galte uh namsau-in sattukin that uh a, amaute susia in amaute a mudahte a utut-un a bawl uh hi.
Jew-te in kumpi khua Susa ah mi zanga a sumang uh hi.
Amaute in Parshanatha, Dalphon, Aspatha,
Poratha, Adalia, Aridatha,
Parmashta, Arisai, Aridai le Vaizatha,
- Jew-te galpa Hammedatha tapa Haman tapa sawmte zong a that uh hi. Ahi hangin amau vante a sukha kei uh hi.
Kumpi khua Susa a kithatte tua ni mahin kumpipa tungah a kizasak hi.

Kumpipa in Kumpinu Esther kiangah, "Jew-te in kumpi khua Susa ah mi zanga le Haman tapate sawm a that khin uh hi. Kumpi uk sung gamdangte ah bang a hih lai ding uh hiam? Tu-in bang nong kal lai ding hiam? Nang hong kipia ding hi. Bang nong ngen lai ding hiam? Nong nget lai leh hong kipia lai ding hi," a ci hi.

Esther in, "Kumpipa na lung a kim leh Susa khua sungah Jew-te in tuni-a na thupiakna mah zing ciang zong hong zangsak lai-in Haman tapa sawmte gui-awk khuampi tungah hong khaisak lai in," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in a hih dingun thu a pia hi. Susa khua sungah thupiakna khat kipia a, amaute in Haman tapa sawmte a khai uh hi.
Susa a om Jew-te Adar kha a sawm le li ni-in kikhawm uh a, Susa khua sungah mi zathum a that uh hi, ahi hangin a vante uh a sukha kei uh hi.

Tua hun sung mahin kumpi-gam sunga Jew midangte zong a galte uh panin a kihut theih nadingun mun khatah a omkhawm uh hi. Amaute in tul sawmnih le tulnga that uh a, ahi hangin a vante uh a sukha kei uh hi.
Hih in Adar kha a sawm le thumna ni-a thupiang hi-a a ni sawm le lina ni tawlnga-in pawi bawl ni le lungnop ni-in a zang uh hi.
Tuaci-in Susa a Jew-te a sawm le thumna ni, sawm le lina ni in kigawmkhawm uh a, a sawm le ngana ni pawi bawl ni le lungnop ni-in a zang uh hi.
Hih thu hangin khuata a Jew-te - khuaneu-a tengte in Adar kha ni sawm le lina ni, lungnop ni le pawi bawl ni, khat le khat letsong kipiak ni-in a zang uh hi.
Hih thupiangte Mordecai in ciamteh a, Kumpi Xerxes ukna a nai a gamla mun khempeuh a om Jew-te tungah lai a khak hi.
Amaute in Adar kha a ni sawm le lina ni le a ni sawm le ngana ni pawi bawl uh a,

Jew-te a galte uh khut sung pan a suahtakna uh, amaute dahna, nuamna a suah kha le amaute thum ni, pawi bawl ni a suah kha phawkna in a bawl dingun a zasak hi. Amah in amaute tungah tua mite pawi bawl ni le lungnop ni-in zanga khat le khat an kikholhin mizawngte letsong piakni-a a zat dingun a gelh hi.
Tua ciangin Jew-te in Mordecai gelh bangin a zatsa uh zomsuak uh hi.
Ahang in Jew-te khempeuh galpa Agag mi Hammedatha tapa Haman in Jew-te sugawpin a siatsak nading pur (tua pen aisanna) in ai san-a siatsak ding a sawmsim hi.

Jew-te in amaute le a suante uh leh amaute a pawlpihte in a kipelh ngei lo ngeina-in nei uh a, kum simin hih ni nihte tangin hih dinga kigelhsa bang le a kisehsa hunte a zang uh hi.

Hih nite kiphawk den dinga, a gamgam, a khuapi a khuapi ah akhang akhangin a innkuankuanin kizang ding hi. Hih Purim nite in Jew-te in pawi bawl den ding uh a, amau suante tungah a kiciamteh tawntung ding hi.

Jew mi Mordecai le Kumpinu Esther in amaute a thupiaksa bangin hih Purim nite a sehsa hunin a tan nadingun gelh a, amaute ciat in na kipsakin amau suante in amau hun ciatin an tangin taamlawh hunin a zang uh hi.
Hih Purim tawh kisai zuih ding ngeinate Esther thupiakna in kipsaka, ciamtehna sungah a kigelh hi.
Kumpi Xerxes in a ukna gam khempeuh tuitung leitung dongin siah a kai hi.
Ama vangliatna le a thahatna khempeuh, le kumpipa in a laptoh Mordecai liatna teng Media le Persia kumpite khangthu ciamtehna laibu sungah a cingin kigelh lo ahi hiam?

Kumpi Xerxes zomin Jew mi Mordecai a lianpen hi-a, Jew-te lakah amah lian penin a lawm Jew-te tampi in amah a tawisang uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a mipihte hoih nadingin nasem a, Jew-te khempeuh a gualzawh nadingin kam a pau hi.
Uz gamah Job min nei mi khat a teng hi. Hih mipa thutangin a pau baang kei hi; amah in Pasian kihta a gamtat hoih lo a pel hi.

A tapate in amau inn ah a banbanin pawi bawl zel uh a, a nek a dawn khawmpih dingun a sanggam numei thumte a sam uh hi.

A siang lo panin a siangah kua in tun thei ahi hiam?
Kuamah in tun thei kei!
Mihing nite kiseh khin hi;
a kha phazah na ciangtan-a,
ama khansak theih loh dingin na ciangtan khin hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a kicial mi bangin
ama hun a tun mateng kimuhmawhbawl inla amah guak omsak lel in.
"Singkung khat in lametna nei buang hi.
Kiphuktan taleh meng kikin sel pelmawh dinga,
a mengthakte a si kei ding hi.
A bulte lei sungah teek dinga,
lei hoih lakah a bulsum a si ding hi;
tua hi napi tui gimnamin sel a,
singkungno bangin sel to hi.
Mihing ahileh si-a, lei sungah kivui hi;
a huu a nunung pen sanga a om nawn kei hi.
Tuipi pan tuite a manthan bang ahikeh
guntui kiamkiama tuinuai a keu bangin,
mite a kisial khit nak leh a tho kik nawn kei hi;
vante a om nawn loh mateng mite khanglo nawn lo ding ahikeh
a ihmutna pan a kithosak kei ding hi.

na hehna a dam mateng kei hong selcip hoh ve!

Mi khat si leh a nungta kik ding hiam?

Nong sam dinga, kong dawng ding hi;

Tua ciangin ka khekhap na sim takpi dinga,
ahi hangin ka mawhna nong sulzuih nawn kei ding hi.
Ka thupalsatnate ip khat sungah seal kikhencip ding hi;

"Ahi hangin damdama cim mual a manthan bang le
suangtum a omna pan a kikhin bang,
tui in suangtum a nekmang bang le
tuizeu in leihoih a nawkmang bangin

Khatvei-a cinkhin dingin amah na zo a, tuateh amah om nawn lo hi;
ama maipuak na khela na sawlmang hi.
A tapate kipahtawi taleh amah’n a thei kei hi;
amaute kiniam koih taleh amah’n a mu kei hi.
Ama pumpi natna bek thuak a,
amah guak mah a thum hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Teman mi Eliphaz in dawng a:

Ahi hangin nang, biakna-mi hih ding na sumai-a,
Pasian tunga ki-ap ding na dal hi.
Na mawhna in na kam manlangsak a;

Na kam in kei hong mawhpaih loin nang hong mawhpaih hi;

"Nang bek mihing a piang kisa na hi hiam?
Mualte pianma-in hong kibawl khia khin ahi hiam?
Pasian vaihawmna zasim na hi hiam?
Nang bek pilna nei na hi hiam?
Kote theih loh bang thei na hi hiam?
Kote neih zawh loh bang thugil nei na hi hiam?

Pasian in nang hong hehnem a

Bang hangin na lungtang in hong pimang a,

Pasian tungah tua bang hehluatna kam

"Ken zong hong gencian ning, na ngai dih in;

Hih in mipilte thugen hi a,

Migilo in a nuntak sung thuaksiatna tuak a,

Musanete a
a tungah khuamial a tunpah ding lam a thei hi.

Bang hang hiam cihleh amah in Pasian lamah a khuttum liika,

Amah khuamial pan a suakta kei ding hi;
ama mengte meikuang in hultum dinga,
Pasian kam pana huu in amah pimang ding hi.
Man nei lo khat muangin amah le amah kikhem kei hen,

Ama hun a tun ma-in a cingin kipia dinga,

Note kei dinmunah om le uhcin
kei zong no pau bangin ka pau thei ding hi;

kam hoih nono ka pau thei mah ding hi.

"Pau taleng lah ka natna nuamtuam tuan lo a;

Hi takpi hi, Pasian aw, kei nong patkhiasak a;
ka innkuan bup nong gamsak hi.
Kei nong hencip khin a - tua mah kei teci a suak hi;

Pasian in kei hong doin, hehin kei hong balkham a,

Mite kamka-in kei hong zahnuihsan uh a;

kei langkhatah kipawl uh hi.
Pasian in migilote tungah kei hong pia a,

A nuamsa kimlai kei hong nuaizan a;
ka gawlah hong manin hong nencip hi.
Muitum in hong nei a;
a thalkapte in kei hong umcih uh hi.
Hehpih peuhmah loin ka kalte sunlet uh a,

Amah in kei hong liamsuah kikkik a,

"Ka vuntungah puanhampi ka khui-a,

Ka kahkahna-in ka mai san a,

"Leitang aw, ka sisan vukcip kei in;
ka kikona kikhawlsak kei tapeuh hen!
Tu nangawn in vantungah ka teci a om hi;

Kei hong thumsakpa ka lawm a
tua kawmkawmin Pasian tungah ka khitui ka sungkhia hi;
Mi khat in a lawmpa ading a thumsak bangin
mi khat tangin amah in Pasian tungah a thumsak hi.
"A kileh kik nawn lo dingin
khual ka zin ma-in kum tawmkhat sung bek lah hong bei ding hi.
‘Ka lungsim kitamkham a,
ka nite kitomsakin hankhuk in
kei hong ngak ta hi.
Mi zahkohte in hong umcih taktak uh hi;

Pasian aw, nong kalh kiciamna hong pia in.
Kua dangin kei adingin bitna hong piaksak ding hiam?
Amaute theihtelna lungsim na khaksak hi;

"Pasian in mi khempeuh tungah thusia gentehna hong suaksak khin a;

"A gilopa’ meivak kisukmitsak hi;

Thang in a khetul ah mana,

Tua in a vun khenkhat ne mang a,

A puanbuk muanhuaina pan amah kibalzan a,

Mei in a puanbuk tenden c

A nuai-ah a thaguite keucip a,

Amah kiphawkna leitung panin mangthang a;

Khuavak panin khuamial ah amah kihawlkhia a,

Ama mite lakah suan le khak ahikeh gui nei lo a,
a tenna ah a khuasuak kuamah a om nawn kei hi.
Nitumna-lam mite ama hangin lauthawng uh a,
nisuahna-lam mite linglawng uh hi.
Migilote tenna tua bang hitakpi a;
Pasian a theilote mun tua bang ahi hi," a ci hi.

Migilote totsa lampi lui mah

Amau hun a cin ma-in amaute kipuamang hi;

"Pasian tung ki-ap lel inla, amah tawh kilem in;

A kama hong lamlahna mang inla
na lungsim sungah ama kammalte kemcing in.
A Thahatpa lamah na kihei kik leh na ngeina hong bangsak ding hi.
Na puanbuk pan gamlapi ah gitlohna na paihmang a,

Tua ciangin Thahatpenpa sungah nuam na sa taktak dinga,
Pasian lamah na dakto ding hi.
Ama tungah thu na ngen dinga, amah in hong za ding hi;

Na lungsim khentatna kitangtungsak dinga,

Mite in mi a niamsak ciangin, ‘Amaute phong to un!’ na ci a,

Amah in mawhpeng lo pa khat nangawn hukhia dinga,

Tua ciangin Job in dawng a:

tautau taleng a khut a

"Ahi zongin nisuahna-lam pai taleng tua lai-ah amah na om lo hi;

A kama hong thupiakte ka zuikhial kei a;

"Ahi hangin amah bek ding hi, kua in nial zo ding hiam?

Thahatpenpa in kei hong lauthawngsak hi.
Ahi zongin khuamialna,

Job dawnga, Amah in:
"Bangmah thei lopi-a thugen,

"Leitung bulpi ka phuh lai-in nang koi-ah om na hi hiam?
Na theih leh hong gen dih in.
A thei takpi na hi leh! A phacia ding kua in ciamteh hiam?
Kua in a tungah tehna khau kai ahi hiam?
Zingsang aksite in la sakhawm uh a,
van sawltakte b
a khuambulte bang tungah kiphut a,

"Tuipi in sul a phutkhap lai,

khuamial sahpi-a ka tuam lai,
a om nading ciangtansak a,

‘Hih ciang pai inla hih ban kal kei in,

ka cih lai-in kua in tuipi kongkhak khak ahi hiam?
"Nang in zingsang khuavak tungah thupia-in
a hikeh phalvak tungah a ma mun ding lak na hi hiam?
leitung a mongah manin migilote
a sinkhiat ding hilh ngei na hi hiam?

ama tunga muanhuaite’ lampi a hu hi.
Tua ciangin thumaan thutang le a kilawm
a kituak lampi hoih bang hiam cih na theitel ding hi.
Ahang in na lungsim ah pilna hong lut dinga,
na hinna in theihna nuam a sa ding hi.
Theihkakna in nang hong hu dinga,
theihtelna in nang hong cing ding hi.
Pilna in migilote lam pan,
thu lehgen mite pan,
lampi tang nusia a,
khuamial lampi a tawnte pan,

gilo-a lehtatna-a lungkimte pan,
a lampi uh kawi-a,

Tua in, angkawmnu pan,
uklah zi zolsiamna kamte pan,
a neulawm nusia a, Pasian a
a thuciam a thusim lo numei panin zong hong honkhia ding hi.
Ahang in, tuanu inn in sihna ah hong pi a,

Tuanu kianga paite kuamah kileh kik lo-in,

Tua bangin mihoihte lampi na zui dinga,

Ahang in, thutangte leitungah teng dinga,

Ka tapa aw, kong hilhna mangngilh kei inla,

tuate in na khan kum tampi sotin

Na lungsim khempeuhin

Nang kimuhna ah pil kisa kei in;

Pilna mu a, theihtelna a ngahpa

Ruby sangin manphazaw a;

A taklam khut ah khansauna om a;

Ama lampi nuam a,
a lampi khempeuh kilemna ahi hi.
Amah a pom mi adingin nuntakna singkung hi-a,

ama theihtelna tawh a mun takah vantungte a koih hi.
Ama theihna-in tuithukte kikhen a,

Ka tapa aw, akip thukhenna le theihkakna len inla,
tuate en gige in;
tuate nang adingin nuntakna hi dinga,

Tua hileh lungmuangin na nungta dinga,

Bingtuahsiatna kihta kei inla migilote tunga

Nang hih zawh ding ahileh

na vengpa kiangah,
Hong pai kik in; zing ciang hong pia ning, ci kei in.

Nang hong nasak lo mipa tungah

A ngongtat mi eng kei inla

a thumaante innsung thupha a pia hi.
Amah in a kiphasak mi simmawhte simmawh a,

Mipilte in pahtawina luah uh a,

Ka tapate aw, pate lamlahna ngai unla,

Sinna picing kong pia hi;

Pilna thupisak in, nang hong tawisang ding hi;

Ka tapa aw, ngai-in ka thugen sang in;

Na pil nading lammaan ah kong pi a,

Na pai ciangin na kalsuanna hong dal om lo ding hi.
na tai ciangin na kimuktu kei ding hi.
Lamlahna lenkip inla khahsuah kei in;

Migilote’ lampi tawn kei inla,

Tua lampi pel inla, tawn kei in;

Migilote a sia khat a bawl mateng ihmu thei lo uh a,

Amaute in gitlohna annekin nei uh a,

Thumaan mite’ lampi ahileh ni suak tung nizang banga,

Ka tapa aw, ka thugen thusim inla,

Mitkhah loin en gige inla

Taklam le veilam ah pial kei inla,

Ka tapa aw, ka pilna thusim inla,

Ahang in angkawmnu’ muk khuaizu-a diahsa banga,

Nuntakna lampi ngaihsun lo-a;

Tuanu gamlapi ah peel unla,

Tu inlah mi kikhawm honpi bup lakah

Nangma tuibeel pan le nangma tuiluang

Kongzingte ah na tuinakte letkhia-in,

a nawite in tai den inla

Ka tapa aw, bang hangin angkawmnu khat matcipsa-in om na hi hiam?
Bang hangin midang khat zi’ angkawi ding na hi hiam?
Ahang in,
a lampite khempeuh a sittel hi.

Ka tapa aw, na vengpa tangin mawhlawh tawi dingin na om a,

Pai-in nang mahmah kiniamkhiat in;

Lusu kei inla
ihmu kha kei in.
Sabengpa khut panin suakta sanang bang,

Thadahpa aw, miksi kiangah pai-in

Tua in makaipa,

Nang thadahpa aw, bang tanvei lum lai ding na hiam?

Misia, mi tatkhelpa

Ka tapa aw, na pa thupiakte zui inla,

Hih thupiakte meivak hi-a,

Mi khat in a puan kangsak loin

Midang khat zi a luppihpa tua tawh a kibang hi-a;

A puksi dektak gutapa in a gilpi puah nading a guk leh

Amah in a tanga sum piak sang loin,

Ka tapa aw, ka thute kem inla,

Pilna kiangah, "Ka sanggamnu na hi hi," ci inla,

Pilna in hong sam hi lo hiam?
Theihtelna in a aw sangsak hi lo hiam?
Lampi dunga asanna mun teng,

"No mihingte aw, kong sam hi;

No mimawlte aw, kidop siamna ngah un,

Ngai un, a manpha nate kong gen hi;

Ka muk in gitlohna kih ahi manin

Ka kammal khempeuh thutang hi-a,

A theisiamte adingin thumaan vive hi a,

Kong lamlahna ngun tangin teel unla,

"Keimah pilna in, kidop siamna tawh ka tengkhawm a,

Kei tungtawnin kumpite in uk uh a,

Kham siangsa sangin kei gah hoihzaw a,

Mimawl khempeuh hih lai-ah hong paisak un!

Solomon’ paunakte:
Tapa pil in a pa lungnuamsak a,

A thumaante phawkna thupha hi dinga,
migilote min ahileh a muat ding hi.
Lungpil mi in thupiak sang thei a,
mihai kamtam in ahileh siatna a thuak hi.
A citak mi pai hiathiat a,
thukawi bawl mi ahileh a kiphawkkhia ding hi.
Mi mitsiik-atpa in lungkhamna tuak a,
mihai kamtam in siatna tuak hi.
Thumaan mite kam nuntakna tuikhuk hi-a,
migilote kam ahileh ngongtatna in a tuam hi.
Muhdahna in kitotna piangsak a,
itna in ahileh khialhna khempeuh khuhcip hi.
Thu theikakte muk ah pilna kimu a,
thukhentel lo pa nungzang in ciangduai a thuak hi.
Mipil in theihna khol a,
mihai kam in ahileh siatna a sam hi.
Mihaute hauhna in amau kulh nei khuapi hi-a,
mizawngte siatna ahileh zawnna ahi hi.
A thumaante thaman nuntakna hi a,
migilote sumtum ahileh dantuahna ahi hi.
Sektatna a thusim mi nuntakna lampi tawn hi-a,
kipuahphat ding a awlmawh lo mi in ahileh midangte lam khialsak hi.
A muhdahna a imte mi zuauphuak hi-a,
mi gensiat hat peuhmah mihai ahi hi.
Thu tampi genna ah mawhna kihel teitei a,
a kam ip theite a pil ahi hi.
A thumaan mite leii ngun hoih pen hi-a,
migilote lungsim ahileh man nei lo hi.
A thumaan mi muk in tampi vak a,
mihaite ahi uh leh thukhenna a theih loh manun si uh hi.
lunghimawhna a behlap kei hi.
Mihai in tatsiat nuamsa a,

Siapa in,

A mawknapi! A mawknapi!
ECC.1.2	Bangmah hi peuhmah lo a mawknapi!
ECC.1.2	Na khempeuh a mawknapi ahi hi, a ci hi.
Mihing in sun nisa nuai-ah gimpi-in
na a sepna hangin bang lawhtak ahi hiam?
Khang khat tungin khang khat bei-a,
ahi hangin leitung kibangden hi.
Ni suakin ni tum-a
a suah nading lamah kuan kik pah hi.
Leitaw-lam manawh in huih nunga,
leilu lamah nung kikin,
suk nun zel to nun zel-a,
a zuihna ngei teng mah zui-in nungnung hi.
Luite khempeuh tuipi sungah luang-a,
tuipi a dim ngei tuan kei hi.
Luite a luankhiatna
a nak mah ah kilehkik hi.
Na khempeuh lunggimhuai-a,
mihing gen zawh hi lo hi.
Mit in a muh cim ngei lo-a,
bil in a zak cim ngei lo hi.
Ahisa mah hi kik-a,
a kisemsa mah a kisem kik ding hi;
sunni nuai-ah a thak bangmah om lo hi.
"En sin uh! Hih a thak hiveh!
a kici thei ding khat beek om ahi hiam?
Sawt pekpek-a a om khinsa mah hi-a,
ei hun ma-a a na om khinsa ahi hi.
Sawt pekpeka te mihing in phawk zo nawn lo a,
a piang lai dingte zong
a piang nai lote in
a phawk kha kei ding hi.
Keimah, Siapa in Jerusalem a Israel-te kumpipa ka hi hi.
Van kikhupsin nuai-a pilna tawh a kisemsa khempeuh guizuiha zonkhiat ding ka nak ngaihsut mahmah hi. Pasian in mihing tunga a suat van gik si e!
Sunni nuai-a a kihihsa khempeuh ka mu khin ta-a; a vekpi-in a mawknapi, huih nungdelh lel ahi hi.
A kihuiheksate kitangsakthei lo a;
a om lopi a kisim thei kei hi.
Kei kia-in ka ngaihsuna, "En in, ka khan khin a, kei ma-a Jerusalem a ukte khatpeuh sangin ka pilzaw hi; pilna le theihna tampitak ka tuakkha khin hi," ka ci hi.
Tua ciangin kei mahmah in pilna a theihtelna le haina a haitatna ka ngaihsun kak-a, ahi hangin hih zong huih nungdelh lel mah ahilam ka theikhia hi.
Ahang in, pilna tam semsem leh dahna khang semsem-a;
theihna khang semsem leh lunggimna tam semsem hi.
Ka lungsim sungah, "Hong pai dih in a hoih na muh khiat nadingin nopsakna tawh nang kong zia-et ding hi," ci-in ka ngaihsun hi. Ahi hangin tua zong a mawknapi mah ahi hi.
"Nuihna in haina ahi hi. Tua hileh nopsakna a khiatna bang ahi hiam?" ka ci hi.

Zu-a gualnopna le haina kawicip kawmin - ka lungsim pilna tawh a makaih dingin kei mahmah ka hanciam hi. Van kikhupsin nuai-ah mihingte tomvei a nuntak sungin bang sem leh manpha ding hiam, cih ka thei nuam hi.
Nasep lianpi ka sem hi: Kei ading innte lamin lengguite ka suan hi.
Huan le khawlmun nuamte ka bawl a, tuate sungah singgah kung namcin ka suan hi.
Tua singhalhte tui buah nadingin bualtuite ka bawl hi.
Sila numei le sila pasal ka lei-a, ka inn sunga suak adang sila zong ka nei hi. Kei ma-a Jerusalem a om khatpeuh sangin tuuhon le bawng hon tam ka nei zaw hi.

Kei mahmah in kumpite le gamte neihsa gou ngun le kham tampitak ka khol hi. Pasal lungsim nopna dingin mihing a lung nuamsak ding - lasa numei, lasa pasal le pasal lungsim nopna dingin zi tampi koihna a
Kei ma-a Jerusalem a omsate sangin nakpi in ka lianzaw tham hi. Hihte khempeuh ah ka pil ngei-in ka pil hi.
Ka mit iplah khempeuh panin ka kidaam kei hi;
ka lungsim nopsakna ka nial kei hi.
Ka nasep khempeuh ah nuam ka sa a,
hih in ka gimna khempeuh hanga ka pahtakman ahi hi.
Tua hi napi ka khuta ka sepsa khempeuh
ka et phat kik ciangin
haksapi a ka sepnate khempeuh a mawknapi, huih nungdelh lel ahi hi;
sunni nuai-ah hamphatna bangmah a om kei hi.
Tua ciangin pilna,
haina le haitatna ka ngaihsun leuleu hi.
Kumpite zalaihte in a ma-a semte sepsa zah val
bang sem thei ahi hiam?
Khuamial sangin khuavak a hoihzawk bang tektekin
haitatna sangin pilna a hoih zawk lam ka mu hi.
Mihaipa in khuamial sunga a pai laitakin
mipilpa in a lutangah mit nei a,
ahi hangin a nih un a kibanga
a tuah ding uh ka thei hi.
Tuateh ka lungsim ka ngaihsun a,

Mihaite tuah mah kei zong ka tuak ding hi.
ECC.2.15	Tua ciangin ka pil manin bang lawhtak ding ka hi hiam? ka ci hi.
Ka lungsim sungah,
Hih zong a mawknapi hi ei! ka ci hi.
Ahang in, mihaite mah bangin mipilte sawt a kiphawk tuan kei ding hi;
mailam hunah a nihun kimangngilh ding hi.
Mihaite mah bangin mipilte zong a si pelmawh ding uh hi.
Tua hi-a sunni nuai-ah gimpi-a nasep in hong khasiasak lel ahi manin nuntakna ka mudah hi. Tuate khempeuh a mawknapi hi a, huih nungdelh lel ahi hi.
Kei nunga piang dingte adingin ka nusiat pelmawh ding ahi manin sunni nuai-a haksapi-a sepsa na khempeuh ka mudah hi.
Tua hi-a, kua in amah a pil ahikeh a hai ahih ding lam thei ahi hiam? Tua hi napi sunni nuai-a hanciamna le siamna tawh ka sep khempeuh tungah amah in uk ding hi. Hih zong a mawknapi mah ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin sunni nuai-ah haksapi a ka nasepte khempeuh hangin ka lungkiat ding kipan hi.
Ahang in, mi khat in a pilna a siamna le a theihna tawh na sem dinga, a sem lo mipa adingin ama neihsa khempeuh a nusiat ding hi. Hih zong a mawknapi mah hi-a, vangsiatna lianpi khat ahi hi.
Mihing in haksapi in sunni nuai-ah thatang sanin na a sep man bang ngah ahi hiam?
A nuntak sunga ama nasep, natna le dahna ahi hi; zan nangawnin a lungsim a tawlnga kei hi. Hih zong a mawknapi mah ahi hi.
Mi khatin, ne-in dawnin na a sepna ah a lungkimna zah val a hoihzaw bangmah a sem thei kei hi. Hih zong Pasian khutsuak hi, cih ka mu hi;
ahang in, amah loin kua in an ne-in nuamsa thei ahi hiam?

Pasian in amah a lung kimsakpa tungah pilna, theihna le lungnopna pia-a, mawhneipa ahileh Pasian a lungkimsakpa tungah a ap ding hauhnate kaikhawmsakin a kholsak hi. Hih zong a mawknapi mah hi-a, huih nungdelh lel mah ahi hi.
Na khempeuh in hun nei ciat hi,
van kikhupsin nuai-a piang khempeuh amau hunhun-a piang hi-a:
suah hun omin sih hun om a,
suan hun omin bawhkhiat hun om a,
thah hun omin damsak hun om a,
phelkhiat hun omin lam hun om a,
kah hun omin nuih hun om a,
thum hun omin lam hun om a,
suangte thehthang hun omin tuate khop kik hun om a,
kikawi hun omin kikhah hun om a,
zon hun omin mansak hun om a,
kep hun omin paihmang hun om a,
balkek hun omin phop hun om a,
daih hun omin pau hun om a,
it hun omin muhdah hun om a,
kido hun omin kilem hun om hi.
Na sempa in gimpi-a na a sepna panin bang lawhtak ahi hiam?
Pasian in mihing tungah a suat vangik ka mu ta hi.

Amah in na khempeuh amau hun ciat-a a melhoih dingin a bawl ahi hi. Amah in mihingte lungsim a tawntunga ding zong guan napi amaute in Pasian nasepsa a kipatna pan a mong dong a lamteh thei tuan kei uh hi.
Mihingte adingin a nuntak sungun na hoih sema a lungdam ding uh sanga hoihzaw bangmah ka thei kei hi.
Mihing peuhmah in ne thei dawn thei-a a nasepna khempeuh ah a kham a ngahna - hih in Pasian letsong ahi hi.
Pasian sepsa khempeuh a kip tawntung ding ahilam ka thei a; bangmah kibehlap thei loin bangmah a kilakhia thei kei hi. Mihing in amah a zahtak theih nadingin Pasian in tuaci-in a bawl ahi hi.
A omte a om ngei khinsa hi-a,
a om lai dingte zong a om ngeisa mah hi-in,
Pasian in a om khinsa mah mangkik a
Tuateh sunni nuai-ah nadang ka mu lai hi:
Thukhenna munah - gitlohna om a,
thutang omna munah - gitlohna a om hi.
Ka lungsim sungah,

Pasian in thumaante le migilote tungah
ECC.3.17	thu a khen tuak ding hi,
ECC.3.17	ahang in sepna ding hun omin
ECC.3.17	bawl nading hun om ding hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi.
Kei zong, "Mihing in, amaute ganhing tawh kibang ahilam a muh theih nadingun Pasian in amaute sittel hi.
Mihingte tuah le ganhingte tuah a kibang hi-in, a nih un a kibang tuah ding ngak uh a: Khat a sih bangin a khat zong a si hi. A vekpi in huu sang b
A vekpi-in a mun kibangah pai uh hi; a vekin leivui pan pianga, tuateh leivui mah ah ciah kik hi.
Mihingte kha a kahtoh lam le ganhingte c

Tua ahi ciangin mi khat in ama nasep nuam a sak ding sanga hoih zaw bangmah ka mu kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua in ama tanh ahi hi. Ahang in, ama nungah bang piang ding cih a en dingin amah kua in theisak thei ding ahi hiam?
Ka et kik leh sunni nuai-a apiang kinetniamna khempeuh ka mu a:
A kinengniamte khitui -
a huh ding kuamah a neih loh lam;
a nengniamte vanglian uh a-
tuateh a hehnem ding kuamah a neih loh lam uh ka mu hi.
A nungta lai mihingte sangin,
a si khinsa misite
lungdam zaw hi ka cikhia hi.
Ahi hangin hih gel sangin
a piang nai lo
sunni nuai-a a kigamta gitlohnate
a mukha lote hoihzaw hi.
Tuateh mi khat in a vengte engin na nakpi-a kisem ahilam ka mu hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huih nungdelh lel mah ahi hi.
Mihai in a khutte zep a,
amah mah kisiatsuah hi.
Gimpi-in sema khutdim nih ngah a
huih nungdelhna sangin
daitaka khutdim khat ngah hoihzaw hi.
Sunni nuai-ah a mawknapi pawlkhat ka mu leuleu hi:
Mi khat amah kia om a;
tapa ahi a, sanggampa ahi zongin a nei kei hi.
Gimpi-a nasep khawl hunnei loin,
ama hauhna a mit dim tuan lo hi.
Amah in, "Kua ading gimpi-in na sem-a,
bang hangin ka ututin ta lel lo ka hi hiam?"ci-in kidong hi.
Hih zong a mawknapi mah hi-a
a gentheihhuai nasep ahi hi!
Khat sangin nih hoihzaw hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh amau sepna ah a hoih ngah kik uh hi.
Mi khat a tuk leh
a lawmpa in phong thei hi!
Ahi hangin mi khat tuka
a phong ding a nei lo pa hehpihhuai si!
Mi nih lumkhawm leh zong a khua uh lum ding hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatguak bangci-in a khua lum thei ding ahi hiam?
Mi khat kizothawh thei napi,
nih hileh amau le amau kihu thei uh hi.
Zang thum kihual khawm khau tat pak lo hi.
A kivauhilh thei nawn lo, tek le hai a thuah kumpipa sangin mizawng khangno khat hoihzaw hi.
Khangno khat a thongkiatna panin kumpi suak thei a, ama kumpi-gam sung mahmah ah a zawngsa-a suak hi thei hi.
Sunni nuai-a lampai-a nungta peuhmah in kumpite zalaih ding khangnopa a zuih uh ka mu hi.
Amaute ma-a mite simzawhlohin tam hi. Ahi hangin amau nunga piangte kumpipa zalaihpa tungah a lungkim kei uh hi. Hih zong a mawknapi hi a, huih nungdelh lel mah ahi hi.
Pasian inn ah na pai ciangin kidawmin gamta in. A khialh lam uh a thei lo mihaite biakna sangin thu ngai dingin a kiangah pai lecin hoihzaw hi.
Pasian mai-ah na khatpeuh na gen ciangin
kam paukhiat ding manlang kei inla,
na lungsimin nawh ngaihsut kei in.
Pasian vantungah om a,
nang leitunga om na hi hi;
tua ahi ciangin na kam tawmsak in.
Lunghimawhna tampi a om ciang in manga a kimat bangin, kam tampi a kipau ciangin, mihaipa haina kilangkhia hi.
Pasian tungah na kiciam ciangin tangtungsak hak kei in. Amah mihaite tungah lungdam lo hi, na kiciamna tangtun in.
Kiciamna tangtungsak loh sangin, kiciam loh hoihzaw hi.
Na kam tawh mawhna sung kitunsak kei in. Biakinnpi thupuakpa kiangah, "Ka kiciamna ka khial hi," ci kei in. Bang hangin na thugenna ah Pasian hehin na khut a na sepsa susia ding ahi hiam?
Mang tampi mat le kam tampi pau a mawknapi ahi hi. Tua ahi ciangin Pasian kihta-in om in.
Gam sungah mizawngte kinengniam a, thumaan le thutang a kinial na muh leh lamdang sa kei in; ahang in, ulian khat amah sanga lianzaw khat in ena, amaute gel tungah a sangzaw dang om lai hi.
Gam sunga piangte mi khempeuh in tanga; lo panin kumpipa bek in metlawh hi.
Sum iplah peuhmah in sum a deihzah nei ngei lo a;
hauhna iplah peuhmah a ngahzah tawh a lungkim ngei kei hi.
Hih zong a mawknapi ahi hi.
Nate a khanna tawh ki zui-in,
tuate a ne ding a khang hi.
Tua ahileh a neipa in a mitin a muh nuam a sak longal,
ama adingin bang phatuam ahi hiam?
Nasempa khat in tawm ne in
tam ne taleh a ihmut nuam a,
ahi hangin mihaupa a hauhletna in
a ihmusak thei kei hi.
Sunni nuai-ah a dahhuai mahmah gitlohna khat ka muh in:
hauhna in a neipa nasak a,
vangsiatna hangin hauhna maimanga,
tapa a neih ciangin
ama ading bangmah a nusiat kei hi.
Mihing a nu sung pan guaktangin suahkhia a,
a suahkhiat bangin a paikhia ding hi.
A khut sungah a sepsa
bangmah a pua thei kei hi.
Hih zong a dahhuai gitlohna mah ahi hi:
Mi khat a suah bangin pai kik hi,
huih adingin gimpi-a na a sep nungsang
bang lawhtak ahi hiam?
A nuntak hun sung lawhsamin,
lunggimin hehsa-in khuamial lakah an a ne hi.

Tua ciangin mi khat in sunni nuai-ah Pasian piak tomkha a nuntak hun sungin gimpipi-a a sepsate ne-in dawnin kham a ngah ding ama adingin hoih hi, ci-in ka ngaihsun hi - ahang in, ama lawhtak hih ahi hi.
Tua tham loin mi khatpeuh Pasian in neihsa lamsa pia-a a hauhna nuamtakin a zatsak leh ama lawhtak tua mah ahi ciangin sang henla a nasepna ah nuamsa hen - hih in Pasian letsong ahi hi.
Pasian in a lungsim lungkimna tawh kem ahi manin a nuntak sung nite a ngaihsun kha kei hi.
Sunni nuai-ah gitlohna adang khat ka mu a, mite tungah a gik mahmah hi:

Pasian in mi khat a lungsima a deih teng a kim nadingin hauhna neihsa lamsa le minphatna pia-a ahi hangin Pasian in amah nopsasak loin ama tangin midang khat in nopsak lawh hi. Hih in a mawknapi hi-a a dahhuai gitlohna ahi hi.
Mi khat in ta za khat nei-in kum tampi nungta thei hi; amah bang tanvei nungta taleh ama daupaina a nopsakpih kei a, a kivui ding banga a kivui kei leh amah sangin lamhzui naungeek hoihzaw hi.
A khiatna nei loin paikhia a, khuamial ah ciah kikin ama min khuamial sungah kikhupcip hi.
Tua in ni mukha loin bangmah a theih loh hangin tua mipa sangin sawtvei tawlnga zaw a -
amah kum tul khat zahnih nungta ta leh ama daupaina nuam a sakpih kei hi.A vekun a paina mun uh kibang hi lo ahi hiam?
Mi khempeuh gimpih a kama ding bek hi napi,
a ankam limna in phazo sak hun nei lo hi.
Mihai khat sangin mipil khat
a hamphatzawkna bang ahi hiam?
Mizawng khat in midangte mai-ah a omzia ding
a theih hangin bang phatuam ahi hiam?
Ankam limna zon kawikawi sangin
mita muhna hoihzaw hi.
Hih zong a mawknapi hi a,
huih nungdelh mah hi lel hi.
A piangkhiasa peuhmah min kivawhsa hi-in,
mihing bang hiam cih a kitheisa hi a;
amah sanga hatzaw khat
a to ngam kuamah a om kei hi.
Thu tam semsem leh
khiatna nei lo semsem hi;
tua in mi khatpeuh bang ci phattuamsak hiam?

Mihing khat in a khiatna nei lo hun tomkha sung niliim banga a khenkhen sungin, mihing khat nuntak nadingin a hoih kua in thei ding ahi hiam? Amah a sih khit ciangin sunni nuai-ah bang piang ding cih ama tungah kua in gen thei ding ahi hiam?
Paknamtui hoih sangin minpha hoihzaw a,
suahni sangin sih ni hoihzaw hi.
Mi khempeuh tawpna, sihna hi a,
a nungta laite in a lungsimah ciamteh ding ahi manin
pawibawlte inn a hawh sangin
a dahte inn a hawh hoihzaw hi.
Nuihna sangin dahna hoihzaw hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh lungtang adingin dahmai a hoih hi.
Mipilte lungsim a dahte inn ah om a,
ahi hangin mihaite lungsim nopna inn ah a om hi.
Mihaite lasak ngaih sangin,
mipil khat hong taina thusim hoihzaw hi.
Beltaw nuai-a lingkung puak zuahzuah bangin
mihaite nuih puak zuahzuah hi.
Hih zong a mawknapi mah ahi hi.
Amaan lo-a ngahna in mipilpa haisak a,
golhsum in lungsim nawngkaisak hi.
Thu khat a kipatna sangin a tawpna hoihzaw a,
kiphatsakna sangin lungduaina hoihzaw hi.
Mihaite lungtang ah hehna teng ahi manin
na hehna zah dongin lungtom kei in.
"Bang hangin tanglai mite, hihte sangin hoihzaw hiam?" ci kei in,
ahang in, hih bang dotna pilvai lo hi.
Gouluah khat bangin pilna hoih a,
ni a mute a hampha ahi hi.
Sum in hong liah bangin
pilna in hong liah hi,
ahi hangin theihna a hoihzawkna in:
pilna in a neipa nuntakna hutsak hi.
Pasian nasepsate ngaihsun dih in:
a kawisaksate
kua in mamsak thei ahi hiam?
Hun a hoih ciangin, lungdam in;
hun a siat ciangin ngaihsun in:
Pasian in ni khat le nidang khat
a kibanga a bawl ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mi khat in
a mailam thu ding bangmah a mukhia thei kei hi.
Hih a mawknapi a ka nuntak sungin, hihte gel ka mu khin hi:
a thumaan mi a thumaanna ah mangthang a,
a gilo mi a gilosapi mahin sawtpi a nungta hi.
Thumaan lua kei inla lah pil lua kei in -
bang hangin nang le nang
kisusia ding na hi hiam?
Gilo lua kei inla lah hai kei in -
bang hangin sihhun ma-in
si ding na hi hiam?
A khat lencipin a khat pen zong
khah tuan loh ding hoih hi.
Pasian a kihta peuhmah in a uanglua khempeuh pel uh hi. a
Pilna in, khuapi khat sunga gam-uk sawm sangin
mipil khat vangliansak zaw hi.
Leitungah a maana gamta a mawh ngei lo
a thumaan mi kuamah a om kei hi.
Mi thugen peuhmah thusim pahpah kei in,
tua hi kei leh na nasempa hong hamsiatna na za kha ding a -
na lungsim sungah nang zong
midangte tamveipi na hamsiat lam na thei hi.
Hihte khempeuh pilna tawh ka sittel hi-a,
Pil ka sawm hi,
ahi hangin hih in kei theih zawh loh ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin pilna gamla lua a,
a thuk penpen ahi hi -
kua in mukhia thei ding ahi hiam?
Tua ciangin theihtelna lamah ka lungsim ka hei a,
pilna le nate ngimna le kheltatna
a telhakna le haina a haihuaizia telkan ding le
a zongkhia dingin ka lungsim ka hei hi.
Thang nam khat ahi numei,
a lungsim thang kamsa hi-a,
a khut sikkhainiang ahi numei,
sihna sangin a khaat zawk lam ka phawk hi.
Pasian a lungkimsakpa numei panin suakta dinga,
ahi hangin mawhneipa tuanu thangah a awk ding hi.
Siapa b
Nate a ngimna theih nadingin na khat tungah
adang khat ka gawma -
ka zonzon lai mahin ka mu tuan kei hi -
pasal tul khat lakah a thutang khat ka mu a,
numei khempeuh lakah
numei thutang khat zong ka mu kei hi.
Hih bekbek ka mu hi:
Pasian in mite a thutang dingin bawla,
ahi hangin mite in ngimna tampi a zongkhia uh hi.
Mipilpa tawh kibang kua hiam?
Nate ahi bang liana a thei kua ahi hiam?
Pilna in mite maitaangsak a,
a maipuakzia khengsak hi.
Pasian mai-ah kiciam khin na hi manin ken kong cih inah kumpipa thupiak mang in.
Kumpipa omna mun pan paikhia baih lua kei in. Amah in a lungkimna bangbang hih ding ahi manin thusia lamah pang kei in.
Kumpipa thu a sangpen ahi manin ama kiangah,"Bang hih na hiam?" kua in ci thei ding ahi hiam?
Ama thupiakna a mang peuhmah in siatna thuak lo dinga,
lungsim pil in a hun leh a paizia thei ding hi.
Ahang in, mi khat haksatna ama tungah a gik hangin
na khempeuhah a hun leh a paizia om hi.
Mailam thu kuamah in a theih loh nungsang,
ama tunga piang ding kua in gen thei ding ahi hiam?
Huih khumcip nading vaang a nei kuamah om lo-a, a
tua mah bangin a sih ni ding tungah vaang a nei kuamah a om kei hi.
Gal kikap hun laitakin kuamah a kitawpsak loh mah bangin
gitlohna gilo-a gamtatna a khahkhia kei ding hi.
Sunni nuai-a kibawlsa peuhmah ka ngaihsutsut ciangin hih teng ka mu hi. Mi khat in ama b
Tuateh migilote hanah a kivui hi - tuate mun siangtho ah sung tumin pusuak uh a a gamtatna uh hangin khuapi sungah phatna c
Mawhna thukhenna khat manlangin a kisep khiat loh ciangin mite lungsim in siatna bawl ding a sawm hi.
Migilo khat in zavei dong mawhna bawl napi a nuntak veve hangin Pasian mai-ah siangtho a Pasian kihta mite a hoih zawk ding lam ka thei hi.
Tua hi napi migilote in Pasian a kihtak loh manun a ma uh vang lo dinga, nilim tawh a kibang a nuntak hun uh zong a kisawtsak kei ding hi.
Leitunga piang a mawknapi pawlkhat om lai hi: migilopa ngah dinga kilawm a thumaan mipa in ngah a, a thumaan mipa ngah dinga kilawm migi lopa in ngah hi. Hih zong a mawknapi mah hi, ka ci hi.

Tua hi-a mihing adingin sunni nuai-ah ne-in dawna gualnuama om kana hoihzaw om lo ahi manin gualnopna ka phat hi. Tua ciangin Pasian in sunni nuai-a a dam hun dinga a piak sung teng a nasepna ah amah in nuam a sa ding hi.
Pilna le leitunga mihingte nasepna theih sawmin - sun le zana ihmu lo lianga a om uh ka ngaihsunsun a -

tua ciangin Pasian sepsa khempeuh ka mu hi. Sunni nuai-a a piang khempeuh kuama theihtel zawh ding hi lo hi. Ama sepsa khempeuh i zonkhiat nop hangin mihing in a khiatna theikhia zo lo hi. Mipil khat in thei a kisak hangin a thei siang taktak thei kei hi.

Hihte khempeuh ka ngaihsun kikkik a, thumaante le mipilte in a sep khempeuh Pasian khutsuak hi-a ahi hangin amau tuah ding itna hiam muh dahna hiam cih kuamah in a theih loh lam a tawpna ah ka mukhia hi.
Mi khempeuh - a thumaante le migilote, a sia d
Mi hoihpa tunga tung bangbang
mawh neipa tungah tunga
a kiciampa tunga tung bangbang
a kiciam ngamlo pa tungah tung hi.

Sunni nuai-a a piang peuhmah gitlohna ahi hi: tuate khempeuh a mong uh kibang ciat hi. Tua tham loin mihing lungtang gitlohna vive hi a, a nuntak lai mah un a lungsim uh hai-a tua nung ciangin sihna lam zuan uh hi.
A nungta laite laka a om peuhmah in lametna e
Ahang in, a nungta laite in a sih ding lam uh thei a,
ahi hangin a site in bangmah thei lo hi;
amaute in pahtakman nei nawn lo uh a,
amaute kiciamtehna nangawn kimangngilh hi.
Amaute itna, amaute muhdahna le
amaute hazatna beimang khin ahi nungsang;
sunni nuai-a a piang peuhmah
bangmah a tangkha nawn kei ding uh hi.
Pasian na nasepna hong angvanna ahi manin: pai in lungkimtakin na an ne inla lung nuamtakin na zu dawn in.
Puanpak silh den inla na lu sathau nilh tawntung in.

Pasian hong piaksa sunni nuai-a a mawknapi na nuntak hun sung - a mawknapi na hun khempeuh, na it na zi tawh a nuam theithei in zang in. Hih in na nuntak sunga na lawhtak hi-a, sunni nuai-ah gimpi-a na thalawhsa ahi hi.
Na pai nading hankhuk f
Sunni nuai-ah adang pawlkhat ka mu lai hi:
Tai kidemna ah a manlangte in zo kim lo a,
a thahatte in gal zo kim loin
tua mah bangin a pilte in an kham kim lo uh a,
a teite hau kim loin
lai siamte a ki-angvan kim kei hi;
ahi hangin, amaute khempeuh tungah ahunlem hunin a tung kim hi.
Tua banah, ama hun tun ding kuamah in a thei kei hi.
Len gilo-in ngasa a kimat bang,
thangin vasa a kimat bangin
gitloh hunah mite awk a,
lamet loh laitakin amau tungah a tung hi.
Sunni nuai-ah ka lungsim hong khoih mahmah pilna gentehna khat zong ka mu hi:
Khatvei lai-in mi tawmkha a tenna khuapi neu khat om hi. Tua khua a do dingin kumpi vanglian khat kuana, a kimkotah galkap tampitak a umcihsak hi.
Tu-in tua khuapi sunga teng khat zawng napi pila ama pilna hangin tua khuapi a hu zo hi. Ahi hangin tua mizawngpa kuamah in a phawk kha kei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin, "Hatna sangin pilna hoihzaw hi," ka ci hi. Ahi hangin mizawngpa pilna kisimmawh a, ama kampaute a kithu simsak nawn kei hi.
Mihaite ukpa kikona sangin a gingkhia lo
mipilte kampau thusim zawk ding ahi hi.
Galhiamte sangin pilna hoihzaw a,
ahi hangin mawhneipa in na hoih tampitak a susia hi.
Tho sisa in paknamtui a namsiatsak bangin,
haina neuno khat in pilna le pahtawina leek zo hi.
Mipil’ lungsim taklam ah awn-a,
ahi hangin mihai lungsim veilam ah awn hi.
Mihaite in ngaihsut nei loin
a lampai kawm nangawnun
amau haitatna miteng a lak uh hi.
Gam-uk khat nang tungah a heh leh
na dinmun nusia kei in;
daih khikhena in khialhna lianpi daisak thei hi.
Sunni nuai-ah gitlohna khat ka mu-a,
gam-ukte pana ngaihsut khialhnate pawl ahi hi.
Mihaite dinmun sang tampi-ah kikoih a,
mihaute in dinmunniam a ngah uh hi.
Silate sakol tungah tuang uh a,
gam-ukte sila bangin a khe-un a pai uh ka mu hi.
Gum tote, gum sungah kia thei a;
kulh tovangte gul in tu thei hi.
Suangtum tote tuate mah in liam thei uh a;
singtum ekte tuate mah in liamsuah thei hi.
Hei kungh a,
kitat hiam kei leh
thatang san ding kisam a,
ahi hangin siamna in hong zosak ding hi.
Gul in a kikhim ma-in hong tuk leh
a khimpa adingin metna om lo hi.
Mipilpa thugen zaknophuai a,
ahi hangin mihaipa ama kam in valhtum hi.
A kam patna haihuai a;
a kamtawpna gitlohna suakin -
mihaipa in kam tampi pauthuah hi.
Kuamah in hong tung ding theikhol lo a -
ama nunga piang ding kua in genthei ahi hiam?
Mihai nasep in amah gimsak a;
khuapi zuatna lampi a thei kei hi.
Nasem a
zingsanga pawi bawl gam-uk a nei gam aw,
gimna na thuak ding hi.
Nampite kumpi in nei a, ahun manin ne a -
kham nading hi loin hat nadingin a ne uliante a nei gam aw,
thupha ngah na hi hi.
Mi khat a thadah leh a innsun kuai a,
a khut a zawt leh a inn keh hi.
Nuih nadingin pawi kibawl hi-a,
zu in nuntak nuamsakin,
ahi hangin na khempeuh suma kilei ahi hi.
Na lungsim nangawn ah kumpipa phuisam kei in,
ahikeh na lupna inndei ah mihaupa hamsiat kei in,
bang hang hiam cih leh huihlak vasa khat in na thugen puak thei dinga,
vasa leng khat in na thugen va ko thei ding hi.
Tuite tungah na anlum lawn lecin
ni tampi khit ciangin na mu kik na ding hi.
Leitungah bang siatna piang ding cih thei lo na hi manin
khen sagih khen giat dong suahin mi tungah pia in.
Meiite ah tui dim leh,
leitungah guah buasuk hi.
Singkung khat leilulam ahikeh leitawlam a puk nading munah puk a,
a pukna munah lumcip pah hi.
Huih nunzia a cing peuhmah in suan lo dinga;
meiikaizia a cing peuhmah in a at kei ding hi.
Huih paina lampi le
a nu sungah pumpi bangci kibawl a
na khempeuh Bawlpa Pasian nasepna
na theitel kei ding hi.
Na Khaici zingsangin vawh in,
nitak in zong vawh inla na khutte zawsak in,
ahang in hih pen maw, hua pen maw,
a nih-in hoih tuak ding maw,
cih na thei kei hi.
Khuavak nuam a,
mit in ni a muh ciangin nuamsak hi.
Mihing khat a nuntak sung kum tampi ahi zongin
tuate khempeuh nuamtakin zang ta hen.
Ahi hangin amah in khuamial ni ding thei ta hen,
ahang in, tuate tampi pha ding hi.
Hong tung ding na peuhmah a mawknapi ahi hi.
Khangmoipa aw, na moi lai-in lungnuam inla,
na khangno hun sungin na lungsim nopsak bangin om in.
Na lungsim hong pina le
na mita na muh bang zui in;
ahi hangin Pasian in na khempeuh ah
thu hong khen ding ahilam thei in.
Tua ahitak ciangin na lunghimawhna beisak inla,
na pumpi adingin na lungkhamna paikhia in;
ahang in, khangmoina le kithatang-muanna a mawknapi ahi hi.
Na lungkham ding hun hong tun ma,
Amaute ah nuam sa ke’ng
na cih ding kum in hong phak ma,
ni le khuavak, khapi le aksite mialin,
guahzu khina meii ah kileh kikma
na khangno hunin nang hong Piangsakpa phawkin; ;
tua hun pen inn ngakte lingin,

kongzinga kongkhakte kikhakin
angawina a gin nawn loh ciang;
vasa ham in mite phawng napi
a hamte uh a ginngaih nawn loh ciang;
mite in khosang kihta-in
lamdung lauhuai a sak ciang;
almond kung pak ta in
kauphe amah le amah tuan dinga,
a deih bangmah a om nawn loh ciang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mipa a tawntung inn ah pai ta dinga,
a thumte in kong zing zui ta ding uh hi.
Ngun khauhual a kitah ma,
kham kuang-uk a kitap ma,

tuibem a lengpei a kitap ma
le hong kuankhiatna leivui ah a ciah kik ma,
a piapa Pasian kiangah kha a ciah kik ma-in amah phawk in.

Shulam lianemnu aw e;

etin lawmkhawm e!

banzal siamte suangmanpha zun

Na laaibu kuak kiukeu aw e,

Na ngawng in lah vuisai halep tausang dungzil e.

Heshbon bualte zil e.

Na nunkhumte gamleng bang

Ka sannem siang’ ningzucik luangden henla,

Anbang itna a nian’ masiah

Kam meikuang bangin kang ven,

buak mit zolo a,

Itna lei na’ng gou le gamh

I tuai lianu moi lua lai e
ang nunkhum gel mom lo lai hi e.

I tuai lianu dawngkot hi leh,
cedar tamtak gil tawh zun ni e.
Kei pawh kawmpal kiciang hi’ng e
ka nunkhum gel tausang bang hi e.
Tanggual maimit ka duang baang ve’n
ka ngaih kibaanna zong ka hi e,
Solomon in Baal Hamon ah
gam lenggui huan zun hi e.
Lenggah hambang a huai ni ciang
ngun shekel tulkhat ciat a kai e.
Ka lenghuan bel kei thu hi e,

nang huai ding hi e,
Solomon aw, nguntang zanih

Khanghuan a tengte aw e
huan cing sengual ngaihteng tawh,

hong khak dih lai ve aw!

tumtai namcin a pona’ tang ii tungah,
khisano le zuksialno bang
ka siang hong tualbual ve aw.

Ahi zongin tua pua-a kipuakhia ding tanu tapa a omlai a om ding hi. Amaute nang kiangah hong pai ding uh hi. Amaute gamtat luhekzia na muh ciangin tua khuapi tunga ka tunsak gimnate khempeuh - Jerusalem ah tungsak ding mah hi, ci-in na lungsim a zangzaw ding hi.

Tua bangin ngun le khamin hong kizem a, na puansilhte saihadial puan hoih le nai puan manpha le hoihtakin kiphana a kizem puan ahi hi. Na annek: buhnel hoih khuaizu le olive thau ahi hi. Na melhoih mahmah a, kumpinu a suak dingin na khang hi.

Na puansilh pawlkhat munsangte nopcit nadingin na zanga tua munah na kizuakzuak hi. Hici bang na piang ngei lo tham loin na sep ngei loh ding ahi hi.
Nang in kei hong piak suangmanpha hoihte keima ngun le khamte la-in pasal limin na bawla, tuate tawh na kizuak hi.

Hih in Thupipen

Tua ahi ciangin na itte, nuam na kisakpihte, le na muhdahte na itte tawh a kibangin ka kaikhawm dinga na kimkot ah omsakin amaute mai-ah na puan kong hawkkhiatsak dinga na selsim khempeuh a mu ding uh hi.
Angkawm le sisan a luangsak numeite bangin thukhenin dan kong tuaksak ding hi. Ka hazat hehna a ka thangpaih luatna sisan phulakna nang tungah kong tusak ding hi.

Tua ciangin na itte tungah kong ap dinga amaute in na bosangte phelkhia-in na milim biakbuknote a susia ding uh hi. Na puan hong hawkkhiatsakin na kizepna manphate hong laksak ding uh a, na guaktangpi in hong nusia ding uh hi.
Amaute in mipite hong dosak ding uh a, suang in hong dengin namsau-in hong semnen ding uh hi.
Na innte haltum ding uh a, numei tampite muhin dan hong tuaksak ding uh hi. Na kizuakna pan kong khawlsak dinga na itte sumin na guai nawn kei ding hi.
Tua ciangin nang tunga ka thangpaihna damta dinga, haza a ka hehluatna a kam ta ding hi; ka dai dide dinga ka heh nawn kei ding hi.

" ‘Paunak a bulh mi peuhmah in hih paunak "Tanu in a nu sun," cih nang tungah a bulh ding uh hi.
Nang in a pasal le a tate a simmawh na nu’ tanu taktak na hi hi. A pasalte uh le a tate uh a simmawh na sanggamnute’ sanggamnu taktak na hi hi. Na nu Hit-te hi a, na pa Amor-te ahi hi.
Na u nu Samaria, na omna leilu-lam ah a tanute tawh tenga; na naunu na omna leitaw lama a tanute tawh a teng Sodom ahi hi.

"‘Na sanggamnu Sodom mawhna hih ahi hi: Amah le a tanute kiphasakin, khamvalin ne-in kuamah thudon loin om uh hi; a zawngte le a tasamte huh lo uh hi.

Na sanggam numeite diktansakna guan na himanin na zahlakna nang thuak in. Bang hang hiam cih leh amaute mawhna sangin nang aa a siahuaizaw hi. Tua ahi ciangin na sanggamnute amaan tawh kibangsak na hi manin maizumpi in na zahlakna nangmah in thuak ta in.

"‘Ahi hangin amaute in kei hong lehdo uh a, ka thu a ngai kei uh hi; mitkhah lo-a a et uh a muhthadah-huai milimte paikhia lo tham loin Egypt milimte a paikhia tuan kei uh hi. Tua ciangin ka thangpaihna amaute tungah bua in, ka hehna, Egypt ah amaute tunga a zat dingin ka gen hi.

Ama han kimkotah a mipite han om a, a kithatte lakah ama ading lupna khat kibawl hi. A vekpi un namsau-a kithat vun at loh vive ahi uh hi. Amaute launa in a nungtate gamah a kithehthangsak manin kawkhukpi sunga a paisate tawh a maizum khawm uh hi; a kithatte lakah amaute kisial hi.

A sung lutna tong sawm zai-in apang tuaka kawm tong nga a zai hi. Amah in munsiangtho puanung zong a teh hi; adung tong sawmli pha a, avai tong sawmnih a pha hi.

A panga inndeite dawl thum pha a, khat tungah khat kisuang-sawnin dawl khatah inndeino sawmthum a om hi. Biakinnpi sungah a nang ding phuh a kul lo dingin biakinnpi kimkota inndeite a nang dingin a kawm kimkot ah tawitawm a om suak hi.

Biakinnpi kimkota inndeinote adawl sanna tawh kizui-in zai semsem hi. Biakinnpi kimkot a kilamzia a sanna tawh kizui-in a inndeite a zai semsema kilam ahi hi. A sual niampen panin a sual laita kantanin a sual sangpen dong kahlei kidawh to hi.

Tua mun-awng panin a kima inndeite-a tumna leilu-lam pan khat om a, leitaw-lam panin khat a om hi; a kimkot a mun-awng tawh kizopna bulpi tong nga a zai hi.
Nitumna-lam panga biakinnpi tual lam a nga innpi a vailam tong sawm sagih a zai hi. Tua innpi kimkot kawm tong nga sahin tong sawmkua a sau hi.
Tua ciangin biakinnpi a teh hi; a dung tong zakhat pha a biakinnpi tual le inn kikal tong zakhat mah a pha hi.

Tua ciangin biakinnpi nunglam, a tual lam nga-in a dunglam teh a, a pangtuaka lamneu tawh tong zakhat a pha hi.
Munsiangtho pualam, mun siangtho sunglam le a inntual lam nga talaap,

A kihhuai na gamtatna khempeuh uh na behlapna un ka munsiangtho sungah lungtang le silesa a vun at loh gamdang mite na tumpih uh a an, sathau le sisan nong piak laitakun ka biakinnpi buahsakin ka thukhun na palsat uh hi.

" ‘Kei kiang panin taikhia-a a milimte uh nung a zui Levi-te in amaute mawhna a banbanin a thuak ding uh hi.

Amaute in ka munsiangtho ah na sem thei ding uh a, biakinnpi kong cingin a sungah na a sem ding uh hi; meihal biakna gante go thei ding uh a, mite ading biakna-in pia-in mite mai-ah dingin amaute na a sem thei ding uh hi.
Ahi zongin amaute in milimte mai mah ah na sem uh a, Israel innkuante mawhna sungah puksak uh ahi manin a mawhnate uh a thuak ding uh ka khut lamto in ka kiciam hi, Thupipen

Amaute siampi nasem ding ahi a, a siangtho nate khatpeuh kiang nai-ah hong pai ding ahi a, ka biakna siangtho pente tawh ahi zongin kei kiangah hong pai kei ding uh hi; amaute kihhuai gamtatnasate uh hangin a maizum ding uh hi.
Tua hi napi biakinnpi sunga nasemte ka uksak dinga sep ding khempeuh a sem ding uh hi.

Ahi hangin Israel-te kei kiang pan a manthan hun sung teng Levi-te le Zadok suan siampite in ka munsiangtho a nasepte muanhuaitakin sem ding uh a, ka mai-a nasem dingin ka kiangah hong pai-in biakna-a kipia sathaute le sisante pia-in ka mai-ah a ding diing uh hi, Thupipen
Ka munsiangtho sungah amaute bek tum thei ding uh a, ka sabuai kiangah ka na sem dingin amaute bek ka mai-ah hong pai thei ding uh hi.

" ‘Tual sungnung ah amaute a lut uh ciangin saihadial puan silh ding uh a, huang sungnung ahi a biakinnpi sung ahi zongin kongpite ah na a sep uh ciangin samul puan khatpeuh a silh peuhmah kei ding uh hi.
A lu uah saihadial puan khimin a puan tualpi nuai-uah sahadial puan a teng ding uh hi. A khua-ul uh a suaksak thei ding na khatpeuh a silh kei ding uh hi.

Mipite omna apua lam tual ah a paikhiat uh ciangin a sunga a nasep lai-ua a silh uh puante suahkhia-in inndei siangtho sungah nusia ding uh a, amau puansilh tawh mite a siansuah theih loh nadingun puan dang a silh ding uh hi.

Tual sungnunga lut ding siampi peuhmah in zu a dawn kei ding hi.

Amaute in ka mite a siangtho le mawhnate hilh ding uh a, asiang le anin bangci khen ding cih lak ding uh hi.

" ‘Siampite in kisiatna khatpeuh ah thu khen ding uh a, ka khunsa ngeina zui-in thu a khensat ding uh hi. A kisehsa pawi khempeuh ah ka thukhamte le ka thukipte zui ding uh a, ka Sabbath-te siangthosak ding uh hi.

hih-a kilak cia huang a nei ding hi. Leilu- lam pang tong 4,500, leitaw-lam pang tong 4,500 nisuahna-lam pang tong 4,500. nitumna-lam pang tong 4,500 pha kim ding hi.

EZK.48.35	TUA LAI-AH
