Tua ciangin Daniel, Hananiah, Mashael le Azariah cing dinga zum ukpipa in a koihpa kiangah Daniel in,
"Nong hehpihna-in ko na nasemte ni sawm sung hong zia-et phot dih in: Ka nek ding uh anteh singgah le ka dawn ding uh tuisik longal hong pia kei in.
Tua ciangin kumpipa an ne tua khangnote tawh hong enkak inla na nasemte nong muhna tawh kizui-in hong bawl in," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah thukim a, ni sawm sung a zia-et phot hi.
Ni sawm a cin ciangin kumpipa an nete sangin cidamsuakzaw uh a, a ci a sa uh zong a hoihzaw hi.
Tua ciangin a cingpa in an limcite leh a dawn ding uh zute lakhia-in tuate tangin anteh-singgah bek a pia hi.
Hih khangno lite tungah Pasian in theihna le lai nam khempeuh theihtelna le laisiamna a guan hi. Tua banah Daniel in mangmuhna le mangnamte khempeuh a theitel thei hi.
Kumpipa in amaute lah dinga a sehsa hun a cin ciangin zum ukpipa in amaute Nebuchadnezzar a lak hi.
Kumpipa in amaute hopih a, Daniel, Hananiah, Mishael le Azariah-te tawh a kibang kuamah a mu kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute kumpipa nasemin a lut uh hi.
Pilna nam tuamtuam le a thudotnate ah kumpipa in a kumpi gam sung khempeuh-a mitphial siamte le aisan siamte zah sawmin a siam zawk lam uh a mu hi.
Tua hi-a, Kumpipa Cyrus kumpi a suah zawh a kum masapen dong tua lai-ah Daniel a om hi.
Nebuchadnezzar in kumpi a suah zawh a kum nihna kumin mang khat a man hi; a lungsim lauthawnga a ihmu thei kei hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in ama mangmat gen dingin mitphial siamte, aisan siamte, mibum-theite le aksi-en siamte a
Amaute a sungah tumin kumpipa mai-ah a din uh ciangin kumpipa in, "Hong patausak mang khat ka man hi, bang a cih nopna hiam ka thei nuam hi," b
Tua ciangin aksi-en siamte in Aram pau in, c
Kumpipa in aksi-en siamte kiangah, "Kiptak a ka khensat thu hih ahi hi: Ka mang hong genin a khiatna nong gen theih kei uh leh kong atnen dinga na innte uh nin kholna ka suaksak ding hi.

Ahi hangin mang nong gen theih uh a, a khiatna nong gen theih uh leh kei tung panin letsong, pahtakman le pahtawina lianpi na ngah ding uh hi. Tua ahi ciangin ka mang hong gen unla hong khiatsak un," a ci hi.
Amaute in, "Kumpipa aw, na nasemte tungah na mang hong gen in, tua ciangin a khiatna kong gen ding uh hi," ci-in khatvei a dawng kik uh hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in, "Ka lungsim khentatnasa teng tel khin ka hi manin a hun sawt theihtheih nading a zong lel na hilam uh teltakin ka thei hi.

Mang nong gen theih kei uh leh na thuak ding uh dan khat bek a om hi. Lungsim kikhatin thukawng hekhek leng a ngaihsutna khel ding hi, ci-a a lamen na hi uh hi. Tua ahileh ka mang hong gen le uh cin a khiatna zong nong gen theih ding lam uh ka thei ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.

Aksi-en siamte in kumpipa kiangah, "Kumpipa dotna a hih thei leitungah khat beek a om kei ding hi! Bangzah in lianin thahat taleh kumpi khat beek in mitphial siamte, aisan theite le aksi-en siamte tungah tua bang dotna a dong ngei kei hi.
Kumpipa aw, nong thudot haksa lua mahmah hi. Pasiante longal kuamah in kumpipa tungah a pulaak thei kei ding hi, tua bang mi zong leitung mite lakah a teng kei hi," a ci uh hi.
Hih thu in kumpipa hehsak mahmah a, Babylon mipilte khempeuh thah dingin thu a pia hi.
Tua bangin mipil khempeuh thah nading thukip a om ciangin Daniel le a lawmte zong thah dingin mite kizongsak hi.
Babylon a mipil khempeuh that dingin kumpi cingte ukpa Arioch a paikhiat ciangin Daniel in pilvangtak le kidawmtakin amah a hopih hi.
Amah in kumpipa ulianpa kiangah, "Bang dinga kumpipa in hizah a kinawh thukip suaksak hi ding hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Tua ciangin Arioch in Daniel kiangah thupiang teng teltakin a hilh hi.
Tua tak ciangin kumpipa kiangah Daniel tuma mang khiatna a gen theih nadingin hun a ngen hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel a inn ah ciah a, a lawmte Hananiah, Mishael le Azariah-te kiangah thupiang teng a gen hi.
Amah in Babylon a mipil dangte tawh amah le a lawmte a kithahkhawm loh nadingin thuthuk tawh kisai-in van a Pasian tungah lainatna a nget dingun amaute a kun hi.
Zan laitakin Daniel in mangmu a tua thuthuk a kilaak hi. Tua ciangin Daniel in vana Pasian phat in:
"Pasian min a tawntungin kiphat den ta hen;
pilna le vangliatna ama aa ahi hi.

amah tawh khuavak a teng hi.
Ka pate Pasian aw, ka lungdamin nang kong phat hi.
Pilna le vangliatna nong pia khin a,
nang kong dot uh kei tungah nong theisak zo hi.
Kumpipa mang kote nong theisak khin hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Babylon mipilte that dinga a sehpa Arioch kiangah, Daniel pai a, "Babylon mipilte that kei in. Kumpipa kiangah kei hong paipih in, a mang ka khiatsak ding hi," a ci hi.
Arioch in kumpipa kiangah Daniel paipih pah a, "Judah saltangte lak panin na mang khiatna a thei ding mi khat ka mu hi," a ci hi.
Kumpipa in (Belteshazzar zong a kici) Daniel kiangah, "Ka manga ka muh le a khiatna hong gen thei ding na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Daniel in, "Kumpipa in nong dot thuthuk a gen thei dingin mipil, aisan-siam, mitphial siam, khongkhai thei kuamah a om kei hi;

ahi hanign thuthukte a laakkhia vantungah Pasian khat a om hi. Amah in Kumpi Nebuchadnezzar tungah mailam huna thu piang ding hong lak khin hi. Na mang le lupna tungah na lup laitaka na lungsim sunga na mangmuhte hihte ahi hi:
"Kumpipa aw, tua muna na lup laitakin mailam a piang ding thu na ngaihsun hi; thuthukte a lakkhiapa in a piang ding thu hong lak hi.
Kei midangte sanga ka pilzawk man hi loin nang kumpipa mahmah in hih thuthuk a khiatna na theih nading le na lungsim tawna hong paite na theihtel nadingin kei tungah hong kilaak ahi hi.
"Kumpipa aw, na en a, na mai-ah milim lianpi khat a ding hi - tua milim gol pha mahmah a tee daldal in kihtakhuai hi.
Milim lutang teng kham hi-a, a awm le a bante ngun hi-in a gilpi le a pheite sumngo hi-a,
a khete sik hi-in, a khepekte sik le buan ki-em ahi hi.
Na vil gige laitakin mihing khuta kikhuk lo suangtum khat hong tuksuk hi. Tua in sik le buan kihel milim khepek a khazan hi.

Tua ciangin tua sik, tua buan, tua sumngo, tua ngun le tua kham-te thakhatin kitamzan a, khuakhal lai-a ancilna-a ansi leng tawh kibang hi. Huih in mutmang a, amel-amang kimu nawn lo hi. Ahi hangin tua milim a dengkham suangtum mual lian mahmah khat suaka leitung buppi a dim hi.
"Na mang hih ahi hi, tu-in a khiatna kong gen ding uh hi.
Kumpipa aw, nang kumpite kumpipa na hi hi. Vantunga Pasian in nang tungah kumpi-gam, vangliatna, thahatna le minthanna hong pia khin hi;
na khut sungah mihing le leitung ganhing le huih lak vasate hong pia khin hi. Tuate a tenna peuhpeuh ah nangma uk a suaksak hi. Nang in tua kham lutang na hi hi.
"Nang nungah nang sanga a gina lo zaw kumpi-gam dang khat a khang ding hi. Tua zomah sumngo kumpi a thumna khang dinga leitung buppi a uk ding hi.
A nunungpenin, sik banga thakhauh a lina kumpi khat a khang ding hi - sik in na khempeuh sukhamin zansak zo hi. Tua hi-a sik in nate a suknen bangin tua pen in adang khempeuh sukhamin zansak ding hi.

A khepekte le a khemete khenkhat sik hi-in, khenkhat tungman ki-em-a na muh bang tektekin kumpi-gam kikhenkham ding hi; tua hi napi, tungman le sik kihel na muh bangin tua hun nangawnin sik khauhna zah pawlkhat mah a nei lai ding hi.
A khemete khenkhat sik hi-in khenkhat tungman ahi mah bangin kumpi-gam zong khenkhat khauhin khenkhat a nem ding hi.
Sik le tungman kihel khawm na muh bang tektekin mite kihelzau dinga kipawl thei loin sik le tungman mah a bang ding uh hi.

"Tua kumpite hun sungin vantunga Pasian in a kisusia zo lo ding, midangte zong a kiluahsak lo ding kumpi-gam khat a phut ding hi. Tua in tua huna kumpi-gamte khempeuh suzan dinga bei mangsak ding hi; ahi hanign tua gam a kip tawntung ding hi.
Hih in mihing khuta kisukha lo mualtung pana tuksuk suangtumpi khiatna hi a - tua suangtum pen sik, sumngo, tungman, ngun le kham a khazan pen ahi hi.
Mai lama thupiang ding a lian Pasian in kumpipa tungah hong lak khin zo hi. Tua mang thumaan hi-a, a khiatna zong muantak hi, a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Daniel mai-ah Kumpipa Nebuchadnezzar a khup lamin bok a, ama pahtawi-in biak-piakna le gimnamtui-a biakna a piak dingin thu a pia hi.
Kumpipa in Daniel kiangah "Na Pasian, pasiante’ Pasian hitakpi-in kumpite’ Topa hi a, thuthuk a laakkhiapa ahi hi; ahang in, note in hih thuthuk nong laakkhia thei tazen uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin kumpipa in Daniel zalianpi in koih a, letsong tampitakin pahtawi lai hi. Amah in Babylon gamkhen khempeuh uksak a, tua gam sunga mipil khempeuh ukpipa-in a koih hi.
Tuate banah Daniel ngetsakna hangin kumpipa in Shadrach, Meshach le Abednego-te Babylon gamkhente ukin a koih hi. Daniel ahileh kumpi zumah a om lai hi.

a khut uh tawh hong domto ding uh hi,’ d

Jesu in mihonte a muh ciangin mualpangah paito-in a tu hi. Nungzuite ama kiangah va pai uh a,
amaute thu hilh ding kipanin:
"Kha-a gentheite thupha ngah ahi hi,
ahang in, vangtung gam amau aa ahi hi.
A dahte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in,
amaute a kihehnem ding hi.
Lungnemte thupha ngah ahi hi, ahang in,
amaute in leitung a luah ding uh hi.
Thumaanna hanga gilkial dangtakte thupha ngah ahi hi,
ahang in, amaute kitaiisak ding hi.
Mi lainat siamte thupha ngah ahi hi,
ahang in, amaute lainatna kingahsak ding hi.
Lungsim siangthote thupha ngah ahi hi,
ahang in, amaute in Pasian a mu ding uh hi.
Kilemna a bawlte thupha ngah ahi hi,

"Keima hangin engkona, bawlsiatna le zuauthu tawh gitlohna nam khempeuh a hong kingawh ciangin thupha ngah na hi uh hi.
Note ma-a kamsangte zong tua mah bangin bawlsia uh ahi manin lungdamin kipak un, bang hang hiam cih leh vantung ah no ading pahtakman a lian hi.
"Note leitung ci na hi uh hi. Ahi hangin ci a alna mang leh bangci ki-alkiksak thei ding ahi hiam? Buakhia a mite tuatcil ding longal a hoihna om lo hi:
"Note leitung khuavak na hi uh hi. Mualtunga om khuapi a kiliah thei kei hi.
Mite in meivak a vak uh ciangin kuang a khuh kei uh hi. A khuh sangsikin inn sunga omte khempeuh in khua a muh theih nadingin meivak tunna tungah kikoih zaw hi.
Tua mah bangin mite in na gamtatna hoihte uh a muh ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a phat nadingun na khuavak uh mite mai-ah na tangsak un.
"Thukham ahi zongin, Kamsangte thu ahi zongin a beisak dinga hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kei un; tuate a beisak dinga hong pai hi loin, a tang tungsak dinga hong pai ka hizaw hi.
Thutak kong geninah, van le lei a manthan masiah Thukham khempeuh a tangtun kim khit mateng, laimal neupen ahi-a sutvom ciau khat ahi zongin a mangthang kei ding hi.

Hih thupiakte lak pan a neu pen palsatin, tua banga palsat ding midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah a neu pen kici ding hi. Ahi hangin hih thupiakte zui-a, midangte a hilh peuhpeuh vantung gamah alian kici ding hi.

Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, a sanggam c
"Tua ahi ciangin biaknatau ah biakna na piak laitakin na sanggam pa in na tungah lungkimlohna nei hi, ci-a na phawk leh,
biaknatau mai-ah na piak nate nusia phot in. Pai inla na sanggampa tawh va kilem phot in; tua khit ciangin pai-in na biakna pia pan in.

"Thukhenna mun hong tun na lawmpa tawh kilem mengmeng in. Na paikhawm laitak un kilem zawh nading hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh thukhenpa tungah hong pia dinga, thukhenpa in bupa khut sungah hong pia-in thong sung hong kidenna kha ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, na liausum e
"‘Ang kawm kei in,’ f
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, mi khatpeuh in lunggulhluatna tawh numei khatpeuh a et leh ama lungtang sungah amah tawh angkawm khin ahi hi.
Na taklam mittang in hong khialhsak leh khelkhia inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sunga hong kipaih sangin na pumpi na khat a hem ding nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
Na taklam khut in hong khialhsak leh sattan inla paimang in. Na pumpi kimin hell sungah na lut sangin na pumpi hiang khat a hem ding, nang adingin hoihzaw hi.
"‘Zi ma peuhmah in makna lai pia ta hen,’ a
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, ang kikawmsanna hang longal, a zi a ma peuhmah in a zi angkawmsak a suak hi. A kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawm a suak hi.
"Tua ciang leuleu-in tanglai mite kiangah, ‘Ciampel kei in; Topa tawh na kiciamnate tangtun in,’ a kici thu na zaksa uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, tomlo peuhmah kei un: vantung, Pasian tokhom ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un;
leitung, Pasian khengakna ahi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un; Jerusalem, Kumpi Lianpa khuapi a hi manin tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
Na samzang khat nangawn vomsak, kangsak thei lo na hi manin na lutang zong tomlawhna-in zang kei un.
A hite, ‘Himah,’ a hilote, ‘Hikei,’ ci lel un. Tua bansiah peuhmah gilopa kiang pana hong pai ahi hi.

Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, migilopa na nang kei un. Na pang taklam hong bet leh alang lam zong na dawh in.
Na puan-ak hong deihgawh mana thusia hong zongte, na puantualpi zong na piakbeh in.
Zawhthawh thu-a tai khat hong paipihte, tai nih dong na zui in.
Hong ngente na pia inla, hong leitawite nungngat san kei in.
"‘Na vengte c
Ahi hangin ken kong geninah, na galte d
Tua hileh vantunga na Pa uh tate na suak thei ding uh hi. Amah in miphate le misiate tungah ni tangsak a, thumaante le thumaan lote tungah guah a zusak hi.
Hong itte bek na it uh leh bang pahtakman ngah ding na hi uh hiam? Siahdongte nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Na sanggamte bek uh na muak uh leh midangte sangin a hoihzaw na bawl uh bang om ding ahi hiam? Lawkite nangawn in tua bangin hih uh hi lo ahi hiam?
Tua ahi ciangin vantunga om na Pa uh a hoihkim bangin note zong na hoihkim un.

Note in thumaanna nasepte na sep uh ciangin mihing muh ding utna tawh mite mai-ah sem kei un. Tua bangin na sep uh leh vantunga om na Pa uh tung pan pahtakman na ngah kei ding uh hi.

"Note in thu na nget uh ciangin kineihsiamte bangin na hih kei un. Amaute in mite muh theihtheih dingin synagogue-te sung le lamkabom khawngah dinsa in a ngen nuam se uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, amaute in pahtakman a cingin a ngah zo uh hi.

"Hong hilh tektek ka hi, na nuntak nading, na nek na dawn ding ahi zongin na pumpi uh ading, na silh na ten ding uh bangmah lunghimawh kei un. An sangin nuntakna thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam? Puansilh sangin pumpi thupizaw hi lo ahi hiam?
Huih laka leng vasate en dih un; tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, ansal ah zong khol lo napi vantunga om na Pa un tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note manphazaw tham hi lo na hi uh hiam?
A lunghimawh manin a nuntak hun nai khat sung bek a sotto thei note lakah kua om ahi hiam? a
"Bang hangin na silh na ten ding uh lunghimawh na hi uh hiam? Gamlak a unok kungte ngaihsun dih un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin Solomon nangawn a thupina na khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin hih unok pak khat zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi, cih kong gen hi.

Midangte tungah thu khen kei un. Na khen uh leh no tungah zong thu hong kikhen ding hi.

Kineihsiampa aw, nang mit-a singpek lakhia masa in, tua hileh na sanggampa mit-a na lakkhiat ding ninthem na telmuh pan ding hi.
"A siangtho nate ui pia kei un. Vok mai-ah na kep manphate uh pai kei un. Tua banga na hih uh leh a tuatcil gawp khit uh ciangin kihei-in note hong balnen ding uh hi.
"Ngen un hong kipia ding hi; zong un na mu ding uh hi; kiu un kongkhak hong kihon ding hi.
Ahang in, a ngen khempeuh in a ngah uh hi; a zongte in a mu hi; a kiute ading kongkhak kihon ding hi.
Note lakah a tapa in anlum a nget ciangin suang a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
Ahikeh ngasa a nget ciangin gul a pia ding kua om ahi hiam?
Tua ahileh note migilo hi napi, na tate uh na hoih piak ding thei na hi uh leh vantunga om na Pa un a ngente na hoih pia nuam zawtham lo ding ahi hiam!
Na khempeuh ah no tunga hong kibawl ding na deih bangun midangte tungah bawl un. Hih in Thukham le kamsangte thu khempeuh huam khin hi.
"Kong kawcik ah lut un. Ahang in, siatna a tun kongpi tanzau-in lampi zai-a mi tampi a lut hi.
Ahi hangin nuntakna a tun kongpi neu a, lampi kawcik in mi tawmcik bek a lut hi.
"Kamsang zuaute hangin na kigalging un. Amaute tuuvun silhin note kiangah hong pai uh hi; ahi hangin amaute sunglam, ngia hangsan ahi hi.
Amaute a gah un na khentel thei ding uh hi. Lingkung panin lenggah kilo ngei ahi hiam? Thangling kung panin theigah kilo ngei ahi hiam?
Tua mah bangin kung hoih in gah hoih gah a, kung hoih lo in gah hoih lo a gah hi.
A kung hoih in gah hoih lo gah thei lo a, tua mah bangin a kung hoih lo in gah hoih gah thei lo hi.
Gah hoih a gah lo singkung peuhmah kiphukin meikhukah kikhul hi.

Tua ni ciangin mi tampi in ka kiangah, ‘Topa, Topa, nangma minin thu hilh hi lo ka hi uh hiam; nangma minin dawite hawlkhia in, nalamdang tampi bawl hi lo ka hi uh hiam?’ hong ci ding uh hi.
Tua ciangin, ‘Note kong thei ngei kei hi. Gitlohna a bawlte aw, kei kiang pan taikhia un!’ teltakin ka ci ding hi.

Amaute in, "Pasian Tapa aw, ko bang cih hong sawm na hi hiam? A kisehsa hun a tun ma-in kote bawlsia dinga hih lai-a hong pai na hi hiam?" ci-in a kiko uh hi.

Tua hun ciangin vantung gam in a meivakte uh kengin zineipa dawn dinga kuankhia nungak bit sawmte tawh kibang ding hi.

"Tua ciangin nungak bitte a vekun khanglo uh a, a meivak uh a puah tek uh hi.
Nungak hai teng in a pilte kiangah, ‘Ka meivak uh mit hi, na meitui uh hong hawm un,’ ci-in ngen uh hi.
"Nungak pilte in, ‘I vek adingin kicing lo ding ahi manin kong hawm zo kei ding uh hi. Tua sangin, pai-in meitui zuakte kiangah no ading va lei un,’ ci uh hi.
"Tua bangin meitui lei dinga a pai kalun, zineipa a tung hi. A kigingkholsa nungakte, zineipa tawh mopawi-ah lutkhawm uh hi. Tua ciangin kong kikhak hi.

Amau hihtheihna ciat tawh kizui-in, nasem khat tungah talent a
Talent nga a ngah pa paikhia pah a, summet bawlin a met talent nga a ngah hi.
Tua mah bangin talent nih a ngah pa in zong a met talent nih mah a ngah hi.
Ahi hangin talent khat a ngah pa paikhia-in lei to-a, a pu sum a phum hi.
"Hun sawtpi khit ciangin tua nasemte’ pu ciah kika, amaute sum kepna thu teng a sittel hi.
Talent nga a ngah pa in adang nga hong tawi thuah a, ‘Pu aw, kei muanga nong kepsak talent nga ahi hi. En in, hih lai-ah a met nga ka ngah hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A hoih a muanhuai nasempa aw, pha hi! Na tawmkha tungah na muanhuai hi; na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Hong pai inla na pu tawh lungdam khawm in!’ ci hi.
"Talent nih a ngah pa zong va pai a, ‘Pu aw, kei muanga nong kepsak talent nih ahi hi. En in, a met nih ka ngah hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A hoih, a muanhuai na sempa aw, pha hi! Na tawmkha tungah na muanhuai hi; na tampi kong uksak ding hi. Hong pai inla na pu tawh lungdam khawm in!’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin talent khat a ngah pa va pai a, ‘Pu aw, nang mi genhak na hi hi, na vawh lohna munah na at a, khaici na theh lohna munah a kaikhawmpa na hilam ka thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin kong kihta a paikhia-in na talent lei sungah ka sel hi. En in, nang aa teng mah ahi hi,’ ci hi.
"A pu in, ‘A tatsia, a thadah na sempa aw! Ka vawh lohna munah atin, khaici ka theh lohna munah ka kaihkhop lam thei takpi na hi hiam?
Tua ahileh kong ciah kik cianga a met le a sumpi ka ngah kik theih nadingin bang dinga ka sum, sumsinte na ap lo na hi hiam.
"Tua talent khat ama tung pan lakhia unla, talent sawm neipa na pia un.

"Tua hun ciangin Kumpipa in a taklama omte kiangah, ‘Ka Pa in thupha hong piaksate aw, hong pai un; leipiansak cil-a kipan no adinga kibawlsa na luah ding uh gam hong luah un.
Ahang in, ka gilkial laitakin ka nek ding nong pia uh a, ka dangtak laitakin ka dawn ding nong pia uh hi. Mikhual ka hi laitakin zin nong do uh hi.

Abel sisan a kipan biakna-tau le mun-siangtho kikala kithat Zechariah sisan dong, a luangkhia khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in kisim ding hi. Hi mah hi, ken kong geninah hihte khempeuh hih khang mite mawhna in a kisim ding hi.

Tua lai panin Jesu a paikhiat ciangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in amah nasiataka langpan ding sawmin ngak uh a,

Na samzangte khempeuh uh kisim khin takpi hi. Lau kei un; kawlgit tampi sangin note na manphazaw uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin Mihing Tapa a langgente peuhmah kimaisak dinga, ahi hangin Khasiangtho a gendai peuhpeuh a kimaisak kei ding hi.

Tua ciangin amah in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a, "Mi hau khat lo ah an tampi a piang hi.

Tua ciangin, ‘Kum tampi man ding na hoih tampi ka koih khin zo hi. Nuntakna nopzatin, nene-in dawndawnin gualnuam in, ka kici ding hi,’ ci hi.

An sangin nuntakna thupizaw a, puan sangin pumpi thupizaw hi.

Va-akte na ngaihsun dih un: Tuate in vawh lah vawh lo, at lah at lo, gawdam ahi zongin sal ah ahi zongin a khol kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Pasian in tuate a vak hi. Vasate sangin note na manpha zawtham pek uh hi!

"Unokte khanzia na ngaihsun un. Na sem loin khau lah a khek kei uh hi. Tua hi napi Solomon nangawn a thupina khempeuh tawh a kizep laitakin, hihte zahin zong a kizem zo kei hi.
Upna neu mite aw, tuni-in hih lai-ah om a, zing ciangin mei-a kikhul ding lopa kung khat, Pasian in tua zahin zem ahileh amah in note puan hong guan zaw tham ding hi!
Tua ahi ciangin na nek na dawn ding uh ngaihsut penin nei kei un; tuate na lunghimawh kei un.
Hih nate khempeuh leitung lawkite in zon penin a nei uh hi. Hih nate na kisap lam uh na Pa un a thei hi.

"Tuu hon tawmkhate aw, na Pa un note gam hong piak ding lungkim khin ahi manin na lau kei un.
Na neihsate uh zuak unla mizawngte na pia un. A patvang thei lo sumbawm no le no na kiguan unla, a bei thei lo, gutate in a naih theih loh le nget nek theih lohna mun vantungah na gou uh khol un.

"Na sem dinga kisa kholsa in om unla, meivak kuangsa-in om un;
mopi powi sima hong ciah kik, kong a kiuh pheta a honpah thei dinga a pu uh a ngakte bangin om un.
A pu uh a pai ciangin tua banga a ngak laitak a tuah nasemte hampha ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, an vak dingin amah kithawi-a, a nasemte sabuai ah kingamsakin amaute ankuang a lui ding hi.
Zan, vil nihna ahi zongin, vil thumna ahi zongin a pu a pai cianga, a pu in kigingsa-a om a tuah nasemte a hampha ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin note in hih thu na theitel un: Inn neipa in zanlai bang hunin gutate pai ding hiam cih theikhol leh a inn kiluhsak lo ding hi.
Na muanmawh loh hun laitakun Mihing Tapa hong pai ding ahi manin note zong pel loin kigingsa in om un," a ci hi.
Peter in, "Topa aw, hih gentehna ko tung beka gen na hi hiam, ahikeh mikim tunga gen na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Topa in, "Tua ahileh ama inn sunga nasem dangte ukin, amaute a hunhuna an a pia dinga a pu in a koih, a muanhuai a pil sungtapipa kua ahi hiam?
A pu a ciah kik cianga tua banga a sep laitak a tuah nasempa hampha ding hi.
Thutak kong geninah, a pu in tuapa a neihsa khempeuh a uksak ding hi.
Ahi hangin tua nasempa in, ‘Ka pu sawtveipi hong tam na inteh,’ ci-in nasem-numei le nasem-pasalte satgawp henla, an ne in zu dawnin zu na kham leh,
a lamet loh ni le a khuadon loh hun laitakin a pu tung dinga, tua nasempa a pu in atnenin thu um lote tawh mun khatah a koihkhawm ding hi.
"A pu deihna thei napi-in, a pu deihna banga gamta lo-a, kigingkhol lo tua nasempa tam veipi a kisat ding hi.

Ahi hangin bangmah thei lo-a gawtna thuak nadinga kilawm nate a hihpa ahileh tawm vei kisat ding hi. Tampi a kipiate tung panin tampi kingen kik ding hi; tampi a ki-apte tung panin a tamzaw lai kingen kik ding hi.
"Leitungah mei puak dinga hong pai ka hi hi. Tua mei a kuang khin hileh ut sing!
Ahi hangin ka thuak ding baptisena khat oma, tua a kizawh siang mateng ka lungdong mahmah hi!
Leitung ah kilemna puak dingin hong pai hi, ci-in hong ngaihsun kha uh hiam? Hi lo hi, ken kong geninah kikhenna khah dinga hong pai ka hi hi.
Tu-a kipanin innkuan khat mi nga a phate, thum lang ah nih, nih langah thumin khat le khat kilangpang ciat ding uh hi.
A tapa langah a pa, a pa langah a tapa, a tanu langah a nu, a nu langah a tanu, monu langah teknu, teknu langah monu kilangpan ciatin amaute a kikhen ding uh hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in mihonpite kiangah, "Nitumna-lam panin meii hong kai na muh uh ciangin, ‘Guah zu ding hi,’ na ci thei pah uh a, guah lah a zu takpi hi.
Leitaw-lam pana huih a nun ciangin, ‘Khua lum ding hi,’ na ci uh a, a lum takpi hi.
Kineihsiamte! Van le lei maitangte pianzia na khia thei uh hi. Bangci bangin tu lai hun khia thei lo na hi uh hiam?
"Bang hangin note in amaan le amaan lo khen thei lo na hi uh hiam?

Thukhenpa kiangah na langpa tawh na paikhawm laitak mah un lampi-ah na kilemkik zawh nading nakpi in hanciam in. Tua hi kei leh amah in thukhenpa kiangah nang hong kai dinga, thukhenpa in bupa tungah hong apin, tua bupa in nang thong sung hong denna ding hi.
Ken kong geninah, na liausum na piak khit siang matengin na suakta kei ding hi," a
Tua laitakin tua lai-a om mi pawlkhat in, Pilate in Galilee-te sisan le a biakpiakna uh a helsakna Jesu kiangah a ko uh hi.
Jesu in, "Tua Galilee mite in hih banga a thuak manun a Galilee mipih dangte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
Ken kong geninah, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi.
Ahikeh Siloam a tausang in a denlup mi sawm le giatte, Jerusalem a tengte khempeuh sangin a mawhzaw hi dingin na ngaihsun uh hiam?
Kong hilh tektek hi, a mawhzaw tuan kei uh hi! Ahi hangin note na kisik kei uh leh note zong na vekun na mangthang khin ding uh hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amah in, hih gentehna gen a: "Mi khat in a lenggui lo sunga kisuan theikung khat a nei hi. Amah a gah en dingin a pai hangin a gah khat beek a mu kei hi.

Tua ciangin amah in a lenggui lo cingpa kiangah, ‘Kum thum sung tawntung thei a gah hiam, cih en dingin kong paipai hangin a gah khat beek ka mu kei hi. Phuk tan in! Lei hoih pengsak lel hi lo hiam?’ ci hi.
"Tuapa in, ‘Pu aw, kum khat khawi lai dih in, a kimkot toin leihoih na sung phot dih ning.
Ni kum ciang a gah le pha! A gah kei leh tua ciangin phuk in,’ ci-in dawng hi," a ci hi.
Sabbath ni khat Jesu in synagogue-te khatah thu a hilh hi.
Tua lai-ah kha khat in, kum sawm-le-giat sungtak a poisak numei khat a om hi. Tuanu a nung kulin a dingtang thei peuhmah kei hi.
Jesu in amah a muh ciangin a mai lamah samkhia a, "Numei aw, na zawnkhalna panin hong kikhahkhia hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amah in tuanu tungah a khutte nga-a, tua khit phetin tuanu dingtang thei-a Pasian a phat hi.

Sabbath ni-in Jesu in cina damsak ahi manin synagogue ukpa lungkim lo a mipite kiangah, "Nasep hun ding ni guktak a om hi. Tua ahi ciangin a kidamsak dingin tua nite in hong pai unla, Sabbath ni-in hong pai kei zaw un," a ci hi.
Topa in tuapa kiangah, "No kineihsiamte, Sabbath ni-in na bawngte na laate uh a buk pan sutin nomau ciat in tui pia dingin paipih hi lo na hi uh hiam?
Tua ahileh kum sawm le giat sungtak Satan in a hencip hih Abraham tanu a kihencipna pan Sabbath ni-in khahkhiat huaizaw lo ding ahi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Amah in hih thu a gen ciangin amah a langpangte khempeuh zahlak uh a, ahi hangin mipite ahileh ama hih nalamdangte hangin a kipak uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, "Pasian gam bang tawh kibang ahi hiam? Bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
Mi khat in huan sunga a cin ankam tang tawh kibang hi. Tua ankam khangto a, kungpi suakin a hiangte tungah huihlak vasate a tuang uh hi," a ci hi.
Amah in, "Pasian gam bang tawh ka teh ding hiam?
Numei khat in a ki mekman buhnel lompi b
Tua ciangin Jerusalem lam manawhin a pai kawmin khuapi khuaneute ah lutin thu a hilh hi.
Mi khat in ama kiangah, "Topa, mi tawmkha bekin hotkhiatna ngah ding uh ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah,
"Kong kawcik-a lut ding na hahkat un. Bang hang hiam cihleh, mi tampi in lut ding a hanciam ding uh a, ahi hangin a lut thei kei ding uh hi, cih kong gen hi.
Inn neipa khatvei thoin kong a khak khit nak leh note a pualamah dingin, ‘Topa aw, kote kong hong hon in,’ ci-in kongkhak kiu-in na ngen ding uh hi.

Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi,’ ci-in dawng ding hi.
LUK.13.26	 Tua ciangin note in, ‘Nang tawh i nekhawm i dawnkhawm a, ka kongzingte uah zong thu na hilh hi,’ na ci ding uh hi.
"Ahi hangin amah in, ‘Note kong thei kei hi; koi pan hong pai cih zong kong thei kei hi, no a tatkhelte aw paimang un!’ ci-in hong dawng ding hi.
"Abraham, Isaac, Jacob le kamsangte khempeuh, Pasian gam sungah om a, note pualamah hong kihawlkhia cih na muh uh ciangin tua lai-ah kahna le hagawina a om ding hi.
Nisuahna, nitumna, leilu, leitaw panin mite hong pai ding uh a, Pasian gam sunga pawipi-ah amau mun ciatah a tu ding uh hi.
A nunungte masa a, a masate nunung cih a om takpi hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Tua hun laitakin Jesu kiangah Pharisee-te pawlkhat va pai uh a ama kiangah, "Hih lai nusia in mundang khatpeuh ah pai in. Herod in nang hong that nuam hi," a ci uh hi.
Amah in, "Pai-in tua ngia kiangah, ‘Tuni le zingciang dawite hawlkhia-in mite ka damsak dinga, a ni thumna ni-in ka tupna ka tung ding hi, ci hi,’ ci-in va gen un.
Bangbang ahi zongin tuni, zingciang le thaiciang ka vakvak lai ding hi - ahang in, Jerusalem pualamah kamsang kuamah a si thei peuhmah kei ding hi!
"Jerusalem aw, Jerusalem, kamsangte that-a, nang kianga hong kisawlte suangin a deng nang, akpi in a note a kha nuai-ah a khop bangin na tate ka khop nop hangin nang na ut kei hi!
En in, na inn a hawmmangsa in kinusia ding hi. Ken kong geninah, ‘Topa min a
Sabbath ni khat, a kipi-et mahmah Pharisee khat innah Jesu an ne dingin a pai ciangin amah limtakin a encik uh hi.
Tua lai-ah, ama mai-ah tuipuak natna a vei mi khat a om hi.
Jesu in Pharisee-te le thukham siamte kiangah, "Sabbath ni-a cina damsak ding thukham tawh kituak hiam, kituak lo hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Ahi hangin amaute a dai khipkhep uh hi. Tua ciangin amah in, tua mipa lenin damsaka, a ciahsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Note lakah khatpeuh in a tapa b
Amaute in gen ding a nei kei uh hi.
Lenglate in sabuai-a tutna thupite a tel uh amah in a theih ciangin amaute kiangah gentehna gena:
"Mi khatpeuh in mopi pawi-a hong sap ciangin no sanga lianzawte na kisam kha thei ding ahi manin, tutna thupite ah na tu kei un.
Tua hileh note gel hong samkhawm inntekpa hong pai-in na kiangah, ‘Na tutna tuapa na awn in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin nang zahlakin a thupi lo penna munah na tut kul kha ding hi.

Ahi hangin nang hong kisap ciangin aniam penna munah na tut leh, inntekpa hong pai-in nang kiangah, ‘Lawm aw, a hoihzaw mun tutna ah na tuto in,’ hong ci ding hi. Tua ciangin na lenglapihte khempeuh lakah na angtang ding hi.
Ahang in, amah le amah a kitawisangte kiniamsak dinga, amah le amah a kiniamsakte kitawisang ding hi," a ci hi.

Tua ciangin Jesu in a inntekpa kiangah, "Sun-an ahi zongin nitak-an ahi zongin na vak ciangin, na lawmte ahi zongin na sanggamte ahi zongin na tanaute ahi zongin sum hau na vengte ahi zongin sam kei in. Tua banga na sap leh amaute in nang hong samin hong thuk kik ding uh hi.
Anvakna pawi na bawl ciangin mizawngte, mipoite, khebaite le mittawte na sam zaw in,
tua hileh thupha na ngah ding hi. Amaute in nang hong thuk zawh loh hangin thumaante thawhkik ciangin nang hong kithukkik ding hi," a ci hi.
Amah tawh sabuai-a tukhawmte khat in hih thu a zak ciangin Jesu kiangah, "Pasian gam sunga pawi-a an ne dingte, thupha ngah ahi hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Mi khat in pawi lianpi khat bawlin mi tampi a kho hi.
Tua anvak pawi hun ciangin a khohsate kiangah, ‘Hong pai ta un, na khempeuh a baihsa-in om zo hi,’ ci-a gen dingin a nasemte a sawl hi.
"Ahi hangin a khohsate in a kibangin paulap a nei ciat uh hi. A masa pa in, ‘Lo khat a lei khin phet ka hi a, pai-in tua lo ka et kul hi. Nong hehpihna-in hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
"Adang khat in, ‘Bawng kap nga a lei khin phet ka hi-a tuate sin dingin a pai kimlai ka hi hi. Nong hehpihna-in kei hong pengsak in,’ ci hi.
"Adang khat leuleu in, ‘Zi nei khin phet ka hi hi, tua ahi ciangin kong pai thei kei ding hi,’ ci hi.

"Nasempa ciah kika, a pu kiangah hih thute a zasak hi. Tua ciangin inn neipa heha, a nasempa kiangah, ‘Khuapi kongzingte le kongzingneute ah pai mengmeng inla, mizawngte, mipoite, mittawte le khebaite hong lutsak in,’ ci-in thu pia hi.
"Nasempa in ‘Pu aw, nong thupiak bangin kihih khin zo hi, ahi hangin mun awng lai hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua ciangin a pu in nasempa kiangah, ‘Lamliante le lamneute ah va pai inla, ka inn a dim nadingin amaute hong lutsak in.
Ken kong geninah, a kikhosate khat beek in ka anvak a ciam kha kei ding uh hi,’ ci hi," a ci hi.
Mihon tampi tawh Jesu a paikhawm laitakin amaute lam nga in,
"Kei kianga hong pai mi khatpeuh in a nu, a pa, a zi a tate le a sanggampate, a sang gamnute tham lo ama nuntakna nangawn a muhdah kei leh amah, kei nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
Tua hi-a ama singlamteh pua-a ka nung hong zui lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
"Gentehna-in note lakah tausang dawh nuam khat om leh a tua tausang a dawh zawh nading sum a kicing ding a nei hiam, cih thei dingin tu-in aman ding tuat masa lo ding ahi hiam?
Ahang in, amah in a bulpi pan khin napi, zosiang zo kei leh a mu khempeuh in nuihsan dinga,
‘Hih pa in tausang dawh kipan khin napi a zosiang kei hi,’ ci ding uh hi.
"Ahikeh gentehna in kumpipa khat in kumpi dang khat sim dingin kithawi leh mi tul sawmnih tawh a kuanpa, mi tul sawm tawh a nang zo ding hiam, cih tu photin, ngaihsun masa lo ding ahi hiam?
Amah a kingap kei leh, a galpa a gamlapi-a a om lai-in ama kiangah palai sawl dinga, kilem nadingin a thumsak ding hi.
Tua mah bangin note laka na khempeuh a nusia lo peuhmah ka nungzui a hi thei kei ding hi.
"Ci a lim hangin a alna mang leh bangci in ki-al kiksak thei ding hiam?
Leitak ading ahi zongin eklei dinga khol ding ahi zongin kimanna a nei kei hi; kibuakhia lel hi.
Zak nading bil nei peuh in za ta hen, a ci hi.
Tua ciangin ama thu gen ngai dingin siahdongte le "mawhneite" ama kimah a kikhawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin Pharisee-te le thukham siate in, "Hih mipa in mawhneite ngai-in amaute tawh an a nekhawm hi," ci-in a phunsan uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah gentehna gen a,
"Note lakah khat in tuu zakhat nei a, tuate lakah khat mansuah leh sawmkua le kua-te pawn lakah nusia in a tuu mang a muh mateng zong lo ding ahi hiam?
A muh ciangin lungnuamtakin a liangko tungah pua-in,
innah a ciah hi. Tua ciangin amah in a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm a, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka tuu mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
Tua mah bangin kisik a kul lo a thumaan mi sawm kua le kua-te sangin mawh nei khat a kisik na hangin vantung ah nuamna a lianzaw ding hi, cih kong hilh hi.
"Ahikeh gentehna-in numei khat in nguntang a
A muh ciangin a lawmte le a vengte samkhawm in, ‘Kei hong nuampih un; ka sum mang ka mu zo hi,’ ci hi.
Tua mah bangin ken kong geninah, mawhnei mi khat a kisikna hangin Pasian vansawltakte omna ah nuamna a om hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in a thugen zomlai a, "Tapa nih a nei mi khat a om hi.
A nauzawpa in a pa kiangah, ‘Pa aw, i goute sung pan kei tanh ding hong khenkhia in,’ ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in a neihsate amau gel a hawmsak hi.
"Tua khit a sawt loin a nauzawpa in a neih khempeuh kaikhawmin, gamlapi ah pai-a noptatna-in a sum neih teng a zangbei hi.
A neih khempeuh a zat bei khit ciangin tua gambup ah kialpi tunga, amah a kitasam hi.
Tua ciangin amah tua gam mite khat kiangah sum thalawh dingin pai-a, tuapa in amah a lo ah vok-an pia dingin a sawl hi.
Amah in vokte nek begapte duhgawh mahmah a, ahi hangin kuamah in bangmah a pia kei hi.
"Amah le amah a kiphawkkhiat ciangin, ‘Ka pa inn a sum thalawhte tampi in an khamval nei ding uh a, kei lah hih lai-ah ka puksi dektak hi!
Kei dingkhia ning ka pa kiangah ciah kikin: Pa aw, vantung le nangma tungah ka mawh zo hi.
Nang ta cih dingin ka kilawm nawn kei hi; na sum thalawhte khat bangin hong koih in ka ci ding hi,’ ci hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amah tho-a, a pa kiangah a ciah hi.

Ahi hangin inn pan gamlapi-a a om laitakin a pa in na galmuh-a, amah khuatuah mahmah ahi manin, a tapa delha pumkawi-in a nam hi.

"Ahi hangin a pa in a nasemte kiangah, ‘Manlang un! Puan a hoih pen hong la unla amah silhsak un. A khutme ah zungbuh bunsak unla khedap zong bulhsak un.
Bawngno vakthau pen hong paipih unla go un. Pawipi bawlin lawm ni.
Ahang in, hih a si khinsa ka tapa tu-in hing kik zo hi; a mangsa hi-a tu-in kimu kik hi,’ ci hi. Tua ahi ciangin amaute in a lawm uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin amah in nasemte khat sama, ‘Bang kihih ahi hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.
Amah in, ‘Na sanggampa hong ciah ta a, cidam ludamtakin na pa kiang hong tung kik ahi manin na pa in amah bawngno vakthau pen gawh hi,’ ci hi.
"A u pa heh a inn sungah a lut nuam kei hi. Tua ahi ciangin a pa pusuakin amah va zol hi.

Ahi hangin amah in a pa kiangah, ‘Ngaihsun in! Kum hi tan vei nang adingin sila-na ka sema, nong thupiakte ka mang lo ngei peuhmah kei hi. Tua hi napi ka lawmte tawh ka lop nadingin keelno khat nangawn nong pia ngei kei hi.
Ahi hangin na neihsa teng numei kizuakte tawh a zatmang khit cianga inn hong zuan hih na tapa, bawngno vakthau pen na gawh tazen hi!’ ci hi.
"A pa in, ‘Ka ta aw, nang le kei i omkhawm dena, ka neih khempeuh nang aa ahi hi.
Ahi hangin na sanggampa a si khinsa tu-in hong hing kika, a mangsa tu-in kimu kik ahi manin nuamin i lop a kul hi,’ ci hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Jesu in a nungzuite kiangah, "Khatvei mihau khat om a, sungtapipa in a pu neihsa teng a zat beisak hi, ci-in kingawh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a pu in amah sama, ‘Nang thu ka zak bang thu ahi hiam? Ka sungtapipa hi thei nawn lo ding na hi manin na sum ciamtehna hong lak dih in,’ ci hi.
"Sungtapipa in a lungsim sungah, ‘Tu-in bang cih ding ka hi hiam? Ka pu in ka nasepna pan hong tawpsak ding hi. Lei to dingin lah ka hat nawn kei a, khut dawha nget ding lah ka maizum hi.
Hih lai-a ka nasep ka tan ciangin mite in a innuah kei hong san theih nadingun ka hih ding ka thei ta hi,’ ci hi.
"Tua ahi ciangin amah in a pu tunga leibate a banbanin a sam hi. Amah in a masa pen kiangah, ‘Ka pu tungah bangzah na ba hiam?’ ci-in dong hi.

Sungtapipa in ama kiangah, ‘Na leiba lai va la inla, tu mengmeng in zali in bawl in,’ ci hi.

"A pu in a simtat nasempa geelsiam mahmah ahi manin a phat hi. Ahang in, khuavak sunga om mite sangin hih leitung mite in amaute kibatpihte tawh kizop zia ah a geelsiam zaw uh hi.
Ken kong geninah, leitung hauhnate lawm ngah nadingin na zang un; tua hileh a bei ciangin tawntung tenna ah note hong kimuak ding hi.
"Tawmcik tunga muanhuaite tampi tungah kimuang thei dinga, tawmcik tunga muanhuai lote tampi tungah zong a muanhuai kei ding hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note leitung hauhna kem dingin na muanhuai kei uh leh hauhna taktak kem dingin kua in hong muang ding ahi hiam?
Midang khatpeuh neihsa tungah na muanhuai kei uh leh no neihsa ding kua in hong pia ding ahi hiam?

"Kuamah in to nih na a sem khawm thei kei hi. Khat itin khat a mudah hiam, khat beelin a khat a simmawh hiam, khat zawsang hi ding hi. Pasian na le Sum na, na sem khawm thei kei ding uh hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Sum iplah Pharisee-te in hih thu a zak uh ciangin Jesu a zahpih uh hi.
Amah in amaute kiangah, "Note, mite mitmuh ah dik na kitansak uh hangin Pasian in na lungtangte uh a thei hi. Mite in manpha a sak mahmah nate Pasian muhna-ah kihhuai hi.
"John hun masiah Thukham le Kamsangte a kitangko hi. Tua khita kipan, Pasian gam lungdamna-thu kihilhin, tua sungah thahatthu-in mikim a lut gawp hi.
Thukham panin a mal themcik khat a mawk maiman sangin van le lei a mawk maiman ding a baihzaw ding hi.
"A zi ma a numei dang khat a tenpih peuhmah, angkawmpa suak a, a kimasa numei a tenpih peuhmah angkawmpa a suak hi.
"Khatvei sumhaupa khat a om hi; tuapa in puan dupsan le saihadial puan silh a, nisimin noptatin a om hi.
A kongpi gei-ah meima in a pumtuam Lazarus min nei khutdawh-a ngen khat kikoih hi.
Amah in sumhaupa sabuai pana kia an-nengte a lunggulh hi. Uite nangawn pai-in ama meimate a liahsak uh hi.
"Tua khutdawh-a ngenpa a sih ciangin vansawltakte in Abraham kiangah a puak uh hi. Sumhaupa zong si-a, a kivui hi.
Amah gentheipi-a a omna mun hell a
Tua ciangin amah sama, ‘Pa Abraham aw, kei hong hehpih in. Hih mei sungah gimna nakpi in ka thuak hi. Lazarus in a khutme dawn tui diahin ka leii hong votsak dingin hong sawl in,’ ci hi.

"Ahi hangin Abraham in, ‘Ka ta aw, na nuntak hun sungin na hoihte na ngah a, tua laitakin Lazarus in na hoih lote a ngah hi, cih phawk in. Ahi hangin tu-in amah hih lai-ah nuamsa a, nang na hileh gimna na thuak hi.

Amah mah le a tate, a tuuhonte, a ganhonte in a dawnna uh, hih tuikhuk hong piapa ka pa uh Jacob sangin lianzaw na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Hih tui a dawnte peuhmah a dangtak kik ding hi;
ahi hangin kei piak tui a dawn mi peuhmah a dangtak ngei nawn kei ding hi. Ken ka piak tui, ama sungah tuinak suakin nuntak tawntungna dongin a phulto taktak ding hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Numei in ama kiangah, "Sia aw, ka dangtak nawn loh nading le hih muna tui khai-a ka pai nawn loh nadingin, tua tui kei hong pia in," a ci hi.
Amah in tuanu kiangah, "Pai-in na pasal va sam inla, hong pai kik in," a ci hi.
Amah in, "Pasal ka nei kei hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in, "Pasal ka nei kei hi, na cih amaan hi,
a taktakin pasal nga na nei zo a, tu-a na neih pa pen na pasal a hi kei hi. Tu-a na gen pak maan mahmah hi," a ci hi.
Numei in, "Sia aw, kamsang khat na hilam ka thei thei hi.
Ka pate un hih mualtungah bia uh a, ahi hangin no Jew-te in: Jerusalem bekah kibia thei hi, na ci se uh hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Numei aw, kei hong um in. Hih mual tung ahi a, Jerusalem ah ahi zongin Pa na biak loh hun uh hong tung ding hi.
No Samaria mite in na theih lohpi uh na bia uh hi; kote in ka theih uh ka bia uh hi. Ahang in, hotkhiatna, Jew-te pan ahi hi.
Ahi hangin a bia taktakte in a kha le thutak a, Pa a biak hun uh hong tung ding tham loin tu-in a tung zo hi, ahang in, tua banga biate bek Pa in a zong hi.
Pasian in kha ahi hi. Amah a biate in kha le thutakin a bia pelmawh ding uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua numei in, "Tua Messiah (Christ kici) hong pai ding cih ka thei hi. Amah hong pai ciangin eite tungah na khempeuh hong telgen ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, "Amah pen tu-a nang hong hopih pa ka hi hi," a ci hi.

Tua khit phetin a nungzuite tung kik uh a, numei tawh a kiho a muh uh ciangin lamdang a sa uh hi. Ahi hangin khat beek in, "Bang deihna hiam?" ahikeh "Bang hang tuanu hopih na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong kei uh hi.
Tua ciangin tua numei in tuibel nusia in khuapi sungah pai kik a, mite kiangah,
"Hong pai un, ka hihsa khempeuh kei tunga hong genpa khat hong en un. Hih pa Christ f
Amaute khuapi panin paikhia uh a, ama lam a zuan uh hi.
Tua kalin a nungzuite in, "Rabbi aw, bang khatpeuh ne in," ci-in a sawl uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in amaute kiang ah, "A thu bangmah na theih loh uh an nek ding ka nei hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin a nungzuite in, "Mi khatpeuh in an na puak zo hi ve maw?" a kici uh hi.
Jesu in, "Kei hong sawlpa deihna bang sep ding le tua nasep ka zawh ding, ka an ahi hi," a ci hi.
"Note in, ‘tu zawh kha li ciangin an lak hun ta ding hi,’ ci hi lo na hi uh hiam? Note kong hilh hi, khuadakin lote en dih un! Ante min khin in lak hun ta hi.
Tu nangawn in buh atpa in thaman a sang hi. A vawh pa le a at pa a lungdam khawm theih nadingin tu nangawnin tawntung nuntakna ading an a la hi.
‘Mi khat in vawh a, midang khat in a at hi,’ kici in thumaan ahi hi.
Na sep loh uh at dingin note kong sawl hi. Midangte in nakpi-in na sem uh a, amau sep gah note in na at uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua numei in, "Ka hih ngeisa khempeuh hong gen hi," ci-a teci a panna hangin tua khuapi a Samaria mite tampi in amah a um uh hi.
Tua ciangin Samaria mite ama kiangah pai-in amaute kiangah a taam nadingin kho uh a, ni nih a taam hi.
Ama thugente hangin thu-um tampi a kibehlap hi.
Amaute in tua numei kiangah, "Nang hong genna hang bek-a um ka hi nawn kei uh a, ko mahmah in tu-in ka za uh a, hih mipa, leitung Honpa taktak hi, cih ka thei uh hi," a ci uh hi.
A ninih ni khit ciangin Galilee zuanin a pai hi.
(Jesu mahmah in, kamsangpa in ama gamah pahtawina ngah lo hi, cih a kawkkhia khin hi.)
Galilee ah a tun ciangin Galilee mite in amah a na muak uh hi. Amaute, Jerusalem a Paisan Pawi hun sungin va om kha uh ahi manin a hihsate khempeuh a mu zo uh hi.
Tui, lenggahzu a suahsakna mun Galilee gam Cana ah khat vei va hawh kik hi. Tua lai-ah kumpi nasem ulian khat oma, a tapa Capernaum ah cina-in a lum hi.
Hih pa in, Judea panin Galilee ah Jesu tung zo cih a zak ciangin ama kiangah va pai a, a si dektak a tapa a va damsak nadingin a thum hi.
Jesu in ama kiangah, "No mihingte in na lamdang le a lamdangte na muh loh ngalun na um ngei kei ding uh hi," ci-in a gen hi.
Tua kumpi nasem ulianpa in, "Sia aw, ka ta a sih ma-in hong paisuk in" a ci hi."
Jesu in, "Pai lel in, na tapa nungta ding hi," a ci hi.
Tuapa in Jesu thugen muangpah a, a paikhia hi.
Amah lamkal ah a om laitakin a nasemte in a tapa nungta hi, cih thu tawh amah a na dawn uh hi.
Amah in a tapa noptuam hun a kan ciangin amaute in, "Zanni a nai sagihna hunin nattun a dam hi," a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, "Na tapa a nungta ding hi," a cih hun lian hi, cih a pa in a thei hi. Tua ciangin amah le a innkuanpihte in a um uh hi.
Hih pen Judea pan Galilee ah Jesu, tun zawh nalamdang a bawl a nihna ahi hi.
Tua nung a sawt loin Jew-te pawi sim dingin Jerusalem ah Jesu a paito hi.
Jerusalem a, Tuu kongpi kici kiangah Aram pau-a Bethsaida a
Hih munah a lumden mittawte, khebaite, pumzawte, mipoi tampi a om uh hi. b
A hunhunin Topa vansawltak kumsukin tui va lok zelzel hi. Tua tui a tat ciangin a kidiah masa penpen a cinatna peuhpeuh a dam hi. c
Tuate lakah kum sawm-thum-le-giat sung a zawngkhal khat a om hi.
Jesu in tuapa mu-a, tua munah tua bangin sawtveipitak lum hi, cih thei-in a kiangah, "Na dam nuam hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Tua mi zawngkhalpa in, "Sia aw, tui a tat ciangin, tui sungah hong diah ding kuamah ka nei kei hi. Kidiah dinga ka kithawi ciangin kei ma-ah midang khat na kidiah khin zel hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in ama kiangah, "Ding in, na phek la inla pai in," a ci hi.
Tuapa thakhatin dampah-a a phek la-in a pai hi.
Hih thupiang Sabbath ni khat ahi hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin Jew-te in a kidam sakpa kiangah "Sabbath ni ahi hi, thukham in phek na puak ding kham hi," a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin amah in, "Kei hong damsakpa in ka kiangah, ‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, "‘Na phek la inla pai in,’ hong ci kua hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Tua lai-a om mihonte lakah Jesu lutmangpah ahi manin a cidampa in a damsakpa kua hiam, cih a thei kei hi.
Tua nung ciangin Jesu in amah biakinnpi ah mu a, "En in, na dam kik hi, mawhna na bawl nawn kei in, tua hikeileh nang tungah a siazaw hong tung kha ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua mipa paikhia-a, Jew-te kiangah amah a damsakpa Jesu ahilam a gen hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in hih nate Sabbath ni-a sem ahi manin Jew-te in amah a bawlsia uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Ka pa in tuni mahmah dongin na sem tawntunga, kei zong ka sem hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in Sabbath ni a tan loh man bek hi loin Pasian nangawn ama Pa a cihna hang le Pasian tawh a kikim-a a kikoihna thute hangin Jew-te in amah thah ding a hanciam semsem uh hi.

Jesu in amaute hih in a dawng hi: "Thutak kong geninah, Tapa in amah guakin bangmah a hih thei kei hi; a Pa hih a muhsate bek hih thei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh, Pa hih peuhpeuh Tapa in zong a hih hi.
Ahang in, Pa in Tapa it-a a hih khempeuh amah a lak hi. Himah hi, lamdang na sak dingun hihte sanga a lamdangzaw nangawn a lak lai ding hi.
Ahang in, Pa in misite nuntakna pia-in a thawhkiksak bangin Tapa in zong a piak nop mite tungah nuntakna a pia hi.
Tua banah, Pa in kuama tungah thu a khen kei hi, ahi hangin thukhenna khempeuh Tapa tungah a ap hi;
tua pen mi khempeuh in Pa a pahtawi bangin Tapa a pahtawi nading uh ahi hi. Tapa a pahtawi lote in amah a sawlpa, Pa pahtawi lo ahi hi.
"Thutak kong geninah, ka thugen za a, kei hong sawlpa a um peuh in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi; a kimawhpaih kei ding hi. Amah in sihna kantanin nuntakna ah tung zo hi.
Thutak kong geninah, misite in Pasian Tapa aw a zak hun hong tung dinga, tu-in zong hong tung zo hi; a zate a nungta ding hi.
Ahang in, Pa in amah mah-a nuntakna a neih bangin Tapa in zong amah mah-a nuntakna a neih nadingin a pia zo hi.
Amah Mihing Tapa ahi manin thukhen nading thuneihna amah in pia zo hi.
"Hih thu lamdang sa kei un, ahang in, amau han sunga omte in ama aw za in,
hong paikhiat hun hong tung dinga, a hoih a nasemte a nungta dingin tho ding uh hi. A tatsiate kimawhpaih dingin tho ding uh hi.
Kei thu guakin bangmah ka hih thei kei hi. Ka zak bangin thu ka khen hi.Tua ahi ciangin ka thukhenna atang hi. Ahang in, kei lungkim nading zong loin kei hong sawlpa lungkimna ka zong zaw hi.
"Kei thu ah kei le kei teci kipang leng, ka teci panna a kip kei ding hi.
Kei hong angvan teci pang midang khat om hi, kei thu teci panna a kip hi, cih ka thei hi.
"Note in John kiangah na kansak zo uh hi. Amah in thutak teci a pang hi.
Mihing teci panna ka sang hi, ka cihna hi loin note in hotkhiatna na ngah theih nadingun ka gen hizaw hi.
John pen meivak hi-a a kuang in khua a vaksak hi. Ama khuavak ah hun khat sung nopsak ding na teel uh hi.
"John teci panna sanga thugik zaw ka nei hi. Ahang in, Pa in zawh khit dinga hong piak tua ka nasep pen Pa in kei hong sawl ahina teci ahi hi.
Kei hong sawlpa Pa mahmah in kei tawh kisai teci a pang hi. Note in a aw na za ngei kei uh a, a mel zong na mu ngei kei uh hi.
Ama sawlpa um lo na hi manun a thu zong note sungah a teng kei hi.
Laisiangtho simna hangin nuntak tawntungna a kinei sa na hi manun limtakin na sin a
Tua hi napi nuntakna ngah dingin kei kiangah nong pai nuam kei uh hi.
"Mite hong phatna ka sang kei hi.
Ahi hangin note kong thei hi. Note lungsungah Pasian itna na neih loh uh ka thei hi.
Ka Pa minin kong pai-a, note in nong sang kei uh hi. Ahi hangin midang khat ama minin hong pai leh, amah na sang ding uh hi.
Note khat le khat kiphatna kisangin, Pasian khat bek b
"Ahi hangin Pa mai-ah note hong mawhsak dingin hong ngaihsun kei un. Note hong mawhsak, na lametna uh a kingakna pa Moses ahi hi.
Moses in kei thu gelh zo ahi manin amah na up uh leh kei zong nong up ding uh ahi hi.
Ahi zongin ama gelhsate na up loh nung sangun kei gente bangci up thei ding na hi uh hiam?" a ci hi.
Tua nung ciangin Galilee Tuipi (tua pen Tiberias tuipi) galkhat lam pekah Jesu a galkah hi.
Mihon tampi in cinate tunga a hihsa lim lamdangte mu uh ahi manin amah a zui uh hi.
Tua ciangin mual pangah Jesu paito-a a nungzuite tawh a tu hi.
Jew-te Paisan Pawi hun a nai ta hi.
Jesu a daktoh leh ama lam zuana pai mihonpite a mu hi. Philip kiangah, "Hih mihonpite nek ding an koi-ah i lei ding hiam?" a ci hi.
Amah in a hih ding a lungsim sungah theikhol khin napi a zia-et nop manin a dot ahi hi.
Philip in, "Hih teng in kam khat ciat a nek ding uh kha giat thaman c
A nungzui dangte khat, Simon Peter sanggampa Andrew in,
"Hih lai-ah naupangno khat in mangbuh ham lum nga le ngasa neu nih a nei hi. Ahi zongin mihing hizah in bang tham a ne ding uh ahi hiam?" a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Mipite na tusak un," a ci hi. Tua munah lopa a tam hi. A tu mi peuhmah tul nga bang a pha hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in anlum la a, lungdam ko-in a tu mihonpite lakah a duh zahzah uh a luisak hi. Tua mah bangin ngasa zong a hih hi.
Amaute in a duh zahzah uh a nek khit pikpek uh ciangin a nungzuite kiangah, "Khamval themte khawm kik un. A thelthang khat beek omsak kei un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin mangbuh ham lum nga a nete in a khamval uh athem a khop uh leh bawmta sawm le nih a pha hi.
Jesu nalamdang bawl mite in a muh khit uh ciangin, "Hih pa, leitunga hong pai ding Kamsangpa hi takpi hi," a ci pan uh hi.
Amaute in zawhthawh thu-in Jesu, kumpi-in koih nuam uh ahilam Jesu in a theih ciangin mual tungah a kihem khia hi.
Nitak ciangin a nungzuite tuilipi ah paisukin,
gunkuang ah tuang uh a, tuilipi kantanin, Capernaum lamah a galkah uh hi. Tua hunin khua mial ta-a, Jesu lah a mau kiang a tung nai kei hi.
Huih khauh nunga, tui nakpi-in a kilok hi.
Amaute in tai thum ahikeh tai thum le alang d
Ahi hanign amaute kiangah, "Keimah ka hi hi, lau kei un," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in gunkuang sungah amah tuangsak nuam uh a, tua khit phetin a manawhna uh tuigei-ah gunkuang a tung pah hi.
A zing ciangin tuilipi galkhat-a om mihonpite in, gunkuang khat bek tua lai-ah om a, Jesu lah a nungzuite tawh tuang khawm loin amauteng guak a pai uh a thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin Tiberias pan gunkuang pawlkhat va pai-a, Topa in lungdam a koh khit ciangin anlum a nekna mun kiang uh, mun khatah a khawlsak uh hi.
Mihonpite in Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah a om loh lam a theih uh ciangin gunkuang tungah tuang leuleu uh a, Jesu zong dingin Capernaum ah a pai uh hi.
Tuilipi galkhatah amah a muh uh ciangin amaute in, "Rabbi aw, cik-a hihtak tung na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in thutak kong geninah, lim lamdang na muh manun kei hong zong na hi kei uh a, anlum ne in na gilvah manun kei hong zong na hi uh hi.

A sia thei an ngah nadingin na na sep uh sangin Mihing Tapa hong piak ding, nuntak tawntungna donga kimang ding an ngah nadingin sem zaw un. Pa Pasian in amah a sanna ciamtehna ama tungah a koih zo hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, "Pasian deih na ka sep nadingun bang hih kul ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Jesu in, "Ama hong sawlpa up ding, Pasian’ na sepna ahi hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin amaute in, "Tua ahileh ka muh uh cianga nang kong up theih nadingun lim lamdang bang nong lak ding hiam? Bang hih ding na hi hiam?
‘Amah in vantung panin amaute nek ding anlum a pia hi,’ a
Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Thutak kong geninah, vantung pana anlum hong pia Moses hi lo hi. Vantung pana anlum taktak hong pia, ka Pa ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian anlum ahileh vantung pan hong paisuk in, leitung khempeuh nuntakna a piapa ahi hi," a ci hi.
Amaute in, "Sia aw, tu-a kipan tua anlum ko hong pia in," a ci uh hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in telgen a, "Kei mah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi. Kei kianga hong paite a gilkial ngei kei dinga, kei hong umte a dangtak ngei kei ding hi.
Ahi hangin kong gensa bangin note in hong mu khin napi nong um kei lai uh hi.
Ka Pa hong piakte khempeuh ka kiangah hong pai dinga, ka kianga hong pai khempeuh ka hawlkhia ngei kei ding hi.
Ahang in, kei deih bang sem ding hi loin kei hong sawlpa deih banga sem dingin vantung pan kong paisuk hi.
Kei hong sawlpa deih na ahileh, kei hong piak khempeuh khat zong mansuah lo a, nitawp ni ciangin amaute ka thawhsak ding ahi hi.
Ahang in, ka Pa deihna ahileh Tapa mu a, amah a um peuhpeuh in nuntak tawntungna nei-a, ni nunung ni ciangin amah ka thawhsak ding ahi hi," a ci hi.
Amah in, "Vantung pana hong pai suk anlum ka hi hi," a cihna hangin Jew-te in amah a phunsan uh hi.
Amaute in, "A nu le a pa i theih mahmah Joseph tapa Jesu hi lo hiam. Bangci a, ‘Vantung pana hong paisuk ka hi’ ci thei ahi hiam?" a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, "Note phun zelzul nawn kei un.
Kei hong sawlpa, Pa in a huai lohte khat beek kei kiangah hong pai thei lo dinga, hong paite lah ni nunung ni ciangin ka thosak ding hi.
Kamsangte laibu sungah, ‘Pasian in amaute khempeuh a hilh ding hi,’ b
Pasian kiang pana hong pai mi khat longal Pa a mu ngei a om kei hi. Amah bek in Pa a mu zo hi.
Thutak kong geninah, a um mi in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi.
Keimah, nuntakna anlum ka hi hi.
Na pute na pate un gamlak ah manna a nek uh hangin a si thei lai veve uh hi.
Ahi hangin mite in ne-a, a sih theih nawn lohna uh vantung pana hong paisuk anlum hih lai-ah a om hi.
Keimah in vantung pana hong pai a nungta anlum ka hi hi. Mi khat in hih anlum a nek leh a nungta tawntung ding hi.Hih anlum in leitung buppi nuntak nadinga ka piak ding ka sa ahi hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jew-te in, "Hih pa in i nek dingin a sa bang hong ci piak theih ding hiam?" ci-in nakpi-in a kinial uh hi.
Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Thutak kong geninah, Mihing Tapa a sa ne-a, a si na dawn kei uh leh note sungah nuntakna na nei kei ding uh hi.
Ka sa ne a, ka si a dawn peuhmah in nuntak tawntungna a nei hi. Ni nunung ni ciangin tua mi ka thokiksak ding hi.
Ahang in, ka sa, an taktak hi-a ka si dawn ding taktak ahi hi.
Ka sa ne a ka si a dawn peuhmah kei sungah tenga, ama sungah kei ka teng hi.
A nungta Pa in kei hong sawl-a, Pa hangin kei ka nuntak bangin kei-a kivak peuhmah kei hangin a nungta ding hi.
Hih in Vantung pana hong kumsuk anlum ahi hi. Na pute na pate un manna ne uh a, a si veve uh hi; ahi hangin hih anlum-a kivakte a nungta tawntung ding hi," a ci hi.
Hih thu, Capernaum a synagogue ah thu a hilh laitaka a gen ahi hi.
A nungzuite tampi in hih thu a zak uh ciangin, "Hih in a khauh thuhilhna ahi hi. Kua in sang thei ding hiam?" a ci uh hi.
Hih thu ah a nungzuite phun uh cih a theih ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Hih thu in no hong dong ahi hiam?
Note in Mihing Tapa ama-a a omna munah a kahtoh mu le uh cin, bang na ci tazen uh tam!
Kha in nuntakna a pia hi, ci-le-sa bangmahin kimang lo hi. Note tunga kong gen thute kha c
Ahi zongin note lakah a um lo na om lai uh hi," a ci hi. Ahang in, Jesu in a kipatcilin amaute kua teng in um lo dinga, kua in lehhek ding cih a thei khol khin hi.
Amah in a gen ban zom lai-a, "Pa in a hihtheihsakte longal kuamah ka kiangah hong pai thei lo hi, ka cihna ahang hih ahi hi," a ci hi.
Hih huna kipan a nungzui mi tampi nunghei-in amah a zui nawn kei uh hi.
Jesu in Sawm-le-nihte kiangah, "No zong kei nong taisan nuam uh hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Simon Peter in, "Topa ko kua kiang ah pai ding ka hi uh hiam? Nangmah in nuntak tawntungna thu na nei hi.
Pasian’ Mi Siangtho na hi cih kong um uh a, kong thei uh hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu in, "No, Sawm-le-nihte hong teel khin hi lo ka hi hiam? Hi napi note lak nangawn ah khat, dawi mangpa ahi hi!" ci-in a dawng hi.
(Sawm-le-nihte lakah khat ahi hanga a nung cianga a lehhek ding pa Simon Isacariot tapa Judas a genna ahi hi.)
Hih teng khit ciangin Jew-te in Jesu thah sawmin tua munah a ngak uh ciangin Judea pan kihemkhia-in Galilee kim tengah a vak kawikawi hi.
Ahi hangin Jew-te Biakbuk Pawi hun nai ta a,
Jesu sanggamte in, "Na nungzuite in nalamdang na bawlte a muh theih nadingun hih mun nusia in Judea ah na pai ding kilawm hi.
Tangpi theih tham mi a hi nuam peuhmah in a simthamin na a sem ngei kei hi. Hih nate hih na hi nungsang, leitung mite mai-ah kilakkhia in,"a ci uh hi.
Ahang in, ama sanggamte nangawn in amah a um kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Jesu in amaute kiangah, "Kei ading hun hoih a tung nai kei hi. No adingin hun khempeuh a hun ahi hi.
Leitung in no hong mudah thei kei ding hi. Ahi hangin a gamtat hoih lote lakkhia ka hi manin kei hong mudah hi.
Tua Pawi va sim un. Kei hun tung nai lo ahi ciangin tua Pawi simin ka pai nai a
Hihte a gen khit ciangin Galilee ah a taam lai hi.
Ahi zongin a sanggamte in pawi sim dinga a paisan khit uh ciangin mipite theih lohin amah zong va paisim hi.
Pawi bawlna phualah Jew-te in amah kan uh a, "Tua mipa koi-ah om hiam?" ci-in a dong uh hi.
Mihonpite lakah ama thu kihuausim uh a, a kizel thang hi. Pawlkhatte in, "Amah mi hoih hi," a ci uh hi.
Adangte in, "Hi kei, amah’n mite a khem hi," a ci uh hi.
Ahi hangin Jew-te kihtakna hangin ama thu kuamah in mipi zakin a genkhia kei uh hi.
Pawi bawlna alang bang a kiman ciangin biakinnpi tualah Jesu paito in thuhilh a kipan hi.

Jesu in, "Philip aw, note tawh hih tanveitak ka omkhawm nangawnin kei hong thei nai lo na hi hiam? Kei hong mute peuhmah, Pa mu ahi hi. Bangci a, ‘Kote, Pa hong lak in,’ ci thei na hi hiam?
Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om cih um lo na hi hiam? Note kianga kong gen thute, kei thu beka, gen ka hi kei hi. Ka sunga a nungta Pa in ama na a sem hizaw hi.
Pa sungah kei ka om a, kei sungah Pa a om hi, ka cih ciangin kei hong um un. Tua ahikeh zong nalamdangte kitelsakna beek um un.
Thutak kong geninah, kei hong um mi peuhmah in ka sepsa pen mah a sem ding hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hihte sangin na lianzaw nangawn a sem ding hi.
Tapa in Pa tungah minthanna a puak theih nadingin kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka na sepsak ding hi.
Note in kei min suanga na khatpeuh nong nget uh leh kong sepsak ding hi.
"Kei nong it uh leh kong thupiak na mang ding uh hi.
Pa kiangah ka ngen dinga, amah in note tawh a omkhawm tawntung dingin Thukuppihpa dang khat -
Thutak Kha note hong pia ding hi. Leitung in amah thei ngei lo, mu zong mu ngei lo ahi manin a sang thei kei hi. Ahi zongin amah note tawh omkhawm a, note sungah om ding d
Tagahte bangin note kong nusia kei ding hi. No kiangah kong pai ding hi.
A sawt loin leitung in kei hong mu nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin no nong mu ding uh hi. Kei nungta ka hi manin note zong na nungta ding uh hi.
Tua ni ciangin kei ka Pa sungah om-in, kei sungah note na om uh a, note sungah kei ka om cih na theitel ding uh hi.
Ka thupiakte nei-a a mang peuhmah kei hong it ahi hi. Kei hong itte ka Pa in it dinga, kei zong amah it-in, ama tungah ka kilak ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Judas (Judas Iscariot lo pen) in, "Ahi hangin Topa aw, bang dinga kote kianga kilah sawm a, leitung mite kianga kilah sawm lo na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Mi khatpeuh in kei hong it leh ka hilhna a mang ding hi. Ka Pa in amah it dinga, ama kiangah ka pai ding uh a, amah tawh ka teng khawm ding uh hi.
Kei hong it lote in ka hilhna a mang kei ding uh hi. Hih na zak uh thute kei aa hi lo hi; kei hong sawlpa ka Pa aa ahi hi.
"Note tawh ka omkhawm lai-in hihte khempeuh kong gen khin zo hi.
Ahi hangin tua Thukuppihpa keima mina Pa in hong sawl ding tua Khasiangtho in na khempeuh hong hilh dinga, kong gensa khempeuh hong phawkkiksak ding hi.
Lemna note kong nusiat hi; ka lemna note kong pia hi. Leitung piak bangin note tungah kong pia kei hi. Na lungmang kei unla, na lau kei un.
"Note in, ‘Ka paimang dinga no kiangah kong pai kik ding hi,’ ka cih na za uh hi. Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin kei nong it uh leh na kipak ding uh hi. Ahang in, kei sangin Pa lianzaw hi.
Hih thu a pian cianga na up theih nadingun a pian ma-in no tungah tu-in kong gen hi.
Hih leitung ukpa hong pai ta ahi manin note tawh sawtveipi ka kiho nawn kei ding hi. Amah in kei bangmah hong cih zo kei hi.
Kei in Pa ka it a, ka Pa in kei hong thupiak bang tektekin ka sep lam leitung in a theih pelmawh kul hi.

Hong pai un; tu-in paikhia ni.
JHN.15.1	Keimah lenggui taktak ka hi-a, ka Pa, tua lo neipa ahi hi.
Kei sungah oma, a gah lo hiang peuhmah a sattan hi; a gah hiang peuhmah tam a gah zawk nadingin heuhin a hahsiang a
Note tungah kong gensa thu hangin na siang khin ta uh hi.
Keima sungah om un, note sungah ka om ding hi. Amah beka gah thei hiang a om kei hi. A guipi-ah a om pelmawh kul hi. Note zong keima sunga na om kei uh leh na gah thei kei ding uh hi.
"Keimah, lengguipi ka hi hi. Note hiangte na hi uh hi. Mi khat kei sungah oma, ama sungah kei ka om leh gah tampi a gah ding hi. Kei loin bangmah na hih thei kei uh hi.
Mi khatpeuh kei sungah a om kei leh amah, a kipaimang a vul hiang tawh kibang hi. Tua bang hiangte kitawmin mei sungah kikhula, a kangtum hi.
Kei sungah na om uh a, ka thute no sungah a om leh na ut peuhpeuh uh na ngen un; hong kipia ding hi.
Note in gah tampi na gah uh a, ka nungzuite na hina uh na lahna uh, ka Pa minthanna ahi hi.
"Ka Pa in kei hong itsa bangin note kong it zo hi. Tu-in ka itna sungah om un.
Ka Pa thupiakte manga ama itna sungah ka om bang tektekin, kong thupiakte na man uh leh ka itna sungah na om ding uh hi.
Ka lungnopna note sungah om a, note lungnopna a kicin theih nadingin hih thu kong gen zo hi.
Kong thupiak hih ahi hi: Note kong it bangin note khat le khat na ki-it thuk un.
A lawmte tang dinga a nuntakna a paai itna sanga itna lianzaw a nei kuamah om lo hi.
Ka thupiak na zuih uh leh ka lawmte na hi uh hi.
Silate in a pu nasep thei lo uh ahi manin note silate kong ci nawn kei hi, tua sangsikin ka Pa tung pana ka theih khempeuh note hong theisak khin ka hi manin lawmte kong ci ta hi.
Note in kei nong teel kei uh a, keimah in pai-a gah a gah tawntung dingin note kong teel hi. Tua ciangin ka min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh Pa in note hong pia ding hi.
Ka thupiak hih ahi hi: Khat le khat ki-it thuk un.
"Leitung in note hong muhdah leh, kei hong mudah masa hi, cih thei gige un.

Leitung aa na hi uh leh ama aa bangin note hong it ding hi. A taktak in leitung aa na hi kei uh hi. Keimah in leitung mite lak panin note kong teelkhia zo hi. Tua hangin leitung in note hong mudah hi.
Note tunga kong gensa thute ciamteh un: ‘A pu sanga lianzaw nasem kuamah a om kei hi.’ b
Ka min hangin amaute in note hih bangin hong bawl ding uh hi. Ahang in, amaute in kei hong Sawlpa a thei kei uh hi.
Amaute kiangah hong pai-in thu gen lo hi leng khialhna hanga a mawh a suak kei ding uh hi. Ahi zongin tu-in ahileh a mawhna uh paulap ding a nei kei uh hi.
Kei hong mudahte in ka Pa zong a mudah uh hi.
Amaute lakah kuama bawl loh va bawl kei leng, amaute khialhna hangin a mawh suak lo ding uh hi. Ahi hangin tu-in hih nalamdangte mu zo uh a, tua hi napi amaute in kei le ka Pa hong mudah khawm uh hi.
Ahi hangin hih in amaute thukham sunga kigelhsa: ‘Amaute in ahang om lopi-in kei hong mudah uh hi,’ c
"Pa kiang pana no kianga kong sawl ding, Pa kiang pana hong paikhia thutak Kha - Thukuppihpa hong pai ciangin kei tungtang thu teci a pang ding hi.
Note zong a cil a kipan kei tawh om khawm na hi uh ciangin teci na pang pelmawh ding uh hi.

Note in lam na khialh loh nadingun hihte khempeuh kong gen zo hi. 
JHN.16.2	 Amaute in synagogue panin hong hawlkhia ding uh hi. A taktakin, note hong that peuhpeuh Pasian nasem-a a kingaihsut hun hong tung ding hi. 
JHN.16.3	 Kei ka hi a, ka Pa ahi zongin hong thei lo uh ahi manin amaute in tua bangin a hih ding uh hi. 
JHN.16.4	 Ahun hong tun ciangin kong vauhilhsa ahilam na phawk nadingun hih thu kong gen hi. A cil-in note tawh omkhawm ka hi manin hih thu note kong hilh kei hi.
JHN.16.5	 Tu-in kei hong sawlpa kiangah ka pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin note khat beek in, ‘Koi-ah pai ding na hiam?’ ci-in nong dong kei uh hi.
Hih thute ka gen manin na dah lua uh hi.

Ahi hangin thutak kong geninah: Ka paikhiat note hoih nading ahi hi. Kei paikhia lo hileng Thukuppihpa no kiangah hong pai lo ding hi. Ahi zongin kei va paikhia leng, no kiangah amah kong sawl ding hi.
Amah hong pai ciangin mawhna, thumaanna le thukhenna thu ah, leitung a mawhna a
mawhna thu ah, mite in kei hong up loh hang uh ahi hi;
thumaanna thu ah, note in kei nong muh nawn loh nading uh mun Pa kiangah ka pai ding hang;
tua ciangin thukhenna thu ah, hih leitung ukpa tu-in a kimawhpaih laitak hang ahi hi.
"Tu-a na san zawh ding sangua tamzaw note kiangah gen ding ka nei hi.
Ahi hangin amah thutak Kha hong pai ciangin thutak khempeuh ah hong pi ding hi. Ama thu hong gen ding ahi kei hi. A zak thute bek gen dinga, hong piang lai ding thu note hong hilh ding hi.
Amah in kei kiang pan la-in note tungah hong theihsakna tawh kei hong minthangsak ding hi.
Pa aa khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Kha in kei aa pan la-in note tungah hong theisak ding ka cih tua hang ahi hi.
"Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi," a ci hi.

A nungzuite pawlkhat in, "‘Pa kiangah pai ding ka hi manin hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mu nawn kei ding uh hi; tua khit a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ a cih bang a cih nopna hi ding hiam?" ci-in a kidong uh hi.
Amaute in, "‘Hun tawm vei,’ a cih bang a cihna hi ding hiam, a thugen lah i tel zo peuhmah kei a?" ci-in a kidong lailai uh hi.

Jesu in amaute in hih thu dong nuam uh cih a theih ciangin, "‘Hun tawm vei khit ciangin kei nong mukha nawn kei ding uh hi, tua khit ciangin a sawt loin nong mu ding uh hi,’ ka cih ciangin ka cihnopna bang hiam cih khat le khat kidong na hi uh hiam?
Thutak kong geninah, leitung a lungdam laitakin note kapin na dah ding uh hi. Na lungkham ding uh a, ahi hangin na lungkhamna uh lungnopna a suak ding hi.
"Numei tasuak in tasuah hun tung ahi manin a na a thuak hi. Ahi hangin ta a suah khit ciangin leitungah ta khat suak ahi manin lungdamin a thuaknate a mangngilh hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong tu lai-takin na dah uh hi. Ahi zongin note kong mu kik dinga, na lungdam ding uh hi. Note lungdamna kuamah in hong sutkhia kei ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin kei, bangmah nong dong nawn kei ding uh hi. Thutak kong geninah, kei min suanga na nget peuhpeuh uh ka Pa in hong pia ding hi.
Tu hun dong kei min suangin bangmah na ngen nai kei uh hi. Ngen le uh cin na ngah ding uh a, tua ciangin na lungdamna uh a kim ding hi.
"Tehpih zanga thu kong gen khit hangin hih bang pau namte zanga kong gen loh hun hong tung ta hi. Ahi hangin ka Pa thu siangtaka kong gen hun hong tung ding hi.
Tua ni ciangin note in kei min suangin na ngen ding uh hi. Note tangin Pa kiangah kong ngetsak ding a ci ka hi kei hi.
Hi lo hi, Pa mahmah in note hong it hi, bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong it uh a, Pa kiang pana hong pai ka hilam na um uh hi.
Pa kiang panin kong pai-a, leitung ah kong lut khin zo hi; tu-in leitung nusia in Pa kiangah ka ciah kik ding hi," a ci hi.
Tua ciangin Jesu nungzuite in, "Tu-in tehpih zang loin kiteltakin na gen hi.
Tu-in ahileh na khempeuh na thei a, kuama hong dot nangawn a kul kei hi, cih ka thei ta uh hi. Nang, Pasian kiang pana hong pai na hilam hih in ko hong umsak ta hi," a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, "Hong um ta buang uh teh maw! b

Ahi hangin note na inn ciatuah na kikhenthang hun uh hong tung ding tham loin hong tung zo hi. Note in kei guak nong nusia ding uh hi. Ahi zongin ka Pa tawh om khawm ka hi manin kei guak ka hi kei hi.
Note in kei sungah lungnopna na ngah nadingun hih thute kong gen khin ta hi. Hih leitung ah note na lungmang ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kilungkhauhsak un! Leitung ka zo zo hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in hih teng a genkhit ciangin vantung lam entoin thu ngen a:

Pa aw, a hun tung zo hi. Na Tapa in nang hong minthansak theih nadingin, na Tapa minthangsak in. 
JHN.17.2	 Ahang in, amah na piaksa mi khempeuh tungah nuntak tawntungna a piak theih nadingin mi khempeuh tunga thuneihna amah na pia zo hi.

JHN.17.4	 Ka hih dinga nong piakte zawhsiangna tawh leitungah minthanna nang kong puak zo hi.

Tu-in amaute in kei nong piak khempeuh nang kiang pana hong pai ahilam thei ta uh hi.
Ahang in, kei nong piak thute, amaute ka pia-a, tuate a sang uh hi. Amaute in nang kiang pana pai ka hilam theitel uh a, nang kei nong sawl zong a um uh hi.
Amaute ading thu kong ngetsak hi. Leitung ading kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin nong piaksate ading kong ngen hi. Ahang in, amaute nang aa ahi uh hi.
Kei neih khempeuh nang aa hi-a, nang neih khempeuh kei aa ahi hi. Tua hi-a, amau tungtawnin minthanna ka ngah hi.

Leitung ah sawt ka om nawn kei ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute leitung ah om lai ding uh a, nang kiangah kei kong pai ding hi. A Siangtho Pa aw, nang le kei khat i hi bangin, amaute khat ahi theih nading un kei nong piaksa min - nangma min vangliatna tawh amaute hu in.
Amaute tawh ka omkhawm laitakin, nong piaksa min tawh amaute bittakin ka hu zo hi. Laisiangtho a tangtun nadinga a mang thang pa pen simloh khat beek ka mansuah kei hi.
"Tu-in nang kiangah kong pai ta ding hi. Ahi hangin amaute in amau sungah ka lungnopna a dim a neih theih nadingun leitung a ka om laitakin hih thute ka gen hi.
Amaute tungah na thu ka pia khin a, kei leitung aa ka hi lo bangin amaute zong leitung aa hi nawn lo uh ahi manin leitung in amaute a mudah hi.
Amaute leitung pan na lakkhiat ding kong ngen kei hi. Ahi hangin gilopa panin na hut ding kong ngen hi.
Kei, leitung aa ka hi lo bangin, amaute zong leitung aa hi lo uh hi.
Amaute thutak tawh siangthosak a
Leitungah kei nong sawl bangin, amaute leitungah ka sawl zo hi.
Amaute zong a siantho takpi nadingun keimah le keimah ka kisiangthosak hi.
"Amaute ading kia kong ngen kei hi. Amaute thupuakte tungtawn a kei hong um ding mite adingin zong kong ngen hi.

Pa aw, nang kei sungah na om a, kei nang sungah ka om bang tektekin amaute khat a suah theih nadingun kong ngen hi. Nang, kei nong sawl ahilam leitung in a up nadingin amaute zong ei sungah om uh hen.
Eite khat i hi mah bangin amaute zong khat ahi theih nadingun nong piaksa minthanna amaute ka pia zo hi.
Amaute sungah kei ka oma kei sungah nang na om hi. Nang, kei nong sawl le kei nong it bangin amaute na it cih leitung in a theih nadingin amaute kiciantakin pumkhat suak uh hen.
"Pa aw, nong piaksa mite ka omna-ah kei tawh a om khawm ding le nong it mana leitung piansak ma-a minthanna nong piak keima minthanna a muh ding uh ka deih hi.
"A thumaan Pa aw, leitung in nang hong thei kei zongin, ken nang kong thei-a, nang, kei nong sawl amaute in a thei uh hi.
Amaute tungah nang kong pulak zo-a, nangmah in kei nong itna amaute aa ahi theih nading le kei mahmah amaute sungah ka om theih nadingin kong pulak lai hi," a ci hi.
Jesu in thu a nget khit ciangin a nungzuite tawh tua mun nusia in Kidron Kuam a kantan uh hi. Tua kuam galkhatah Olive lo khat a om hi; tua lo sungah amah le a nungzuite a lut uh hi.
Jesu le a nungzuite tua lai-ah kituah pahpah uh ahi manin amah lehhekpa Judas in tua mun a thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Judas in, galkap pawlkhat le siampi makaite le Pharisee-te pana ulian pawlkhat makaih in lo sungah a va pai uh hi. Amaute in meisel, meivak le hiam a keng uh hi.
Jesu in ama tunga thu piang ding khempeuh thei khin a, paikhia-in amaute kiangah, "Kua deih na hi uh hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, "Nazareth mi Jesu," ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Jesu in, "Kei, amah ka hi hi," a ci hi. (Tua laitakin a lehhekpa Judas zong amaute lakah a ding hi.)
Jesu in, "Kei, amah ka hi hi," a cih ciangin amaute nungkin in lei-ah a puk uh hi.
Jesu in, "Kua deih na hi uh hiam?" ci-in amaute a dong kik hi.
Amaute in, "Nazareth mi Jesu," a ci uh hi.
Jesu in, "Kei, amah ka hi hi, ci-in kong gen zo hi. Kei hong zong na hi uh leh hih mite paisak un," ci-in a dawng hi.
"Nong piaksa mi khat beek ka mansuah kei hi," b
Tua ciangin namsau khat a nei Simon Peter in a namsau dokin tulpipa nasempa a sat leh a taklam bil a satkhia hi. (Tua nasempa min Malchus ahi hi.)
Jesu in Peter kiangah, "Na namsau paimang in. Pa hong piaksa hai dawn lo ding ka hi hiam?" ci-in thu a pia hi.
Tua ciangin galkap pawlkhatte le a makaipa uh tawh Jew-te uliante in Jesu a man uh hi. Amaute in amah hen uh a,
tua kuma tulpi a sem Caiaphas sungpa Anna kiangah a puak masa uh hi.
Caiaphas pen, mipite tangin mi khat si leh hoih ding hi, ci-a Jew-te tungah thuhilh pa ahi hi.
Simon Peter le nungzui dang khat in Jesu a nungzuih uh hi. Hih nungzuipa pen tulpipa meltheih ahi manin tulpipa huang sung dong Jesu tawh a tonkhawm hi.
Ahi zongin Peter in a pualam kongbiang ah a ngak hi. Tulpipa meltheih nungzuipa pai kika, nasem-a om nungak kiangah a gen ciangin huang sungah Peter a lutsak hi.
Kongkhak a nungaknu in Peter kiangah, "Nang hih mipa nungzui lakah khat hi lo na hia?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amah in, "Hi keng," ci-in a dawng hi.
Khuadam a, nasemte le uliante mei awi-in mei kimkotah a ding uh hi. Peter zong amaute lakah mei awi-in a ding hi.
Tua hun laitak, tulpipa in Jesu, a nungzuite le a hilh thute a dot laitak ahi hi.
Jesu in, "Leitung kiangah a lang tang in ka gen zo hi. Jew-te kikhopna ahi zongin synagogue-te le biakinnpi ah thu ka hilh tawntung hi. Ka sim gen bangmah a om kei hi.
Bang dinga kei hong dong na hi hiam? Ka thugen a zate dong in. Ka gensate thei mahmah uh hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Jesu in hih bang a cih ciangin a kianga om uliante laka khat in, "Tulpipa dawn nading hih bang maw?" ci-in a maitang a beng hi.
Jesu in, "Thu maan lo gen ka hileh ka khialhna hong gen in. Ahi hangin thutak gen ka hileh bang hanga hong beng na hi hiam?" ci-in a dawng hi.
Tua ciangin Annas in amah hensa mah in tulpi Caiaphas tungah a puak hi. a
Simon Peter mei awi-a a din laitakin, "Ama nungzui dang khat hi ngel ve teh aw?" ci-in amah kidong hi.
Amah in, "Hi keng," ci-in a nial hi.
Tulpipa nasemte laka Peter in a bil a satkhiatsak pa tanaute khat in, "Olive lo sungah amah le nang hong mu khawm hi lo ka hia?" ci-in a to hi.
Peter in nial kik leuleu a, tua hun laitakin ak a khuang hi.

Tua ciangin Jew-te in Caiaphas inn panin Rome-te ukpipa innpi ah Jesu a paipih uh hi. Tua hun zingsang tung ahi hi. Jew-te in Paisan Pawi ne thei nuam uh a, biakna ngeina palsat a, a nit loh nadingun kumpipa inn sungah a lut kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin amaute kiangah Pilate paikhia a, "Hih mipa na mawh matna uh bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, "Amah in tatkhialh na lian nei kei leh nang khut sungah kong tun kei ding uh hi," ci-in a dawng uh hi.
Pilate in, "Note mah in amah pai-pih unla, nomau thukham bangin thu khen un," a ci hi.
Jew-te in, "Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh tungah thu khena thah theih nading thu ka nei kei uh hi," ci-in a nial uh hi.
Bangci banga sihna thuak ding cih, Jesu in ama sih nading thu a genkholhna, a tangtun nadingin hih thu a piang ahi hi.
Tua ciangin innpi sungah Pilate lut kik a, Jesu samin thu donga, "Nang, Jew-te kumpipa na hi hiam?" a ci hi.
Jesu in, "Tua pen nang ngaihsut mah ahi hiam, ahikeh kei thu midang khatpeuh hong gen ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Pilate in, "Kei Jew mi ka hi hiam? Nang, kei khut sung hong tun na mipihte le na siampi makaite ahi hi. Nang bang hih na hi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Jesu in, "Kei kumpi gam hih leitung hi lo hi. Hi hileh, Jew-te hong matin ka nasemte in kei hong hutna un a do ding uh hi. Ahi hangin kei kumpi-gam mundang pan ahi hi," a ci hi.
Pilate in, "Nang, kumpi khat na hi maw leh!" a ci hi.

Jesu in, "Kei kumpi nong cih na maan hi. A taktakin, hih thu hangin ka suaka, hih thu hang mahin leitung ah kong pai-a thutak ah teci ka pang hi. Thutak lama pang peuhmah in ka thu a ngai uh hi," ci-in a dawng hi.
Pilate in, "Thutak bang ahi hiam?" ci-in a dong hi. Tua a cih kawmin Jew-te kiangah paikhia kik a, "Amah mawhsak nading thukho bangmah ka mu kei hi.
Ahi hangin Paisan-pawi hun ciangin note kiangah thongkia khat ka khah ding na ngeina uh ahi hi. ‘Jew-te kumpipa’ kong khah ding na deih uh hiam?" ci-in a dong hi.
Amaute in, "Hi lo, amah hi lo! Barabbas hong pia ou," ci-in a kiko kik uh hi. Barabbas ahileh kumpi langdona-a kihel khat ahi hi.
Tua ciangin Pilate in Jesu a satsak hi.
Galkapte in ling phekkhawmin kumpi lukhu phan uh a, a lu-ah a khusak uh hi. Amaute in kumpi puan dupsan silhsak uh a,

Perga ah thu a gen khit uh ciangin Attalia ah paisuk uh hi.
