Ahang in, note in na sim theih loh ding uh le na theihtel loh dingun bangmah kong gelh kei uh hi.

Tua ciangin note in kote a kim lo-a nong theihsa uh bangin Topa Jesu ni ciangin kote in note kong kisialhpih ding bangun note in zong kote hong kisialhpih thei ding ci-in a cingtaka na theihtel takpi ding uh ka lamen hi.
Hih mah ka muan manin nihvei na hamphat theih nadingun note kianga hawh masak dingin ka geel hi.
Macedonia a ka pai kawmin no kiangah hong hawhin, Macedonia pan kong ciah ciangin hong bang leuleu lenga, Judea ka manawh ciangin hong kha le uhcin ci-in ka geel hi.
Hici-a ka geel ciangin baihtaka geelziau ka hi hiam? Ahikeh lei mite hih bangin, Hihi, hihi," le "Hikei, hikei," cih a thuah lel ka hi hiam?
Ahi hangin Pasian a muanhuai takpi bangin kote in note tunga kong thupuak uh, "Hihi," le "Hikei," a hikhawm kei hi.
Ahang in, note lakah kei le Silas a
Ahang in, Pasian in bangzah ta in thuciam a bawl khin zongin tuate Christ sungah,"Hihi," cih ahi khin hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama tungtawnin Pasian minthan nadingin eite in, "Amen," i ci hi.
Tu-in Christ sungah note le kote kiptaka hong ding khawmsakpa Pasian ahi hi.
Amah in eite sathau hong nilh zo a, ama hong neihna seal eite tungah hong khenin, hong tung ding ciamna-in khamkholhna ama Kha eite lungsungah hong koihsak hi.
Corinth ah kong kileh kik lohna note kong dopna ahilam ka teci ding Pasian ka ko hi.
Note upna tunga kiliansak hi loin, note na upna hangun kiptaka ding na hi manun, na lungnop nadingun no tawh a semkhawm ka hizaw hi.
Tua ciangin note a dahsaka kong hawh nawn loh nadingin ka lungsim ka khensat hi.
Ahang in, note hong dahsak leng kong dahsak note longal kei hong nuamsak ding kua dang om ahi hiam?
Kong pai ciangin kei hong lungnuamsak dinga kilawmte in hong lungkhamsak loh nadingin hih bangin lai kong gelh hi. Kei lungnopna hong lungnoppih dingin note khempeuh tungah muanna ka nei hi.
Ahang in, note kong lungkhamsak nopna hi loin kong itna athukzia kong theihsak nopna-in lungdonna lianpi, lungsung natna le khitui tampi tawh lai hong gelh ka hizaw hi.
Ka uanggenna hi loin mi khatpeuh in lungkhamna a piansak leh note khempeuh hong lungkhamsakna zahin kei hong lungkhamsak lua kei hi.
Mi a tamzawte in ama tungah gawtna a piak uh ama adingin kicing khin hi.
Tu-in ahileh tua sangsikin amah a khengvala dahna in a vukcip loh nadingin maisakin na hehnep zawk ding uh kisam hi.
Tua ahi manin amah na itna uh kipsak kik dingin note kong kun hi.
Lai kong gelhna pen note in zia-etna thuak zo-in na khempeuh ah na thumang uh hiam, cih kong zia-etna ahi hi.
Note in mi khatpeuh na maisak uh leh kei zong amah ka maisak hi. A mawhna ka maisak khitin maisak ding dang a om lai leh note tangin Christ muhna ah
Satan in eite hong nopneh loh nadingin amah ka maisak hi. Ahang in, ama hong sawmnate i haih kei hi.
Troas ah Christ lungdamna-thu gen dingin ka pai lai-in Topa in kei ading kong khat hong honsak hi, cih thei napi,
tua lai-ah ka sanggampa Titus mu lo ka hi manin ka lung a nuam kei lailai hi. Tua ciangin amaute mangpha ka khaka, Macedonia ah ka paisuak hi.
Ahi zongin Christ hanga gualzawhna ah hong makaih den kote tungtawna ama theihna namtui mun khempeuh ah a kizelsakpa Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
Ahang in, a kihonkhiate le a mangthangte lakah kote, Pasian tungah gimnamtui ka hi uh hi.
Khat tungah sihna gimnam ka hi uh a, adang khat tungah nuntakna gimnamtui ka hi uh hi. Tua bang nasem dingin kua kicing ahi hiam?
Mi tampite tawh kibang loin met nadingin Pasian thu ka thangbawl kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin Pasian kiang pana kisawl mite bangin Pasian mai-ah cihtakna tawh Christ sungah thu ka gen uh hi.
Kote, ko le ko kiphat kik dinga kipan ka hi uh hiam? Ahikeh mi pawlkhatte bangin note tungah ahikeh note tung panin panpihna laite kisam ka hi uh hiam?
Note mahmah kote lungtang tunga kigelhsa, mi khempeuh in thei-a a sim uh lai na hi uh hi.

Note Christ tung pana lai na hi uh a, kote nasep gah, laitui tawh kigelh hi lo, a nungta Pasian Kha tawh a kigelh, suangpekte tungah hi lo, mihing lungtang pekte tunga kigelh lai na hina uh na lak uh hi.
Christ tungtawnin kote in Pasian mai-ah tua zahta kimuanna ka nei uh hi.
Na khatpeuh ko pana piang hi, ci-a ngaihsun dingin ko mahmah in kicinna ka nei kei uh hi. Kote kicinna Pasian tung pan hizaw hi.
Amah in kote lai-a gelh hi loin Kha in thukhun thak nasemte bangin hong kicingsak zo hi. Ahang in, lai gelh in that a, ahi hangin Kha in nuntakna a pia hi.
Tu-in sihna hong tun nasepna, tua suang tunga kigelhkuak laimalte a mual thei minthanna hi napi-in Israel-te in Moses maitang tangtaka a et theihloh zah a, minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh
Kha nasepna minthang zawtham lo ding ahi hiam?
Mihingte a mawhpaih nasepna minthang ahileh thumaanna hong tun nasepna nak minthan zaw ngel ve!
Ahang in, a minthang ngeisa in a minthang zaw tham tawh tehin tu-in minthanna a nei nawn kei hi,
A mual thei nangawn minthanna tawh hong tung ahileh a om den minthanna bangzahin a lianzaw tham tam!
Tua ahi manin tua bang lametna ka neih khit nungsangun ka hang mahmah uh hi.
Kote ka hi uh leh a maitanga a vangtannate a mual hiaihiai lam Israel-te in a muh loh nadinga a maitang puan a khuhpa Moses bang ka hi kei uh hi
Ahi hangin amaute lungsim kimawlsaka tuni dongin thukhun lui a kisim ciangin tua khuhna puan mah a om lai hi. Christ tungtawnin kilakhia thei bek ahi manin a kihawkkhiatsak nai kei lai hi.
Tuni dong nangawnin Moses laite a kisim ciangin khuhna puan in amaute lungtang a khuh lai hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh Topa lamah a kihei peuhpeuh ciangin khuhna puan a kihawkkhia ahi hi.
Tua Topa pen tua Kha hi-a, Topa Kha a omna ah suahtakna a om hi.
Maitang kikhuh lo-a Topa minthanna a tang sawnsak a
Tua ahi manin kote in Pasian lainatna tungtawna hih nasep ka neih khit nungsangun ka lungkia kei uh hi.

Tua sangin a simtham le a zumhuai-a gamtatnate ka tawpsan uh hi. Khem bawlnate zang loin Pasian thu zong ka lehkaih kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin tua thutak teltakin ka pholak uh a, Pasian mitmuh ah mi khempeuh lungsim tawh kituakin ka om zaw uh hi.
Tua ciangin ko gen lungdamna-thu a kikhuh leh zong a mangthangte adinga kikhuh hi lel hi.
Pasian lim a hipa Christ minthanna lungdamna-thu khuavak a muh theih loh nadingun a um lote lungsim mit hih khanghun pasian in a tawsak hi.
Ahang in, kote in ko thu ka gen kei uh a, Jesu Christ Topa a hina le Jesu hanga note nasem ka hina uh ka genzaw uh hi.
Ahang in, "Khuamial lak panin khuavak tang hen," b
Ahi hangin na khempeuh sanga lianzaw, a vangliatna kote tung pan hi lo Pasian tung pan a hina a kilat nadingin hih gou, leibeelte sungah ka nei uh hi.
Kote ka kimkot panun nakpi-in hong kinehcih hangin netkhapin ka om kei uh hi; amkhamin ka om uh hangin lung mangin ka om kei uh hi;
bawlsiatin ka om uh hangin taihsatin ka om kei uh hi; hong kisattuk hangin hong kisusia kei hi.
Kote pum tungah Jesu nuntakna zong a kilaak theih nadingin kote pumpi ah Jesu sihna ka pua kawikawi uh hi.
Ahang in, a si thei kote pumpi tungah ama nuntakna a kilat theih nadingin a nungta kote, Jesu hanga si dingin piakkhiatsa in ka om tawntung uh hi.
Tua ahi tak ciangin kote sungah sihna in na sem a, ahi hangin note sungah nuntakna in na a sem hi.
"Ka um hi; tua ahi manin ka gen zo hi" c
Bang hang hiam cih leh misi pana Topa Jesu a thosakpa in Jesu tawh kote hong thosak khawm dinga, ama omna ah kote tawh note hong tunkhawm ding hi, cih ka thei uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh note phattuam nading hi-a, mi a tam semsemte kianga tung, tua hehpihna in Pasian minthan nading lungdamkohna a dimlet a piansak theih nading ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ka lungkia kei uh hi. Ka pualam uh a kiamkiam hangin ka sunglam uh a ni a ni-in hong kithak suaksak hi.
Ahang in, a cihtak lo le hun tomno sunga ka thuak uh lungkhamnate in tuate khempeuh a khup tawntung minthanna kote hong ngahsak hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a kimu theite mitsuan loin a kimu thei lote ka mitsuanzaw uh hi. Ahang in, a kimu theite tomkha kal sung bek om a, a kimu thei lo pen ahileh a om tawntung ahi hi.
Tu-in eite tenna leibuk a kisiat leh mihing khut tawh kibawl lo, Pasian bawlsa tawntung inn khat vantungah i neih lam i thei hi.
Tu laitakin vantunga ten nading hong kisilhsak ding lunggulhin i thum i tau hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh eite hong kisilhsak ciangin guaktangin i om kei ding hi;

ahang in, eite hih buk sungah i om laitakin hong kigimsaka i tau hi; tua pen silh loh ding i ut man hi loin i vantung tenna hong kisilhsak ding i ut man le a sithei pen nuntakna in a valh ding i ut man hizaw hi.
Tua hi-a hih ding mah a eite hong bawl Pasian in hong tung ding khamkholhna-in Kha hong piakhol zo hi.
Tua ahi manin eite muangtakin i om den a, i pumpi-a i om laitengin Topa kiang tawh i kigamlat lam lah i thei hi.
Eite muhna tawh nungta loin upna tawh i nungta hi.
Eite lungmuangtakin i om a, pumpi nusia-in Topa tawh inn a omkhawm ding i utzaw lai hi, ka ci hi.
Tua hi-a i pumpi inn ah i om a, i om kei zongin amah i lungdamsak ding i tuppi pen ahi hi.

Ahang in, eite khempeuh Christ thukhenna tokhom mai-ah i ding pelmawh ding hi. Tua ciangin mi khempeuh in asia ahi zongin apha ahi zongin, pumpi-a a om sunga a hihsate hangin amau ngah dinga kituakte a sang ding uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin kote in Topa kihtakzia ding thei ka hi manun mite zol ding ka hahkat uh hi. Kote ka hi bangun Pasian mai-ah a kiteltakin ka kilang uh a, tua pen mah note in zong na lungsim uh tawh na theihtel ding uh ka lamen hi.
Lung sunga om pen hi lo, a kimu thei pen a kisaktheihpihte na dawn theih nadingun note tungah hong kisial kik ka hi kei uh a, kote nong kisaktheihpih nadingun hun hoih hong bawlsak ka hizaw uh hi.
Kote ka hai uh leh Pasian hang ahi hi; ka hai kei uh leh note ading ahi hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh adingin mi khat si-a, tua ahi manin mi khempeuh si hi, cih taksang takpi ka hi manun Christ itna in kote hong sawl teitei hi.
Tua hi-a ama hangin a nungtate amau adingin nungta nawn loin amau adingin si-a, a tho kiksakpa adingin a nuntak theih nadingun amah mi khempeuh tangin a si hi.
Tua ahi ciangin tu-a kipan kote in leitung mite muh bangin kuamah ka mu kei uh hi. Khatvei lai-in hih bangin Christ ka na mu uh a, tu-in ka mu nawn kei uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin mi khatpeuh Christ ah a om leh amah piansak thak ahi hi; alui pen beimanga, athak a tung zo hi!
Hihte khempeuh Christ tungtawna kote amah tawh hong kilemkiksaka kilemna nasep hong piapa Pasian tung pan ahi hi:
Pasian in Christ tungtawnin leitung amah tawh kilemsaka, mihingte mawhna amaute mawhna-in a simsak kei hi. Tua hi-a, tua kilemkiksakna thupuak kote hong kemsak hi.
Tua ahi manin kote tungtawnin Pasian in hih ngetna hong bawl bangin kote Christ palaite ka hi uh hi. Kote in Christ tangin: Pasian tawh kilemkik un, ci-in kong thum uh hi.
Eite ama tungtawnin Pasian thumaanna i suah theih nadingin Pasian in mawhna a nei lo amah eite adingin mawhna a
Pasian tawh na semkhawm ka hi uh bangin Pasian hehpihna kimanna a nei lo-a ngah na suah loh nadingun kong thum uh hi.
Ahang in amah in, "Kong angvan hunin note kong za a,
hotkhiatna ni-in note kong huh hi," b
Pasian angvan hun tuhun hi-a, hotkhiatna ni tuni ahi hi, cih kong gen hi.
Kote nasep a kiminsiatsak loh nadingin kuama lamlai-ah kimuktuk nading ka koih kei uh hi.
Pasian nasemte ka hi mah bangun lam khempeuh ah ko le ko a phathuai-in ka kilangsakzaw uh a: bawlsiatna thuakna ah; lungmanna ah, haksatna le lungdonna ah;
satnate ah, koltanna le ngongtatna ah; naham sepna, zana ihmut theihlohna le gilkialna ah;
siangthona, theihtelna, lungduaina le migitna ah; Khasiangtho le it takpina in;
thutaka genna le Pasian vangliatna tawh; veilam le taklama thumaanna galhiam tawh;
minthanna le simmawhna lakah, siatgenna le phatgenna lakah; a taktak hi napi a khema kingawhna bangin,
kithei napi a kithei lo bangin; sidekdek napi ka nungta uh hi; hong kisatgawp napi hong kithat liang lo a;
dah napi ka lungnuam tawntung uh a; zawng napi mi tampi ka hausak uh a; bangmah nei lo napi, na khempeuh ka nei uh hi.
Corinth-te aw, note kiangah siit nei loin thu kong gen uh a, ka lungtang uh zapi kong hon uh hi.
Kote in note tungah ngaihna ka kidaam het kei uh a, kote tungah note na kidaam zaw uh hi.
Ko aa bangin a kilawma nong thukna-un note in zong na lungtang uh zapi in hong hon un, ci-in tate tunga thugen bangin kong gen uh hi.
Thu um lote tawh hakkol na zawng khawm kei un. Ahang in, thumaanna le gitlohna in bang kikop khawm ahi hiam? Ahikeh khuamial le khuavak in bang kipawl khawmna nei thei ahi hiam?
Christ le Belial c

Pasian biakinnpi le milimte kikal ah bang kithukimna om ahi hiam? Ahang in, eite a nungta Pasian biakinnpi i hi hi. Pasian in: "Amaute tawh ka teng dinga amaute lakah gamtangin, amaute Pasian ka hi dinga amaute keima mi ahi ding uh hi," d
"Tua ahi manin amaute lak panin paikhia unla,
a tuamin om un.
Topa in ci hi.
A siang lo peumah lawng kei le uhcin
note kong sang ding hi." e
"Keimah note Pa ka hi dinga,
note ka tanu ka tapate na hi ding uh hi.
Thahatpen Topa in ci hi." f
Kong it lawmte aw, hih kamciamte i neih khit nungsang, pumpi le kha a buahsakte khempeuh panin ei le ei kisiangthosakin Pasian zahtakna tawh siangthona ah bukimin om ni.
Note lungtang sungah kote mun hong awn un. Kote kuama tungah ka khial kei uh a, kuamah siasak loin, kuamah ka zawhthawhbawl kei uh hi.
Note mawhpaih nadinga hih thu hong gen ka hi kei hi. Note tawh sihkhawm ahi zongin nuntak khawm nading zah dongin kote lungsim sungah note na teng uh hi, cih kong genkhol khin zo hi.
Note kong muang mahmah hi; note kong kisaktheihpih mahmah hi. Keimah nakpi-in kihan thawnin, kote lungmanna khempeuh ah ka lungnopna uh a dimlet hi.
Ahang in, kote Macedonia a kong lut lai-un hih ka pumpi uh a tawlnga ngei kei hi. Ahi hangin kote kiheina peuhpeuh ah pualam ah kidona, sunglam ah launate ka tuak den uh hi.
Ahi hangin a kinengniamte a hehnempa Pasian in, Titus hong tunna tawh hong hehnemin,

ama hong tunna hang bek hi loin note in amah na hehnemna hang uh zong ahi hi. Amah in kote kiangah kei nong lunggulh uh, na dahluatna uh, kei nong lunghi mawh luatna uh thute hong gena ka lungnopna a lianzaw sem hi.
Lai kong khak hanga note hong dahsak ka hileh zong ka kisik kei hi. Ka kisik ta zongin kong laikhak in na lungsim uh a natsak lam ka thei a, ahi hangin tomcik sung bek ahi hi.
Note kong dahsak hang hi loin, na dahna un note hong kisiksakna hangin tu-in ka lung a dam hi. Ahang in, Pasian geel banga dah na hi uh hi; banglam banglam ah kote hong natsak hi lo hi.
Pasian lama dahna in hotkhiatna a tun kisikna piangsak a, a kisuanlah huai kei hi. Ahi hangin leitung dahna in sihna a tun hi.

En dih un hih Pasian lama dahna in note sungah bang cihtakna, no le no kihahsiang nop nading bang lawpna, bang ngaihdahna, bang patauhna, bang lunggulhna, bang lunghi mawhna, amaana thukhen ding a tunsak lam mu un. Hih thu tawh kisai-in bangmah peuhah na mawhpen’ lam uh na kiciansak zo uh hi.

Tua hi-a note kiangah ken kong gelh ta zongin a khiala gamtapa hang hi lo a, a thuakte pawl hang zong ahi tuan kei hi, ahi hangin kote tungah note na kipiak zawhna uh nomau le nomau in Pasian mai-ah na muh theih nading uh hizaw hi.
Hihte khempeuh hangin kote hong kihanthawn hi.
Kote hong kihanthawn banah note khempeuh hanga Titus in lungsim thathak a ngah mana a lungdam luatna ka muh uh ciangin ka nuam diak uh hi.

Ama tungah note kong kisaktheihpih a, tua thu ah nong zahlaksak kei uh hi. Ahi hangin note tunga kong gente khempeuh uh a maan ahi bangin Titus tunga note kong kisaktheihpihna uh zong a maanna hong lak hi.
Note khempeuh in a thu mangin lau le ling kawmin amah na san uh, a ngaihsut kik ciangin amah in note hong itna a lian semsem hi.
Note tungah muanna a kim kong neih theih manin ka nuam hi.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in Macedonia pawlpite tunga Pasian piak hehpih na thu na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Amaute nakpi-a zia-et bawlsiatna lak pan, a lungnopna uh a dimletna le a zawn luat mahmahna panun nakpi-a citna nak nei-in a phulto hi.
Ahang in, amaute in a piak theih zahzah uh le a piak theihzah val nangawn uh a piak lam uh ka theihpih hi. Amau utthu-in,
misiangte ading nasepsakna amau zong hamphatna a tanh theih pah nadingun kote kiangah hong ngen uh hi.
Ko lamet bangin hih loin Topa tungah amau mahmah kipia masa-in tua khit ciangin Topa deihna tawh kituakin ko tungah hong kipia uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin Titus in a masa lai-a a na patkhitsa ahi manin hih note hehpihna nasep hong zawhpih vet dingin amah ka na kun uh hi.
Ahi hangin note upna, thugenna, theihna, cihtakna khempeuh le kote a
Note thu kong pia kei hi. Ahi hangin midangte cihtakna tawh tehin note itna a taktak ahina kong theih nop man ahi hi.
Ahang in, i Topa Jesu Christ hehpihna na thei uh hi; ama zawnna tungtawna na hauh theih nadingun amah a hau hi napi note hangin a zawng hi.
Hih thu tawh kisai-in note ading a hoih pen kong thuhilhna in: Nikum in note a pia masa bek hi loin tua banga piak ding a ut masa na hi uh hi.
Hih dinga utna tawh lawptaka sep na sawm bangun na neih bangbang uh tawh kituak pia-in hih nasep na zosiang un.
Ahang in, utna a om nak leh a neih loh tawh kizui hi loin a neih tawh kizui-a a piak letsong a santak ahi hi.
Midangte vanzansak nadingin note vangik suat hong sawm ka hi kei uh a, a kikim ciat nading a deih ka hizaw uh hi.
Amaute hauhna in note tangsapna hong huk kik theih nadingin tu laitaka note hauhna in amaute sapna a hu ding hi.
"Tampi a khawmpa in tam lua nei lo a, tawmkha a khawmpa inlah tawm lua a nei kei hi" b
Keimah in note kong lunghimawh bang lunghimawhna Titus lungsim sunga a guanpa Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Ahang in, Titus in ka ngetna uh hong thukimpih bek hi loin ama lungsim tup tawmna bangin note kiangah lawptakin hong pai ding ahi hi.
Tuateh lungdamna-thu nasepna ah pawlpi mi khempeuh in a pahtak uh sanggampa amah kong zuisak uh hi.
Tua banah amah pen sumpi puaka ka pai lai-un kote hong zui dinga pawlpite in a teelpa uh ahi hi. Topa mahmah pahtawi nading le huh nuam ka hina uh lahna-in tua sum piak ka hawm uh hi.
Citna tawh a kipia hih letsongte ka zek uh ciangin gensiatna ka pelh nuam uh hi.
Ahang in, Topa muh bek hi lo mihingte muh mahmah in zong amaan na sem dingin ka hih theih tawpun ka kidawm uh hi.
Tua banah ka sanggampa un lam tampi ah ama lawpna hong latsak tham loin note hong muanna lianpi hangin amau tawh kong sawl uh hi.
Titus ahileh note laka ka naseppih le ka kikoppih hi-a, ka sang gam dangte uh ahileh pawlpi palaite le Christ pahtawina ahi uh hi.
Tua ahi manin note in kong itna uh le kong kisaktheihpihna uh ahang pawlpi in a muhtel theih nadingun hih mite tungah na lak un.
Misiangte tunga hih nasepna thu no tungah lai-a gelh ding kisam ka sa kei hi.

Ahang in, midangte huh nading na lawpna uh ka thei zo a, nikum nungsang no Achaia gama omte a pia dingin a kithawisa-a om cih thu Macedonia gama omte tungah ka kisialhpih densa ahi hi. Tua ciangin note thalawpna in amaute a tamzaw nasep thanuamsak hi.
Ahi hangin, note kong kisaktheihpihna uh a hawmsuak loh nadingin amaute a kithawisa uh ahi hi, ka cih bangin a kithawisa na hih theih nadingun sang gamte kong sawl hi.
Ahang in, Macedonia-te khatpeuh in kei hong zuih a, note a kithawisa-in hong muh kei leh note kong muan gen mahmahsa ahi manin note gen loh kote zong ka maizum ding uh hi.

Tua ahi ciangin citpiak dinga na ciamsate uh pia dingin kithawikholsa-a na om theih nadingun hong ma hawh dingin sanggamte kut ding kisamin ka um hi. Tua hileh itsa pipi-a piak hi loin phaltaka kipiasa citpiak ahina hong kilang ding hi.
Hih thu ciamteh un: A cil vawh peuhmah in tawmcik at dinga, phaltaka a vawh ziahziah peuhmah in tampi a at ding hi.
Mi khempeuh in piak dinga a lungsima a khensatsa bangin pia uh hen; lungsit pipi ahikeh piak loh phamawh cihna-in pia kei uh hen, ahang in, Pasian in lungtaitaka piate a it hi.
Na kisap khempeuh uh Pasian in nei-a, hun khempeuh ah na khempeuh na hauh theih nadingun nasep hoih tawh note tungah hehpihna khempeuh kicingsak thei hi.
"Amah in a zawngte tungah
ama letsongte mun khempeuh ah a hawmthang zo hi;
ama thumaanna a tawntungin kipden hi." c
Khaici vawhpa tungah khaici pia a, a an ding anlum a piapa in, na sal ah antang khangsakin note thumaanna gah na khopte uh zong a tamsak semsem ding hi.
Note hun khempeuh ah na cit theih nadingun hauhna namcinin hong kihausak dinga, tua ciangin kote tung tawnin na citna uh Pasian tungah lungdamkohna suak ding hi.
Hih na nasepna uh Topa mite huhna bek hi loin Pasian tungah lungdam thu genna tampi a dimletna lahna hi lailai hi.
Na kilatkhiatna uh ahi tua nasepna hangin, Christ lungdamna-thu na pulakna uh a zui thuman’na le amaute le mi khempeuh tawh na tanh khop uh na citna uh hangin mite in Pasian a phat ding uh hi.
Pasian in a hehpihna a dimletin note hong piakna hangin amaute in note hong lunggulhin thu hong ngetsak ding uh hi.
A kigen khin zo lo ama letsong hangin Pasian tungah lungdamna om ta hen.
Note tawh i kimaituah cianga "zahkai" a, i kigamlat cianga "hang san" pa keimah Paul in Christ lungnemna le migitna pansanin kong ngen hi!
Hih leitung mite gamtat bangin gamta-a hong ngaihsun mi pawlkhat tungah, kong pai ciangin hangtaka cih ka sawm bangin cih a kul loh nadingin kong thum hi.
Ahang in, leitunga teng ka hi uh hangin leitung mi bangin gal ka do kei uh hi.
Kote galdona galvante leitung galvante ahi kei hi. Tuate tawh kilehbulhin, akip mahmah kulhte phel nading Pasian vangliatna a neizaw hi. Kitotnate le
Pasian theihna langdo-in, kipilsaknate khempeuh ka phelkhia uh a, Christ thu a mang dingin ngaihsutna khempeuh salin ka kai uh hi.
Note thuman’na khatvei-a a kicin siang nak leh thuman’lohna nasep peuhmah gawtna pia dingin kigingsa in ka om ding uh hi.
Note in nate a pualama kilangkhia bekin na en uh hi. a
Ahang in, note hong phelgawp ding hi lo, hong laamto dinga Topa hong piak thuneihna kidaam lo-a a suang ka hileh zong ka zumpih kei ding hi.
Ka laikhakte tawh note hong linthawn ka bat ding ka ut kei hi.
Ahang in, mi pawlkhat in, "A laikhakte gikin khauh naven, amah taktakin mi lungsim kuai zo kei, a thugen zong bangmahpi hi kei," hong ci uh hi.
Tua bang mite in no kiangah om lo-a, ka laikhakte uh sunga ka gelh bangbangun note kianga ka om ciangin zong ka hih ding uh ahilam phawk uh hen.
Amau le amau a kiphat mi pawlkhatte laka kihel ahikeh a kitehkak ngam ka hi kei uh hi. Amau le amau mah kitehin, amau le amau mah a kitehkak uh ciangin amau a pil ahi kei uh hi.
Kote ka hi uh leh a kilawm zah valin ka kisial kei uh a, bangbang ahi zongin Pasian in kote adinga hong sehsaksa zah note nangawn hong huamkha ciangah ka kisial ding uh hi.
Note kiang hong tung khin lo bangin aval akanin ka kisial kei ding uh hi. Ahang in, Christ lungdamna-thu tawh no ciangciang kong ban khin ta uh hi.
Ko adinga kisehsa valin midangte nasepsa a kisialhpih zong ka hisam kei uh hi. b
Tua banga note khena gamte ah zong lungdamna-thu ka gen theih nading uh ahi hi. Ahang in, midangte gamhuam sunga na kisemsa ka kisialhpih nuam kei uh hi.
Ahi hangin, "A kisial mi, Pasian sungah kisial ta hen," c
Ahang in, amah le amah a kiphatte kuamah in sang lo-a Topa in a phat mi kisang hi.
Note in ka haina tawmkha beek nong thuak zawh ding uh ka lamen hi; ahi hangin nong thuak zo khin uh hi.
Keimah in Pasian aamna-in note kong aam hi. Pasal khat tua Christ tungah note nungak bit banga piak dingin kong kamciam zo hi.
Ahi hangin gulpi zuau siamna tawh Eve a khem zawh bangin Christ tunga atak le a siangtho-a na kipiakna pan un na lungsim uh na pialsak khak ding uh ka lau hi.

Ahang in, no kiangah mi khatpeuh hong pai-in ko gen Jesu lo, Jesu dang khat thu hong genin, na ngahsa uh kha lo kha dang khat na ngah uh a, na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo a kilamdang khat na san uh leh na nang zo kei baih lua uh hi.
Ahi hangin tua "sawltakpipente" sangin neukha zong a niamzaw in ka kingaihsun kei hi.
Thugen kisinna, a siam mi ka hi kholloh hangin theihna ka nei hi. Note tungah hih bang ka hina lam khempeuh ah kitel sinsenin ka langsak zo uh hi.
Note tungah man ngen loin Pasian lungdamna-thu ka genna tung tawnin a sangzaw munah note kong tut theih nadingin ka kiniamkhiatna kei adingin mawhna ahi hiam?
Note na ka sep nadingin pawlpi dangte pan huhna ngahin amaute aa ka sut hi.

Note kiangah ka om lai-in kisapna khatpeuh ka neih ciangin kuama vangik ka suak kei hi. Ahang in, Macedonia pana hong pai sanggamte in ka sapna teng hong pia uh hi. Note vangik ka suah loh nadingin lam khempeuh ah ka kikem a, tua bangin ka kikem lai ding hi.
Keima sungah Christ thutak a om takpi bangin Achaia kuala omte khempeuh in hih ka kisialhna a beisak kei ding uh hi.
Bang hangin? Ken note kong it loh hang ahi hiam? Kong it lam Pasian in a thei hi!
A kisialhpih uh nate tawh kisai-a kote tawh kikima, a kingaihsut theih nading uh hun hoih a deih mite panmun ka bulkalh theih nadingun ka hih pen ka hih lailai ding hi.
Ahang in, tua bang mite sawltakpi zuau hi-a, zuauphuak nasemte, Christ sawltakpi banga kineih tawmte ahi uh hi.
A lamdang hi lo hi. Satan zong amah le amah khuavak vansawltak khatin a kineih tawm hi.
Tua ahi ciangin ama nasemte thumaanna na sema, a kineihtawm uh leh lamdang sak ding ahi kei hi. Amaute beina in amau gamtatna tawh kituak ahi ding hi.
Kong gen kik inah: Kua mah in kei ahai-in hong ngaihsun kei hen. Ahi hangin nong ngaihsut uh leh tawm beek ka kisialhpih nadingin a haite na san bangun hong sang un.
Kei mahmah kimuanga ka kisialhna hih thu ah, Topa gen ding banga gen hi loin ahai banga gen ka hizaw hi.
Mi tampite leitung kisialh-a a kisialh nungsang kei zong ka kisial sam ding hi.
Pil lua na hi manun lungdam takin mihaite na thuak zo uh hi.
A taktakin note sal-a hong kai mi, note metna-a hong nei mi, hong zawh thawhbawl mi, amah le amah a kisangkoih mi, hong pangbet mite nangawn na thuak zo uh hi.
Tua bang dingin kote ka gina kei lua uh hi, cih maizumpipi-in kong gen hi.
Mihai banga thu ka geninah: Mi khatpeuh in a kisialhpih ngam pen kei zong ka kisialhpih ngam hi.
Amaute Hebrew mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Israel mi ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi. Amaute Abraham suante ahi uh hiam? Kei zong ka hi hi.

Amaute Christ nasem ahi uh hiam? (Mihai banga hih bang thu a gen ka hi hi) Kei ka hi zawsem hi. Na ka nak sepzaw hi; thong ah ka kia munzaw hi. A nasia zaw-in hong kisat hi. Sih theihna ah hong kitun pahpah hi.
Jew-te satna sawmli ah khatvei kiam, ngaveitak ka thuak hi.
Ciangpum in thumvei hong kisat hi. Suang in khatvei hong kideng hi. Tembaw kisiatna thumvei ka tuak hi. Sun khat le zan khat tuipi laizangah ka om ngei-a,

tawlnga loin mai ka nawt hi. Gunte ah lauhuaina, misuamte lauhuaina, keima gam mite kihtakhuaina, Gentile-te kihtakhuaina, khuapi sungah lauhuaina, gamlaka lauhuaina, tuipi tunga lauhuaina le sanggam-zuaute kihtak-huainate ka tuak zo hi.
Nakpitakin na semin ka gima, ihmu man lo liangin ka om thithe hi. Gilkial dangtakna ka thuak a, an ngawla ka om hun a tam hi. Ka guaktangin khuadam ka thuak hi.
Nadang khempeuh banah pawlpite khempeuh lunghimawhin nisimin ka lunggimpih lai hi.
Ken ka thanempih loh a thanem kua ahi hiam? Ka sunga ka thuakpih loh mawhna sunga om kua ahi hiam?
Kisial lo thei lo hileng ka ginatlohna hong lak nate ka sial ding hi.
A tawntunga kiphat ding Topa Jesu Pasian le Pa in ka zuau loh lam a thei hi.
Damascus a Kumpi Aretas khut nuai-a om ukpipa in kei hong matsak nadingin Damascus khuapi a cingsak hi.
Ahi hangin kulh tawhlet panin bawmin hong kikhaisuk a, amau khut panin ka suakta hi.
Ka kisial lailai ding hi. Met nading bangmah a om kei zongin Topa tung pana mangmuhnate le kilaaknate ka gen lai ding hi;
a kilato Christ sunga mi khat ka thei hi. A beisa kum sawm le li lai-in van thumna-a kila to, a pumpi-in maw, a pumpi loin maw, cih ka thei kei a, Pasian in a thei hi.
Hih mipa ka thei-a a pumpi-in hiam, a pumpi tawh kikhen hiam, ka thei kei hi; ahi hangin Pasian in thei-a,
paradise ah kilato hi. Amah in genkhiat theih loh nate, mihing gen dinga kiphal lo nate a za hi.
Tua bang mipa ka kisialhpih dinga ahi hangin kei tungtang ah ka thanemnate longal ka kisialhpih kei ding hi.
Thutak gen ding ka hi manin kisial nuam leng zong mihai ka hi kei ding hi. Ahi hangin ka thugen le ka nasepna in a kilatsak zah vala kuamah in hong ngaihsut loh nadingin ka kidawm hi.
Hih a lian pha mahmah kilaaknate hanga ka ki-uatsak luat loh nadingin kei hong gimsak ding, ka ci-le-sa sungah ling khat - Satan thupuapa khat kei hong kipia hi.
Kei tung panin tua hong kilakkhiatsak nadingin Topa tungah thumvei ka ngen zo hi.

Ahi hangin amah in, "Ka hehpihna nang adingin kicing hi; ahang in, thanemna sungah ka vangliatna kicing hi," hong ci hi. Tua ahi manin Christ vangliatna kei tungah a om theih nadingin lungdam semsemin ka thanemna ka kisialhpih ding hi.
Tua hi a, thanemnate, simmawhnate, thuaksiatnate, bawl-siatnate, haksatnate sunga ka lung-nopna Christ hang ahi hi. Ahang in, ka thanem ciangin ka tha a khauh hi.

Keimah le keimah mihai kong kisuah a, ahi hangin note in tua banga nong bawl uh ahi hi. Note in kei nong phat ding uh ahi hi. Ahang in, bangmah ka hi lo hangin "sawltakpi-pente" sangin neucik zong ka niamzaw peuhmah kei hi.
Sawltakpi khat kiciamtehna limte alamdangte le nalamdangte note lakah lungduaitakin kibawl zo hi.
Note adingin vangik ka suah lohna lobuang pawlpi dangte sanga na niam zawkna uh bang om ahi hiam? Hih ka tatkhialhna hong maisak un.

Tu-in a thumveina note kiangah hong hawh dingin ka kithawi zo hi. Na neihsate uh deih ka hi kei hi, kei deih note hizaw na hi manun note adingin vangik ka suak kei ding hi. A taktakin, tate in nu le pate ading a khol ding uh hi loin nu le pate in tate ading a khol ding uh hizaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note adingin ka neihsa khempeuh lungdamtakin pia-in kei mahmah nangawn ka kizang nuam hi. Ken note kong it semsem leh note in kei hong it lo semsem ding na hi uh hiam?
Tua pen ahi hi, himai ta hen, note adingin vangik ka suak kei hi. Tua hi napi khemsiamin note khembawlin note hong man ka hi ve maw!
No kianga kong sawlte khatpeuh zangin a met lakna-in hong zang ka hi hiam?
No kianga pai dingin Titus ka kun-a, i sanggampa kong zuisak hi. Titus in note a met lakna-in hong nei lo hi, hong nei ahi hiam? Ka lungsim uh kibangin lam khat zuikhawm lo ka hi uh hiam?

Note tungah kote a kihu nilohin hong ngaihsun lai na hi uh hiam? Christ sunga omte bangin Pasian mitmuh a thu gengen ka hi uh hi. Tua hi-a kong it lawmte aw, ka hih khempeuh uh note thakhauhsak nading ahi hi.

Ahang in, kong pai cianga note na hi ding uh kong deih banga kong muh loh khak ding le note in kei ka hi dinga nong deih bangua nong muh loh khak ding uh ka lau hi. Kitotna, kihazatna, heh-a kiselnate, kipawlkhennate, kidaisakna, kigensiatna, ki-uatsakna le buaina a om khak ding zong ka lau hi.

Note kiangah kong pai kik ciangin ka Pasian un note mai-ah hong niamkhiatin nidanga na khialhnasa uh: kihuai-gamtatna, numei-pasal mawhna, huk luatna lanluatnate hangin mawh napi a kisik lo mi tampite hangin ka dah khak ding ka lau hi.
Hih in note kianga kong hawh a thumveina ding ahi hi. "Thu khempeuh teci nih ahikeh thum theihpihna tawh kipsak ding ahi hi" a

Note kianga a nihveina kong hawh lai-in vauhilhna kong pia khin zo hi. Ka om loh kala mah, tu-in kong gen kikinah: Kong kileh kik ciangin a beisa huna a mawhte ahikeh adangte kuamah ka dawm kei ding hi.
Tua in, Christ in kei tungtawnin thu gen ahi hiam, cih a kitelna na kalh sese hang uh ahi hi. Note hong thazawh dingin amah thanem lo a, note lakah vanglian hi.

Ahang in, a taktakin ama thenemna ah kikilhlum napi Pasian vangliatna hangin a nungta hi. Tua mah tawh kibangin ama sungah kote thanem napi note nasem dingin Pasian vangliatna hangin amah tawh ka nungta ding uh hi.
Upna sungah na om uh hiam, no le no kisittel ciat un; no le no kizia-et un. Na kizia-et uh ciangin cing zo lo na hi kei buang uh leh Christ no sungah a ten lam thei lo na hi uh hiam?
Kote tua zia-etna ah cing zo ka hilam uh hong thei dingin kong muang hi.

Khialhna bangmah na bawl loh nadingun, tu-in Pasian tungah thu ka ngen uh hi. Zia-etna ah kote cing ka hina uh mite theih ding deihna hi loin, zia-etna ah cing zo lo banga ka kilat uh hangin note amaan-a na gamtat ding uh deihna hizaw hi.
Ahang in, kote in thutak langdoin bangmah ka hih thei kei uh hi; thumaan lam bekah ka pang uh hi.
Kote ka thanem laitakun note na thakhauh manun ka nuam uh hi; na kicinkim nadingun thu ka ngen uh hi.
Kong pai cianga phelkhiat nading hi lo, note lamtoh nadinga Topa hong piak thuneihna ka khauh zat luat loh nadingin ka om loh kala hih bang teng hong gelh ka hi hi.
A nunung penin sanggamte aw, mangpha na man un. Kicinkimna na tum unla, kong ngetna na ngai un. Lungsim kikhatin na kilem un. Itna le lemna Pasian in note hong ompih ding hi.
Kinapna siangtho tawh khat le khat na kihopih un.
Misiangte khempeuh in hong hopih uh hi.
Topa Jesu Christ hehpihna, Pasian itna le Kha Siangtho kithuahpihna note khempeuh tawh omkhawm ta hen.
Mihing pan hi lo, mite sawl zong hi lo, ahi hangin Jesu Christ le misi pana amah a thosak Pa Pasian sawltakpi Paul le
kei tawh a omkhawm sang gamte khempeuh in,
Galatia a om pawlpite tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
I Pasian le Pa deihna bangin tu a gilo khanghun pana eite hong hu dingin i mawh nate adingin amah le amah hong kipia Pa
Pasian tungah a tawntung in minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
Christ hehpihna hanga note hong sampa tawh hizahta a manlangin ki khena, lungdamna-thu adang na sanpah uh lamdang ka sa hi;
tua na san uh lah lungdamna-thu a hi peuhmah kei hi. Mi pawlkhatte in Jesu Christ lungdamna-thu lehkaihin note hong lungbuaisak nuam uh ahi hi.
Ahi hangin kote ka hi uh zongin vantung pana vansawltak khat ahi zongin note kianga kong gen uh ahi lo, lungdamna-thu dang hong hilh a om leh tawntung mawhpaih hi ta hen!
Kote in kong gensa bangun tu-in kong gen kikinah: Mi khatpeuh in na sansa uh lungdamna-thu lo adang hong hilh leh a tawntungin kimawhpaih ta hen!
Tu-in mihingte maipha ahikeh Pasian maipha a zong ka hi hiam? Ahikeh mihingte lungdamsak a sawm ka hi hiam? Mihingte lungdamsak a sawm lailai ka hileh Christ nasem ka hi kei ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, ka hilh lungdamna-thu, mihing bawltawm ahi loh lam na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Mi khatpeuh tung pana ka ngah hi lo a, hong hilhsak zong ahi kei hi; Jesu Christ tung pan kilaakna-a ka ngah ahi hi.
Ahang in, nidang lai-in Jew biakna ngeina sunga ka nuntak zia, Pasian pawlpi nakpi-a ka bawlsiat zia le suksiat gawp ka sawmzia na za zo uh hi.
Ka khangual Jew mi tampi sung panin ka madawk a, ka pate ngeina gumin nakpi-in ka hahkat hi.
Ahi hangin ka pian tunga a
Gentile-te laka ka gen theih nadingin lungkimtaka a Tapa kei sunga hong kilaaksak lai-in mi khatpeuh ka dong kei hi.
Kei ma-a sawltakpi ahi masate tawh kimu dingin Jerusalem ah zong ka paito kei a, ahi hangin Arabia ah paipah in tua khit ciangin Damascus ah ka ciah kik hi.
Tua zawh kum thum khit ciangin Peter b
Topa sanggampa James bek longal sawltakpi dang kuamah ka mu kei hi.
Note tunga kong gelh thu, zuau ahi loh lam Pasian mai-ah kong theitelsak hi.
Tua khit ciangin Syria le Cilicia ah ka pai hi.
Christ sunga om Judea gam pawlpite kuamah in kei hong meltheih kei uh hi.
Amaute in: "Tunung lai-a eite hong bawlsia pa in, khatvei lai-a a suksiat a sawm tua upna thu tu-in a hilh ta hi," ci-a kigen bek a za uh hi.
Keima hangin amaute in Pasian a phat uh hi.
Tua nung kum sawm-le-li ciangin Jerusalem ah ka paito kik hi; tua tungin Barnabas tawh ka hi hi. Titus zong ka tonpih hi.

Kilaakna thu manga pai ka hi-a, Gentile-te laka ka gen lungdamna-thu mah amaute mai-ah ka lui hi. Ahi hangin ka kitaitehna uh ahi zongin ka tainasa ah ahi zongin, a mawkna a suah ding ka lau manin makai hileh a kilawmte kiangah ka hilh sim hi.
Tua hi napi ka tonpih Titus nangawn Greek mi ahi hangin vunat dingin a kisawl teitei kei hi.
Christ Jesu sunga i suahtakna hong ensimin sila hong suaksak dingin eite lakah sanggam zuau pawlkhat hong lutsim ahi manin hih thu hong piang ahi hi.
Note sungah lungdamna-thu, thutak a om theih nadingin tawmvei sung zong amaute thu ka mang kei uh hi.
Bangzahta in mi thupi hi le uh kilawm ta leh kei adingin amaute kilamdanna a om tuan kei hi. Pasian in a pualam kilatna in thu a khen kei hi—tua mite in ka thupuak bangmah a behlap kei uh hi.
Tua tawh kilehbulh in, Jew-te a
Ahang in, Jew-te tunga sawltakpi Peter nasepna-a a sempa Pasian mah in Gentile-te tunga sawltakpi keima nasepna ah zong na a sem hi. Khuampite dinga a minthang
James, Peter c
Amaute khempeuh in mizawngte phawk gige ding hong deih uh, kei zong ka lawp penpen mah ahi hi.
Antioch ah Peter hong pai ciangin amah khial khin ta ahi manin a mai-tangah amah ka sel hi.

James kiang pan kuate hiam a pai ma-in, amah in Gentile-te tawh an a ne khawmkhawm hi. Ahi hangin amaute hong tun uh ciangin vunatte pawl-a pangte a kihtak manun Gentile-te panin kikang koihin amah le amah a kituam koih hi.
Jew dangte in zong ama kineihsiamna zui uh a, tua ama kineihsiamna in Barnabas nangawn a pialmangsak hi.

Lungdamna-thu amaan bangin amaute in sem lo uh cih ka muh ciangin amaute khempeuh mai-ah Peter kiangah, "Nang Jew mi hi napi, Jew mi bang loin Gentile mi bangin na nungta hi. Tua hi napi Jew ngeina zui dinga Gentile-te na kalh teitei bangci bang hiam?
"Mawh nei Gentile-te bang hi lo pianpih a Jew mi ahi eite in

thukham zuihzawhna hang hi lo, Jesu Christ upna hangin mi in diktansakna ngah hi cih i thei hi. Tua ahi ciangin eite in zong thukham zuihna hang hi lo, Christ upna hangin dik tansak-a i om theih nadingin Christ Jesu sungah i upna i nga hi; bang hang hiam cih leh thukham zuihna hangin kuamah dik a kitangsak kei ding hi.
"Eite in Christ sungah dik kitansak ding i zon laitakin eite mahmah mawh neite i hina hong kilang ahi ciangin Christ in mawhna khangsak cihna ahi hiam? Hi peuhmah lo hi:
Ka suksiat gawpsa ka lam kik leh thukham palsat mi ka hilam ka kitelsak hi.
Ahang in, Pasian adinga ka nuntak theih nadingin thukham tungtawnin thukham ka sihsan hi.

Jesu tawh ka kikilhlum zo a, kei ka nungta nawn kei hi; ahi hangin ka sungah Christ a nungta hi. Ka pumpi sunga ka nuntakna pen, kei hong it-in, kei ading amahmah a kipia pa Pasian Tapa upna-in a nungta ka hi hi.
Thukham tungtawnin thumaanna kingah thei hileh Christ a mawkna-a si hi ding ahi manin, Pasian hehpihna ka pampaih kei hi!" d
No Galatia mihaite! No kua in hong bumhai ahi hiam? Jesu Christ a kilhlup bangin a kiteltakin note mitmuh tektek ah hong kilak hi.
Note tung pan na khat bek ka thei nuam hi. Thukham zuihna hangin Kha na ngah uh hiam, ahikeh na zakte uh na upna uh hangin na ngah uh hiam?
Tua zahta a hai lawmlawm na hi uh hiam? Kha tawh na pat khit nungun mihing nasepna tawh na ngim na tup uh tangtun sawm na hi uh hiam?
A mawkna-in tua zahta thuak na hi uh hiam, a mawkna taktak himawk ding hiam?
Pasian in thukham na zuihna uh hangin note, ama Kha hong pia in note lakah nalamdangte hong bawl ahi hiam, ahikeh na zaksa uh na up hang uh hizaw hiam?
Abraham ngaihsun un: "Amah in Pasian uma, ama adingin tua mah thumaanna in kisimsak hi," e
Tua ciangin a umte Abraham tate suak cih theitel un.
Pasian in upna hangin Gentile-te dik tangsak nuam cih Laisiangtho in mukhol a, Abraham kiangah, "Nang tungtawnin minam khempeuh thupha kipia ding hi," f

Tua in eite khempeuh, tua upna le Pasian Tapa theihna ah khat suaka, Christ kicinna zahzah a i picin mateng ading ahi hi.
Tua ciangin mite in zuau siamna le khelpilna tawh a geel uh amau khemna ah, tuihual in a lapsuk a laptoh, thuhilhna huih citeng in amut kawikawi naungekte i hi nawn kei ding hi.
Tua sangsik in, itna tawh thutak genin, Lutang ahi pa Christ sungah, na khempeuh ah ama sungah i khangto ding hi.
Amah panin pumpi na khempeuh thagui tekah kihuh kizom khawmin, amau sep ding tek a sep ciangin tua pumpi, itna sungah khangin amah le amah a kikhansuah hi.
Tua ahi ciangin note, Gentile-te ngaihsutna gina lo-a, a nuntak bangun na nuntak nawn loh nadingun hih thu Topa sungah kong gena, kong kun tangtang hi.
Amaute lungtang kikhauh sakna hanga bangmah a theih loh manun, Pasiana nuntakna panin amaute kikhenkhia-a, a theihtelna uh kimialsak hi!
Amaute in zumna mel thei nawn loin a siang lo namkima bual dingin a uangzaw kilunggulhna nei tawntung uh a, amau hukna le lanna ah a kipiakhia khin zo uh hi.
Bangbang hi ta leh note in tua bang lamin Christ na thei kei uh hi.
Jesu sunga om thutak tawh kizui-in ama sungah hong kihilh zo ahi ciangin note in amah thu na zaksa uh hi takpi hi.
Tuma lai-a na nuntakna uh tawh kisai-in khemhat lunggulhna in a siatsaksa na milui uh suahkhia ding,
na lungsim puakzia uh kibawl thak ding,
amaan thumaanna le sianthona taktak sungah Pasian tawh kibang dinga kipiangsak mithak na silh ding uh note hong kihilh hi.
Tua ahi manin eite khempeuh pumpi khat sunga a nate i hi manin note a kuamapeuh in zuauphuahna suahkhia-in a vengte tungah maantakin thu a gen pelmawh ding hi.
"Na heh sungin na mawh kei in," c
dawimangpa siksan na awn kei in.
A guta densa pa in gu nawn peuhmah loin a kitangsamte na khatpeuh a hop theih nadingin ama khut tawh, kimanna a nei na khatpeuh sem pelmawh hen.
Na kam panun kam hoih lo pusuak sak kei un, ahi zongin a zate in phat tuampih in amau tangsapna tawh kizui-a, amaute bawlpha in, a huh thei ding kammal bek pusuaksak zaw un.
Tatkhiat ni adinga note hong kiciamtehna Pasian Khasiangtho na dahsak kei un.
Khaat-na, ngonghehna le hehna, kitotzakna le gensiatnate khempeuh etsatna nam khempeuh tawh na paikhia un.
Note migi in khat le khat na kikhuatuah unla Pasian in Christ sunga note mawhna hong maisak bang tektek in, na mawhna uh na kimaisak ciat un.
Tua ahi manin itluat tate bangin Pasian a ettehte hi unla,
Christ in eite hong it a, eite adingin Pasian tungah a namtui-a piakna ding le biakpiakna dingin amah le amah a kipiakkhiat bangin itna nuntakna tawh na nungta un.

Ahi hangin note lakah numei pasal paktatna lim ahi a, siantho lohna nam khat peuhpeuh le huaihamna ahi zongin a om peuhmah kei ding hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian misiangthote adingin hihte kilawm lo hi.
Note kam panin zahmawhpau le haipauna, ciamnuih thanghuaite, tua banga kilawm lote omsak loin lungdam na ko zaw un.
Ahang in, a thangtat, a siangtho lo ahikeh a huaiham, tua banga hihte milim bia hi-a, Christ le Pasian gam d
Thu mawkmawk tawh kuamah na kikhem zosak kei un. Bang hang hiam cihleh tua bang thute hangin thumang lote tungah Pasian thangpaihna a tung hi.
Tua ahi manin amaute tawh kithuah kei un.
Ahang in, hun khat lai-in note khuamial na hi uh a, ahi hangin tu-in Topa sungah khuavak na hi uh hi. Khuavak tate bangin na nungta un;
Ahang in, khuavak gah in, hoihna khempeuh, thumaanna le thutak ahi hi.
Topa lungkimna bang hiam, cih na zong un.
Gah a gah lo khuamial gamtatna tawh na kisawhkha kei unla amau gamtatnate na pholak zaw un.
Ahang in, thumang lote in a simthama a septe uh a kigenkhiat bek zong maizumhuai hi.
Ahi hangin khuavak in a pholak na peuhmah a kimu thei hi.
Ahang in, na khempeuh a kimu theisak khuavak ahi hi. Hih thu hangin:

Ihmu mi aw, khanglo in,
EPH.5.14	misi panin tho in,
EPH.5.14	tua hileh nang tungah Christ a tang ding hi,a na ci hi.
Tua hi-a na nuntak zia uh, apil lote bang hi loin apilte bangin limtakin kidawm unla,
nite hoih lo ahi manin hun hoih na neih peuhpeuh uh a hoih penin na zang un.
Tua ahi ciangin hai kei unla, Topa deihna bang ahi hiam, cih theitel zaw un.
Zu kham kei un, uangtat luatna mun hong tun thei hi. Tua sangsikin, Kha tawh na kidim zaw un.
Phatna-late, biakna late le khalam late in khat le khat na kihopih un. Na lung sung uhah phat kawmin Topa tungah la sa un,
Topa Jesu Christ minin na khempeuh hangin Pa Pasian tungah lungdam na ko tawntung un.
Christ zahtakna tawh khat le khat na kiniamkhiat tuah un.
Zite aw, Topa tunga ki-ap bangin na pasalte uh tungah ki-ap un.
Ahang in, Christ in ama pumpi ahi pawlpi lutang le a Honpa ahi bangin zi lutang in a pasal ahi hi.
Christ tungah pawlpi a ki-ap bangin zite zong na khempeuh ah a pasalte uh tungah a ki-ap ding uh hi.
Christ in a pawlpi it a, ama adingin amah mah a kipumpiak khiat bang tektek in, pasalte aw, na zite uh it un.
Amah in pawlpi siangtho dingin thu tungtawnin tui in sawp a, singthosak a
tua pen a nin baang lo, a vun tonna om lo, a melhemna khatpeuh om lo tham loin siangtho le kawkbaang lo-a, a tangkhia pawlpi-in amah le amah a kipiakkhiat theih nading ahi hi.
Tua tawh kibangin, pasalte in amau pumpi bangin a zite uh a it uh kul hi. A zi it pa amah le amah ki-it ahi hi.
Tuate khempeuh khit ah, ama pumpi mudah kuamah om ngei lo a, Christ in a pawlpi cingin a vak bang tektekin ama pumpi cingin a vak zaw hi.
Ahang in, eite ama pumpi nate i hi hi.
"Hih thu hangin pasal in a nu le a pa nusia-in a zi tawh kigawm dinga, tua nihte sakhat a suak ding uh hi." b
Hih in thuthukpi khat hi-a, ahi hangin kei gen ahileh Christ le pawlpi thu ahi hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin, note a kua mapeuh amah leh amah a ki-it bangin na zite uh na it pelmawh un. Zi in zong a pasal a zahtak pelmawh ding hi.
Tate aw, Topa sungah na nu na pate uh thu na mang un, ahang in, hih in thumaan ahi hi.
"Na nu na pa pahtawi in." c
Tua bang na hileh na khan nuam dinga, leitungah sawtpi nuntak nuam na sa ding hi.
Pate aw, na tate uh mawk hehsak kei un, tua sangsikin, pattahna le Topa lamlahna ah khangtosak un.
Silate aw, Christ thu na man ding bang tektek un, na lungsim sung uhah thutak cihtakna tawh zahtakna le kihtakna tawh na leitung pute thu na mang un.
Amaute hong muh sunga hong pahtak nading bek hi loin Christ sila bangin na lungtang sung uhah Pasian deih bangin amaute thu na mang un.
Mihing nasem bang hi loin Pasian nasem bangin na lungtang khempeuh uh tawh na sem un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in sila ahi a, sila lo ahi zongin na hoih a sem peuhpeuh pahtakman a piak ding na thei uh hi.
Tua ciangin pute aw, tuamah tawh kibangin na silate uh na hih un. Van tungah note le amaute Pu ahi khawmpa om a, amah in gup le paih a neih loh lam thei na hi manun amaute na tawng kei un.
A nunung penin, Topa sung le ama thahat vangliatna sungah thakhauh un.
Dawimangpa hong sawmnate na nan zawh nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
Ahang in, eite do ahileh si le sa hi loin vanlam gama gam-ukte, thuneihnate, hih leitung khuamial vangliatnate le kha gilo galkapte ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ni hoih lo hong tun cianga na pan theih nading uh le hih ding khempeuh na hih khit uh cianga na din zawh lai nadingun Pasian galvan a kimin silh un.
Tua ciangin na kawnguah thutak kawnggak gaksa, na awmuah thumaanna awmdal bulhsa le
na khe-uhah kilemna lung damna-thu pana hong pai kigin kholhna bulhsa-in kiptakin ding un.
Hihte khempeuh banah gilopa mei kuang thaltangte na sukmit theih nadingun upna lum tawi un.
Hotkhiatna sik lukhu le Pasian thu ahi Kha namsau la un.
Tua ciangin hun khempeuh ah thungetna nam khempeuh le ngetna tawh Kha-in thu na ngen un. Hih thu ngaihsun kawmin pilvang unla misiangte khempeuh ading thu na ngetsak den un.
Thu ka hilh peuhpeuh cianga thu hong kipiak theih nading le lungdamna thuthuk lau lo-a ka theihsak theih nadingin zong thu na ngetsak un.
Ahang in, tua thu hangin sikkhainiang bulh kawma palai ka hi hi. Ka hih ding bangin lau peumah loin ka pulakkhiat theih nading thu na ngetsak un.
Topa sunga nasem muanhuai ka it sanggampa Tychicus in kei bangci om a, na bangci sep cih na theih nadingun na khempeuh hong gen ding hi.
Kote bangci cih na theih nading uh le amah in note hong hanthawn theih nading mahmah deihna-in amah note kiangah kong sawl hi.
Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ panin upna tawh kigawmkhawm itna le lemna, sanggamte tungah om ta hen.
A si theilo itna tawh eite Topa Jesu Christ a itte khempeuh tungah hehpihna om ta hen.
Christ Jesu nasem Paul le Timothy in,
Philippi a om Christ Jesu sunga misiangte khempeuh le pawlpi kemte a
Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ tung pana hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.
Note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Note khempeuh ading thu ka nget simin lungnopna tawh ka ngen tawntung hi,
bang hang hiam cih leh ni masa pen ni-a kipan tu dong lungdamna-thu sungah na kihel den uh hi.
Note sunga nasep hoih a panpa in Christ Jesu ni dongin a bucing dingin semsuak ding cih ka muang hi.

Ka lungsunga note kong neih nungsangin hih bang zia a lungsim a kong neih ding a man ahi hi; kolbulhin ka om a, lungdamna-thu hu-in ka kipsak zongin note khempeuh in Pasian hehpihna kei tawh na tangkhawm uh hi.
Note khempeuh Christ Jesu itna tawh kong lunggulh lam Pasian in a thei ding hi.
Ka thungetna in: note itna theihna le a sung thu khenteltheihna ah khang semsema,
a hoihpen telsiang thei-in Christ ni dong siangtho-in, kawkbanna om loin,
Pasian minthan nading le a kiphat nadingin Jesu Christ tungtawna hong pai thumaan gah tawh na dim nading uh ahi hi.
Tu-in sanggamte aw, kei tunga hong tungsa thu in lungdamna-thu khangsak takpi cih na theih ding uh ka deih hi.
Tua hangin Christ hanga kol bulh a om ka hilam kumpi inn cingte b
Kol hong kibulhna hangin Topa sunga sanggamte a tamzaw in Pasian thute hangtak le lau het loin gen ding hanthawnna a ngah zaw uh hi.
Mi kimkhatte in enna le kilungsim demna tawh Christ thu hilh uh a, ahi hangin adangte in amau ngimna hoih nei in, a hilh uh hi, cih thumaan ahi hi.
Hih a nunungte mah in lungdamna-thu a hu dinga om lai ka hilam thei-in itna tawh a hilh uh hi.
A masa pawl in thutak paii loin, kol bulha ka om sungin buaina tawh kei hong linglawngsak thei ding uh kisa in huaiham sawmin Christ thu a hilh uh hi. c
Ahi hangin bang phamawh ahi hiam? A thupi penin, ngimna hoih ahi-a ngimna hoih lo ahi zongin bangbang lamah Christ thu a kihilh nak leh pha zo hi. Hih thu hangin ka nuam hi.
Hihi, ka nuam lailai ding hi.
Ahang in, note thungetna tung tawn le Jesu Christ Kha in kei hong huhna bangin kei tunga piang thu pen ka suahtakna d
Ka pumpi ah nuntakna ahikeh sihna in ahi densa bangin tu-in Christ a kipahtawi theih nadingin a kicing hanna ka nei ding cih maizum loin lawptakin kihehnemna le lametna ka nei hi.
Kei adingin nuntak, Christ hi-a, sih lah metna ahi hi.
Pumpi-in nungta lai leng, ka nasepna gah, gah lai ding hi. Tua hi napi bang teelzaw ding ka hi hiam? Ka thei zo kei hi!
Tua nih saikakin ka om a, paikhia-in Christ tawh omkhawm ding ka lunggulh hi; tua mah nakpi in hoihzaw tham hi.
Ahi hangin note adingin pumpi-a ka nuntak lai ding kisamzaw hi.
Hih thu theitel ka hi manin ka nungta lai dinga, upna sunga na khan nading uh le na lungnop nadingun note khempeuh tawh ka omkhawm lai ding hi.
Tua ciangin note tawh ka omkhawm kikna tungtawnin Christ Jesu sunga na lungnopna uh kei hangin a dimlet ding hi.

Bang khatpeuh piang ta leh, Christ lungdamna-thu tawh a kilawm in, ki-ukin na gamta un. Tua hileh hong hawhin note kong mu a, ka om loh kalin note thu ka galzak zongin lungdamna-thu upna hu in, lungsim kikhatin na dingkip uh cih ka thei ding hi;
note hong langpangte in bangmah lamah hong lausak zo lo cih zong ka thei ding hi. Hih in Pasian in amaute susia dinga note hong hon ding ahi na amaute tungah lim hi ding hi.
Ahang in, amah um ding bek hi lo, ama ading thuak dingin zong, Christ tang dingin note hong kiphal hi.
Ka thuaksa bang note in na thuak uh cih na muh nung sangun tu-in thuak ding nei lai ka hilam thei ta un.

Christ tawh note kigawmna hangin kihanthawnna khatpeuh na neih uh a, a itna panin kihehnepna khatpeuh na neih uh a, Kha tawh kipawlna khatpeuh na neih uh a, kikhuatuahna le kilainatna khatpeuh na neih uh leh
lungsim kibangin om a, itna kibang nei in, lungsim le tupna kikhatin na omna uh tawh ka lungnopna na kimsak un.
Huaihamna le kihisakna tawh bangmah hih loin kiniamkhiatin no sangin midangte a hoihzaw-in na ngaihsun un.
Note khempeuh in no angsung ding bek khual loin midangte angsung ding zong na khualsak ciat un.
Note in Christ Jesu lungsim bang na nei un:
Amah Pasian pianngei a
Pasian tawh kikima om ding khiatlahna a letcip ding ngaihsun loin,
bangmah kihisak loin
nasem pianngei b
mihing tawh hong kibang zaw hi.
Mihing mel taktak hong pua a,
amah le amah kiniamkhiatin,
singlamteh tungah a sih dongin thu a mang tazen hi!
Tua ahi manin Pasian in amah a sang pen munah tawisanga,
min khempeuh sanga min tungnung zaw pia-in,
tua Jesu min ah vantung,
leitung le leinuai-a om khempeuh khukdinin,
leii peuhmah in, "Jesu Christ, Topa hi," ci-in pulak dinga,
Pa Pasian minthanna ahi ding hi.
Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, thu na man densa bangun ka om sung bek hi lo, ka om loh sungin zong ka thu hong mangzaw in, lau kawm ling kawmin note hotkhiatna na semkhia den un.
Ahang in, a hoih ama deihna bang a deih ding le a sem dingin note sunga a sempa, Pasian ahi hi.
Na khempeuh phun lo sel loin sem un;
a lungsim kawi le lungsim mawk khangmite lakah no Pasian tate, mawh nei lo, kawkbaang lo, siangtho in, khuavannuai-a aksite bangin na tan theih nadingun
nuntakna thu na letkip c
Ahi zongin note upna pana piang kithoihna leh nasepna tungah dawntheih-a biakna bangin, biaknain kei hong kisungkhia taleh note khempeuh tawh nuamin ka lungdam khawm veve hi.
Tua mah bangin note zong nuamin kei tawh na lungdam khawm ding uh hi.
Note thu ka zak ciangin kei zong ka kipak theih nadingin a sawt loin, note kiangah Timothy kong sawl pah ding Topa Jesu sungah ka lamen hi.
Note hoih nadinga hong khual taktak ding amah lo midang ka nei kei hi.
Ahang in, mi khempeuh in Jesu Christ khual loin amau angsung bek a khual uh hi.
Ahi zongin tapa in a pa tawh a sepkhawm bangin Timothy in kei tawh lungdamna-thu a sepkhawmna ah amah le amah in a omzia a kilangsak hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Tua ahi manin kei tunga a piang ding thu a kitel phetin amah kong sawlpah ding ka lamen hi.
Kei mahmah zong kong paipah ding Topa sungah ka muang ngam hi.
Ahi hangin ka sanggampa, ka naseppih pa le ka galkappih le note thupuakpa zong ahi, ka kisapna teng hong huh dinga nong sawlpa uh Epaphroditus note kianga kong sawl kik ding kisam ka sa hi.
Ahang in, na zaksa bangun amah cina-a, note khempeuh hong ngai-in a lungdong hi.
Amah cina takpi-a, a si dektak hi. Ahi zongin Pasian in amah bek hi loin kei zong hong lainat a, dahna a kisuangsawnin hong tuaksak kei hi.
Tua ahi manin, note in amah na muh uh ciangin na nuam theih nading uh le keimah zong ka lunghimawhna a tawm tuam nadingin amah kong paisak ding ka lawpzawsan hi.
Topa sungah nuamna lianpi tawh amah na muak unla, amah bang mite na pahtawi un.
Bang hang hiam cih leh note in kei nong huh theih lohte uh hong huh dingin a nuntakna khaamin Christ na semin a si dektak hi.
A nunung penin ka sanggamte aw, Topa sungah lungdam un! Note tungah a kibangmah gelh kik ding buaihuai lo a, note adingin bitna ahi hi.
Tua uite, tua gilo-a gamta mite tua misa a atgawpte lakah na pilvang un.
Ahang in, ei vunatte ei Kha-a Pasian biate, Christ Jesu sunga a minthangte in, ci-le-sa ah muanna i nei kei hi.
Tua bangin suang nuam hi leng, kei mahmah in zong suan theih ding tampi ka nei hi.
Midang khatpeuh in ci-le-sa suan ding nei a, a kingaihsut leh ken ka hauzaw sem hi;
a nigiat ni-a vunat Israel mi, Benjamin beh, Hebrew-te laka a Hebrew, thukham zuihna ah Pharisee,
hahkatna lamah pawlpi bawlsia; thukham tawh kisai thumaanna ah a genbaang lo ka hi hi.
Ahi hangin kei adinga metna ahi peuhmah tu-in Christ hangin supna-in ka sim hi.

Tua tham loin ka Topa Christ Jesu theihna a thupi luatna tawh tehin na khempeuh supna-in ka sima, ama hangin na khempeuh ka taan zo hi. Tuate khempeuh ninneng bangin ka ngaihsun hi, Christ ka ngah nading le
ama sungah ka om theih nading hi-a, thukham pana hong pai keima thumaanna hi loin Pasian pana upna tawh hong pai Christ upna tungtawna kingah thumaanna pen hizaw hi.
Christ le ama thawhkikna’ vangliatna le a thuaknate thuakpihna, a sihna ah amah tawh kibatna ka thei nuam hi.
Tua pen misi pana thawhkikna ka ngah theih nading ahi hi.
Hih khempeuh a ngah khin ta, hong kicingsak khin zo, ka cihna hi loin Christ Jesu in kei hong matna mah ken zong ka mat zawh nadingin mai ka nawt tentan hi.
Sanggamte aw, a mankha khin ta in ka kisim kei hi. Ahi hangin ka hih na khat in: nunglama omte ka mangngilh-a mailama om nate ka delh tentan hi.
Christ Jesu sunga vanlam-a letsong ngah dinga Pasian in hong sapna kung lam manawh in ka nawt teitei hi.
A picing khinsa eite khempeuh in tua bang lungsim i neih ding ahi hi. Note in a kilamdang thu tuam khat na ngaihsut uh leh tua zong Pasian in hong theitelsak ding hi.
I ngahsa ciangciang bek tawh kikhom in eite nungta ni.
Sanggamte aw, kei omdan zui-in midangte tawh kipawl unla, note gamtat zia dinga kong piak bang uh zui-a a nungtate ciamteh un.
Ahang in, a beisa hunah mi tampite Christ singlamteh galin a nungta uh hi, ci-a kong gensa bangin tu-in zong khitui nangawn tawh kong gen kik lai hi.
Amaute tupna, siatna hi-a, a pasian uh amau gilpi hi-in, a minthanna uh amau maizumna ahi hi. Amaute in leitung nate bek a ngaihsun uh hi.
Ahi hangin eite gammi i hina vantung ahi hi. Eite in tua mun panin Honpa Khat - Topa Jesu Christ lawptakin i ngak hi.
Na khempeuh a ukna nuai-ah a koihsak thei tua vangliatna in a simmawh huai i pumpite, a minthang ama pumpi tawh kibang dingin a khel ding pa amah ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin ka sanggam, kong it, kong ngaih luat, ka lungnopna le ka kumpi lukhute aw, Topa sungah na dinkip zia ding uh tua bang ahi hi, kong it lawmte aw!
Euodia le Sintyche-te, Topa sung-ah khat le khat a kilem nadingun ka thum hi.
Hihi, ka hakkol puakpih muanhuai a
Topa sungah lungnuam tawntung un. Kong genkik ding hi: Lungnuam un!
Mi khempeuh tungah na migitna uh na kitelsak un. Topa hong nai hi.
Na khatpeuhah lunghimawh in patau kei unla, na khempeuh ah lungdamkohna tawh thuahin, thungetna le ngetna Pasian tungah na tun un.
Tua hileh theihtelnate khempeuh a khup Pasian lemna in, Christ Jesu sungah na lungsimte uh le na lungtangte uh hong cing ding hi.

A nunung penin sanggamte aw, a maan peuhmah, a zahtakhuai peuhmah, a dik peuhmah, a siang peuhmah, a ithuai peuhmah, a pahtakhuai peuhmah, na khatpeuh a hoih pen hi-a, a phattak nak leh tua bang nate na ngaihsun un.
Kei tung pana na sinsa, na ngahsa, na zaksa uh ahi zongin, kei sunga na muhsate uh ahi zongin na taksuaksak un. Tua hileh lemna Pasian, note tawh a omkhawm ding hi.
Kei nong deihsakna uh na thak suaksak takpi manun, tu petpetin Topa sungah nakpitakin ka lungnuam hi. Nong lunghimawh takpi uh a, ahi hangin nong lah nading uh hun hoih na nei kei uh hi.
A piang bangbang ka lungkim nadingin a kisin khinsa ka hi manin, kisapna nei-a hih thu a gen ka hi kei hi.
Taksap kici bang hi-a, kicing a kici bang hiam cih ka thei hi. Gilkialna hiam gilvahna, zawnna hiam hauhna - omzia namkim ah lungkimna thusim ka sin zo hi.
Kei thahatna hong pia pa tungtawnin na khempeuh ka hih thei hi.
