Eite in Jesu si a, tho kik zo hi, ci-in i um hi. Tua ahi ciangin ama sunga a ihmu khinsate Pasian in Jesu tawh hong tonpih ding hi, ci-in i um hi.
Topa hong pai dong a om lai-a a nungta lai eite, a ihmusate sangin i masazaw peuhmah kei ding cih Topa kammal tawh kituakin note kong hilh uh hi.
Ahang in, Topa mahmah vantung panin, a ngaih mahmah thupiakna tawh, vansawltak lian aw le Pasian sapna pengkul ging tawh hong kumsuk dinga, tua ciangin Christ sunga a sisate tho masa ding uh hi.
Tua khit ciangin a om lai a nungta lai-a om eite, huih lakah Topa dawn dingin amaute tawh meii lakah hong kilato khawm ding hi. Tua tak ciangin Topa tawh i om khawm tawntung ding hi.
Tua ahi manin hih thute in na kihanthawn ciat un.
Sanggamte aw, tu-in a ni le a hun thu kong gelh ding uh kisam lo hi.
Ahang in, zana guta bangin Topa ni, hong tung ding cih teltaka na theihsa uh ahi hi.
Mite in, "Lemna le muanna" a cih laitakun, naupaii numei, nausuahnat in a tut bangin amau tungah thakhatin siatna tung dinga, amaute a suakta kei ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin sanggamte aw, no na hi uh leh guta in a phawn banga, hih ni in hong phawn dingin khuamial laka om na hi kei uh hi.
Note na vekpi-un tua khuavak tapate le sunlai tapate na hi uh hi. Eite tua zan ahikeh tua khuamial aa i hi kei hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin a ihmu midangte tawh kibang loin a kigingsa le ei le ei ki-uk zo-in om ni.
Ahang in, a ihmute zanin ihmu a, zukhamte in zanin a kham uh hi.
Ahi hangin eite sunlai aa i hi nungsangin eimah le eimah ki-uk zoin, upna le itna awmdal in bulhin, lametna sik lukhu in hotkhiatna khu ni.
Ahang in, Pasian in eite ama thangpaihna thuak dingin hong seh lo a, ahi hangin i Topa Jesu Christ tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah dinga hong seh ahi hi.
Eite i ihmu zongin i hak zongin amah tawh i nuntak khawm theih nadingin eite adingin amah a si hi.
Tua ahi manin tu-a na hihsa bangun khat le khat kihanthawnin na kikhantohpih ciat un.
Tu-in sanggamte aw, note lakah nasep hahkatte, Topa sunga no hong ukte le no hong thuhilhte na zahtak ding uh kong sawl uh hi.
Amau nasepna hangin itna tawh a sangpenin na koih un. Khat le khat na kilem un.
Sanggamte aw, a thadahte vauhilh ding, a zahkaite hansuah ding, a thanemte huh ding le mi khempeuh tunga lungduai dingin kong kun uh hi.
Kuamah in khialhna, khialhna-in thuk kik loin note khat le khat ahi zongin, mi khempeuh tungah ahi zongin migit na sawm tawntung un.
Na lungnuam tawntung un;
thu na ngen den un;
hih in Christ Jesu sungah note ading Pasian deihna ahi manin a piang khempeuh ah lungdam na ko un.
Tua Kha’ meikuang na mitsak kei un;
genkholhna thute na simmawhbawl kei un.
Na khempeuh sittel un. A hoihte kiplet un.
Siatna namte peuhmah na peel un.
Pasian mahmah, lemna Pasian in note hong siangthosak sinsen ta hen. Eite Topa Jesu Christ hong pai cianga kawkbaanna a om lo dingin na kha, na lungsim le na pumpite uh a bupin hong kepsak ta hen.
Note hong sampa a muanhuai hi; amah in tuate a hih ding hi.
Sanggamte aw, kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
Kinapna siangtho tawh sanggamte khempeuh na kihopih un.
Hih laikhak sanggamte khempeuh tungah na sim nading uh Topa mai-ah thu kong pia hi.
Eite Topa Jesu Christ hehpihna note tawh om ta hen.
Paul, Silas a
Eite Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ sunga om Thessalonica pawlpi tungah:
Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.

Note hangin Pasian tungah lungdam ka koh den ding uh kilawm hi. Sanggamte aw, amantakpi mah ahi hi, bang hang hiam cih leh na upna uh khangto semsem a, note khempeuh khat le khat na ki-itna uh a khangkhang hi.
Tua ahi manin bawlsiatnate le zia-etnate na thuakna uhah na sikdona uh le na upna uh Pasian pawlpite lakah ka kisialhpih uh hi.
Hihte khempeuh Pasian thukhenna man hi, cih a kilatna hi-a hih thu tawh kizui-in Pasian-gam adinga a santham ding na hina uh hanga a thuak na hi uh hi.
Pasian thutang hi; no hong buaisakte amah in buaisak dinga,
hong kibuaisak note buaina hong vengsakin, kote aa zong hong vengsak ding hi. Topa Jesu ama vansawltak vangliante tawh vantung pan meikuang tawh hong kilat ciangin hih thu a piang ding hi.
Amah in Pasian a thei lote le i Topa Jesu lungdamna-thu a mang lote a gawt ding hi.
Topa ompihna pan le a vangliatna thupina panin amaute kikhenkhia dinga, tawntung siatna-in kigawt ding hi.
Amah hong pai ni-in a misiangthote sungah kiminthangsak dinga amah a um mite khempeuh lakah piandang a kisa ding hi. Note kianga ka teci panna uh na upna un note zong a umte lakah hong kihelsak hi.

Hihte khempeuh phawk kawmin i Pasian in hong sapna tawh kilawm hong sak theih nading le na tup uh a hoih peuhmah le na upna uh hanga piang nasep khempeuh, ama vangliatna tawh a tangtunsak nadingin note ading thu ka ngen niloh uh hi.
Eite Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ b
Sanggamte aw, i Topa Jesu Christ hong pai nading le ama kianga eite hong khop nading tawh kisai-in
Topa ni hong tung khin zo hi, ci-a a kigenkholhna pawlkhat ahi zongin, thu kigensawn ahikeh ko kiang pan hi a kici laikhakte hang ahi zongin, na linglawng, na patauh loh nadingun kong thum hi.
Lam khat peuhpeuh ah kuamah na kikhemsak kei un, ahang in, lehdona piangin, siatna-a kisehsa thukham palsatna c
Amah in Pasian a kici na khempeuh ahikeh a kibia khempeuh langdo dinga, Pasian biakinnpi sungah kikoihin, amah le amah kitawisangin amah le amah Pasian kici-in a kitangko hi.
Note tawh i omkhawm lai-a kong gen zel hih thute phawk nawn lo na hi uh hiam?
A hun liana, a kilaak theih nadingin amah bang in dal hiam, cih tu-in na thei uh hi.
Ahang in, thukham neihlohna in a simtham-a a neih vangliatna in a nasep pan zo hi; ahi hangin tu-a amah a dalpa a kilakkhiat masiah amah in tua bangin a kham lailai ding hi.
Tua tak ciangin thukham nei lo pa hong kilang dinga, Topa Jesu in a kam pana a hu tawh amah zothal-in ama hong paina a thupina in amah a susia ding hi.
Thukham nei lo pa hong paina ahileh nalamdang, lim le a lamdang khemte tawh a kilak Satan nasepna tawh kizui hi-a,
a mangthang dingte a khem gitlohna namkimin hong pai ding hi. Amaute in thutak it ding le a kihotkhiat ding a nial manun a mangthang uh hi.
Hih thu hangin amaute in zuauthu a up nadingun Pasian in a vanglian lam pialsakna a puak hi,
tua in, thutak um lo a, gitlohna nuam a sate khempeuh a mawhpaih nading ahi hi.
Ahi hangin Topa in hong it sanggamte aw, a cilin Pasian in Kha siansuahna nasepna tungtawn le thutak upna tungtawna hotkhiat nadingin note hong teel a
I Topa Jesu Christ minthanna na ngah theih nadingun amah in note, hih ka gen uh lungdamna-thu tungtawnin hong sam zo hi.
Tua ahitak ciangin sanggamte aw, kammal tawh ahi zongin, laikhak tawh ahi zongin no tunga kong puaksawn uh thuhilhnate b
Eite hong itin ama hehpihna hanga tawntung hanthawnna le lametna pha hong pia i Topa Jesu Christ mahmah le i Pa Pasian in,
na lungtang uh hong hanthawnin a hoih na gamtatnate uh le a hoih na pauna tenguhah hong tha khauhsak ta hen.
A nunung penin sanggamte aw, note laka ahi khinsa bang tektek in, Topa thupuak a manlangin kizel a, a kipahtawi theih nadingin kote ading thu na ngetsak un.
Mi khempeuh in upna nei kim lo ahi manin, a gilo a tatkhelte pan hong kihut theih nadingin thu na ngetsak un.
Ahi hangin Topa a muanhuai hi, na tha uh hong khauhsak dinga, gilopa panin hong hu ding hi.
Kong thupiakte uh na zui uh a, a zui lai dingin Topa sungah kong muang uh hi.
Pasian itna sung le Christ thuakzawhna sungah a tung dingin Topa in lam hong lak ta hen.
Sanggamte aw, a thadahte le ko tung pana na ngah uh thuhilhna c
Ahang in, kote etteh a nong neih ding uh ahi zia, no mahmah in na thei uh hi. No tawh ka om khawm lai-un ka thadah kei uh a,
a man piak lohin kuama an ka ne kei uh hi. Tua sangsikin, note khatpeuh adingin vangik ka suah loh nadingun gim pipi tawl pipi-in sun le zanin na ka sem uh hi.
Kote in hih banga ka hih uh ciangin, huhna ngah dinga thuneihna ka neih loh man uh hi loin ko le ko mahmah na zuih ding uh limlak ka suah nadingun ka sep uh hizaw hi.
Ahang in, no tawh ka omkhawm nangawnun zong: "Mi khat in na a sep kei leh an ne kei hen," ci-in zuihtawm ngeina kong pia uh hi.
Note lakah pawlkhat thadah ci-in ka za uh hi. Amaute nasemin manlah lo uh a, midangte thu va kumin a manlah uh hi.
Tua bang mite in na khatpeuh semin amau nektawm ding beek a thalawh nadingun Topa Jesu Christ sungah thu pia-in ka kun uh hi.
Sanggamte aw, note na hi uh leh amaan note nasepna na cimtak ngei kei un.
Mi khatpeuh in hi lai sunga kong lah bangun a man nop kei leh amah na tuam ciamteh un. A maizum theih nadingin amah tawh na kikhawl kei un.
Ahi ta zongin na galbawl kei unla, sanggam bangin na vauhilh un.
Lemna Topa mahmah in, hun khempeuh a, lam khempeuh ah lungmuanna hong pia ta hen. Note khempeuh tawh Topa hong om khawm ta hen.
Keimah Paul in, hih hopihnate ka khutin ka gelh hi-a, ka laikhak khempeuh sungah ciamtehna tuam a suak hi. Hih in ka gelhzia ahi hi.
Eite Topa Jesu Christ hehpihna note khempeuh tawh om ta hen.
Eite Honpa Pasian le i lamet Christ Jesu thupiakna hangin Christ Jesu sawktakpi keimah Paul in,
Upna sunga ka tapa taktak Timothy tungah:
Pa Pasian le i Topa Christ Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
Macedonia ah ka pai lai-a kong kut bangin Ephesus mah ah na tam lai in. Tua pen mi pawlkhat in thu upna maan lo hilh nawn lo a,

tangthu phuahtawm le a bei thei lo khang ciamtehna peuh kana, a kipumpiak nawn loh nadingun thu na piak theih nading ahi hi. Hihte in upna hanga piang Pasian nasepna sangin kinialna a piangsak zaw hi.
Hih thupiakna ngim kung in, lungsim siangtho, eima kitheihna hoih le upna taktak pana piang itna ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhatte, hihte panin gamlapi gam mang zo uh a, a khiatna nei lo holimna ah a pial uh hi.
Thukham sia suak nuam uh a, ahi hangin a thugen uh a theih loh banuah hi taktak sa-a, kipsana a gente uh zong bang hiam cih a thei kei uh hi.
Mi khat in thukham ahi banga a zat nak leh hoih hi, cih i thei hi.
Eite theihna ah thukhama pen mi hoihte adinga kibawl hi loin; thukham a
angkawmte le a lehtatte, sila zuaka summet bawlte le zuautheite, zuauthu-a a kiciamte le thu-up maantak tawh kilehbulh peuhmahte adinga kibawl hizaw a,
tua thu-up maantak pen, amah in kei hong kepsak thupha Pasian aa ahi, a minthang lungdamna-thu tawh kituak ahi hi.
Muanhuai hong sa a, ama nasem dinga hong koih, tha hong guan i Topa Christ Jesu tungah ka lungdam hi.
Khatvei lai-in Pasian daisakpa, mi bawlsiapa, a ngongtatpa ka hi napi in, theihlah man le uplah mana gamta ka hi manin lainatna kei hong kipia hi.
Christ Jesu sunga om upna le itna zui-in i Topa hehpihna a dimletin kei tungah hong kisungkhia hi.
Hih lai-ah a bupa santham thugen muanhuai khat om a, tua in: mawhneite hon dingin Christ Jesu leitungah hong pai hi, ci hi. Tua mawhneite lakah kei a sia pen ka hi hi.

Ahi hangin tua thu hang tektekin Christ Jesu in, amah um a, nuntak tawntungna a sang dingte etteh dingin mawhneite khempeuh laka a sia pen keima tungah a bei thei lo ama lungduaina a latsak theih nadingin lainatna kei hong kilak zo hi.
Tu-in tawntung Kumpipa, a si thei lo, a kimu thei lo, amah bek Pasian tungah, a tawntungin pahtawina le minthanna om den ta hen.

Ka tapa Timothy aw, nang thu tawh kisai, khatvei lai-a genkholhnate tawh kituakin hih lamlahnate kong pia hi. Tua lamlahnate zui-a, upna le lungsim kitheihna hoih lenin galdona hoih na do theih nading ahi hi.
Mi pawlkhat in hihte nolh uh a, a upna uh a siasak ngi-ingei uh hi.
Amaute lakah, Pasian a gendai loh nadingun a kihilh dinga Satan tunga ka ap Hymenaeus le Alexander zong a kihel uh hi.
Tua ciangin, a masa penin mi khempeuh ading ngetnate, thungetnate ngetsakna le lungdamkohnate nei dingin kong kun hi.
Tua pen eite i pasian-mina le sianthona ah lungmuang tak le kilemtaka i nuntak theih nadingin, kumpite le thuneite khempeuh ading thungen ding cihna ahi hi.
Hih in hoih a, eite Honpa Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
Amah, mi khempeuh a kihotkhiat ding le thutak a theih ding uh a deih pa ahi hi.
Ahang in, Pasian khat om a, Pasian le mite kikalah palai khat omin tua mipa Christ Jesu ahi hi.
Mi khempeuh tat nadingin amah kipia a, tua teci panna thu a hun lianin kipia hi.
Tua hi-a hih thu ah kei tangko pa le sawltakpi-in hong kiseh hi; ka zuau hi loin ka takpi hi-a, Gentile-te tungah upna mantak a hilh dingin sia in hong kiseh hi.
Mun khempeuh ah pasal khempeuh in hehna le kitotna om loin a khut siangthote uh lamto a thu a nget ding uh ka deih hi.
Numeite zong a zahtak baang dingin, a kilawm a kituaka a kizep ding uh ka deih hi. Samphek ahi zongin, kham, kep manpha le puan mantamte tawh hi loin,
Pasian bia numeite adinga kilawm ciang gamtat hoih tawh a kizep ding uh hizaw hi.
Numei in dai hithiat in, kiniamkhiatna kim tawh sin ta hen.
Numei in pasal tungah thu a hilh ding ahikeh thu a neih ding ka phal kei hi; amah a sip dide kul hi.
Ahang in, Adam kibawl masa a, tua ciangin Eve kibawl hi.
A kikhem zo pen Adam ahi kei hi; a kikhem zo pen tua numei hi-a mawhnei a suak hi.
Ahi hangin numeite a
Hih lai-ah thugen muantak khat a om hi: Mi khatpeuh in pawlpi kem c
Pawlpi kem ahileh: ngawh bei, zi khat bek a nei, a kidaam thei, amah ki-uk zo, a zahtak baang, zindo a siam, a hilh thei,
lenggahzu a kham lo, a ngongtat lo, a lungnem, kitot a hat lo, sum iplah lo hi pelmawh ding hi.
Ama innkuan sung ukzo a a tate in zahtakna takpi tawh a thu a mante hi pelmawh ding hi.
(Mi khatpeuh in ama innkuan sung a uk nading zia a theih kei leh Pasian pawlpi bangci kep thei ding ahi hiam?)
A piangthak tung hi lo ding hi. Tua hi kei leh kimisak dinga, dawimangpa thuak bang thukhenna a thuak kha ding hi.
A maimawl loh nading le dawimangpa thanga a awk loh nadingin pualam mite in hoihtaka a zahtak hi pelmawh ding hi.
Tua mah bangin pawlpi upate zong, zahtak a baang mi, a thutak, lenggahzu a hai lo, a maan lo metna a zong lo mi hi ding hi.
Amaute lungsim kitheihna siangtak tawh a thuk upna thutakte a lenkipte hi pelmawh ding hi.
A pel loin amaute kizia-et masa dinga, paubaanna a om kei leh upa kisemsak pan ding hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin a zite d
Pawlpi upate, zi khat bek a nei hi pelmawh ding a, ama innkuan sung le a tate hoihtaka a uk zo hi pelmawh ding hi.
Limtaka na a semte in ama ading a hoih pen mun le Christ Jesu sunga a upna uh kitelcianna lianpi a ngah uh hi.
No kianga kong paipah ding ka lamet hi napi, hih lamlahnate kong gelh hi.

Kong ziakai khak leh Pasian innkuan sunga mite in amau le amau bangci gamtat ding cih na theih nading uh ka deihna ahi hi. Tua Pasian innkuan, a nungta Pasian pawlpi hi-a thutak khuampi le bulkip ahi hi.
A lian mahmah nial nading a om lo pasian-mina thuthuk ahi:
Amah e
Kha in dik tangsakin
vantung mite in mu uh a,
minamte lakah a thu kihilhin
leitungah ki-um a,
minthanna tawh kilato hi.
Hun nunung ciangin mi pawlkhat in upna nusia ding uh a, zuau a phuak khate le dawite hilhnate a zui ding uh hi, ci-in Kha in kiteltakin a gen hi.
Tua bang hilhnate kineihsiam mi zuaute tungtawna hong pai hi-a, amau lungsim kitheihna siksa-a bikton tawh kibang ahi hi.
Amaute in mi a kiten ding kham uh a, thumaan thei a, a um mite in, lungdam ko-a, a san dingun Pasian in a piansak an pawlkhat a tan dingun thu a pia uh hi.
Ahang in, Pasian piansak na khempeuh a hoih hi-a lungdam ko-a, a kisan khit nak leh nial ding khat beek a om kei hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian thu le thungetna tawh siansaksa ahi hi.
Nang in hih nate, sanggamte kianga na hilhkhiat leh upna le na zuihsa thuhilhna hoih thutakte sunga khangto Christ Jesu nasem hoih khat na hi ding hi.
A kiphuaktawm pasian-neilote tangthute le pitekte tangthu gente tawh kisawhkha kei inla, tua tangin na pasian-mi nadingin nang le nang kisin in.
Ahang in, pumpi kisinna in manphatna pawlkhat nei a, ahi hangin pasian-mina ahileh tu huna nuntak nading le hong tung ding nuntakna ah thuciam nei khawm ahi manin na khempeuh ah a manpha hi.
Hih in a bupa santham thugen muantak khat hi-a,
(hih hangin na semin nakpi-in i hanciam hi,) tua in mite khempeuh a diakdiakin a um mite ading, Honpa, a nungta Pasian sungah lametna i neihna ahi hi.
Hih nate thupiakna-in hilh in.
Na khangnona hangin kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in; ahi hangin thugenna, nun takna, itna, upna le sianthona ah thu-umte etteh dingin na om in.
Kong pai matengin mipite mai-ah Laisiangtho simin, thu hilhin lai hilhin hahkat in.
Upate in na tungah a khut uh a ngak laitak uh a thu genkholhna thupuak tungtawna hong kipia na letsong thudon loin om kei in.
Hih thute ah thanuam in; mi khempeuh in na khantoh zia a muh theih nadingin hihte ah kipumpiak in.
Na nuntakna le na thu-upna limtakin kemcing in. Tuate ah kuhkal lecin nang le na thugen a zate na honkhia ding hi.
A upazawpa tungah kamkhauh zangin tai kei inla, na pa bangin thudam tawh hansuah in. A khangnozawte na sang gampa bangin na bawl in;
a upazaw numeite, nute bang le a khangnozaw numeite siangthotakin sanggamnute bangin na bawl in.
A tasam takpi meigongnu limtakin na phawk in.

Ahi hangin meigongnu khat in tu le ta a neih leh amaute in a nu a pa, a pi a pu-te a thukkikna un, a biakna uh sepkhiat ding a masa penin sinin a innkuan sung uh kem uh hen; ahang in, hih in Pasian a lungkimsak hi.
Amah bek a kinusia a tasam takpi meigongnu in a lametna Pasian tungah nga-a, Pasian huh ding sun le zanin a ngen niloh hi.
Ahi hangin ama noptatna-a nungta meigongnu, a nuntak lai nangawnin a si ahi hi.
Kuamah a kimawhsak theih loh nadingin hih lamlahna mite tungah zong theisak in.
Mi khatpeuh in ama tanaute a diakdiak in a innkuanpih taktakte kisapna a huh kei leh upna a nial hi-a a um lo mi sangin a siazaw ahi hi.
Meigongnu khatpeuh a khan kum sawmguk a val khita, a pasal tunga a muanhuai a
Ahi zongin a gamtat hoihin, a tate khansuah zo a, zindo a siam, misiangte khe a silsak, gim ngahte huh tawntunga, gamtat hoih namkimte ah kipia zo mahmah in a kipahtak leh meigong lakah ciamteh in.
A khangno zaw meigong numeite ahileh tuate minlakah na hel kei in. Ahang in, a pumpi lunggulh nate in Christ tunga a ki-apna uh a zawh ciangin pasal a deih uh hi.
Amaute in a kamciam masa uh a palsat manun amau le amau thukhenna a kitun uh hi.
Tua banah thadahna zongsang uh a, inn simah a banvak uh hi. A thadah bek uh hi loin mi gensiat hatin, na khempeuh ah kum zo uh a, amau gen loh ding pipi a gen uh hi.
Tua ahi ciangin a khangno lai meigong numeite in, pasal nei in, ta nei in, a inn sung uh kem uh henla, gensiat nading hun hoih galpa pia kei le uh, cih ka thuhilhna ahi hi.
Pawlkhatte Satan nung a zui dingin lam a pial khin takpi ta uh hi.
Thu um numei khat ama innkuan sungah meigong numei a nei a om leh amau hangin pawlpi vangiksak loin amah in amaute huh ta hen. Tua hileh a kitasam takpi meigongte pawlpi in huh thei ding hi.
Pawlpi sung hoihtaka a makaih upate, a diakdiak in thuhilh le laihilh na a semte a zahnih in pahtawi ding kilawm hi.
Ahang in, Laisiangtho in: "Bawngtal in buh a cil laitakin a muk hencip kei in," b
Upa khat a kimawhsakna teci nih ahikeh thum a om kei leh thu-in na sang kei in.
Midangte vauhilhna a suah theih nadingin a mawhte mipite lakah na tai in.
Hih kong lamlahnate kuamah deidan lo, kuamah angvan tuan het loin na zat dingin Pasian le Christ Jesu le a kiteltuam vansawltakte mitmuhin nang kong suan hi.
Mi tungah khutngak ding man langlua kei inla, midang mawhna ah va kikum kei in. Nang le nang a siangtho-in kikem in.
Na gilpi le na cinat pahpahna hangin tuisik bek na dawndawn tawp inla, lenggahzu tawmtawm na zang in.
Mi pawlkhatte mawhna a kilang sise hi-a, amau ma ah thukhenna mun a na tung zo hi; adangte mawhnate in amaute a sulzuih hi.
Tua mah bangin gamtatna hoihte kilang sise a, a kilang sise lote zong a kiselcip thei kei hi.
Pasian min le eite hilhna a kigen siat loh nadingin sila hakkol nuai-a omte khempeuh in, a pute uh na khempeuh ah a zahtak tham cingin ngaihsun uh hen.

Thu um mi pu-a, a neite in zong, amaute sanggamta ahi uh zongin zahtak lo tuan kei hen. Tua sangsikin, amaute nasepna hanga hamphatna a ngahte in, thu-umte le amau a itte ahi manin a na uh a hoihzaw a, a sepsak ding uh hizaw hi. Hihte na hilh ding le amaute tunga na kut ding ahi hi.
Mi khatpeuh in thu-upna maan lo hilh a, i Topa Jesu Christ lamlahna bucing le Pasian thu lama hilhna a lungkim kei leh,
amah a kimisak hi a, bangmah a theitel lo ahi hi. Amah in kikalhna leh kiselna ah ukna maan lo a nei hi a, tuate in enna, kitotna, kigensiatna, a hoih lo lama kimuanmawhnate,
le lungsim sia mite kikalah kinawt ngitngetna a piangsak hi; amah thutak paii lo le pasian-mina, summet bawl nading beka a ngaihsun pa ahi hi.
Ahi hangin lungkimtaka pasian-mina in metna lianpi ahi hi.
Ahang in, eite in leitung ah bangmah i keng kei a, bangmah i puakhia thei kei hi.
Ahi hangin annek ding le puansilh ding i neih nak leh tua tawh i lungkim ding ahi hi.
Ahau nuam mite ahileh khemna le thang, a haihuai le a nasak thei lunggulh-luatnate hangin siatna le manthanna sungah a puk uh hi.
Ahang in, sum itna in siatna namkim bulpi ahi hi. Mi kimkhatte in sum deih lua-in tua upna pan pialkhia uh a, dahna tampi-in amau le amau a kisunlet uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang Pasian mipa aw, hihte khempeuh taisan inla, thumaanna, pasian-mina, upna, itna, sikdona le lungnemna na delh in.
Upna galdona hoih na do in. Hong theihpih tampite mai-ah kipulakna hoih na neihsa, hong sapna, tua nuntak tawntungna limtakin lenkip in.
Na khempeuh tungah nun takna a pia pa Pasian le Pontius Pilate mai-a pulakna hoih a pulak Christ Jesu mitmuh in:
Topa Jesu Christ hong kilat ni matengin a melhemna omlo, a kawk baang loin hih thupiakte na kep ding kong suan hi.
Tua hun pen Pasian thupha ngah amah bek Ukpa, kumpite’ Kumpi, tote’ Topa in ama hun lianin hong piangsak ding hi;
amah bek a si thei lo, a kineh thei lo khuavak sunga nungtapa, kuama muh ngei loh le a muh theih loh pa ahi hi. Ama tungah pahtawina le thahatna om tawntung ta hen. Amen.
Tu huna hih leitung sumhaute kiang ah, a ki-uatsak loh nading uh le a kician lo hauhna muang lo a, eite i lungnop nadingin na khempeuh kicingtaka hong piapa Pasian, a muan zawk nadingun thu pia in.
A hoih semin, gamtat hoih tampi a gamtat nading uh le cingh in mi a hop nop nadingun thu pia in.
Amaute in nuntakna taktak a letkip theih nadingun hong tung ding khanghun ah bulkip ahi dingin hih bangin gou a khol ding uh hi.
Timothy aw, na kep dinga hong kipia, limtakin cing in. Pasian nei lo thu mawk genna le a maan lopi-a theihna a kici, ngaihsutna kituak lote kiheimang san in.
Mi pawlkhatte tua bang nei a kicih hangun upna panin a pialmang uh hi.
Hehpihna nang tawh om ta hen.
Christ Jesu sunga om nuntakna kamciamsa tawh kizui-a Pasian deihna hanga Christ Jesu sawltakpi Paul in.
Ka tapa it Timothy tungah:
Pa Pasian le i Topa Christ Jesu tung pana hehpihna, lainatna le lemna om ta hen.
Ka thungetnate ah sun le zanin nang kong phawk tawntung a, ka pu ka pa-te hihsa bangin lungsim kitheihna siang tawh a na ka sep Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko hi.
Lungnopna tawh ka kidim theih nadingin na khituite phawk kikin nang kong muh ding ka lunggulh mahmah hi.
Na up taktakna ka phawka, tua thu-upna, na pi Lois sungah nungta masa-in, tua khitteh na nu Eunic sungah nungta a, tu-in nang sungah zong nungta hi cih teltakin ka taksang hi.
Hih thu hangin nang tunga ka khut kong ngakna tungtawna, nang sunga om Pasian letsong pen na zapkuang den ding kong phawksak kik hi.
Ahang in, Pasian in eite, zahkaina kha hong pia loin, vangliatna, itna le ei le ei ki-ukzawhna kha hong piazaw hi.
Tua ahi ciangin i Topa thu na genkhiat ding maizum kei inla, ama thongkia ka hina zong maizumpih tuan kei in. Ahi hangin Pasian vangliatna tawh lungdamna-thu hanga ka thuak, hong thuakpih in.
Eite sepsa khatpeuh hang hi loin ama ngimna le hehpihna hangin hong honkhia a, nuntakna siangtho-a nungta dingin hong sam hi. Hun kipat ma-in hih hehpihna Christ Jesu sungah eite hong kipia zo hi.
Ahi hangin tua hehpihna, eite’ Honpa Christ Jesu hong kilatna tungtawnin tu-in hong kilaakkhia hi. Amah in sihna susia a, lungdamna-thu tung tawnin nuntakna le sih theihlohna hong puak hi.
Tua hi-a hih lungdamna-thu tawh kisai-in a tangkopa sawltakpipa le siapa dingin kei hong kiseh hi.
Tua thu hangin hih banga a thuak ka hi hi. Tua hi napi ka maizum kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh ken ka up pa ka thei a, amah ka kepsakte tua ni adingin kem zo ding cih teltakin ka thei hi.
Kei tung pana na zaksate, Christ Jesu sunga om upna le itna tawh, hilhna kician lahna-in lenkip in.
Nang hong kikemsak na hoih kemin, eite sunga teng a Khasiangtho huhna tawh na cing in.
Phygelus le Hermogenes-te zong kihel in, Asia gama omte khempeuh in kei hong taihsat lam na thei hi.
Topa in Onesiphorus-te innkuan tungah a lainatna na lak ta hen. Bang hang hiam cih leh amah in ka kolbulh maizumpih loin thathak hong ngahsak ngitnget hi.
Hong maizumpih gen loh Rome ah a om lai-in kei hong muh matengin haksapi in hong zong hi.
Tua ni teh Topa kiang pana lainatna mu dingin Topa in seh ta hen! Amah in Ephesus ah lam tampi in kei hong huh lam teltakin na thei hi.
Tua ahi ciangin nang ka tapa aw, Christ Jesu sunga om hehpihna hangin thahat in.
Teci mi tampi mai-ah ka gen na zaksa nate midangte zong a hilh thei dinga a cin, a muanhuai mite na kemsak in.
Christ Jesu galkap hoih bangin haksatna kote hong thuakpih in.
Galkap nasem mi kuamah in tangpi vai vasaipih loin amah a makaih mangpa a lungkimsak nuam hi.
Tua mah tawh kibangin kidemna sunga kihel mi khat peuh in kidemna ngeinate zui a, a dem kei leh a gualzote ngah lukhu a ngah kei hi.
Hahkattaka nasem, lokhopa in a gahte tang masa pen hi.
Topa in hihte khempeuh a sungthu hong theisak ding ahi manin, kong thugen ngaihsun kik in.
David suan le khak misi pana a kithosak Jesu Christ phawk gige in.
Tualthat mawhna a nei khat banga kolbulhna ciang dong ka thuakna hih ka lungdamna-thu hang mah ahi hi. Ahi hangin Pasian thu kol a kibulh kei hi.
Tua ahi manin Christ Jesu sunga om hot khiatna a tawntung minthanna tawh a ngah khawm nadingun tua a teelsate hangin na khempeuh ka thuak hi.
Hih lai-ah a muantak thugen khat a om hi:
Amah tawh i sih khawm leh,
amah tawh i nungta khawm ding hi;
eite in i thuak leh,
amah tawh i uk khawm ding hi.
Amah leh amah kinial thei lo ahi manin amah i nial leh,
amah in zong eite hong nial ding hi;
eite i muanhuai kei zongin,
amah a muanhuai den ding hi,
ahang in, amah le amah a kinial thei kei hi.
Hih thute amaute phawksak kik den in. Thumalte peuh tawh kisai-a a kitot loh nadingun Pasian mai-ah amaute vauhilh in; tua in kimanna nei loin a ngai mite a siasak bek hi.
Maizumna om lo thutak thu diktakin a zang a santak nasempa bangin, Pasian tunga na kipiak theih nadingin na hih theih tawpin hih in.
Pasian thusimlohna, thu mawk gengen nate pel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua bang thu-a a uangte a pasian-mi kei semsem ding hi.
Amau thuhilhna, a banmuat meima bangin kizel hi. Amaute lakah Hymenaeus le Philetus,
thutak pana pialmangte kihel uh hi. Amaute in, "Thawhkikna tung khin ta hi," ci uh a, pawlkhatte upna a siasak uh hi.
Ahi zongin Pasian bulkippi kiptakin dinga, "Topa in ama aate a thei hi," a
Inn lianpi sungah ngun le kham tawh kibawl nate bek om lo a, sing le bellei tawh kibawl zong a om hi; pawlkhat a zatna thupi a, pawlkhatte a gina kei hi.
Tua a nunung pen pana mi khat amah le amah a kisiansak leh a zatna a thupi-a vanzat siangtho suaka, a Pu adingin kimanna a nei na hoih peuhpeuh sem dinga kimang thei a suak hi.
Khangno gitloh lunggulhnate taisan inla, lungsim singtho-a Topa a sam mite tawh thumaanna, upna, itna le lemna na delh in.
A haihuai le thugina lo kiselnate in kitotna piangsak cih thei na hi manin tuate ah kikum kha kei in.
Topa nasemte kuamah tawh kitawng peuhmah lo ding uh hi; tua sangsikin mikim tungah migi-in, thu hilh thei dinga, zakdah hau lo ding hi.
Amah a langdote lungnemtakin lamlak pelmawh hen, Pasian in amaute kisiksakin kiheisak dinga thutak theihna ah a pi ding hi.
Tua ciangin khua hong phawk ding uh a, ama deihna bang sem dinga sal-a a khawi dawimangpa thang pan a suakta ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin hih thu ciamteh in: ni nunungte ah a lauhuai hunte hong piang ding hi.
Mite in, amau le amau ki-itte, sum deihluate, kisialhhatte, kisa theite, siatgenhatte, nu-le-pa thu amang lote, lungdamna mel thei lote, a siangtho lote,
itna nei lote, a maisak nuam lote, gensiat-hatte, amah le amah ki-uk zo lote, a ngongtatte, a hoih deih lote,
a zuautatte, a gamhtatte, a kimisakte, Pasian it ding sanga nopsakna a itzawte,
pasian-mina lim nei napi a, a vangliatna a nialte hi ding uh hi. Amaute tawh kisawhkha kei in.
Amaute, kinelnelin mi innah va lut uh a, mawhnate tawh kidim lunggulhna namkim in a suknawk a tonawk,
a sinsin hanga thutak a thei lo numei zulhzaute a va zothawh gawpte ahi uh hi.
Jannes le Jambres-te in Moses a langdo bang tektekun, hih mite in zong thutak langdo uh a, amaute lungsim kisia gawpsa ahi manun upna thu tawh kisai-in a kinilkhiate ahi uh hi.
Ahi hangin amaute in ama uh a sot kei ding uh hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua mite thu tungtang mah bangin amaute haina zong mikim tungah a kitheitelsak ding hi.
Bangbang ahi zongin nang, ka thuhilhna thu khempeuh, ka nuntak zia, ka ngim ka tup, upna, lungduaina, itna, sikdona,

bawlsiatna, thuaknate - Antioch, Iconium le Lystra-te ah kei tungah bang teng pianga, bang bawl siatnate thuak ka hi hiam, cih a vekpi in na thei khin hi. Tua hi napi Topa in tuate khempeuh panin hong hukhia hi.
A taktakin Christ Jesu sunga pasian-mina tawh a nungta nuam mi peuhmah kibawlsia dinga,
migilo le mi kheltatte, mi khem le khemna thuakin a siat semsem laitak uh hi ding hi.
Ahi hangin nang na hileh na sinsa le na kipsansa ah kip den in. Bang hang hiam cih leh nang in tuate na sinna pa na thei-a,
Christ Jesu sunga upna tungtawnin hotkhiatna ngah nadingin hong pilsak thei a siangtho Laisiangtho na neu tunga kipan na theihsa ahilam zong na thei hi.
Laisiangtho khempeuh Pasian humuap hi-a, thuhilh nading, tai nading, bawlphat nading, thumaan lama pattah nadingin phatuamin manpha hi.
Tua in Pasian mipa pen na hoih khempeuh sem dingin kimtaka a kithuam theih nading ahi hi.
Pasian mai le misite le mihingte thukhen ding pa Christ Jesu mai-ah, hong kilat nading le a gam paulamin hih nasep kong guan hi:
Thu hilh in; ahun ahi-a, ahun ahi kei zongin kigingsa-in om in; kuhkaltak le kidawm mahmah kawmin lam lakin, bawlpha in, tai-in, hanthawn in.

Ahang in, mite in thu-up bucing a cimtak hun hong tung ding hi. Tua sangsikin, amaute lunggulhna tawh kituakin, a bil thakna uh tawh kituak, a zaknophuai lel thu a gen dingin amau kiangah sia tampitak a kaikhawm ding uh hi.
Amaute in thutak lehngatsan ding uh a, phuahtawm tangthu lamah a nga ding uh hi.
Ahi hangin nang na hileh bangmah peuhah pilvang inla, haksatna thuakin sawltak na sem inla, na Pasian nasepna ah na nasep khempeuh zo in.
Ahang in, dawntheih-a biakna banga sun dingin a mansa in ka om a, ka pai hun hong tung zo hi.
Galdona hoih do khin in, tai kidemna ka tai zo a, upna ka kemcing zo hi.
Tu-in thumaana thukhenpa Topa in tua ni cinga kei hong piak ding thumaanna lukhu kei ading a om zo hi. Kei bek hong kipia loin ama kilat ding lawpa a ngakte khempeuh zong a pia ding hi.
A manlang theithei-in ka kiangah hong pai dih in.
Ahang in, Demas in hih leitung a it manin kei hong taisan a, Thessalonica ah a pai hi. Galatia ah Crescens pai zo a, Dalmatia ah Titus a pai hi.
Kei kiangah Luke bek a om hi. Mark hong zawn inla hong tonpih in. Bang hang hiam cih leh ka nasepna ah amah ka phattuampih mahmah hi.
Ephesus ah Tychicus ka sawl hi.
Nong pai ciangin Troas a Carpus kianga ka nusiat ka puantualpi le ka laizialte a diakdiak in ka savun laizialte hong puak in.
Sum sungpa Alexander in nakpi in kei hong bawlsia hi. Ama hihsa tawh kituakin Topa in a thukkik ding hi.
Amah in ka thupuak uh langdo lua mahmah ahi manin, nang zong kidawm mahmah in.
Ka kihutna thu ka gen masak lai-in kuamah in kei hong panpih lo-a, a kuamahpeuh in hong taisan uh hi. Amaute kimawhsak kei ta hen.

Ahi hangin ka gei-ah Topa dinga, kei tungtawnin Gentile-te khempeuh in tua thupuak a zak nadingun kicingtaka ka tangko theih nading tha hong guan hi. Tua hi-a, humpinelkai kam panin kei hong hukhia hi.
Gitlohna tawh hong kisukna citeng panin Topa in kei hong hu dinga, ama vantung gamah bittakin hong tunpih ding hi. Ama tungah a tawntungin minthanna om den ta hen. Amen.
Priscilla a
Korinth ah Erastus taam-a, Miletus ah Trophimus cinasa in ka nusia hi.
Phalbi ma-in hih lai tun hong sawm teitei in. Eubulus in nang hong hopih a Pudens, Linus, Claudia le sanggamte khempeuh in zong hong hopih uh hi.
Topa in na kha hong ompih ta hen. Hehpihna in nang hong ompih ta hen.
Pasian teelte, upna le pasian-mina - a tun thutak theih nadinga -
tua upna le theihna pen zuau a gen lo Pasian in hun kipat ma-a a ciamsa, nuntak tawntung nading lametna tungah kinga a,
eite Honpa Pasian thupiakna tawh hun a sak hun lianin, thuhilhna tungtawna ama thu hong kilatsakna Pasian nasem le Jesu Christ sawltakpi keimah Paul in,
Eite in i upkhawm upna sunga ka tapa taktak Titus tungah:
Pa Pasian le eite Honpa Christ Jesu pana hehpihna le lemna hong tung ta hen.
Crete a nang kong nusiatna pen, a kizo nai lo a kinusiate na zawhsiang theih nading le nang kong lamlah bangin khuapi kima upate a seh a
Upa dingte: a pel loin kawkbaanna om lo ding, zi khat bek a nei, a tate zong thu um mi hi ding a, phengphi-a a thumang lo mi a hi kei ding hi.
Saptuam kem b
Tua sangsikin, a pel loin zindo siam mi, a hoih deih mi, ama pumpi ki-uk zo mi, a thutang mi, a siangtho le a kisek zo mi hi ding hi.
Amah in midangte thu-upna maan tawh han thawna a langpante a nial theih nadingin a kihilhsa a muantak, thupuak kiptakin a len pelmawh ding hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh a diakdiakin vunat pawlte sungah a lehdo thei mi, a kamsi le a zuauphuak mi tampi a om hi.
Amaute kamhum ding uh hi. Ahang in, a hilh loh ding pipi uh hillhin innkuan sung buppi a siasak uh hi; tua zong a maan lo-a metna zonna ahi hi.
Amau kamsangte khat nangawn in, "Crete mite zuauphuak dente, gilo ngongtatte, thadah a anhaite ahi hi," na ci hi.
Hih teci panna a maan ahi hi. Tua ahi manin amaute upna ah a kip theih nading uh le
Jew-te phuahtawm tang thute ahikeh thutak a nial mite thupiakte a thudon loh nadingun khauh takin tai in.
A siangthote aa in na khempeuh siangtho a, ahi hangin a kisiate le a um lo mite aa in a siangtho khat beek a om kei hi. A taktakin amaute lungsim le a lungsim kitheihna uh a siakhawm hi.
Pasian thei kineih uh a, ahi hangin a gamtatna uh tawh a nial uh hi. Amaute mi huathuai, a thumang lo, na hoih sem dinga a cin lo uh ahi hi.
Thu-up maan tawh kituakin hilh pelmawh in.
Pasal khanghamte a kidaam thei ding, zahtak baang ding, amau le amau ki-uk zo ding, upna, itna le thuakzawhna ah a kip nadingun hilh in.
Tua tawh kibangin numei khang hamte, amaute nuntakna ah zahtak baang ding, mi gensiat hat loin, zu hai lo ding, ahi hangin a hoih khempeuh a sinsak dingun hilh in.
Kuamah in Pasian thu a gensiat loh nading in, amaute in, nupilate in a pasalte uh le a tate uh a it ding,
amau le amau ki-uk thei ding uh a, siangthoin, innah manlahin, migi-in, a pasalte uh thu a man ding uh a hilh thei ding uh hi.
Tua mah bangin pasal khangno laite amau le amau a ki-uk zawh nadingun hanthawn in.
Na khempeuhah na hoih semin amaute etteh na suak in. Thu na hilh ciangin thutakna, cihtakna,
le a kimawhpaih thei lo kampau siangtho lak in. Tua hileh hong langpante in, eite tungah thusia bangmah mu loin a maizum ding uh hi.
Silate in na khempeuhah a pute uh thu manga, amaute a lungkimsak ding uh hahkatin, amaute kam sel loin,
a na uh guksak loin a muanhuai zaw dingin hilh in. Tua hileh i Honpa Pasian tawh kisai hilhnate a deihhuai a suaksak ding uh hi.
Ahang in, hotkhiatna hong puak Pasian hehpihna, mi khempeuh tungah a kilang zo hi.
Tua hehpihna in pasian-milohna le leitung vaite deihna tawh kisai-a, "Ut lo," ci ding le pumpi ki-uk zo-a nungta ding, diktat ding le tu khanghunah pasian-mitakin nungta dinga hong hilh lai mah in,
a lian a minthang eite Pasian le Honpa Jesu Christ hong kilat nading-lametna thupha i ngak hi.
Amah, tatsiatna khempeuh pana eite hong tankhia ding le ama hong neihtuam dingin amahmah in hong siansuaha, a hoih a gamtat ding a lawp dingin eite ading amahmah hong kipia pa ahi hi.
Tua ahi ciangin hihte khempeuh hilh in; thuneihna khempeuh tawh hansuah inla tai in. Kuamah kisimmawhsak kei in.
Tua mite in gam-ukte le thuneite thu nial lo-a, a thu uh mangin, a hoih peuhpeuh sem dingin kiging kholin,
kuamah gensia loin mi tawh kilemin, mi ading khualin mi khempeuh tungah kiniamkhiatna taktak a lah dingun phawksak kik in.

Hun khat lai-in eite zong ahai, a thumang lo, mi khemsa le pumpi lung gulhna namkim le noptatna sila i hi hi. Gitlohna le hazatna tawh kidim in, mite muhdah le khat le khat kimuhdahna tawh i nungta hi.
Ahi hangin eite Honpa Pasian migitna le itna hong kilat ciangin,
amah in thu maana na i sep hang hi lo, ama lainatna hangin eite hong hon hi. Amah in eite suahkikna-a silsiangna le a Khasiangtho bawlphat thakna tungtawnin hong hon hi.
Amah in eite Honpa Jesu Christ tung tawnin tua Kha Siangtho cingtakin eite tungah hong sungkhia hi.
Tua pen ama hehpihna hanga diktansak, nuntak tawntungna lametna a nei gouluahte i suah theih nading ahi hi.

Hih in a muantak thugen ahi hi: Pasian a muangte in a hoih peuhmah hih dinga, amau le amau a kipiak zawh nadingun hih thute na uang gen ding kong deih hi. Hihte in mi khempeuh adingin a hoih pen le a phatuam pen ahi hi.
Ahi hangin a haihuai kikalhnate, khang tangthute, thukham thu a kiselnate le kitotnate peel in. Bang hang hiam cih leh hihte, phattuamna nei lo le a kimanna bei ahi hi.
Pawl khen nuam mipa khatvei vauhilh inla, tua khitin a nihveina vauhilh lai in. Tua khit ciangin amah thudon nawn kei in.
Tua bang mite a tuampian le mawhdim hi-a, amah le amah kimawhpaih hi cih ciantakin na thei ding hi.
Artemas ahikeh Tychicus no kiangah kong sawl phetin Nicopolis ah ka kiangah pai hong sawm teitei in. Bang hang hiam cih leh tua lai-ah phalbi sung va om dingin ka khentat khin hi.
Tangdingpa Zenas le Apollos na huh theih bangbangun na huh unla, a kisap khempeuh uh na thei un.
I mite mawk nuntak loin a nisim kisapnate uh a kisiktawm zawh nadingun na hoih sem dingin amau le amau a kipiak nadingun kisin pelmawh uh hen.
Kei tawh a omkhawm teng in hong hopih kim uh hi. Upna sunga ei hong itte na hopihsak in.
Hehpihna in note khempeuh hong ompih ta hen.
Christ hanga thongkia pa Paul le i sanggampa Timothy in,
Ka lawm it uh le ka naseppih uh Philemon,
ka sanggamnu uh Apphia, ka galkappih uh Archippus le na inna kikhawm pawlpi tungah:
I Pa Pasian le Topa Jesu Christ tung pana hehpihna le lemna note tungah om ta hen.
Ka thungetna ah note kong phawk simin ka Pasian tungah lungdam ka ko tawntung hi.
Bang hang hiam cih leh Topa Jesu sunga na upna le misiangte khempeuh na itna thu ka za zo uh hi.

Tua ahi tak ciangin kong it lawmte aw, hih a ngak na hi nungsangun a nin baang lo, kawkbanna om lo le amah tawh kilema hong muh theih nadingin na hih theih tawpun hahkatin hih un.
I sang gam it Paul in zong Pasian in amah a piak pilna tawh note kianga hong gelhsa bang tektek in, i Topa lungduaina - hotkhiatna ahilam note lungsim sungah phawk gige un.

A laikhak khempeuh ah a kibangmah gelhin hih thute mah a gen hi. A laikhakte sungah a theihhak pawlkhat om-a, a thei lote le a kip lo mite in amau mah siat nadingin Laisiangtho dangte a hih bangun tuate a lehkaih uh hi.
Tua ahi manin kong it lawmte aw, hih thu na theih khit nungsangun thukham a zui lo mite khialhna in hong manthanpih a, note bitna mun pan na puk khak loh nadingun kikem un.
Ahi hangin i Topa le Honpa Jesu Christ hehpihna le theihna-ah na khangto un. Ama tungah tu le a tawntungin minthanna om ta hen! Amen.
A tunga omsa, kote in ka zaksa uh, ka mit uh tawh ka muhsa uh, en-a ka khut uh tawh ka lawnsa uh, hih nuntakna Thu tawh kisai kong tangko uh hi.
Tua nuntakna hong kilang zo a, kote in mu khinin teci ka pang uh a, Pa tawh a om khawm ko kianga hong kilak tua nuntak tawntungna no tungah kong tangko uh hi.
Note zong kote tawh na kipawl theih nadingun, ka muhsa uh le ka zaksate uh no tungah kong tangko uh hi. Kote kipawlna ahileh Pa le ama Tapa Jesu Christ tawh kipawlna ahi hi.
Ka a
Ama tung panin za-a, no tungah kote hong pulak thupuak in: Pasian, khuavak hi-a; ama sungah khuamial a om peuhmah kei hi.
Eite amah tawh i kipawl hi, ci napi in khuamial sungah i kalsuan lai leh zuauphuak i suaka, thutaka nungta lo i hi hi.
Ahi hangin khuavak sungah i kalsuan leh amah khuavak ahi mah bangin eite khat le khat i kipawla, ama Tapa Jesu sisan in i mawhna khempeuh b
Mawhna ka nei kei hi, i kicih leh ei le ei kikhem i hi a, eite sungah thutak a om kei hi.
Eite in i mawhnate i pulak leh i mawhnate hong maisakin i thumaanlohna khempeuh hong siangsak dingin amah muanhuai-in a thutang hi.
Eite in mawhna ka bawl kei hi, i cihleh amah zuauphuak i suaksak a, i nuntakna sungah ama thu a om kei hi.
Kong it ka tate aw, na mawh loh nadingun hih thu kong gelh hi. Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in mawhna a bawl khak leh eite hong guma Pa kiangah hong gensak ding mi khat - Thumaan Pa Jesu Christ i nei hi.
Amah, eite mawhnate thoihdamna dingin biakpiakna hi-a, eite ading bek hi lo leitung buppi mawhnate thoihdam nadinga c
Ama thupiakte i zuih leh amah i thei zo cih i thei hi.
"Amah ka thei hi," a ci mi in ama thupiakte a zuih kei leh zuauphuak hi-a, ama sungah thutak a om kei hi.
Ahi hangin mi khatpeuh in ama thu a mang leh Pasian itna d
‘Ama sungah ka nungta hi,’ a ci peuhmah, Jesu gamtat bangin a gamta pelmawh ding hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, note kiangah thupiak thak kong gelh kei-a, a cil pana na neihsa uh a lui pen mah ahi hi. Hih thupiak lui, na zaksa uh thupuak mah ahi hi.
Tua hi napi thupiak thak khat hong gelh ka hi hi; khuamial bei zo a, thumaan khuavak tang khin zo ahi manin amah le note sungah a thutak kimu zo hi.
Mi khatpeuh in khuavak sungah ka om hi, ci napi in a sanggampa a muhdah leh khuamial sunga om lai ahi hi.
Ama sanggampa a it mi peuhmah khuavak sunga a nungta hi a, ama e
Ahi hangin a sanggampa a mudah peuhmah khuamial sunga om hi-a khuamial sunga vak kawikawi ahi hi. Khuamial in a mit tawsak ahi manin a pai nading mel a thei kei hi.
Kong it tate aw,
ama min hangin na mawhnate uh kimaisak khin zo ahi manin note lai kong khak hi.
Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omsa pa,
thei zo na hi manun note lai kong khak hi.
Khangnote aw, a gilopa zo khin zo na hi manun
note lai kong khak hi.
Kong it tate aw, Pa thei khin na hi manun
note lai kong khak hi.
Pate aw, a tunga kipan a omdensa pa thei zo na hi manun,
note lai kong khak hi.
Khangnote aw,
note thakhauhin note sungah
Pasian thu teng a,
a gilopa zo khin na hi manin note lai kong khak hi.
Leitung ahikeh a sunga om nate khatpeuh it kei un. Mi khatpeuh in leitung a it leh ama sungah Pa itna a om kei hi.
Ahang in, leitunga om na khempeuh: mawhdim mi lunggulh-luatnate, mittang etlahnate, neihsa le sepsa kisialhpihnate, Pa tung pana hong pai hi loin leitung pan ahi hi.
Leitung le ama deihna mangthang lel a, ahi hangin Pasian deihna bangin a gamta mi a nungta tawntung hi.
Kong it tate aw, hih hun, hun nunung ahi hi. Hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh antichrist bangin tu nangawnin antichrist tampi hong pai zo uh hi. Hih bangin hun nunung ahilam i thei hi.

Amaute, eite lak pana paikhia ahi uh hi. Ahi hangin eite aa taktak ahi kei uh hi. Ahang in, eite aa taktak hi uh hileh eite lak mah ah omden ding uh hi. Ahi hangin amaute paikhiatna in, amaute khat beek eite aa ahi lohna uh hong lak hi.
Ahi hangin note, Siangtho Pa sathau nilhsa na hi uh a, na vekun thutak a
Thutak na theih loh manun note lai hong khak ka hi kei a, thutak na theih hang uh le tua thutak pana zuauthu a pian loh hanga hong khak ka hizaw hi.
A zuaupa kua ahi hiam? Jesu in Christ ahi hi, cih thu a nial mi a zuaupa ahi hi. Tua bang mi antichrist hi-a, amah in Pa le Tapa a nial hi.
Tapa a nial peuhmah in Pa a nei kei hi. Tapa a sang peuhmah in Pa zong a nei hi.
A tunga na zaksa mah uh note sungah omden hiam, cih na ki-entel un. A om leh Tapa sung le Pa sungah note zong na omden ding uh hi.
Amah in eite hong kamciam, hih nuntak tawntungna mah ahi hi.
Note lam pialsak hong sawmte tawh kisai-in hih thute kong gelh hi.

Note na hi uh leh ama sathau nilhna na ngah uh, no sungah omden a, note hong hilh ding kuamah na kisam kei uh hi. Ahi hangin ama hong sathau nilhna in na khempeuh thu hong hilh bangin tua sathau nilhna a lim bek hi lo hi, a taktak ahi hi, note hong hilhsa bang tektekin ama sungah na omden un.
Tu-in kong it tate aw, amah hong pai-a hong kilat ciangin ama mai-ah maizumna om lo-a, kimuangtaka i om theih nadingin ama sungah omden un.
Amah a thumaan hi, cih na theih uh leh thumaan a hih peuhmah ama sunga suak ahi hi, cih na thei uh hi.
Eite, Pasian tate cih-a i om nadingin Pa in eite tunga hong sunleet itna lian mahmah si! Ei lah tua mah i hi hi! Leitung in eite hong theih lohna amah a theih loh hang ahi hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, tu-in eite, Pasian tate i hi a, mailamah bang i hi lai ding hiam, hong kitheisak nai lo hi. Ahi hangin amah hong kilat b
Ama sunga hih lametna a nei peuhmah, amah a siantho bang tektekin amah le amah a kisiangthosak hi.
A mawh peuhmah thukham palsat ahi hi; a taktakin mawhna pen thukham palsatna ahi hi.
Ahi hangin i mawhnate a lakmang theih nadingin amah hong kilang ahilam na thei uh hi. Ama sungah ahileh mawhna a om kei hi.
Ama sunga nungta mi khatpeuh, mawhna a zongsang kei hi. Mawhna a zongsang mi peuhmah amah a mu nai lo, a thei nai lo ahi hi.
Kong it tate aw, mi khatpeuh na kipimangsak kei un. Amah a thumaan bang tektekin amaana gamta mi peuh mah a thumaan ahi hi.
A kipatcil-a kipan dawimangpa a mawhden ahi manin mawhna a bawl mi peuhmah dawimangpa pana piang ahi hi. Pasian Tapa hong kilatna ahang pen dawimangpa nasepna a susia ding ahi hi.
Pasian pana piang peuhmah, Pasian cii ama sungah omden ahi manin mawhna a zongsang kei ding hi; bang hang hiam cih leh amah Pasian pana piang ahi manin mawhna a zong sang kei hi.
Hih in Pasian tate le dawimangpa tate i theihkak theih nading ahi hi. Mi khatpeuh amaana a gamtat kei a, ama sanggampa a it kei leh Pasian ta ahi kei hi.
A cil-a kipan na zak uh thupuak in: Eite khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
Gilopa aa ahi, a sanggampa a that pa Cain na bang kei un. Tua ahileh bang hangin amah that ahi hiam? Bang hang hiam cih leh ama gamtatnate gilo-a, a sanggampa gamtatnate amaan hang ahi hi.
Ka sanggamte aw, leitung mite in note hong muhdah leh lamdang sa kei un.
Eite in i sanggamte i it manin sihna pan paikhia-in nuntakna sungah i lut zo cih i thei hi. A it lo mi peuhmah sihna sungah a om lai hi.
A sanggam a it lo mi peuhmah tualthat hi-a, tualthat kuamah in ama sungah nuntak tawntungna a neih loh lam na thei uh hi.
Itna bang ahi hiam cih i theihna hih ahi hi: Jesu Christ in eite adingin a nuntakna hong khaam hi. Tua bangin eite in i sanggamte adingin i nuntakna i khaam ding kul hi.
Mi khatpeuh in neih le lam nei-in a sanggampa kisap lam thei napi amah a hehpih kei leh bangci bangin ama sungah Pasian itna om thei ding ahi hiam?
Kong it tate aw, a thu le kamsiam bek tawh ki-it loin gamtatna le thutakin ki-it ni.
Tua in, thutak aa i hina i theihna le eite i lungtang in hong mawhpaih peuhpeuh ciangin ama mai-ah i lungsim tawlngakna i theihna ahi hi.
Ahang in, i lungtang sangin Pasian lianzaw a, na khempeuh a thei hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, i lungtang in eite hong mawhpaih kei leh Pasian mai-ah kimuanna nei-in,
ama thupiakte manga, amah lungkimsak i hi manin ama tungah i nget khatpeuh i ngah thei hi.
Ama thupiak hih ahi hi: Ama Tapa Jesu Christ min up ding le amah in eite hong thupiak bangin khat le khat i ki-it ding ahi hi.
Ama thupiakte a mangte ama sungah nungta a, amaute sungah amah a nungta hi. Hih in amah eite sungah a nuntak lam i theihna ahi hi: Eite in ama hong piak Kha-in tua i thei hi.
Kong it lawmte aw, kha khatpeuh um kei un; ahi hangin leitung ah kamsang zuau tampi paikhia khin ahi manin amaute kha Pasian pan hi hiam, hi lo hiam cih sittel un.
Pasian Kha na khentel theih nading uh hih bang ahi hi: Jesu Christ mihingin hong pai hi, ci-a a sang kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi-a,
ahi hangin tua banga Jesu a sang lo kha peuhmah Pasian pan hi lo hi. Hih in antichrist kha hi-a, hong pai ding ci-a na zaksa uh, tu nangawnin leitunga a om khin zo ahi hi.
No, kong it ka tate Pasian pan na hi uh a, leitunga om pa sangin no sunga om pa lianzaw ahi manin amaute na zawhsa uh ahi hi.
Amaute leitung pan hi uh a, tua ahi manin leitung ngaihsutna tawh thu genin leitung in amau thu a ngai hi.
Eite Pasian pan i hi-a, Pasian a thei peuhmah in i thu a ngai uh hi. Ahi hangin Pasian pan ahi lo peuhmah in i thu a ngai kei uh hi. Thutak Kha a
Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian pana itna hong pai ahi manin eite khat le khat ki-it ni. A it thei mi peuhpeuh, Pasian pana suak hi-a Pasian a thei hi.
A it thei lo mi peuhmah in Pasian a thei kei hi; bang hang hiam cih leh Pasian in itna ahi hi.
Pasian in ama itna eite lakah hong lahna hih bang ahi hi: Ama tungtawna eite i nuntak theih nadingin amah in a Tapa neihsun b
Itna hih ahi hi: Eite in Pasian i it cihna hi lo, amah in eite hong it-a, i mawhnate thoihdamna dingin c
Kong it lawmte aw, Pasian in eite hi zaha hong it khit nungsangin eite zong khat le khat i ki-it ding kisam hi.
Mi khat beek in Pasian a mu ngei kei hi; ahi hangin eite khat le khat i ki-it leh, Pasian eite sungah hong tengin i sungah a itna kicingsak hi.
Amah in eite ama Kha hong pia khin ahi manin eite ama sungah i nungta a, amah eite sungah a nungta cih i thei hi.
Tua hi-a Pa in leitung Honpa dingin ama Tapa hong sawl zo hi, cih eite in i mu khin a, teci i pang hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a a san leh ama sungah Pasian tenga, Pasian sungah amah a teng hi.
Tuaci bangin Pasian in eite hong it lam i thei a, tua itna tungah i kinga hi.
Pasian in itna ahi hi. Itna sungah a nungta mi peuhmah Pasian sunga nungta hi-a, ama sungah zong Pasian a nungta hi.
Thukhen ni cianga muang taka i om nadingin hih bangin eite lakah itna hong kicingsak hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh hih leitung ah amah tawh i kibang hi.
Itna sungah launa a om kei hi. Ahi hangin a kicing itna in launa a hawlkhia hi; bang hang hiam cih leh launa pen gawt ding kihtakna ahi hi. A lau mite, itna sungah kicinsak nai loh ahi hi.
Amah in eite hong it masa ahi manin eite in i it hi.
Mi khatpeuh in, "Pasian ka it hi," ci napi a sanggampa a muhdah lai leh zuauphuak pa ahi hi. Ahang in, a muh gige a sanggampa a it lo mi in, a muh nai loh Pasian a it thei kei hi.
Amah in eite hih thupiak hong pia zo hi. Pasian a it peuhmah in pel loin a sanggampa zong it hen.
Jesu in Christ ahi hi, ci-a a umte peuhmah Pasian pana suak hi-a a pa a it peuhmah in a ta zong a it hi.
Pasian tate i it lam i theihna in: Pasian itna le ama thupiakte sepkhiatna ahi hi.
Pasian i itna in: ama thupiakte manna ahi hi. Ama thupiakte lah a haksa lua kei hi;
ahang in, Pasian pana piang peuhmah in leitung a zawhsa ahi hi. Leitung a zo gualzawhna zong tua eite upna mah ahi hi.
Kuate in leitung zo uh ahi hiam? Jesu, Pasian Tapa hi, ci-a umte bek ahi hi.
Tui le sisana hong pai pa, Jesu Christ ahi hi. Amah tui bekin hong pai lo a, tui le sisanin hong pai hi. Tua thu teci pangpa Kha ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh tua Kha, thutak ahi hi.
Ahang in, tua thu teci a pang thum om a:
Kha, tui le sisan ahi hi; d
Eite in mihing teci panna i sang hi. Ahi hangin Pasian in ama Tapa thu teci a panna ahi manin Pasian teci panna a lianzaw hi.
Pasian Tapa a um mi peuhmah in a lungtang sungah hih teci panna a nei hi. Pasian a um lo mi peuhmah in Pasian in a Tapa thu teci a panna um lo ahi manin amah zuauphuak a suaksak hi.
Tua hi-a hih in teci panna ahi hi: Pasian in eite nuntak tawntungna hong pia a, tua nuntakna Tapa sungah a om hi.
Tapa a nei mi in nuntakna a nei hi; Pasian Tapa a nei lo mi in nuntakna a nei kei hi.
Pasian Tapa min a um note in nuntak tawntungna na neih lam uh na theih nadingun no tungah hihte kong gelh hi.
Pasian i zuat cianga i kimuanna in: ama deihna tawh kituak a na khatpeuh i nget leh amah in hong za hi.
Amah in i ngetna hong za hi, ci-a i theih leh ama kianga i nget peuhpeuh i ngah hi, cih i theihna ahi hi.

Mi khatpeuh in, a sanggampa in sihna a tun lo mawhna khatpeuh a bawl a muh leh thu ngen ta hen; Pasian in amah nuntakna pia ding hi. Sihna a tun lo mawhna a hihte gen ka hi hi. Sihna a tun mawhna khat a om hi. Tua thu-a thu ngetsak ding ka ci kei hi.
Gamtat khialhna khempeuh mawhna hi-a ahi hangin sihna a tun lo mawhna a om hi.
Pasian pana suak mi khatpeuh mawhna ah a zongsang kei cih i thei a, Pasian pana suakpa amah bittakin kikemcing a, gilopa in amah a lawng thei kei hi.
Eite Pasian tate i hilam le leitung buppi gilopa ukna nuai-a om ahilam i thei hi.

Amah a thumaanpa a hina i theih nadingin Pasian Tapa hong pai zo cihleh theihtelna hong pia hi cih zong i thei hi. Eite tua ama Tapa Jesu Christ thu maanna sungah i om hi. Amah a thumaan Pasian le nuntak tawntungna ahi hi.
Kong it tate aw, milimte panin no le no na kikem un.
Upapa in,
Thutak sunga ka it, kei bek hi lo thutak a theite khempeuh in zong a it uh -
kote sunga om, kote tawh a omkhawm tawntung ding tua thutak hanga teelsa upanu le a tate tungah:
Pa Pasian le Pa’ Tapa Jesu Christ tung panin hehpihna, lainatna le lemna in thutakna le itna tawh eite hong ompih ding hi.
Pa in eite hong thupiak bang tektek in, na tate uh pawlkhat thutakin a kalsuan uh ka muh in nakpi-in hong nuamsak hi.
Kong it upanu aw, tu-in thupiak a thak kong gelh kei-a, a kipatcil-a i neihsa pen mah ahi hi. Eite khat le khat i ki-it thuk ding kong thum hi.
Ama thupiak manga kalsuanna in: itna ahi hi. A cil-a kipan na zaksa bangun ama thupiak in: itna sungah na gamta un, ci hi.
Jesu Christ ci-le-sa in hong pai hi, ci-a a sang lo, mikhem tampi leitung ah paikhia khin zo uh hi. Tua bang mi peuhmah mikhem le antichrist ahi hi.
Ngah sawma na sep uh pahtakman, mansuah loin a kima na ngah nadingun kigalging un.
Mi khatpeuh a khengvalin pai a, Christ thuhilhna-a a om den lo pa in Pasian a nei kei hi; tua hilhna-a a om den peuhmah in Pa le Tapa a nei khawm hi.
Mi khatpeuh no kiangah hong pai a, hih thuhilhna mah a hilh kei leh na muak kei unla, na inn uah zong na tungsak kei un.
Amah a muak peuhmah ama gilo nasepna ah a kihel ahi hi.
Note tungah kong gelh nop a tam mahmah hangin laidal le laitui ka zang nuam kei hi. Tua sangsik in, i lungnopna a kim theih nadingin hong hawh a, maitang kituah in, thu i kikup ding ka lamen hi.
A kiteel na sanggamnu uh tate in hong hopih nate uh hong khak uh hi.
Upapa in,
Thutak sunga ka it ka lawm ngaih Gaius tungah:
Kong it lawm aw, na kha a cidam bangin na pumpi zong cidama, na khempeuh ah na lawhcin nadingin thu ka ngen hi.
Sanggamte pawlkhat hong pai-in, thutaka na muanhuaina thu le tua thutaka na kalsuan, na zopsuakna thu hong ko uh a, ka lungdam mahmah hi.
Thutaka ka tate a kalsuan ka zaka ka lungdamna sangin lungdamna lianzaw ka nei kei hi.
Kong it lawm aw, sanggamte na theih ngei loh mi hi napi, amaute tunga na gamtatna ah na muanhuai hi.
Amaute in na itna thu pawlpi tungah ko uh hi. Pasian tunga gamtat dinga kilawm zahin a lampi-uah amaute na kha lecin na hoih sem na hi ding hi.
Amaute in lawkite tung panin huhna ngah lo uh a, tua Min hang bekin a kuankhia uh ahi hi.
Tua ahi manin thutak na i sepkhawm theih nadingin tua mite tungah zindo i siamna i lah ding kisam hi.
Pawlpi tungah lai ka khaka, ahi hangin tungnuntuhpa Diotrephes in kote hong thudon nuam lo hi.

Tua ahi ciangin kong pai leh ama gamtatna le kote hong gensiatnate kong pholak ding hi. Amah tuate tawh lungkim zo nai loin sanggamte a na muak nuam kei hi. Tua banga a hih nuamte khamin pawlpi panin a hawlkhia hi.
Kong it lawm aw, a hoih lo lam na etteh kei inla, a hoih lam na etteh zaw in. A hoiha gamta mi peuhmah Pasian pan ahi hi. A sia-a gamta mi peuhmah in Pasian a mu nai kei hi.
Mi khempeuh in Demetrius phat uh a, thutak nangawn in amah a phat hi. Kote in zong amah ka phat uh a, kote teci panna a man ahilam na thei hi.
Nang tungah kong gelhnop tam mahmah a, ahi hangin laidal le laitui-in ka gelh nuam kei hi.
Nang tawh kimuh baih ding ka lamen hi, tua ciangin maitang kituah in i kiho ding hi.
Nang tungah lemna om ta hen. Hih lai-a i lawmte in hong hopihna uh hong khak uh hi. Tua lai-a i lawmte a milipin na hopihsak in.
Jesu Christ nasem James sanggampa Jude in,
Pa Pasian in it a, Jesu Christ in a
Lainatna, lemna le itna a dimin note aa hi ta hen.

Kong it lawmte aw, note tawh i tanh khawm hotkhiatna thu no tungah kong gelh ding lawp mahmah napi misiangte tungah khatvei-a cinkim dinga hong kikemsak tua upna na hut theih nading uh kutna lai-a gelh ding kul ka sa hi.
Ahang in, sawtpi-a amaute a kimawh paihna thu b
Hihte khempeuh na theihsa uh ahi ta zongin "Topa c
Tua ciangin, a thuneihna dinmun uh kemcing lo a, a inn uh a taisan vansawltakte khuamial sungah khumcipin ni thupi Ni-a thukhen dingin tawntung sikkhainiang tawh a khih hi.
Tua bang zia in Sodom le Gomorrah le a kima khuapite in numei-pasal paktatna le lehtatna ah amau le amau kipia uh hi. Amaute, tawntung meikuang sunga gawtna thuak dingte etsakna a suak uh hi.
Tua tawh kibang tektek in, hih bang hih dinga a ngaihsunte in amau pumpi ninsak uh a, thuneihna nialin van mite a gensia uh hi.
Ahi hangin vansawltak a lianpen Michael nangawn, dawimangpa tawh Moses luang a kituh lai-un kosia in mawhsak ngam loin, "Topa in nang hong tai hen," ci bek hi.
Tua hi napi hih mite in a theihtel loh peuhpeuh uh gensia-in, a theihtelsate uah lah, a ngaihsun thei lo gamsate bangin hih uh a, hih nate mahmah in amaute a susia hi.
Amaute in gimna nak thuak na un cia! Cain lampi zui uh a, Balaam khialhna sungah a met delh in, Korah lehdona ah a kisia zo uh hi.

Hih mite in na itna pawite uh melhemsak in, zumna nei loin no tawh an ne uh a - amau kia bek a kivakkhop tuucingte ahi uh hi. Amaute huih in a mutleng kawikawi guah a paii lo meii; gah a gah lo, a kibulkalh - nihvei a si sikhiau singkung ahi uh hi;
a zumhuaina uh a phuankhiasak zuahzuah tuipihual huai siate, a leng kawikawi aksite, amau adingin a mial pen khuamial, a tawntung a kisitsakte ahi uh hi.

eite Honpa Pasian khat bek tungah i Topa Jesu Christ tungtawnin minthanna, thupina, vangliatna le thuneihna, khang hun khempeuh ma, tu laitak le a tawntung in om ta hen! Amen.

Hih genkholhna thute a sim mi thupha ngah hi-a, a sunga kigelhte za-a, a lungtanga a kemte thupha ngah ahi hi; bang hang hiam cih leh a hun hong nai ta hi.
John in,
Asia gama pawlpi sagihte tungah:
Tu laitaka om, a omsa le hong pai ding pa le ama kumpi tokhom mai-a kha a
le a muanhuai teci pa, misi pana a suak masa pen, le leitung kumpite a ukpa, Jesu Christ tung panin hehpihna le lemna no tungah om ta hen.

ama Pasian le Pa nasem dinga kumpi-gam le siampi hong hisak ama tungah minthanna le vangliatna a tawntungin om den ta hen! Amen.

Kumpi tokhom panin aw ngaih mahmah khat ka za a, "Tu-in Pasian tenna mite tawh om khawm ta dinga, amah amaute tawh a teng khawm ding hi. Amaute ama mi hi ding uh a, Pasian mahmah amau tawh om khawmin, amaute Pasian hi ding hi.
Amah in amaute mit-a khitui khempeuh a nulsak ding hi. Alui nate paizia mangthang zo ahi manin tua lai-ah natna, sihna, thumna, kahnate a om nawn kei ding hi," a ci hi.
Kumpi tokhom tunga tupa in, "Na khempeuh athakin ka bawl hi!" a ci hi. Tua ciangin amah in, "Hih thute muan takin thumaan ahi manin gelh in," hong ci hi.
Amah in kei kiangah, "Kizo ta hi! Keimah Alpha le Omega, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi. A dangtak mi tungah man nei loin nuntakna tuinak panin tui ka pia ding hi.
A gualzo mi in hihte khempeuh luahin, ama Pasian ka hi dinga, amah ka tapa ahi ding hi.

Ahi hangin a meidawite, a umlote, a tatsiate, tualthatte, numei le pasal paktatte, mi bumte, milim biate le zuauphuakte khempeuh - amaute mun ding, kaat kuang meilipi sung hi ding hi. Hih pen sihna nihna ahi hi," hong ci hi.
A nunung gimna sagihte tawh ki dim kuangkum sagihte a tawi vansawltak sagihte lakah khat ka kiangah hong pai-a, "Hong pai in, Tuuno zi ahi, mo, kong lak ding hi," hong ci hi.
Amah in Kha-in hong puamangin alian asang mualtungah hong tuna, Pasian kiang vantung pan hong paisuk, Khuapi Siangtho, Jerusalem hong lak hi.
Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi tana, a tanphatna, a manpha mahmah suang le jaspar tawh kibangin crystal bangin a siang hi.
Kulh lianpi sangpitak nei a, kongpi sawm le nih nei in, a kongpite ah vansawltak sawm le nih mah a om hi. A kongpite tungah, Israel beh sawm le nihte min kigelh hi.
Nisuahna lamah kongpi thum, leilu lamah thum, leitaw lamah thum le nitumna lamah thum a om hi.
Khuapi kulh in bulkip sawm le nih nei-a, tuate tungah Tuuno sawltakpi sawm le nihte’ min a tuang hi.
Kei hong hopih vansawltak in tua khuapi, a kongpite le a kulhte teh nading kham kibawl tehna ciang khat a tawi hi.
Tua khuapi pen kiu li nei, adung avai kikima kilam ahi hi. Amah in tua ciang tawh khuapi teh a, adung, avai le a sanna stadia a
Amah in a kulh teh a, tua vansawltak in, mihing tehna banga a teh hi-a, tong b
A kulh jaspar kiciang hi-a, a khuapi limlang siang tawh kibang kham citak ahi hi.
Khuapi kulh bulkipte, suang man pha namkim tawh kizem hi. A khatna bulkip jaspar hi-a a nihna saphire, a thumna chalcedony, a lina emerald,
a ngana sardonyx, a gukna carnelian, a sagihna chrysolite, a giatna beryal, a kuana topaz, a sawmna chrysophrace, a sawm le khatna Jacinth, le a sawm le nihna amethyst a
Kongpi sawm le nihte kep manpha sawm le nih hi-a, kongpi khat kep manpha khata kibawl ahi hi. Tua khuapi kongzingpite kham citak hi-a, limlang paisuak a bang hi.
Khuapi sungah biakinnpi ka mu kei hi. Bang hang hiam cih leh Thahat pen Topa Pasian le Tuuno, a khuapi biakinnpi ahi hi.
Pasian minthanna in tua khuapi taana, a meivak Tuuno ahi manin ni ahi a, khapi ahi zongin a taan ding kisam lo hi.
Minamte, tua khuavak ah lam pai ding uh a, leitung kumpite in a thupinate uh a sungah a puak ding uh hi.
Tua lai-ah zan hun om ngei nawn lo ding ahi manin a kongpite kikhak ni a om ngei kei ding hi.
Minamte minthanna le pahtawinate a sungah kipuak ding hi.
Tua sungah a siang lo bangmah lut thei lo dinga, a zumhuai, zuauphuakte khatpeuh zong a lut ngei kei ding hi; ahi hangin Tuuno nuntakna laibu sunga min kigelhsate bek a lut thei ding hi.
Tua ciangin vansawltak in nuntakna guntui hong laka, crystal bangin cim sitset a, Pasian le Tuuno tokhom pan luangkhia-in,
khuapi kongzing lian laizangah a luangsuk hi. Tua gunpang tuakah nuntakna singkung po-in, kha simin gah a, kum khatin sawm le nih vei a gah hi. Tua singkung a tehte minamte damsak nading ahi hi.
Kihamsiatna a om nawn kei ding hi. Tua khuapi sungah Pasian le Tuuno tokhom om dinga, a nasemte in ama na a sem ding uh hi.
Amaute in ama maitang mu ding uh a, amaute taltangah ama min a tuang ding hi.
Tua mun ah zan a om nawn kei ding hi. Topa Pasian vang in amaute taan ding ahi manin meivak tang le ni tang a kisam nawn kei ding hi. Amaute in a tawntung in uk den ding uh hi.
Tua vansawltak in, "Hih thute muan takin thutak ahi hi. Topa kamsangte khate’ Pasian in a pel lo-a, hong tungpah ding nate a nasemte a lak dingin ama vansawltak hong sawl ahi hi," hong ci hi.
"Ngai in, kong paipah ding hi! Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a kem cingte thupha ngah ahi hi."
Keimah John in hih nate mu-a, a za pa ka hi hi. Hihte mu-a ka zak khit ciangin hih thute hong lak vansawltak khe phungah a bia dingin ka boksuk hi.
Ahi hangin amah in kei kiangah, "Hih kei in! Kei zong nang le na sanggam kamsangte le hih laibu sunga thute a kemcingte khempeuh tawh nasem khawm khat mah ka hi hi. Pasian bia in!" hong ci hi.
Tua ciangin ka kiangah "Ahun nai ta ahi manin hih laibu-a genkholhna thute bilhcip kei in,
mawh bawlte in bawl lailai henla, a tatsiate tatsia lailai uh hen la, amaana gamtate gamta lailai hen; a siangthote siangtho lailai ta hen," ci-in hong gen hi.
"Ngai in, kong pai pah ding hi! Ka pahtakman ka kiangah om hi; mi khempeuh tungah ama hihsa tawh kizui-in ka pia ding hi.
Keimah, Alpha le Omega, a Masapen le a Nunungpen, a Patna le a Tawpna ka hi hi.
"Nuntakna singkung neih theih nading le kongpite tawna khuapi sunga lut nading thu neih theih nadinga a puantual uh a sawpsiangte thupha ngah ahi uh hi.
A pualam ah ahileh, uite, dawi-ai tawite, numei le pasal paktatte, tualthatte, milim biate, le zuauphuah nuamsa-a, zuauthu gente peuhmah a om ding uh hi.

Tua Kha le tua mo in, "Hong pai in!" ci uh hi. A za peuh in, "Hong pai in!" ci ta hen. A dangtak peuhmah hong pai ta hen. A ut peuhmah in letsonga kipia nuntakna tui sang ta hen.
Hih laibu sunga genkholhna thute a za peuhmah ka vauhilh hi: Mi khatpeuh in tuate banah bang khatpeuh a behlap leh Pasian in ama tungah hih laibu sunga kigentel gimnate a behlap ding hi.
Mi khatpeuh in hih genkholhna laibu sung pana thute a paihkhiat leh Pasian in ama tung panin hih laibu sunga kigentel nuntakna singkung pan le khuapi siangtho pana a tanh ding a lakkhiatsak ding hi.
Hih nate teci a pangpa in, "Hihi, kong paipah ding hi," a ci hi.
Amen. Topa Jesu aw, hong pai ta in.
Topa Jesu hehpihna Pasian mite tawh omkhawm ta hen. Amen.
